noun eye 眼睛和嘴一樣會說話。 yǎnjing hé zuǐ yīyàng huìshuō huà. Eyes are as eloquent as lips. 群眾的眼睛是雪亮的。 Qúnzhòng de yǎnjing shì xuěliàng de. The masses are sharp-sighted. or The masses have sharp eyes. 她那雙眼睛十分動人。 Tā nà shuāng yǎnjing shífēn dòngrén. Her eyes are very beautiful.
Déjà

adjective 1 easy 好(不)容易 hǎobùróngyì not at all easy; in a hard way 容易的題先做。 Róngyì de tí xiān zuò. Do the easy problems first. 說起來容易做起來難。 Shuō qǐlai róngyì zuò qǐlai nán. It’s easier said than done. 2 likely; liable; apt 他容易生病。 Tā róngyì shēngbìng. He often gets ill. 這容易引起誤會。 Zhè róngyì yǐnqǐ wùhuì. This is liable to cause misunderstanding. 人們容易把這兩個問題混淆起來。 Rénmen róngyì bǎ zhè liǎng ge wèntí hùnxiáo qǐlai. People are apt to confuse the two issues.

noun pleasure-boat; touring boat
noun drawing; picture; painting
noun commerce; trade; business

noun 1 condition; term; factor 貿易條件 màoyì tiáojiàn terms of trade 自然條件 zìrán tiáojiàn natural conditions 利用有利的條件 lìyòng yǒulì de tiáojiàn make use of the favourable factors 在目前條件下 zài mùqián tiáojiàn xià given the present conditions; under present circumstances 在對等的條件下給予優惠待遇 zài duì děng de tiáojiàn xià jǐyǔ yōuhuì dàiyù give preferential treatment on a reciprocal basis 這個工廠生產條件很好。 zhège gōngchǎng shēngchǎn tiáojiàn hěn hǎo. This factory has all the right conditions for production. 2 requirement; prerequisite; qualification 提出條件 Tíchū tiáojiàn list the prerequisites; put forward the requirements 當宇航員對身體條件要求很嚴。 Dāng yǔhángyuán duì shēntǐ tiáojiàn yāoqiú hěn yán. The physical fitness requirements for being an astronaut are very stiff. 做這項工作需要具備什麼條件？ Zuò zhè xiàng gōngzuò xūyào jùbèi shénme tiáojiàn？ What qualifications are needed for this job?
verb bear fruit; fructify 這棵樹去年結了好多果兒。 Zhè kē shù qùnián jiē le hǎoduō guǒr. This tree bore a lot of fruit last year.

verb take no care of; not look after 他整天忙, 從來不管孩子。 Tā zhěngtiān máng, cónglái bùguǎn háizi. He is always busy and never has time to care for his child. 他對公司裡的事不管不顧。 Tā duì gōngsī lǐ de shì bùguǎn bù gù. He has no interest in what’s going on in the company. conjunction regardless of; no matter (what, who, etc.) 不管多大的困難, 我們都能克服。 bùguǎn duō dà de kùnnan, wǒmen dōu néng kèfú. We can overcome any difficulty, however great. 不管他來不來, 我們(都)得走了。 bùguǎn tā lái bù lái, wǒmen děi zǒu le. Regardless of whether he comes or not, we’ve got to leave. 不管怎樣我不想去。 Bùguǎnzěnyàng wǒ bù xiǎng qù. In any case I don’t want to go.

verb 1 forget 我永遠不會忘記我們初次見面的那一天。 wǒ yǒngyuǎn bù huì wàngjì wǒmen chūcì jiànmiàn de nà yī tiān. I’ll never forget the day we first met. 2 overlook; neglect 不能忘記自己的責任。 Bùnéng wàngjì zìjǐ de zérèn. One mustn’t neglect one’s duties.

noun 1 connections; relations; relationship 搞好關係 gǎohǎo guānxi build good personal relations 家庭關係 jiātíng guānxi family connections; family (or familial) relations 托人找關係 tuōrén zhǎo guānxi seek for special connections 他們的關係不好。 Tāmen de guānxi bù hǎo. They are not on good terms. 她和老闆的關係很好。 tā hé lǎobǎn deguānxi hěn hǎo. She’s well in with her boss. 2 [often used correlatively with 沒有, 有] relevance; bearing; influence; significance 你去不去, 關係不大。 Nǐ qù bù qù, guānxi bùdà. Your going or not won’t make much difference. 這件事跟我沒有關係。 Zhè jiàn shì gēn wǒ méiyǒu guānxi. This matter has nothing to do with me. 這一點對今後工作關係重大。 Zhè yīdiǎn duì jīnhòu gōngzuò guānxi zhòngdà. This has an important bearing on our future work. 3 [usu. with 由於 or 因為 to indicate cause or reason] 由於時間關係, 就談到這裡吧。 Yóuyú shíjiān guānxi, jiù tán dào zhèlǐ ba. Time is limited, so I’ll stop here. 4 credentials showing membership in or affiliation with an organization 組織關係 zǔzhī guānxi membership credentials (or papers) 5 euphemistic (extramarital) sexual relations 發生關係 fāshēng guānxi have sexual relations with sb. (not as husband and wife); have an affair verb concern; affect; have a bearing on; have to do with 環保關係到國家的可持續發展。 Huán-bǎo guānxi dào guójiā de kěchíxù fāzhǎn. Environmental protection directly affects sustainable development in our country.

adjective special; particular; out of the ordinary 特別的愛好 tèbié de àihào an unusual hobby 他的口音很特別。 Tā de kǒuyin hěn tèbié. He has a peculiar accent. 這棟樓的設計沒有什麼特別的地方。 Zhè dòng lóu de shèjì méiyǒu shénmetèbié de dìfang. The design of this building is nothing out of the ordinary. 這種花每當夜晚就散發出一種特別的香味兒。 Zhèzhǒng huā měidāng yèwǎn jiù sànfā chū yī zhǒng tèbié de xiāngwèir. As evening approaches, this flower gives off a distinctive fragrance. adverb 1 especially; particularly 質量特別好 zhìliàng tèbié hǎo of extra fine quality 工作特別努力 Gōngzuò tèbié nǔlì especially hard-working 建設一支特別能戰鬥的隊伍 jiànshè yī zhī tèbié néng zhàndòu de duìwu train a contingent of exceptional fighters 今天特別熱。 Jīntiān tèbié rè. It’s extremely hot today. 這個報告特別有教育意義。 zhège bàogào tèbié yǒu jiàoyù yìyì. The talk was particularly instructive. 2 for a special purpose; specially; deliberately 他臨走時特別去向女主人道謝。 Tā línzǒu shí tèbié qùxiàng nǚzhǔrén dàoxiè. He made a point of thanking his hostess before he left the party. 這些花是我特別為你摘的。 Zhèxiē huā shì wǒ tèbié wèi nǐ zhāi de. I picked these flowers specially for you. 3 all the more; in particular 他喜愛體育, 特別是籃球。 Tā xǐ'ài tǐyù, tèbié shì lánqiú. He loves sports, particularly basketball. 這裡最需要醫務人員, 特別是外科醫生。 Zhèlǐ zuì xūyào yīwù rényuán, tèbié shì wàikē yīshēng. There’s a huge need for medical workers here, especially surgeons.

noun beginning; outset; commencement 一開始 yī kāishǐ at the very beginning 一種新的工作, 開始總會遇到一些困難。 Yī zhǒng xīn de gōngzuò, kāishǐ zǒng huì yùdào yīxiē kùnnan. You always run into some difficulties at the beginning of a new job. verb begin; start; commence 開始生效 kāishǐ shēngxiào take effect; come into effect (or force) 從頭開始 cóngtóu kāishǐ start from the very beginning 開始討論實質性問題 Kāishǐ tǎolùn shízhìxìng wèntí come to substantive questions 今天從第五課開始。 Jīntiān cóng dì-wǔ kè kāishǐ. Today we’ll begin with Lesson 5. 他們開始了旅行中最危險的階段。 Tāmenkāishǐ le lǚxíng zhōng zuì wēixiǎn de jiēduàn. They entered upon the most dangerous part of the journey.

adjective 1 simple; uncomplicated (opp. 複雜) 簡單明了 jiǎndānmíngliǎo simple and clear; concise and explicit 簡單拼湊 jiǎndān pīncòu simply piercing together 吃得很簡單 Chī de hěn jiǎndān have simple food 生活得很簡單 shēnghuó de hěn jiǎndān lead a simple life 事情沒那麼簡單。 Shìqing méi nàme jiǎndān. There is more to it. 這機器構造簡單。 Zhè jīqì gòuzào jiǎndān. The machine is simple in structure. 2 [usu. in the negative] commonplace; ordinary 她的槍法那麼準, 真不簡單。 Tā de qiāngfǎ nàme zhǔn, zhēn bù jiǎndān. She’s a marvel to be able to shoot with such accuracy. 這家伙鬼點子特多, 可不簡單。 Zhè jiāhuo guǐdiǎnzi tè duō, kě bù jiǎndān. This fellow is no simpleton. He is full of tricks. 3 oversimplified; casual 簡單粗暴 jiǎndāncūbào do things in an oversimplified and crude way 不能用簡單的方法去解決這個問題。 Bù néng yòng jiǎndān de fāngfǎ qù jiějué zhège wèntí. This matter cannot be settled in a summary fashion. 這篇文章我只是簡單地看了看。 Zhè piān wénzhāng wǒ zhǐshì jiǎndān de kàn le kàn. I only skimmed through this article.

verb handle; conduct; transact 辦理進出口業務 bànlǐ jìnchūkǒu yèwù handle imports and exports 辦理入境手續 bànlǐ rùjìng shǒuxù go through entry formalities (or procedures) 這些事情你可以斟酌辦理。 Zhèxiē shìqing nǐ kěyǐ zhēnzhuó bànlǐ. You may handle these matters as you see fit.

noun experience 個人經歷 Gèrén jīnglì personal experiences 生活經歷 shēnghuó jīnglì life experience 他這人經歷多, 見識廣。 Tā zhè rén jīnglì duō, jiànshi guǎng. He’s a man of wide knowledge and experience. verb go through; undergo; experience 現代科學技術正經歷著一場革命。 xiàndài kēxué jìshù zhèng jīnglì zhe yī cháng gémìng. Modern science and technology are in the throes of a revolution.

adjective 1 difficult 呼吸困難 hūxī kùnnan breathe with difficulty 2 financially difficult; economically straitened 生活困難 shēnghuó kùnnan live in straitened circumstances noun difficulty; hardness 困難重重 kùnnanchóngchóng be beset with difficulties 困難行業 kùnnan hángyè difficulty-ridden industry 困難職工 kùnnan zhígōng the needy (worker) 困難像彈簧, 你弱他就強。 kùnnan xiàng tánhuáng, nǐ ruò tājiù qiáng. Problems loom large when men don’t.

noun knowledge; intellect 知識淵博 zhīshi yuānbó wide knowledge; erudite; learned 知識密集型產業 zhīshi mìjí xíng chǎnyè knowledge-intensive industries 技術知識 jìshù zhīshi technical know-how 書本知識 shūběn zhīshi book learning 跟這種沒有知識的人議論嚴肅音樂本來就沒有意思。 Gēn zhèzhǒng méiyǒu zhīshi de rén yìlùn yánsù yīnyuè běnlái jiù méiyǒu yìsi. There’s no point discussing serious music with such ignorant people.

noun 1 general (or elementary) knowledge 科學常識 kēxué chángshí general knowledge of science 衛生常識 wèishēng chángshí elementary knowledge of hygiene and sanitation 2 common sense 天冷了要穿得暖一點兒, 這是常識。 tiān lěng le yào chuān de nuǎn yīdiǎnr, zhè shì chángshí. It’s common sense to dress more warmly in cold weather.

noun fact 與事實不符 Yǔ shìshí bùfú not tally with the facts 事實如此。 Shìshírúcǐ. This is how things are (or stand). 事實恰恰相反。 Shìshí qiàqià xiāngfǎn. The facts are just the opposite. or The opposite is the case. 事實俱在, 不容抵賴。 Shìshí jù zài, bù róng dǐlài. The facts are there and cannot be denied.
noun perfume; scent 噴香水 pēn xiāngshuǐ spray on perfume

verb 1 (dī) carry; hold (sth. with a handle) 手裡提著個籃子 Shǒulǐ tí zhe ge lánzi carry a basket in one hand 我去提壺水來。 Wǒ qù tí hú shuǐ lái. I will fetch a kettle of water. 2 lift; raise; promote 從井裡提水 Cóng jǐng lǐ tí shuǐ draw water from a well 把某人提到領導崗位上去 Bǎ mǒurén tídào lǐngdǎo gǎngwèi shàng qù promote sb. to a position of leadership 把問題提到原則高度來分析 bǎ wèntí tídào yuánzé gāodù lái fēnxi analyse a problem from the level of principle 把鞋提上。 Bǎ xié tí shàng. Pull your shoes on. 這種自行車很輕便, 一隻手就能提起來。 zhèzhǒng zìxíngchē hěn qīngbiàn, yī zhīshǒu jiù néng tí qǐlai. This bicycle is very light. You can lift it with one hand. 3 shift to an earlier time; move up a date 把會議的日期往前提 bǎ huìyì de rìqī wǎng qiántí move the date of the meeting up 4 put forward; bring up; raise 提方案 tí fāng'àn suggest (or propose) plans 提抗議 tí kàngyì lodge a protest 提條件 tí tiáojiàn put forward conditions 提問題 tí wèntí ask a question 提要求 tí yāoqiú make demands 提意見 tí yìjian make a criticism; make comments (or suggestions) 把事情提到會上去討論 bǎ shìqing tídào huì shàng qù tǎolùn take (or submit) the matter to the meeting for discussion 把計劃生育提到議事日程上來 bǎ jìhuà shēngyù tídào yìshì rìchéng shàng lái put family planning on the agenda 5 draw (or take) out; extract 我到車站提行李去。 Wǒ dào chēzhàn tí xíngli qù. I’m going to collect my luggage at the station. 銀行裡的這筆款子你提了沒有？ Yínháng lǐ de zhè bǐ kuǎnzi nǐ tí le méiyǒu？ Have you drawn the money from the bank? 6 summon (a prisoner) for interrogation 提犯人 Tí fànrén fetch a prisoner for interrogation 7 mention; refer to; bring up 別再提那件事了。 Bié zài tí nà jiàn shì le. Don’t bring that up again. 論文有幾處提到了該書。 Lùnwén yǒu jǐ chù tí dàoliǎo gāi shū. The paper contains several references to that book. 他提了一下這個計劃, 但沒有說明細節。 Tā tí le yīxià zhège jìhuà, dàn méiyǒu shuōmíng xìjié. He mentioned the plan, but gave no details. noun 1 dipper 油提 yóutí oil-dipper 2 rising stroke (in Chinese characters)

noun 1 drop (of liquid) 雨點兒 yǔdiǎnr raindrop 2 spot; dot; speck 墨點兒 mòdiǎnr ink spots 3 dot stroke (in Chinese characters) 4 mathematics point 兩點成一直線。 Liǎng diǎn chéng yī zhíxiàn. A straight line is formed by connecting two points. 5 decimal point; point 三點兒五 Sāndiǎnr wǔ three point five (3.5) 6 place; point 突破一點 tūpò yīdiǎn make a breakthrough at one point 7 aspect; feature 從這點上看 cóng zhè diǎn shàng kàn viewed from this aspect 對這一點沒人懷疑。 Duì zhè yīdiǎn méi rén huáiyí. Nobody has any doubt about that. 8 finance point 上證指數收漲44點。 Shàngzhèng Zhǐshù shōu zhǎng 44 diǎn. The Shanghai Composite Index ended up 44 points. verb 1 place a dot 點三個點兒表示省略 diǎn sān ge diǎnr biǎoshì shěnglüè a sequence of three dots marks an omission 2 touch on very briefly; skim 他用篙一點就把船撐開了。 Tā yòng gāo yīdiǎn jiù bǎ chuán chēng kāi le. He pushed the boat off with a shove of the pole. 她發言時點(到)了這件事。 tā fāyán shí diǎn le zhè jiàn shì. She touched on the matter in her speech. 3 drip 點眼藥 diǎn yǎnyào put drops in the eyes 4 sow in holes; dibble 點豆子 diǎn dòuzi dibble beans 5 check one by one; count 點貨 diǎnhuò check over goods; take stock 請把錢點一點。 Qǐng bǎ qián diǎn yī diǎn. Please count the money. 6 select; choose 他點了牛排。 Tā diǎn le niúpái. He ordered a steak. 7 hint; point out 一點他就明白了。 Yīdiǎn tā jiù míngbai le. He quickly took the hint. 8 light; burn; kindle 點燈 diǎn dēng light a lamp 他是火爆性子, 一點就著。 Tā shì huǒbào xìngzi, yīdiǎn jiùzhe. He’s got a fiery temper and flares up very quickly. 9 embellish; decorate 裝點 zhuāngdiǎn furnish; decorate measure word 1 a little; a bit; some 讀點兒魯迅 Dú diǎn r Lǔ Xùn read some of Lu Xun’s works 給我點兒紙。 gěi wǒ diǎn r zhǐ. Give me some paper, will you? 他今天好點兒了。 Tā jīntiān hǎo diǎn r le. He’s feeling a bit better today. 人的認識一點兒也不能離開實踐。 Rén de rènshi yī diǎn r yě bùnéng líkāi shíjiàn. Human knowledge cannot be separated from practice. 2 [for items] 我有幾點不成熟的想法。 Wǒ yǒu jǐ diǎn bù chéngshú de xiǎngfa. I have some tentative suggestions. noun 1 o'clock 上午九點(鐘) Shàngwǔ jiǔ diǎn zhōng nine o’clock in the morning 現在幾點了？ Xiànzài jǐ diǎn le？ What time is it now? 2 appointed time 到點了 Dào diǎn le it’s time (to do sth.) 3 VARIANT OF 76626147雲板yun2ban3雲板 dated iron bell or clapper (used by government offices or influential families to give time or announce an event) noun refreshments 茶點 chádiǎn tea and pastries noun printing point (a unit of measurement for type bodies)

noun 1 hook 衣鉤 yīgōu clothes-hook 魚鉤 yúgōu fishhook 2 calligraphy hook stroke 3 check mark; tick 打鉤 dǎgōu make a check mark verb 1 secure with a hook; hook 他的袖子給釘子鉤住了。 Tā de xiùzi gěi dīngzi gōu zhù le. His sleeve caught on a nail. 2 crochet 鉤花邊 gōu huābiān crochet lace 3 sew with large stitches 鉤貼邊 gōu tiēbiān sew on an edging 4 spoken form for the numeral 9 on certain occasions 5 (Gōu) a surname

verb turn sideways; slant 把桌子斜過來 bǎ zhuōzi xié guòlai turn the table sideways adjective oblique; slanting; inclined; tilted 斜著眼看人 xié zhe yǎn kàn rén cast sidelong glances at sb.; look sideways at sb. 斜躺在沙發上 Xié tǎng zài shāfā shàng recline on a sofa 這根線斜了。 Zhè gēn xiàn xié le. The line is slanting. 柱子有點兒斜。 zhùzi yǒudiǎnrxié. The pillar is a little tilted.

adjective vertical; upright; perpendicular (opp. 橫) 竪放 shù fàng put sth. vertically 畫一條竪線 huà yī tiáo shùxiàn draw a vertical line verb set upright; erect; stand 竪旗杆 shù qígān erect a flagpole 竪大拇指 shù dàmuzhǐ hold up an approving thumb 這杆子我竪不起來。 Zhè gānzi wǒ shù bù qǐlai. I can’t get the pole to stand up. noun vertical stroke (in Chinese characters) “王”字的寫法是三橫一竪。 “Wáng” zì de xiěfǎ shì sān héng yī shù. The character 王 is composed of one vertical and three horizontal strokes. noun literary archaic young servant
verb press down; restrain 捺著性子 nàzhe xìngzi control one’s temper 勉強捺住心頭的怒火 miǎnqiǎng nà zhù xīntóu de nùhuǒ barely manage to restrain one’s anger noun right-falling stroke ()

noun 1 discount; rebate 打八折 dǎ bā zhé give 20% discount; charge 80% of the original price 2 turning stroke measure word an act of zaju (雜劇) verb 1 break; snap 折斷腿 zhéduàn tuǐ fracture (or break) one’s leg 折斷一根樹枝 zhéduàn yī gēn shùzhī break off a branch 2 suffer the loss of; lose 損兵折將 sǔnbīng-zhéjiàng suffer heavy losses 3 bend; twist 曲折 qūzhé twists and turns 4 turn back; change direction 邊界由此折向西南。 Biānjiè yóucǐ zhé xiàng xīnán. From here the boundary turns southwestward. 5 convinced; filled with admiration 心折 xīnzhé deeply convinced; filled with heartfelt admiration 6 convert into; amount to 把市斤折成公斤 bǎ shìjīn zhé chéng gōngjīn convert (or change) jin into kilograms 這筆外幣折成人民幣是多少？ Zhè bǐ wàibì zhé chéng rénmínbì shì duōshao？ How much does this foreign excharge convert into Renminbi? noun folded booklet with a slipcase, used for keeping accounts, etc.; folder 存折 cúnzhé account book verb fold 把信折好 bǎ xìn zhé hǎo fold the letter 把紙對折起來 bǎ zhǐ duìzhé qǐlai fold the sheet of paper in two

adjective 1 horizontal; transverse (opp. 豎, 直) 橫線 héngxiàn a horizontal line 2 from east to west or from west to east (opp. 縱) See 22625024橫貫heng2guan4橫貫 3 at a right angle to (opp. 直, 縱) See 22628608橫剖面heng2pou1mian4橫剖面 4 unrestrained; turbulent 老淚橫流 lǎolèihéngliú tears flowing from aged eyes 蔓草橫生 màncǎo héng shēng overgrown with creepers 5 [meaning much the same as 橫 hèng 1, limited to use in idiomatic expressions] violent; fierce; flagrant See 22633472橫行霸道heng2xing2ba4dao4橫行霸道 verb 1 lie crosswise; be sideways 中文也能橫著寫。 Zhōngwén yě néng héng zhe xiě. Chinese can also be written across the page. 他橫在長沙發上看報。 Tā héng zài chángshāfā shàng kànbào. He reclined on the settee reading the newspaper. 一棵倒了的樹橫在馬路上。 Yī kē dǎo le de shù héng zài mǎlù shàng. A fallen tree lay across the road. 2 place sth. crosswise (or horizontally) 把扁擔橫過來。 Bǎ biǎndan héng guò lái. Put the carrying pole in a horizontal position. 把桌子橫過來。 bǎ zhuōzihéng guòlai. Turn this table and place it crosswise. noun horizontal stroke (in a Chinese character) adverb dialect 1 in any case; anyway 我橫不那麼辦！ Wǒ héng bù nàme bàn! I’m not going to do that anyway. 2 most likely; probably 今天下雨, 他橫不來了。 Jīntiān xiàyǔ, tā héng bù lái le. It’s raining today; he most likely won’t come.

verb 1 lie 仰臥 yǎngwò lie on one’s back 2 dialect lay a baby down 把小孩臥在床上。 bǎ xiǎohái wò zàichuáng shàng. Lay the baby on the bed. 3 (of animals or birds) crouch; sit 4 figurative live in seclusion 5 dialect poach (eggs) 臥個雞子兒 wò ge jī zir poach an egg noun 1 abbreviation sleeping car (or carriage); sleeper 2 abbreviation sleeping berth 軟臥 ruǎnwò soft sleeping berth 硬臥 yìngwò hard sleeping berth 3 abbreviation bedroom 主臥 zhǔwò master bedroom
verb cast aside; throw overboard; neglect 撇下不管 piēxià bù guǎn cast aside; ignore verb skim 把油撇掉 bǎ yóu piē diào skim off the fat 撇沫兒 piē mòr skim off the scum

noun content; substance 內容和形式的統一 nèiróng hé xíngshì de tǒngyī unity of content and form 他的演說缺乏內容。 Tā de yǎnshuō quēfá nèiróng. His speech lacked substance (or content). 這本書內容豐富。 Zhè běn shū nèiróng fēngfù. This book has substantial content. 這次談話的內容牽涉面很廣。 Zhè cì tánhuà de nèiróng qiānshè miàn hěn guǎng. The talk covered a lot of ground.

adverb already 已經兩點了。 Yǐjīng liǎng diǎn le. It’s already two o’clock. 這樣已經不錯了。 Zhèyàng yǐjīng bù cuò le. It’s good enough as it is. or It could be worse. 這點前面已經說過了。 Zhè diǎn qiánmian yǐjīng shuō guò le. This has been dealt with before. 我們已經十年不見了。 Wǒmen yǐjīng shí nián bù jiàn le. It’s ten years since we last saw each other.
verb review; revise 複習功課 fùxí gōngkè review (or revise) lessons
verb (of students) prepare lessons before class; preview

noun way; fashion; pattern 鬥爭方式 dòuzhēng fāngshì form of struggle 領導方式 lǐngdǎo fāngshì style of leadership 生活方式 shēnghuó fāngshì way (or mode) of life; life-style 一反過去因襲的方式 yī fǎn guòqu yīnxí de fāngshì depart from the formula followed in the past 做工作應注意方式方法。 Zuò gōngzuò yīng zhùyì fāngshì fāngfǎ. In doing our work, we must pay attention to method and style.
verb demonstrate 工人們為我們演示了他們自己的發明創造。 Gōngrén men wèi wǒmen yǎnshì le tāmen zìjǐ de fāmíng chuàngzào. The workers gave us a demonstration (or show-how) of their own inventions.
noun title, subject or topic selected verb (-//-) select a title, subject or topic (for writing or research)
adjective not alike; different; distinct 不同意見 bùtóng yìjiàn dissenting views 趣味不同 qùwèi bùtóng have different tastes; varying tastes 在不同的程度上 zài bùtóng de chéngdu shàng to varying degrees

noun date 日期和時間設置 rìqī hé shíjiān shèzhì day and time set 出生日期 chūshēng rìqī date of birth 起程的日期定了嗎？ Qǐchéng de rìqī dìng le ma？ Has the departure date been fixed? 信上的日期是六月二日。 Xìn shàng de rìqī shì Liùyuè èr rì. The letter is dated June 2. 開會的日期是六月二十一日到二十七日。 Kāihuì de rìqī shì Liùyuè èrshíyī rì dào èrshíqī rì. The congress will be in session from June 21st to June 27th.

noun address 電郵地址 diànyóudìzhǐ email address 固定地址 gùdìng dìzhǐ permanent address 回信地址 huíxìn dìzhǐ return address 臨時地址 línshí dìzhǐ temporary address 通訊地址 tōngxùn dìzhǐ mailing address 轉送地址 zhuǎnsòng dìzhǐ forwarding address

noun age 年齡不饒人。 Niánlíng bù ráo rén. Age will show itself. or Age will tell. 從馬的牙齒可以看出它的年齡。 Cóng mǎ de yáchǐ kěyǐ kànchū tā de niánlíng. You can tell a horse’s age from its teeth. 他參軍還不夠年齡。 Tā cānjūn hái bùgòu niánlíng. He is too young to join the army.
noun 1 longevity; long life 2 courteous your venerable age 老大爺, 您今年高壽？ Lǎodàye, nín jīnnián gāoshòu? May I ask how old you are, Grandpa?
noun nutrition; nourishment 有營養 yǒu yíngyǎng nourishing; nutritious 缺乏營養 quēfá yíngyǎng (suffer from) inadequate nutrition
noun 1 old woman 2 dated woman in a certain occupation 媒婆兒 méipór woman matchmaker 收生婆 shōushēngpó midwife 3 husband's mother; mother-in-law

pronoun it 這杯牛奶你喝了它。 Zhè bēi niúnǎi nǐ hē le tā. Drink up this glass of milk. 有個東西在黑影裡蹲著, 我也看不清它到底是貓還是狗。 Yǒu ge dōngxi zài hēiyǐng lǐ dūn zhe, wǒ yě kàn bù qīng tā dàodǐ shì māo háishi gǒu. Some animal was crouching in the shadow but I couldn’t make out whether it was a cat or a dog. 這些畫報我都看過了, 你把它拿去吧。 Zhèxiē huàbào wǒ dōu kàn guò le, nǐ bǎ tā ná qù ba. I’ve finished with these magazines, you can have them. noun (Tā) a surname

noun 1 dialect father 爺娘 yé-niáng father and mother 2 dialect grandfather 3 [a respectful form of addressing an elderly man] uncle 李爺 lǐ yé Uncle Li 四爺 sì yé Fourth Uncle 4 dated [a form of addressing an official or rich man] sir; master; lord 少爺 shàoyé young master 縣太爺 xiàntàiyé county magistrate 5 [a worshipper's form of address for a god] 土地爺 tǔdìyé God of the Land 閻王爺 Yánwangyé Yama, King of Hell
noun colloquial pa; dad; father 爸媽 bàmā dad and mom; parents
noun 1 Yu (reputed founder of the Xia Dynasty (c. 21st-16th century BC)) 2 a surname

adjective literary high; lofty noun 1 dated [often in names of studies, restaurants or teahouses] small room or veranda with windows 2 archaic high-fronted, curtained carriage 3 archaic window or door

adjective 1 good; fine; nice (opp. 壞) 好人 hǎorén nice person 祖國的好兒子 Zǔguó de hǎo érzi worthy (or fine) son of our country 莊稼長得真好。 Zhuāngjia zhǎng de zhēn hǎo. The crops are growing well. 2 friendly; kind 好朋友 Hǎo péngyou good (or great) friend 他們對我真好。 Tāmen duì wǒ zhēn hǎo. They are really kind to me. 倆孩子又好了。 Liǎ háizi yòu hǎo le. The two children are friends again. 3 be in good health; get well 你好哇！ Nǐ hǎo wa! How are you? 我的病好了。 Wǒ de bìng hǎo le. I’m well (or all right) now. 4 be ready; done 飯好了。 Fàn hǎo le. The food (or rice) is ready. 5 [after verbs to indicate finishing or finishing satisfactorily] 我把他的病治好了。 Wǒ bǎ tā de bìng zhì hǎo le. I cured his illness. 這件事他做不好。 Zhè jiàn shì tā zuò bù hǎo. He can’t do this job well. 坐好吧, 要開會了。 Zuò hǎo ba, yào kāihuì le. Take your seats, please. The meeting is going to begin. 6 [before verbs to denote what is satisfying] good; easy 好吃 hǎochī good to eat—delicious 暖瓶放在這兒好拿。 Nuǎnpíng fàng zài zhèr hǎo ná. It’s handy to have the thermos here. 這本書可不好買。 Zhè běn shū kě bù hǎo mǎi. This book is not easily available. 這個問題好回答。 Zhège wèntí hǎo huídá. This question is easy to answer. 7 [at the beginning of a sentence or clause, to express agreement, disapproval, surprise, etc.] 好, 就這麼辦。 Hǎo, jiù zhème bàn. OK, it’s settled. 好了, 不要再說了。 Hǎo le, bùyào zài shuō le. All right, no need to say any more. 好！ 那得多少錢！ Hǎo! Nà dé duōshao qián! Gosh! How much money will that cost! 好, 這下可麻煩了。 Hǎo, zhè xià kě máfan le. Well, we’re in for trouble now. adverb 1 [before adjectives with exclamatory force] very; quite; so 好大的工程！ Hǎo dà de gōngchéng! What a huge project! 你好大膽子。 Nǐ hǎo dà dǎnzi. You are so daring. 2 dialect [before adjectives in the same way as 多] to what extent; how 火車站離這兒好遠？ Huǒchēzhàn lí zhèr hǎo yuǎn？ How far is the railway station from here? 3 [before indefinite time or numbers] quite 好半天 hǎobàntiān quite a while 好幾個 hǎojǐgè quite a few 好幾天 hǎojǐtiān quite a few days verb produce favourable effects 這事可好了他了。 Zhè shì kě hǎo le tā le. This will benefit him. auxiliary 1 the better to; in order to; so that 把她的地址告訴我, 我好找她。 Bǎ tā de dìzhǐ gàosu wǒ, wǒ hǎo zhǎo tā. Tell me her address so that I can go and see her. 今兒早點睡, 明兒好早起趕火車。 Jīnr zǎodiǎn shuì, míngr hǎo zǎoqǐ gǎn huǒchē. Let’s turn in early, so as to get up early tomorrow to catch the train. 2 dialect may; can; should 我好進來嗎？ Wǒ hǎo jìnlai ma？ May I come in? 時間不早了, 你好走了。 Shíjiān bù zǎo le, nǐhǎo zǒu le. It’s getting late. You ought to get going.

noun antithetical couplet; couplet 喜對 xǐ duì wedding couplet verb 1 answer; reply 無言以對 wúyányǐduì have nothing to say in reply 2 treat; cope with; counter 刀對刀, 槍對槍 dāo duì dāo, qiāng duì qiāng sword against sword and spear against spear 上海隊對北京隊 Shànghǎi duì duì Běijīng duì Shanghai versus Beijing 3 train on; direct at 槍口對著某人 qiāngkǒu duì zhe mǒurén train the gun on sb. 她的話不是對著你的。 Tā de huà bù shì duì zhe nǐ de. What she said was not directed at you. 4 bring (two things) into contact; fit together 這個榫頭對不上。 Zhège sǔntou duì bù shàng. This tenon does not fit. 5 suit; agree; get along 對心眼兒 duìxīnyǎnr suit one very well; compatible 6 compare; check; identify; verify 對筆跡 duì bǐjì identify the handwriting 對號碼 duì hàomǎ verify numbers 7 set; adjust 對好望遠鏡的距離 duì hǎo wàngyuǎnjìng de jùlí adjust the focus of a telescope 8 mix; add 茶太濃了, 給我對點兒水。 Chá tài nóng le, gěi wǒ duì diǎnr shuǐ. Add some water to the tea, it’s too strong for me. 9 divide into halves 對股劈 duìgǔ pī go halves; split fifty-fifty adjective 1 opposite; opposing See 59556067對岸dui4an4對岸 2 right; correct 猜對了 cāi duìle guess right 對, 就這麼辦。 Duì, jiù zhème bàn. All right, just do it. or Yes, that’s what we’ll do. 你說得很對。 Nǐ shuō de hěn duì. What you say is quite true. or You are quite right. 這事你做得對。 Zhè shì nǐ zuò de duì. You did the right thing. 他今天神色不對。 Tā jīntiān shénsè bùduì. He doesn’t look himself today. adverb mutual; face to face 對罵 duìmà call each other names; curse each other 對飲 duìyǐn (two people) drink together 對坐 duìzuò sit facing each other preposition with regard to; concerning 對健康不利 duì jiànkāng bùlì bad for one’s health; unhealthy 對青少年的教育工作 duì qīng-shàonián de jiàoyù gōngzuò educating young people; education of the young 對這個問題的不同意見 duì zhège wèntí de bùtóng yìjian different views on this question 對犯罪分子實行法律制裁 duì fànzuì fènzǐ shíxíng fǎlǜ zhìcái impose legal sanctions on criminals; punish criminals according to the law 他對父親很尊敬。 Tā duì fùqin hěn zūnjìng. He has great respect for his father. 這錄音機對我來說是夠好的了。 Zhè lùyīnjī duì wǒ láishuō shì gòu hǎo de le. This recorder is good enough for me. measure word pair; couple 一對夫婦 yī duì fūfù a married couple 一對花瓶 yī duì huāpíng a pair of vases

verb 1 rise; get up; stand up 起席 qǐxí rise from the table 早睡早起 zǎoshuìzǎoqǐ early to bed and early to rise 2 remove; extract; pull 起雷 qǐléi clear mines 起油 qǐyóu remove grease stains 起釘子 qǐ dīngzi draw out a nail 起瓶塞 qǐ píngsāi pull the cork from a bottle 把畫起下來 bǎ huà qǐ xiàlai take down a picture 3 appear; raise 腳上起水泡 jiǎo shàng qǐ shuǐpào get blisters on one’s feet 4 rise; grow 起疑心 qǐ yíxīn become suspicious 起作用 qǐ zuòyòng take effect 起風了。 Qǐ fēng le. The wind is rising. 5 draft; work out 起稿子 qǐ gǎozi work out (or make) a draft 6 build; set up 起伙 qǐ huǒ set up a mess 起一堵牆 qǐ yī dǔ qiáng build a wall 7 start; begin 從今天起 cóng jīntiān qǐ starting from today 8 draw; get 起護照 qǐ hùzhào get one’s passport 9 leave; start See 28173312起程qi3cheng2起程;28176896起飛qi3fei1 起飛 10 move (or rise) up 這球不起了。 Zhè qiú bù qǐ le. There is no spring left in this ball. or The ball doesn’t bounce. 11 to start; to launch See 28171776起兵qi3bing1起兵;28188160起事qi3shi4 起事 preposition 1 [after a verb preceded by 從 or 由] 從頭兒講起 cóng tóu'ér jiǎng qǐ tell the story from the very beginning 從何說起？ Cóng hé shuō qǐ？ What shall I say? or What’s there to say? 2 dialect from 起這兒往北 qǐ zhèr wǎng běi go north from here 3 dialect by 我見他起窗外走過。 Wǒ jiàn tā qǐ chuāngwài zǒuguò. I saw him going by the window. noun (Qǐ) a surname measure word 1 case; instance 一起交通事故 Yī qǐ jiāotōng shìgù a traffic accident 兩起大腦炎 Liǎng qǐ dànǎoyán two cases of cerebritis 2 batch; group 分兩起出發 fēn liǎng qǐ chūfā set out in two groups (or batches)

noun 1 visitor; guest (opp. 主) 家裡來客了。 Jiālǐ lái kè le. We have a guest at home. 2 traveller; passenger 3 travelling merchant 珠寶客 zhūbǎo kè jeweller 4 customer; client; patron 客來客往 kèlái-kèwǎng customers come and go; be thronged with customers 回頭客 huítóukè regular customer 5 person engaged in some particular pursuit 刺客 cìkè assassin 政客 zhèngkè politician verb settle (or live) in a strange place; be a stranger 客於他鄉多年 kè yú tāxiāng duō nián live away from one’s hometown for years See 24995840客居ke4ju1客居 adjective 1 objective; independent of human consciousness See 24992256客觀ke4guan1客觀 2 visiting; guest See 24991488客隊ke4dui4客隊;64714467客座ke4zuo4 客座 measure word dialect portion (of food, drink, etc.) 三客冰激凌 sān kè bīngjilíng three servings of ice cream; three ice creams

noun 1 gas 毒氣 dúqì poisonous gas 2 air 這球氣兒挺足。 Zhè qiú qìr tǐng zú. There’s enough air in the ball. 自行車前胎沒氣了。 Zìxíngchē qián tāi méi qì le. The front tyre of the bike is flat. 3 breath 停下來歇口氣 Tíng xiàlai xiē kǒuqì stop and catch one’s breath 長跑運動員需要氣長。 Chángpǎo yùndòngyuán xūyào qì cháng. Long-distance runners require plenty of stamina. 老太太已經沒氣了。 Lǎotàitai yǐjing méi qì le. The old woman has stopped breathing. 4 weather 天氣 tiānqì weather 5 smell; odour 香氣 xiāngqì sweet smell; fragrance 6 anger; annoyance; irritation 7 airs; manner 官氣 guānqì bureaucratic airs 8 spirit; morale 朝氣 zhāoqì youthful spirit 英雄氣 yīngxióng qì heroic spirit 9 Chinese medicine vital energy; energy of life 10 Chinese medicine certain symptoms (of diseases) verb 1 get angry; be enraged; be annoyed 氣壞了 qì huài le be beside oneself with rage 氣哭了 qì kū le be annoyed to tears 氣得直哆嗦 Qì de zhí duōsuo tremble with rage 氣出一場病來 qì chū yī cháng bìng lái have an attack of illness caused by anger 我氣他工作太馬虎。 Wǒ qì tā gōngzuò tài mǎhu. I’m angry with him for being careless in his work. 我不氣別的, 氣他事先不通知我一聲。 Wǒ bù qì bié de, qì tā shìxiān bù tōngzhī wǒ yī shēng. I’m annoyed with him simply because he didn’t notify me beforehand. 2 make angry; enrage; annoy 你別氣我了！ Nǐ bié qì wǒ le! Stop annoying me! 他就是想氣氣我。 Tā jiùshì xiǎng qì qì wǒ. He just wanted to annoy me. 我故意氣他一下。 Wǒ gùyì qì tā yīxià. I got him angry on purpose. or I was deliberately trying to annoy him. 3 bully; insult 受氣 shòuqì be bullied; suffer wrong

noun 1 expenses; outlay See 23655168家用jia1yong4家用;26009344零用ling2yong4零用 2 usefulness; use 沒什麼用 méishénme yòng rather useless 有點兒用 yǒudiǎnr yòng be of some use 3 (Yòng) a surname verb 1 use; employ; apply; consume 酒精常用作溶劑。 Jiǔjīng chángyòng zuò róngjì. Alcohol is often used as a solvent. 你會不會用計算機？ Nǐ huì bù huì yòng jìsuànjī？ Do you know how to operate a computer? 你應該把主要精力用在學習上。 Nǐ yīnggāi bǎ zhǔyào jīnglì yòng zài xuéxí shàng. You should devote your chief energies to your studies. 2 [usu. in the negative] need 不用擔心。 Bùyòng dānxīn. Don’t worry. 不用開燈。 Bù yòng kāi dēng. There’s no need to turn on the light. 3 courteous eat; drink 請用茶。 Qǐng yòng chá. Won’t you have some tea, please? preposition with 用火烤 yòng huǒ kǎo roast over the fire 用手掰 Yòng shǒu bāi break with one’s hands 用水煮 yòng shuǐ zhǔ boil in water 用五十八秒鐘跑完全程 yòng wǔshíbā miǎo zhōng pǎo wán quánchéng run the course in 58 seconds 用針刺麻醉做外科手術 yòng zhēncì mázuì zuò wàikē shǒushù employ acupuncture anaesthesia in surgery conjunction literary [usu. in letters] hence; therefore 用特函達。 Yòng tè hán dá. Hence this letter.

verb 1 thank 謝了又謝 xiè le yòu xiè thank again and again 多謝。 Duōxiè. Thanks a lot. 不用謝。 Bù yòng xiè. Don’t mention it. 2 literary make an apology; excuse oneself 謝病 xièbìng excuse oneself on grounds of illness 謝過 Xièguò apologize for having done sth. wrong 3 decline See 33321984謝絕xie4jue2謝絕 4 (of flowers, leaves) wither 凋謝 diāoxiè wither and fall noun (Xiè) a surname

adverb 1 [for an action yet to take place, or contemplated] again; once more; further 再創新紀錄 Zài chuàng xīn jìlù try to set another new record 良機難再。 Liángjī nán zài. Opportunity knocks but once. 青春不再。 Qīngchūnbùzài. One’s youth never returns. 我不能再喝了。 Wǒ bùnéng zài hē le. I mustn’t drink any more. 我還得再去幾次。 Wǒ hái děi zài qù jǐ cì. I have to go a few more times. 我叫他別再來, 可他又來了。 Wǒ jiào tā bié zài lái, kě tā yòu lái le. I told him not to come again, but here he is. 我再也不去了。 Wǒ zài yě bù qù le. I won’t go again. 要是再下雨, 那還得改日子。 Yào shì zài xià yǔ, nà hái děi gǎi rìzi. If it rains again, the date will have to be changed. 有工夫, 請再來玩。 Yǒu gōngfu, qǐng zài lái wán. Please come again whenever you are free. 2 [before adjectives] more; -er 再好不過了。 Zài hǎo bù guò le. It couldn’t be better. 再冷的天我也不怕。 Zài lěng de tiān wǒ yě bù pà. I can stand colder weather than this. 還有再大點兒的嗎？ Háiyǒu zài dà diǎnr de ma？ Have you got a bigger one? 聲音再大一點兒。 shēngyīn zài dà yīdiǎnr. Louder, please. 3 [indicating a continuing situation in conditional or suppositional clauses] 再不走我們就趕不上火車了。 Zài bù zǒu wǒmen jiù gǎn bù shàng huǒchē le. We’ll miss the train if we delay any longer. 再過幾年, 這個村子就要整個變樣了。 Zài guò jǐ nián, zhège cūnzi jiù yào zhěnggè biànyàng le. A few more years and this village will change completely. 4 [for a delayed action, preceded by an expression of time or condition] then; only then 你做完了功課再出去。 Nǐ zuò wán le gōngkè zài chūqu. Finish your homework before you go out. 先到張家, 再到李家。 Xiān dào zhāng jiā, zài dào lǐ jiā. First go to the Zhangs’, and then to the Lis’. 雨住了再走吧。 Yǔ zhù le zài zǒu ba. Let’s leave when the rain stops. 這件事等明年再說。 Zhè jiàn shì děng míngnián zàishuō. This business can keep till next year. 5 in addition; on top of that 到會的有教職員工, 再就是學生代表。 Dàohuì de yǒu jiàozhíyuángōng, zài jiù shì xuésheng dàibiǎo. Present at the meeting were faculty, administration, and staff, and also student representatives. 6 [used correlatively with 也, followed by a negative expression] no matter how...still (not) 他再賣力也升不了職。 Tā zài màilì yě shēngbuliǎo zhí. No matter how hard he works, he’ll never get promoted. 你再勸他也沒有用。 Nǐ zài quàn tā yě méiyǒu yòng. Try as you may, you will never persuade him.

noun view; opinion 依我之見 Yī wǒ zhī jiàn in my opinion; to my mind verb 1 see; catch sight of 只見一個人影閃過牆角 Zhǐjiàn yī ge rényǐng shǎn guò qiángjiǎo catch sight of sb. turning the corner 從來沒見過這種鳥。 Cónglái méi jiàn guò zhèzhǒng niǎo. I’ve never seen a bird like that before. 2 meet with; be exposed to 見困難就上, 見榮譽就讓 jiàn kùnnan jiùshàng, jiàn róngyù jiùràng dash forward where there are difficulties to overcome and draw back when honours are to be conferred; take difficulty for oneself and leave honours to others 冰見熱就化。 Bīng jiàn rè jiù huà. Ice melts with heat. 這種藥怕見光。 Zhèzhǒng yào pà jiàn guāng. This medicine is not to be exposed to daylight. 見人就獻媚, 誰見誰討厭。 jiàn rén jiù xiànmèi, shuí jiàn shuí tǎoyàn. Those who seek to please everybody please nobody. 3 show evidence of; appear to be 見諸報端 jiàn zhū bàoduān appear in newspapers 見之於行動 jiànzhīyúxíngdòng be translated into action 並不見瘦 bìng bù jiàn shòu not seem to be any thinner 4 refer to; see; vide 見第三十六頁 jiàn dì-sān shíliù yè see page 36 情況已見好轉。 Qíngkuàng yǐ jiàn hǎozhuǎn. The condition is improving. 5 meet; call on; see 待會兒見。 Dāihuir jiàn. See you later. 你見到他了沒有？ Nǐ jiàndào tā le méiyǒu？ Did you meet him? 我不想見他。 Wǒ bù xiǎng jiàn tā. I don’t wish to see him. 她今天下午要來見你。 Tā jīntiān xiàwǔ yào lái jiàn nǐ. She’ll call on you this afternoon. verb literary 1 [before a verb to indicate the passive] 見愛 jiàn'ài be loved (or liked); be regarded highly 2 [before a verb in polite requests] See 23814656見告jian4gao4見告

noun 1 country; nation; state 大國 dàguó a big country 強國 qiángguó a powerful nation 諸侯國 zhūhóu guó feudal states 保家衛國 bǎojiāwèiguó protect our homes and defend our country 利國利民 lìguólìmín benefit both country and people; good for the country and for the people 2 best of the nation See 22188288國手guo2shou3國手;22186496國色guo2se4國色 3 abbreviation Kuomintang (KMT) 國共兩黨 Guó Gòngliǎngdǎng KMT and CPC 4 (Guó) a surname adjective 1 of the state; national See 22161408國花guo2hua1國花 2 of our country; Chinese See 22161664國畫guo2hua4國畫

noun beauty (opp. 醜) 美醜 měi-chǒu beauty and ugliness 心靈美 xīnlíngměi inner beauty verb 1 beautify; prettify See 26658048美容mei3rong2美容 2 colloquial be pleased with oneself; pride oneself upon; feel smug 美得了不得 měi déliǎo bùdé take too much pride in oneself adjective 1 beautiful; pretty (opp. 醜) 風景多美啊！ Fēngjǐng duō měi a! What beautiful scenery! 她長得很美。 Tā zhǎng de hěn měi. She’s very pretty. 2 very satisfactory; good; pleasing See 66674147美酒mei3jiu3美酒 noun 1 abbreviation American continent 南美 Nán Měi South America 2 abbreviation America; the United States of America; the US 美鈔 Měichāo US banknote; United States notes; greenback

noun 1 law 守法公民 shǒu fǎ gōngmín law-abiding citizen 2 method; way; mode 表達法 biǎodáfǎ mode of expression 教學法 jiàoxuéfǎ teaching method 3 standard; model See 20654080法書fa3shu1法書 4 Buddhism the Law; dharma 5 magic arts 作法 zuòfǎ exercise magic 6 (Fǎ) abbreviation France; French 法式大菜 fǎ shì dàcài French cuisine verb literary follow; model after 強國不必法古 qiángguó bùbì fǎ gǔ To build a strong nation, it is not necessary to follow ancient examples. measure word abbreviation physics farad (F)

noun 1 name 筆名 bǐmíng pen name; pseudonym 文件名 wénjiànmíng file name 一種名為九二〇的生長激素 yī zhǒng míng wéi jiǔ èr ○ de shēngzhǎng jīsù growth hormone known as 920 他名叫張南。 Tā míngjiào zhāng nán. His name is Zhang Nan. or He is called Zhang Nan. 2 given name 這位同志姓李名大剛。 Zhè wèi tóngzhì xìng lǐ míng dà gāng. This comrade’s surname is Li and his given name, Dagang. 3 excuse; false pretences 以出差為名遊山玩水 Yǐ chūchāi wéi míng yóushānwánshuǐ take a pleasure trip in the guise of a business trip 4 fame; reputation; renown 名聞中外 míngwénzhōngwài well-known both at home and abroad; widely known 成名 chéngmíng become famous 不為名, 不為利 bù wèi míng, bù wèi lì seek neither fame nor gain 5 abbreviation noun 名, 動, 形, 副 míng, dòng, xíng, fù noun, verb, adjective and adverb verb 1 express; describe 不可名狀 bùkěmíngzhuàng indescribable 2 possess; take; own 不名一文 bùmíngyīwén without a penny to one’s name; penniless adjective famous; celebrated; well-known; noted 名教授 míng jiàoshòu well-known (or prominent) professor 名詩人 míngshīrén noted poet measure word [for people] 十二名學生 shí'èr míng xuésheng twelve students

noun 1 word; character 你這個字寫得不對。 Nǐ zhège zì xiě de bù duì. You wrote this character wrong. See 78122467字形zi4xing2字形;78123491字義zi4yi4 字義 2 pronunciation (of a word or character) 說話字字清楚 Shuōhuà zìzì qīngchu pronounce every word clearly; have clear articulation 3 form of a written or printed character; style of handwriting; print type 柳字 liǔ zì style of calligraphy of Liu Gongquan (柳公權, 778-865) 篆字 zhuànzì seal character 黑體字 hēitǐzì boldface type 他寫得一手好字。 Tā xiě de yī shǒu hǎo zì. He writes a good hand. or He has good handwriting. 4 scripts; writings 專藏字, 不藏畫 Zhuān cáng zì, bù cáng huà only collect calligraphy, not paintings 5 receipt; written pledge 收到款子, 寫個字兒給他。 Shōudào kuǎnzi, xiě ge zìr gěi tā. Write him a receipt when you get the money. 6 man's style name taken at the age of twenty 諸葛亮字孔明。 Zhūgě Liàng zì Kǒngmíng. Zhuge Liang styled himself Kongming. 7 dated (of a girl) be betrothed 未字 wèi zì not yet betrothed See 19547648待字閨中dai4zi4gui1zhong1待字閨中 8 common name for scale of electric meter, water meter, etc.

adjective contrary; opposite 我的意思跟你正相反。 Wǒ de yìsi gēn nǐ zhèng xiāngfǎn. My opinion is contrary to yours (or is just the opposite of yours). 結果與我們的願望恰好相反。 Jiéguǒ yǔ wǒmen de yuànwàng qiàhǎo xiāngfǎn. The result turned out contrary to our expectations. 他們朝著相反的方向開走了。 Tāmen cháozhe xiāngfǎn de fāngxiàng kāi zǒu le. They drove off in opposite directions. 他跟他弟弟對政治持相反的觀點。 Tā gēn tā dìdi duì zhèngzhì chí xiāngfǎn de guāndiǎn. He and his brother have opposite views on politics. conjunction on the contrary 他們根本不是好朋友, 恰恰相反, 是死對頭。 Tāmen gēnběn bù shì hǎo péngyou, qiàqià xiāngfǎn, shì sǐduìtou. Far from being good friends, they are bitter enemies. 他一點兒也不吝嗇, 相反, 沒有比他更大方的了。 Tā yīdiǎnr yě bù lìnsè, xiāngfǎn, méiyǒu bǐ tā gèng dàfang de le. He is not stingy at all; on the contrary, no one could be more generous.
verb 1 invest (more) money 2 deposit (more) money in a phone card, etc.
noun president (of a bank)
noun company; corporation; firm 公司(內部)成員 gōngsī chéngyuán members of a company
noun fine day; sunny day 大晴天 dàqíngtiān a brilliantly sunny day

verb 1 end; finish; conclude; wind up; close 結束講話 jiéshù jiǎnghuà wind up a speech 結束戰爭狀態 jiéshù zhànzhēng zhuàngtài terminate the state of war 演出到此結束。 Yǎnchū dào cǐ jiéshù. That’s the end of our performance. 招待會到此結束。 Zhāodàihuì dào cǐ jiéshù. The reception is over. [said by the host] 競爭遠沒有結束。 jìngzhēng yuǎn méiyǒu jiéshù. The competition is far from over. 會議下午五時結束。 Huìyì xiàwǔ wǔ shí jiéshù. The meeting ended at 5 p.m. 主席宣布討論結束。 Zhǔxí xuānbù tǎolùn jiéshù. The chairman declared the discussion closed. 代表團結束了對中國的訪問。 Dàibiǎotuán jiéshù le duì Zhōngguó de fǎngwèn. The delegation has concluded its visit to China. 2 [often in the early vernacular] style of dressing; makeup
verb dangerous; perilous 脫離危險 tuōlí wēixiǎn out of danger 冒生命危險 mào shēngmìng wēixiǎn at the risk of one’s life 有電, 危險！ Yǒu diàn, wēixiǎn! Danger! Elec-tricity!

noun safety; security 交通安全 jiāotōng ānquán traffic safety; road safety 採取安全措施 Cǎiqǔ ānquán cuòshī take safety measures (or precautions) 改進安全設施 gǎijìn ānquán shèshī improve safety devices 保衛國家安全 bǎowèi guójiā ānquán safeguard national security 危及國家安全 wēijí guójiā ānquán threaten national security 安全第一！ Ānquán dì-yī! Safety first! adjective safe; secure 安全降落 ānquán jiàngluò land safely 安全起飛 ānquán qǐfēi take off safely 安全行車 ānquán xíngchē drive with caution; careful driving 安全正點 ānquán zhèngdiǎn safe and punctual (of trains, buses, etc.) 人多安全。 rén duō ānquán. There is safety in numbers. 你的錢存在我這裡絕對安全。 Nǐ de qián cúnzài wǒ zhèlǐ juéduì ānquán. Your money will be quite safe with me.

noun procedures; formalities; process 手續不完備 shǒuxù bù wánbèi uncompleted formalities 辦手續 Bàn shǒuxù go through formalities; complete formalities 法律手續 fǎlǜ shǒuxù legal formalities 行政手續 xíngzhèng shǒuxù administrative formalities
1 plus-minus sign (±) 2 plus and minus signs (+ and -)
noun restaurant

noun certificate; identification; testimonial 醫生證明 yīshēng zhèngmíng medical certificate verb prove; testify; bear out 充分證明 chōngfèn zhèngmíng fully prove; demonstrate 雄辯地證明 xióngbiàn de zhèngmíng give (or be) eloquent proof of 事實證明我是對的。 Shìshí zhèngmíng wǒ shì duì de. The facts bear me out. 無數事實已證明了這一點。 Wúshù shìshí yǐ zhèngmíng le zhè yīdiǎn. Countless facts have proved this point.

noun training 上崗培訓 shànggǎng péixùn training before posting 在職培訓 zàizhí péixùn on-the-job training 短期強化培訓 duǎnqī qiánghuà péixùn short intensive training verb train (personnel) 培訓導遊 péixùn dǎoyóu train tourist guides
noun text (of a lesson)

verb (-//-) take an examination 考試不及格 kǎo shì bù jí gé flunk in an exam; fail an examination 你們什麼時候考試？ Nǐmen shénme shíhou kǎoshì？ When will you have the exam? noun examination; exam; test 期末考試 qīmò kǎoshì final (or end-of-term) exam 期中考試 qīzhōng kǎoshì mid-term exam 通過考試 tōngguò kǎoshì pass an exam 學科考試 xuékē kǎoshì course examination 他這次考試的成績很好。 Tā zhè cì kǎoshì de chéngjì hěn hǎo. He got excellent grades in this exam.

verb 1 explain; explicate; expound; illustrate 說明理由 shuōmíng lǐyóu give reasons 說明真相 shuōmíng zhēnxiàng give the facts 說明機器的用法 Shuōmíng jīqì de yòng fǎ explain how a machine works 舉例說明 jǔlìshuōmíng illustrate by examples 代表團認為有必要說明自己的立場。 Dàibiǎotuán rènwéi yǒu bìyào shuōmíng zìjǐ de lìchǎng. The delegation deems it necessary to state its position. 2 show; prove 他的話很能說明問題。 tā dehuà hěn néng shuōmíng wèntí. His words are very telling. 事實充分說明這種做法是正確的。 Shìshí chōngfèn shuōmíng zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ shì zhèngquè de. The facts show clearly that this procedure is correct. noun explanation; directions; caption 圖片下邊附有說明。 Túpiàn xiàbian fùyǒu shuōmíng. There is a caption under the picture.

verb explain; expound; interpret 解釋法律 jiěshì fǎlǜ interpret laws 解釋新詞 jiěshì xīncí explain a new word 對這件事你怎樣解釋？ Duì zhè jiàn shì nǐ zěnyàng jiěshì? How do you account for this? 這些事實不能有別的解釋。 Zhèxiē shìshí bù néng yǒu bié de jiěshì. The facts admit of no other explanation. 這是誤會, 解釋一下就行了。 Zhè shì wùhuì, jiěshì yīxià jiù xíng le. This is a misunderstanding. A little explanation will clear it up. 河水的流動可以用重力原理來解釋。 Héshuǐ de liúdòng kěyǐ yòng zhònglì yuánlǐ lái jiěshì. The flow of river water is explained by the principle of gravity. 對本協定在解釋上遇有分岐, 應以中文本為準。 Duìběn xiédìng zài jiěshì shàng yù yǒufèn qí, yīng yǐ Zhōngwén běn wéi zhǔn. In case of divergence of interpretation of this agreement, the Chinese text shall prevail.

verb 1 introduce; present 介紹對象 jièshào duìxiàng introduce sb. to a potential marriage partner; find sb. a boy or girl friend 作自我介紹 Zuò zìwǒ jièshào introduce oneself 讓我介紹一下, 這位是李先生。 ràng wǒ jièshào yīxià, zhè wèi shì lǐ xiānsheng. Allow me to introduce Mr. Li. 這種滅蟲方法是去年才介紹到我們縣來的。 Zhèzhǒng miè chóng fāngfǎ shì qùnián cái jièshào dào wǒmen xiàn lái de. This method of pest control was introduced into our county only last year. 2 recommend; suggest 申請入黨, 必須有正式黨員兩人負責介紹。 Shēnqǐng rùdǎng, bìxū yǒu zhèngshì dǎngyuán liǎng rén fùzé jièshào. An applicant for Party membership must be recommended by two full Party members. 我給你介紹一本書。 Wǒ gěi nǐ jièshào yī běn shū. I’ll recommend you a book. 因為有張先生的介紹, 我給了他這份工作。 Yīnwèi yǒu zhāng xiānsheng de jièshào, wǒ gěi le tā zhè fèn gōngzuò. I gave him the job on Mr Zhang’s recommendation. 3 let know; brief 介紹經驗 jièshào jīngyàn pass on experience 介紹情況 jièshào qíngkuàng brief sb. on the situation; put sb. in the picture; fill sb. in
noun crochet hook
noun arts & crafts paper-folding; origami verb fold paper (for decoration)

verb 1 shift to an earlier date; move up (a date); advance 點火的時間提前了。 Diǎnhuǒ de shíjiān tíqián le. The time for the ignition has been moved up. 2 do sth. in advance (or ahead of time) 提前釋放戰犯 tíqián shìfàng zhànfàn release war criminals before their sentences expire 提前召開大會 tíqián zhàokāi dàhuì convene the congress earlier than planned 提前兩個月完成全年生產指標 Tíqián liǎng ge yuè wánchéng quánnián shēngchǎn zhǐbiāo meet the year’s production target two months ahead of time 下星期要是有演出, 請提前通知我們。 Xiàxīngqī yàoshi yǒu yǎnchū, qǐng tíqián tōngzhī wǒmen. If there is to be a performance next week, please notify us in advance.

verb nod one's head; nod 點頭示意 diǎntóu shìyì signal by nodding 點頭同意 Diǎntóu tóngyì nod assent 點頭打招呼 diǎntóu dǎ zhāohu nod to sb. (as a greeting); acknowledge with a nod 他已經點頭了。 Tā yǐjing diǎn tóu le. He’s already given the go-ahead. or He’s already OK’d it.

noun 1 crooked road; tortuous path 2 roundabout way; detour 少走彎路 shǎozǒuwānlù avoid detours 由於缺少經驗, 我們的工作走了(一段)彎路。 Yóuyú quēshǎo jīngyàn, wǒmen de gōngzuò zǒu le wānlù. Owing to lack of work experience, we wasted much time and energy.

verb curl one's lip (in contempt, disbelief or disappointment); twitch one's mouth; purse one's lips 這女孩兒撇嘴要哭。 Zhè nǚ hái'ér piězuǐ yào kū. The girl’s mouth began to twitch as she began to cry. 他撇了撇嘴, 輕蔑地一笑。 Tā piē le piězuǐ, qīngmiè de yī xiào. His lips curled in a contemptuous smile (or a sneer).
verb restrain; control 按捺不住怒火 ànnà bùzhù nùhuǒ unable to suppress (or restrain) one’s anger 按捺不住自己的感情 ànnà bùzhù zìjǐ de gǎnqíng unable to contain one’s emotions
noun slope
noun bedroom 臥室照明 wòshì zhàomíng bedroom lighting
mother’s father
noun (maternal) grandmother
idiom regard men as superior to women

noun 1 weight 這兩隻箱子輕重不一樣。 Zhè liǎng zhī xiāngzi qīngzhòng bù yīyàng. These two boxes do not weigh the same. 2 degree of seriousness; relative importance 根據病情輕重決定病人是否住院。 Gēnjù bìngqíng qīngzhòng juédìng bìngrén shì-fǒu zhùyuàn. Whether a patient is to be hospitalized depends on how serious the case is. 3 propriety 這個人說話不知輕重。 Zhège rén shuōhuà bùzhī qīng zhòng. That man doesn’t know the proper way to talk.

verb 1 give way; give ground; yield; give up; concede 各不相讓。 Gèbùxiāngràng. Neither is willing to give ground. 誰都讓他三分。 Shuí dōu ràng tā sānfēn. Everybody has to let him have his way somehow. 我讓了他兩步棋(=兩個子)。 Wǒ ràng le tā liǎng bù qí. I have conceded him two moves (or two pieces) (in a chess game). 你該讓著弟弟一點兒。 Nǐ gāi ràng zhe dìdi yīdiǎnr. You ought to humour your younger brother a little. 2 invite; offer 讓茶 Ràngchá offer sb. tea 把客人讓進裡屋 bǎ kèren ràng jìn lǐwū invite guests into the inner room 3 let; allow; make 讓我想一想。 Ràng wǒ xiǎng yī xiǎng. Let me think it over. 展品不讓摸。 Zhǎnpǐn bù ràng mō. The exhibits are not to be touched. 別讓老王為難了。 Bié ràng lǎo wáng wéinán le. Don’t embarrass Wang. or Don’t make things awkward for Wang. 對不起, 讓你久等了。 Duìbuqǐ, ràng nǐ jiǔděng le. Sorry to have kept you waiting. 4 let sb. have sth. at a fair price 我把書按原價讓給他了。 Wǒ bǎ shū àn yuánjià ràng gěi tā le. I’ve turned my book over to him at the original price. 5 be inferior to; not as good as 巾幗不讓鬚眉。 Jīnguó bù ràng xūméi. Women are no inferior to men. 6 give way; step aside 請讓一讓。 Qǐng ràng yī ràng. Please make way. or Excuse me. 7 [expressing wishes] 讓我們永不分離。 ràng wǒmen yǒngbù fēnlí. May we never separate. preposition [in a passive sentence to introduce the doer of the action] 行李讓雨淋濕了。 Xíngli ràng yǔ lín shī le. The luggage got wet in the rain. 她讓他給氣跑了。 Tā ràng tā gěi qì pǎo le. He made her so angry that she left in a huff.

adjective 1 (of a child) well-behaved; good 真是個乖孩子。 Zhēn shì ge guāi háizi. There’s a dear. or What a good child! 2 clever; shrewd; alert 學乖了 Xué guāi le become a little wiser; get smart literary verb perverse; contrary to reason; run counter to 有乖常理 yǒuguāichánglǐ run counter to reason; not make sense adjective (of character, behaviour, etc.) abnormal; odd
adjective important; significant; major 這文件很重要。 Zhè wénjiàn hěn zhòngyào. This document is very important.

noun occasion; situation 公開場合 gōng kāi chǎnghé in public 社交場合 shèjiāo chǎnghé social occasion 外交場合 Wàijiāo chǎnghé diplomatic occasion 說話要注意場合。 shuōhuà yào zhùyì chǎnghé. Consider where you are when you speak. 這種場合你不能穿得太隨便。 Zhèzhǒng chǎnghé nǐ bù néng chuān de tài suíbiàn. You should be properly dressed for such an occasion.

verb understand; know 懂禮貌 Dǒng lǐmào have good manners 懂英語 dǒng Yīngyǔ know English 不要不懂裝懂。 Bùyào bùdǒngzhuāngdǒng. Don’t pretend to know (or understand) when you don’t. 他的話我聽懂了。 Tā de huà wǒ tīng dǒng le. I understand what he said.
1 east, south, west and north 2 all directions

noun 1 literary tributary; river branch 茫茫九派流中國。(毛澤東) Mángmáng jiǔ pài liú Zhōngguó. (Máo Zédōng) Wide, wide flow the nine streams through the land. 2 political group; faction; school of thought or of art, etc. 黨派 dǎngpài political parties 他的唱腔自成一派。 Tā de chàngqiāng zì chéng yī pài. He has a unique style of singing. 很多學者都是這一派。 Hěn duō xuézhě dōu shì zhè yī pài. Many scholars belong to this school. 3 style; manner and air 氣派 qìpài bearing verb 1 send; dispatch; assign; appoint 派工作 pài gōngzuò set sb. a task 派勤務 pài qínwù assign public duties 派代表團出席大會 Pài dàibiǎotuán chūxí dàhuì send a delegation to the conference 派他擔任車間主任 pài tā dānrèn chējiān zhǔrèn appoint him head of the workshop 2 apportion; allocate; distribute 派糧 dated pài liáng levy grain 3 censure; blame See 27576832派不是pai4bu4shi5派不是 measure word 1 [for political groups, schools of thought or art, factions etc.] 三派學者 Sān pài xuézhě scholars of three different schools 各派政治力量 gè pài zhèngzhì lìliang different political forces (or groups) 2 [with the numeral 一, for a scene, atmosphere, speech, etc.] 一派北國風光 yī pài běiguó fēngguāng typical northern scenery 一派深秋景色 yī pài shēnqiū jǐngsè a late autumn scene 一派生機勃勃的新氣象 yī pài shēngjībóbó de xīn qìxiàng a new and dynamic atmosphere 形勢一派大好 xíngshì yī pài dàhǎo an overall excellent situation 一派胡言！ Yīpài húyán! A pack of nonsense! 一派謊言！ Yī pài huǎngyán! A pack of lies! adjective dialect stylish; graceful; handsome 他穿上這身衣服真夠派的。 tā chuānshang zhè shēn yīfu zhēn gòu pài de. He looks very stylish in this suit. noun transliteration pie 水果派 shuǐguǒ pài fruit pie
noun ballet 跳芭蕾 Tiào bālěi dance ballet
noun music guitar
noun hamburger
noun transliteration champagne
noun chocolate 巧克力餅乾 qiǎokèlì bǐnggān chocolate biscuit 果仁巧克力 Guǒrén qiǎokèlì nut chocolate 酒心巧克力 jiǔ xīn qiǎokèlì whisky heart chocolate
noun transliteration sofa; settee 單人沙發 Dānrén shāfā (upholstered) armchair 三人沙發 sān rén shāfā three-seater settee

adjective brilliant; splendid; wonderful 精彩的表演 jīngcǎi de biǎoyǎn brilliant performance 發言中最精彩的地方 fāyán zhōng zuì jīngcǎi de dìfang most interesting parts of a speech 這場球打得真精彩。 Zhè chǎng qiú dǎ de zhēn jīngcǎi. This is an exciting game.
noun (train or bus) ticket 請大家買車票！ Qǐng dàjiā mǎi chēpiào! All fares, please!
1 just now 2 a moment ago
noun playground; sports ground; drill ground
be windy

verb 1 welcome; greet 到機場歡迎貴賓 Dào jīchǎng huānyíng guìbīn meet distinguished guests at the airport 歡迎大家批評。 huānyíng dàjiā pīpíng Criticism is welcome. 歡迎您到北京來！ Huānyíng nín dào Běijīng lái! Welcome to Beijing! 足球隊受到了非常熱烈的歡迎。 Zúqiúduì shòudào le fēicháng rèliè dehuānyíng. The soccer team received a very warm welcome. 2 be well received 這部電影深受公眾歡迎。 Zhè bù diànyǐng shēnshòu gōngzhòng huānyíng. The film has been well received by the public.

noun chance; opportunity 機會均等 jīhuijūnděng with equal opportunities 機會難得 jīhui nándé this is a rare chance 錯過機會 cuòguò jīhui miss a chance 抓住機會 zhuāzhù jīhui seize a chance 千載一時的好機會 qiān zài yīshí de hǎo jīhui golden opportunity; chance of a lifetime 能有機會見到他就好了。 Néng yǒu jīhui jiàndào tā jiù hǎo le. It would be wonderful if I could meet him in person. 我願借此機會向你們表示衷心的感謝。 Wǒ yuàn jiècǐ jīhui xiàng nǐmen biǎoshì zhōngxīn de gǎnxiè. I wish to avail myself of this opportunity to extend to you my heartfelt thanks.

verb concerned about; show solicitude for; care for; express interest in 關心國家大事 guānxīn guójiā dàshì pay attention to national affairs; be interested in national politics 關心少年兒童的健康成長 guānxīn shàonián értóng de jiànkāng chéngzhǎng show great interest in the healthy development of children 懂得關心人 dǒngdeguānxīn rén be thoughtful; considerate 雙方共同關心的問題 Shuāngfāng gòngtóng guānxīn de wèntí matters of interest to both sides
preposition about; on; with regard to; concerning 關於經濟學的書 guānyú jīngjìxué de shū books on economy 關於這件事我有個建議。 guānyú zhè jiàn shì wǒ yǒu ge jiànyì. I have a suggestion about this.
noun transliteration microphone; mike 落地式麥克風 luòdìshì màikèfēng floor microphone 佩戴式麥克風 pèi dài shì màikèfēng lapel microphone 手持式麥克風 shǒuchí shì màikèfēng hand-held microphone

verb 1 develop; evolve 演遞 yǎn dì develop 2 deduce; elaborate See 34082048演繹yan3yi4演繹 3 drill; practise 演兵 yǎn bīng drill; parade 4 perform; play; act; put on 演電影 yǎn diànying show a film 演五場 yǎn wǔ chǎng give (or put on) five performances 她在劇中(出)演一個老太太。 tā zài jùzhōng yǎn yī ge lǎotàitai. She plays the part of an old lady in the opera.
adverb colloquial in any case; anyway 橫豎我要去的, 不用給他打電話了。 héngshù wǒ yào qù de, bùyòng gěi tā dǎ diànhuà le. No need to ring him up. I’ll be going there anyway.
noun dress; apparel 穿著入時 chuānzhuó rùshí be fashionably dressed 穿著大方得體 chuānzhuó dàfang détǐ be decently dressed 穿著樸素整潔 chuānzhuó pǔsù zhěngjié be plainly but neatly dressed
noun Western-style clothes; suit
noun necktie; tie 打領帶 dǎ lǐngdài tie (or knot) a necktie 把領帶解下來 bǎ lǐngdài jiě xiàlai untie (or remove) a necktie 穿襯衫繫領帶 chuān chènshān jìlǐngdài wear a shirt and tie

noun pencil
noun 1 behind sb. 他身後跟著一群人。 tā shēnhòu gēnzhe yī qún rén. He was followed by a group of people. 2 after one's death 身後留下一大筆遺產 shēnhòu liúxià yī dàbǐ yíchǎn left sb. a large inheritance

verb 1 hold or carry in the arms; embrace; hug 抱著小孩子 bào zhe xiǎoháizi take a child in one’s arms 不要抱住錯誤觀點不放。 Bùyào bào zhù cuòwù guāndiǎn bù fàng. Don’t stick to your wrong views. 2 have one's first child or grandchild 她快抱孫子了。 Tā kuài bào sūnzi le. She’ll soon be a grandmother. 3 adopt (a child) 他的女兒是抱(來)的。 tā de nǚ'ér shì bào de. His daughter is adopted. 4 colloquial hang together 抱成一團 bàochéngyītuán gang up; hang together 5 dialect (of shoes and clothes) fit 這件上衣抱身兒。 Zhè jiàn shàngyī bào shēnr. This jacket fits well. 6 cherish; harbour 抱(有)很大希望 bào hěn dà xīwàng entertain high hopes 抱一線希望 bào yī xiàn xīwàng hope against hope 抱正確的態度 bào zhèngquè de tàidu adopt (or take) a correct attitude; have a good attitude 抱最好的希望, 作最壞的打算 bào zuìhǎo de xīwàng, zuò zuìhuài de dǎsuan hope for the best, but prepare for the worst 不抱幻想 bù bào huànxiǎng cherish no illusions measure word armful of 一抱草 yī bào cǎo an armful of hay 這棵樹有一抱粗。 zhè kē shù yǒu yī bào cū. You can just get your arms around this tree trunk. verb hatch (eggs); brood
noun park; public garden 國家公園 guójiāgōngyuán national park

verb 1 (of the sun) shine upon 曬裂 shài liè suncrack 曬傷 shàishāng sunburn 乾曬 gān shài dry in the sun 日曬雨淋 rìshàiyǔlín be exposed to the sun and rain 這裡曬得慌。 Zhèlǐ shài de huāng. There’s too much sun here. 他的臉曬黑了。 Tā de liǎn shài hēi le. His face is tanned. 2 dry in the sun; bask 曬鹽 shàiyán solar (sea) salt 曬被子 shài bèizi air a quilt 曬糧食 Shài liángshi dry grain in the sun 曬煙葉 shài yānyè sun-cure tobacco 放在太陽底下曬曬。 Fàng zài tàiyáng dǐxia shài shài. Leave it to dry in the sun. 3 dialect ignore (sb.) 4 internet show 曬工資 shài gōngzī make public one’s salary

noun 1 sun 太陽光 tàiyángguāng sun’s rays; sunshine; sunlight 太陽大氣 tàiyáng dàqì solar atmosphere 2 sun's rays; sunshine; sunlight 曬太陽 shài tàiyáng bask in the sun; sunbathe 今天太陽很好。 Jīntiān tàiyáng hěn hǎo. It’s a lovely sunny day. 3 (on the human head) temples

adverb 1 just; only; exactly 天剛剛亮。 Tiān gānggāng liàng. It is just beginning to get light. 2 a moment ago; just now 他剛剛走。 Tā gānggāng zǒu. He left just a minute ago. 報紙剛剛到。 Bàozhǐ gānggāng dào. The newspaper came just now.

adjective intact; whole 完好 wánhǎo whole; complete verb 1 run out; use up; exhaust 我們的存貨已經快完了。 wǒmen de cúnhuò yǐjing kuài wán le. Our stock is nearly exhausted. 信紙用完了。 Xìnzhǐ yòng wán le. The writing pad is used up. 2 finish; complete; be over; be through 下期續完 Xià qī xù wán to be concluded in the next issue 會開完了。 Huì kāi wán le. The meeting is over. 我馬上就完。 Wǒ mǎshàng jiù wán. I’ll be through soon. 3 pay See 32043264完稅wan2shui4完稅 4 be done for; be finished See 32037376完蛋wan2dan4完蛋

adjective 1 handsome; good-looking; pretty; beautiful 漂亮的色彩 piàoliang de sècǎi beautiful colours 漂亮的小姑娘 piàoliang de xiǎogūniang pretty little girl 漂亮的小伙子 piàoliang de xiǎohuǒzi handsome young man 打扮得漂漂亮亮的 dǎban de piàopiàoliangliang de be smartly dressed 2 remarkable; brilliant; splendid; beautiful 打一個漂亮仗 dǎ yī ge piàoliang zhàng fight a fine battle; win a brilliant victory 普通話說得很漂亮 pǔtōng huà shuō de hěn piàoliang speak beautiful standard Chinese 守門員這個球救得真漂亮。 Shǒuményuán zhège qiú jiù de zhēn piàoliang. The goalie made a beautiful save. 3 high-sounding (but will not come true) 光說得漂亮有什麼用？ Guāng shuōdepiàoliang yǒu shénme yòng? What’s the point of simply paying lip service? or High-sounding words are no use.
noun clothing; clothes 衣服裡子 yīfu lǐzi lining 外邊冷, 多穿些衣服。 Wàibian lěng, duō chuān xiē yīfu. It’s cold outside. Put on more clothes.
noun right (or right-hand) side; right 右邊第二間 yòubian dì-èr jiān second room to the right 樓右邊有家超市。 lóu yòubian yǒu jiā chāoshì. There’s a supermarket to the right of the building.
noun left; left (or left-hand) side 房子左邊(兒)有一棵榆樹。 Fángzi zuǒbian yǒu yī kē yúshù. There’s an elm tree to the left of the house.

verb 1 work as; serve as; be 選他當組長 Xuǎn tā dāng zǔzhǎng elect him group leader 我長大要當飛行員。 Wǒ zhǎngdà yào dāng fēixíngyuán. I want to be a pilot when I grow up. 2 bear; accept; deserve 敢做敢當 gǎnzuògǎndāng dare to act and to take the consequences 我可當不起這樣的誇獎。 Wǒ kě dāng bù qǐ zhèyàng de kuājiǎng. I just don’t deserve such praise. 3 direct; manage; be in charge of See 19645696當家dang1jia1當家 4 [as aux.] ought to; should; must 能省的就省, 當用的還是得用。 Néng shěng de jiù shěng, dāng yòng de háishi dé yòng. Save what you can, but use what you must. 5 literary hold back; block See 31200768螳臂當車tang2bi4dang1che1螳臂當車 adjective equal See 26675200門當戶對men2dang1hu4dui4門當戶對 preposition 1 in sb.'s presence; to sb.'s face 咱當著大家談一談。 Zán dāng zhe dàjiā tán yī tán. Let’s speak out in the presence of everyone. 2 just at (a time or place) 當莫扎特四歲時, 就開始寫小步舞曲。 dāng mò zhā tè sì suìshí, jiù kāishǐ xiě xiǎobù wǔqǔ. When only four, Mozart was composing minuets. onomatopoeia sound of a gong or a bell 當當的鐘聲 Dāng dāng de zhōngshēng the tolling of a bell noun literary end 瓦當 wǎdāng eaves tile
be all smiles; have a broad smile on one’s face
noun 1 photograph of the whole family 2 hotchpotch (as a dish)
come from
noun Africa
idiom be friendly or on intimate terms 同學們相親相愛, 關係十分融洽。 Tóngxué men xiāngqīnxiāng'ài, guānxi shífēn róngqià. The students are very close and get on well together.

noun 1 famous person's own handwriting (or painting) 這一題詞是魯迅先生的手筆。 Zhè yī tící shì Lǔ Xùn xiānsheng de shǒubǐ. This inscription is in Lu Xun’s own handwriting. 2 literary skill 手筆不凡 shǒubǐ bùfán outstanding literary skill 3 style (in handling matters, esp. spending money) 手筆闊 shǒubǐkuò liberal with money; largesse

noun 1 twig 這棵葡萄長出了許多新條。 Zhè kē pútao zhǎng chū le xǔduō xīn tiáo. This grapevine has grown many new twigs. 2 long narrow piece; strip; slip 把一塊布撕成條 Bǎ yī kuài bù sī chéng tiáo tear a piece of cloth into strips 3 brief informal note 經理不在, 請你給他留個條吧。 Jīnglǐ bù zài, qǐng nǐ gěi tā liú ge tiáo ba. The manager is out. Will you leave a note for him, please? 4 item; article 這項條約的正文共八條。 Zhè xiàng tiáoyuē de zhèngwén gòng bā tiáo. The main body of the treaty consists of eight articles. 5 order 有條不紊 yǒutiáobùwěn in an orderly way measure word 1 [for long, or narrow, or thin objects] 兩條魚 Liǎng tiáo yú two fish 三條船 sān tiáo chuán three ships 一條床單 Yī tiáo chuángdān a bed sheet 一條大街 yī tiáo dàjiē an avenue 一條肥皂 yī tiáo féizào a bar of soap 一條褲子 yī tiáo kùzi a pair of trousers 一條香煙 yī tiáo xiāngyān a carton of cigarettes 2 [for certain nouns] 兩條新聞 liǎng tiáo xīnwén two pieces (or items) of news 三條人命 sān tiáo rénmìng three human lives 四條建議 sì tiáo jiànyì four proposals 一條好漢 yī tiáo hǎohàn a brave man 一條妙計 yī tiáo miàojì a brilliant scheme 一條好嗓子 yī tiáo hǎo sǎngzi a good voice

verb compare; contrast 把譯文和原文比較一下 Bǎ yìwén hé yuánwén bǐjiào yīxià check the translation against the original 做細緻的比較 Zuò xìzhì debǐjiào make a detailed comparison 做粗略的比較 zuò cūlüè debǐjiào make a rough comparison 有比較才能鑒別。 Yǒu bǐjiào cái néng jiànbié. Comparison leads to differentiation. 和其他孩子比較, 他有點兒遲鈍。 hé qítā háizibǐjiào, tā yǒudiǎnr chídùn. He is a bit slow compared to other children. adverb fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather 比較好 bǐjiào hǎo fairly good 比較快 bǐjiào kuài relatively fast 比較累 bǐjiào lèi rather tired 比較而言 bǐjiào'éryán relatively speaking preposition (used to compare a difference in degree) 比較去年有顯著的增長 Bǐjiào qùnián yǒu xiǎnzhù de zēngzhǎng show a marked increase over last year

adverb in process of; in course of 正在進行磋商。 Zhèngzài jìnxíng cuōshāng. Consultations are under way. 正在修建一條新鐵路。 Zhèngzài xiūjiàn yī tiáo xīn tiělù. A new railway is under construction. 他們正在聊天。 Tāmen zhèngzài liáotiān. They’re having a chat. 許多問題正在討論。 Xǔduō wèntí zhèng zài tǎolùn. Many questions are under discussion.

noun 1 single item 工件 gōngjiàn workpiece 零件 língjiàn part 2 letter; correspondence; paper; document 來件 láijiàn mail received 密件 mìjiàn confidential letter measure word 1 [for matters in general] 大件 dàjiàn big piece; bulky piece 一件事 Yī jiàn shì a matter; a thing 一件工作 yī jiàn gōngzuò a piece of work; a job 2 [for clothing, furniture, luggage, etc.] 一件大衣 yī jiàn dàyī an overcoat 一件家具 yī jiàn jiāju a piece of furniture 三件行李 sān jiàn xíngli three pieces of luggage 一件一件地點查 Yī jiàn yī jiàn dìdiǎn chá check piece by piece
