adjective 1 old; aged (opp. 少, 幼) 老馬 lǎo mǎ old horse 老樹 lǎoshù old tree 老婦人 lǎofùrén old woman 顯老 xiǎnlǎo look old for one’s age 不顯老 bù xiǎn lǎo bear (or carry) one’s age well 逐年見老 zhúnián jiànlǎo show signs of age year by year 我老了, 走路走不快了。 Wǒ lǎo le, zǒulù zǒu bù kuài le. I’m getting old and can’t walk very fast. 2 old; of long standing (opp. 新) 老歌 lǎogē old song 老機器 lǎo jīqì old machine 老習慣 lǎo xíguàn old habit 老相識 lǎoxiāngshí old acquaintance 這種紙煙牌子很老了。 Zhèzhǒng zhǐyān páizi hěn lǎo le. This is a very old brand of cigarettes. 3 outdated; old-fashioned; obsolete (opp. 新) 老方法 lǎo fāngfǎ outmoded method 老式樣 lǎo shìyàng old fashion 4 original; former; same 老版本 lǎo bǎnběn original edition 老部下 lǎo bùxia former subordinate 5 (of vegetables) overgrown (opp. 嫩) 老筍 lǎo sǔn tough bamboo shoots 老菠菜 lǎo bōcài overgrown spinach 6 (of food) tough; overdone; well-done (opp. 嫩) 雞蛋煮老了。 Jīdàn zhǔ lǎo le. The eggs have been hard boiled. 牛肉太老。 Niúròu tài lǎo. The beef is too tough. 青菜不要炒得太老。 Qīngcài bùyào chǎo de tài lǎo. Don’t overcook the greens. 我喜歡吃老一點兒的牛排。 wǒ xǐhuan chī lǎo yīdiǎnr de niúpái. I like steak quite well-done. 7 experienced; veteran; seasoned 老作家 Lǎo zuòjiā veteran writer 8 (of certain colours) dark 老綠 lǎo lǜ dark green 老紅 lǎo hóng dark red 這件上衣顏色太老了。 Zhè jiàn shàngyī yánsè tài lǎo le. This jacket is too dark. 9 colloquial last born; youngest 老閨女 lǎoguīnü youngest daughter noun 1 senior person; old people; venerable old man 敬老 jìnglǎo show respect for the aged 徐老 xú lǎo revered old Xu 養老院 yǎnglǎoyuàn home for the aged; senior citizens’ home 2 (Lǎo) a surname verb dialect euphemistic [followed by 了 le, usu. of an old person] pass away; die 王大爺前天老了。 wáng dàye qiántiān lǎo le. Grandpa Wang died the day before yesterday. adverb colloquial 1 for a long time 老沒見你啊。 Lǎo méi jiàn nǐ a. I haven’t seen you for ages. 2 always; all the time 老管閒 lǎo guǎn xiánshì be always meddling 老想不開 lǎo xiǎngbùkāi keep on worrying; cannot put sth. out of one’s mind 他老那麼幹。 Tā lǎo nàme gàn. He does it all the time. 3 very 老遠 lǎoyuǎn far away 老早 lǎozǎo very early 老長的鬍子 lǎo cháng de húzi very long beard 太陽已經老高了。 Tàiyáng yǐjing lǎo gāo le. The sun is already high. affix 1 [in terms of address before the surnames of acquaintances or friends to indicate intimacy or informality] 老王 lǎo wáng Lao Wang 2 [in kinship terms before numerals to indicate order of seniority] 老大 lǎodà eldest; number one (among sons, daughters, brothers, or sisters) 老二 lǎo'èr number two 老么 lǎoyāo youngest 3 [in certain names of animals and plants] See 25432576老虎lao3hu3老虎;25469696老玉米lao3yu4mi5 老玉米
surname Shi

noun 1 learning; knowledge 博學 bóxué learned; erudite 2 subject of study; branch of learning 數學 shùxué mathematics 文學 wénxué literature 3 school; college 大學 dàxué university; college 上學 shàngxué go to school; attend school; be at school verb 1 study; learn 學外語 xué wàiyǔ learn (or study) a foreign language 學文化 xué wénhuà acquire an elementary education; learn to read and write 學先進 xué xiānjìn emulate the advanced 學游泳 xué yóuyǒng learn swimming 把新技術學到手 bǎ xīn jìshù xué dào shǒu master a new skill 學而不化, 不如不學。 xué ér bù huà, bùrú bù xué. Better unlearned than ill-learned. 學而不思則罔；思而不學則殆。(《論語》) xué ér bù sī zé wǎng; sī ér bù xué zé dài. Learning without thought means labour lost; thought without learning is perilous. 2 imitate; mimic 這孩子學他爸爸走路的樣子。 Zhè háizi xué tā bàba zǒulù de yàngzi. The boy imitates his father’s way of walking.

verb 1 give birth to; bear; generate 生蛋 shēng dàn lay eggs 生孩子 shēng háizi give birth to a child 2 be born; come into existence (opp. 死) 生我者父母, 知我者足下。 shēng wǒ zhě fùmǔ, zhī wǒ zhě zúxià. My parents brought me up, but you alone have understood me. 3 grow 生根 shēnggēn take root; strike root 生芽 Shēng yá sprout 4 be afflicted with; get; have 生疑 shēngyí be suspicious 生凍瘡 shēng dòngchuāng get chilblains 生癤子 shēng jiēzi get boils 5 light (a fire) 生爐子 shēng lúzi light a stove noun life; living 謀生 móushēng make a living 一生 yīshēng all one’s life 生的偉大, 死的光榮！ shēng de wěidà, sǐ de guāngróng! A great life, a glorious death! adjective alive; living See 29868032生擒sheng1qin2生擒 adjective 1 unripe; green (opp. 熟) 生材 shēngcái green timber 生膠 shēngjiāo raw rubber; caoutchouc 生蘋果 shēng píngguǒ green apple 這些桃子還是生的。 Zhèxiē táozi hái shì shēng de. The peaches are not ripe yet. 2 raw; uncooked (opp. 熟) 生肉 shēngròu raw meat 生水 shēngshuǐ raw water 黃瓜可以生吃。 Huánggua kěyǐ shēng chī. Cucumbers can be eaten raw. 3 unprocessed; unrefined; crude (opp. 熟) See 29870848生石膏sheng1shi2gao1生石膏 4 unfamiliar; unacquainted; strange (opp. 熟) 剛到這裡, 工作還很生。 Gāng dào zhèlǐ, gōngzuò hái hěn shēng. I’ve only just come here. I’m still not familiar with the work. 5 stiff; mechanical See 29846784生湊sheng1cou4生湊 adverb [before certain words, indicating feeling or perception] very; much 生疼 shēngténg very painful noun 1 pupil; student 留級生 liújí shēng pupil who is repeating the year’s work 優等生 yōuděngshēng top student 2 intellectual; scholar 書生 shūshēng intellectual; scholar 3 [noun suffix, in names of occupations or stations of persons] 醫生 yīshēng doctor 4 theater male role (one of the four main roles in traditional opera, the other three being 旦 dàn,凈 jìng, and 丑 chǒu; subdivided into 老生 lǎoshēng,小生 xiǎoshēng,武生 wǔshēng, etc.) affix [added to certain adverbs] See 22440960好生hao3sheng1好生;35694336怎生zen3sheng1 怎生

verb be the same as “鎚”同“錘”。 “chuí”tóng“chuí”. 鎚 is the same as 錘。 adjective same; alike; similar 同年級 tóng niánjí in the same grade adverb together; in common 和工人同吃同住同勞動 Hé gōngrén tóng chī tóng zhù tóng láodòng eat, live, and work with the workers; live with the workers, eat the same food, and join them in physical labour 我們兩國同屬第三世界。 Wǒmen liǎng guó tóng shǔ dì-sān shìjiè. Both our countries belong to the Third World. preposition 1 [indicating company, relationship, involvement, etc.] with 我同你一起去。 Wǒ tóng nǐ yīqǐ qù. I’ll go with you. 這同你沒有關係。 Zhè tóng nǐ méiyǒu guānxi. This has nothing to do with you. 這件事同他有牽連。 Zhè jiàn shì tóng tā yǒu qiānlián. He is implicated in the affair. 2 [introducing the recipient of an action] 他同我商量下一步該怎麼辦。 Tā tóng wǒ shāngliang xià yī bù gāi zěnme bàn. He consulted me about what to do next. 他上午來同我告別。 tā shàngwǔ lái tóng wǒ gàobié. He came to say good-bye to me this morning. 3 [showing comparison] like; in relation to 同去年相比, 產量增加了20%。 tóng qùnián xiāngbǐ, chǎnliàng zēngjiā le 20%. Output has increased by 20% over last year. 湖面同明鏡一樣清澈。 Húmiàn tóng míngjìng yīyàng qīngchè. The limpid lake is like a mirror. 4 dialect for 別著急, 我同你想個辦法。 Bié zháojí, wǒ tóng nǐ xiǎng ge bànfǎ. Don’t worry, I’ll find you a way out. 這封信我一直同你保存著。 Zhè fēng xìn wǒ yīzhí tóng nǐ bǎocúnzhe. I’ve kept this letter for you all this time. conjunction and 老師同學生 Lǎoshī tóng xuésheng teachers and students

noun 1 matter; affair; thing; business 國家大事 guójiā dàshì state affairs 這事兒不好辦。 zhè shì r bù hǎobàn. This matter is hard to manage. 這是怎麼回事兒？ Zhè shì zěnme huí shì r? What’s this all about? or What’s happening? 2 trouble; accident 出事 chūshì meet with a mishap; have an accident 3 job; work 她找到事兒了。 Tā zhǎo dào shìr le. She’s got a job. or She’s found a job. 4 responsibility; involvement 沒你的事。 Méi nǐ de shì. It’s none of your business. 這件案子裡還有他的事兒呢。 Zhè jiàn ànzi lǐ hái yǒu tā deshì r ne. He was involved in this case too. 有我什麼事兒, 幹嗎怪我？ Yǒu wǒ shénmeshì r, gànmá guài wǒ? I had nothing to do with it, so why blame me? verb literary 1 wait upon; serve 事父母 shì fùmǔ wait upon one’s parents 2 be engaged in 不事營生 bù shì yíngsheng lead an idle life
man

noun 1 language; tongue 本族語 běnzúyǔ native language 2 set phrase; proverb; saying 語云, “將欲取之, 必先與之。” Yǔyún, “jiāng yù qǔ zhī, bì xiān yǔ zhī. As the saying goes, “Give in order to take.” 3 nonlinguistic means of communicating ideas; sign; signal 4 words; expression 語多乖戾 yǔduōguāilì use absurd and offensive remarks 語不驚人死不休 (杜甫《江上值水如海勢聊短述》) yǔ bù jīngrén sǐ bùxiū never rest until one finds some words that can cause a great sensation 5 (of birds, insects, etc.) twitter verb speak; say 細語 xìyǔ speak in details

noun friend 良朋 liángpéng good friend 賓朋滿座。 Bīnpéngmǎnzuò. There was a houseful of guests. or The house was full of visitors. verb literary 1 gather round; gang up 朋奸 péngjiān conspire 朋宴 péngyàn (of friends) dine together 2 rival; equal 碩大無朋 shuòdàwúpéng of enormous size; huge; gigantic

noun 1 friend 好友 hǎoyǒu good (or great) friend 敵友不分 dí yǒu bù fēn not distinguish between friend and foe 2 companion; company 球友 qiúyǒu companion in playing ball game; playmate 3 member of the same institution, unit, etc. 校友 xiàoyǒu schoolmate; schoolfellow; alumnus adjective 1 friendly See 35059456友愛you3ai4友愛 2 of friendly relations 友方 yǒu fāng friendly side

pronoun 1 [in questions] which; what 你學的是哪國語言？ Nǐ xué de shì nǎ guó yǔyán？ What foreign language are you studying? 我們這裡有兩位姓張的, 您要找的是哪一位？ Wǒmen zhèlǐ yǒu liǎng wèi xìng zhāng de, nín yào zhǎo de shì nǎ yī wèi？ We’ve got two Zhangs here. Which one do you want? 2 [in statements to indicate sth. indefinite] whichever; any that 哪天有空就請過來。 Nǎ tiān yǒukòng jiù qǐng guòlai. Come over whenever you are free. 你喜歡哪件就拿哪件。 Nǐ xǐhuannǎ jiàn jiù ná nǎ jiàn. Take whichever you prefer. adverb [in rhetorical questions to express negation] 哪有這樣的事？ Nǎ yǒu zhèyàng de shì？ Nothing of the sort (or kind)! 沒有昨天的流血犧牲, 哪有今天的幸福生活？ Méiyǒu zuótiān de liúxuè xīshēng, nǎ yǒu jīntiān de xìngfú shēnghuó? Without past sacrifices how could we have such a happy life today?

noun 1 country; nation; state 大國 dàguó a big country 強國 qiángguó a powerful nation 諸侯國 zhūhóu guó feudal states 保家衛國 bǎojiāwèiguó protect our homes and defend our country 利國利民 lìguólìmín benefit both country and people; good for the country and for the people 2 best of the nation See 22188288國手guo2shou3國手;22186496國色guo2se4國色 3 abbreviation Kuomintang (KMT) 國共兩黨 Guó Gòngliǎngdǎng KMT and CPC 4 (Guó) a surname adjective 1 of the state; national See 22161408國花guo2hua1國花 2 of our country; Chinese See 22161664國畫guo2hua4國畫

(shuí) pronoun 1 who 他是誰？ Tā shì shéi？ Who is he? 他在跟誰說話？ Tā zài gēn shéi shuōhuà？ Who is he talking to? 這是誰的意見？ Zhè shì shéi de yìjian？ Whose idea is this? 2 [in rhetorical questions] who 誰不說他好？ Shéi bù shuō tā hǎo？ Who wouldn’t speak well of him? 誰言寸草心, 報得三春暉。(孟郊《遊子吟》) Shéi yán cùncǎo xīn, bào de sānchūn huī. Such kindness of warm sun, can’t be repaid by grass. 3 someone; anyone 你要找誰嗎？ Nǐ yào zhǎo shéi ma？ Are you looking for someone? 我沒跟誰說話。 Wǒ méi gēn shéi shuōhuà. I didn’t talk to anyone. 有誰能幫助我就好了。 Yǒu shéi néng bāngzhù wǒ jiù hǎo le. If only someone would help me! 4 [before 都 or 也] everyone; anyone 誰也不要。 Shéi yě bùyào. Nobody wants it. 誰都喜歡他。 Shéi dōu xǐhuan tā. Everybody likes him. 5 [repeated in two phrases] whoever 誰污染誰治理的原則 shéi wūrǎn shéi zhìlǐ de yuánzé principle of keeping pollution controlled by whoever making it 誰先到, 誰先吃。 Shéi xiān dào, Shéi xiān chī. Whoever arrives first will eat first. 大家看誰合適就選誰。 Dàjiā kàn shéi héshì jiù xuǎn shéi. You may elect whoever you think is suitable. 6 [as both subject and object to indicate two different people] 他們倆誰也說不服誰。 Tāmen liǎ shéi yě shuō bù fú shéi. Neither of them could convince the other.

noun 1 year 年復一年 niánfùyīnián year after year; year in year out 三年 Sān nián three years 2 annual; yearly See 67485923年產量nian2chan3liang4年產量 3 age 年過六十 nián guò liùshí over sixty (years old) 4 period in one's life 老年 lǎonián old age 童年 tóngnián childhood 5 period in history 近年來 jìnniánlái in recent years 明朝初年 míngzhāo chū nián at the beginning of the Ming Dynasty 6 harvest 豐年 fēngnián rich harvest 7 New Year 過年 guònián celebrate the New Year 8 of or for the New Year See 27329792年貨nian2huo4年貨 9 archaic relationship between candidates who passed the same imperial examinations See 67505635年兄nian2xiong1年兄;67506403年誼nian2yi4 年誼 10 (Nián) a surname

noun 1 literary year 嵗除 suìchú New Year’s Eve 嵗杪 suìmiǎo end of the year; year-end 嵗末 suìmò end of the year 嵗時 suìshí four seasons 嵗朝 suìzhāo first day of the lunar New Year 辭舊嵗, 迎新年 cí jiù suì, yíng xīnnián ring out the old year and ring in the new 2 literary year's harvest 歉嵗 qiànsuì lean year 3 age 同嵗 tóngsuì of the same age 4 literary time 嵗月如梭。 suì yuè rúsuō. How time flies. measure word year (of age) 三嵗女孩兒 sān suì nǚ hái'ér three-year-old girl

noun 1 family; household 張家和王家 Zhāng jiā hé wáng jiā the Zhangs and the Wangs 他全家都是工人。 Tā quánjiā dōu shì gōngrén. They’re all workers in his family. 小區裡家家都愛養花。 Xiǎoqū lǐ jiājiā dōu ài yǎnghuā. In this neighbourhood, every family loves growing flowers. 2 home 回家 huíjiā go home 不在家 bù zàijiā not be in; be out 上我家去吧。 Shàng wǒ jiā qù ba. Come to my place. 3 person or family engaged in a certain trade 船家 chuánjiā boatman 4 specialist in a certain field 畫家 huàjiā painter 科學家 kēxuéjiā scientist 5 school of thought 儒家 Rújiā Confucian school 6 self-deprecating my [in speaking of relatives older than oneself] See 23637248家父jia1fu4家父 7 (in playing cards, mah-jong, etc.) party; side See 59564771對家dui4jia1對家;29587456上家shang4jia1上家;36692480莊家zhuang1jia5莊家 adjective domestic; tamed (opp. 野) 家兔 jiātù rabbit measure word [for families or business establishments] 兩家人家 Liǎng jiā rénjia two families 三家商店 sān jiā shāngdiàn three shops 一家電影院 yī jiā diànyǐngyuàn a cinema

adverb 1 all 大家都到了嗎？ Dàjiā dōu dào le ma？ Is everybody here? 什麼都行。 Shénme dōu xíng. Anything will do. 我父母都不在了。 Wǒ fùmǔ dōu bù zài le. My parents are both deceased. 2 [with 是 to show the cause] 都是你, 把他灌成這樣。 Dōu shì nǐ, bǎ tā guàn chéng zhèyàng. It’s all your fault making him drunk. 都是你老磨蹭, 害得我們遲到了。 Dōu shì nǐ lǎo móceng, hài de wǒmen chídào le. It is because you dawdled that we were late. 3 even 今天天氣真怪, 中午比早晨都冷。 Jīntiān tiānqì zhēn guài, zhōngwǔ bǐ zǎochen dōu lěng. What strange weather, it’s colder at noon than early in the morning! 連他都不知道。 Lián tā dōu bù zhīdao. Even he doesn’t know. 4 already 他都八十歲了, 身子骨還那麼硬朗。 Tā dōu bāshí suì le, shēnzi gǔ hái nàme yìnglang. He’s already eighty but still going strong.

noun 1 meeting; gathering; party; get-together; conference 報告會 bàogàohuì public lecture 研討會 yántǎohuì seminar 2 association; society; union 幫會 bānghuì secret soceity 協會 xiéhuì association 3 temple fair 廟會 miàohuì temple fair 4 association of worshippers 香會 xiānghuì company of Buddhist pilgrims 5 revolving credit association (people who regularly contribute to a common fund and draw from it by turns) 6 chief city; capital 都會 dūhuì metropolis 7 literary opportunity; occasion 適逢其會 shìféngqíhuì happen to be present at the right moment verb 1 get together; assemble 聚會 jùhuì meet; get together 2 meet; see 昨天我沒有會著他。 Zuótiān wǒ méiyǒu huì zhe tā. I didn’t see him yesterday. 3 literary happen to 會有客來。 Huì yǒu kè lái. A visitor happened to come by. 4 literary should; ought to verb 1 understand; grasp 誤會 wùhuì misunderstand 2 know 他還會兩齣京戲。 Tā hái huì liǎng chū Jīngxì. He knows a few airs of Beijing opera. 我會英語, 不會日語。 Wǒ huì Yīngyǔ, bù huì Rìyǔ. I know English but not Japanese. 3 can; be able to 會滑冰 Huì huábīng can skate 這孩子剛會走路, 還不大會說話。 Zhè háizi gāng huì zǒulù, hái bù dà huì shuōhuà. The infant has just learnt to walk but not to speak yet. 4 excel at; be good at; be skillful in 會修鐘錶 huì xiū zhōngbiǎo skilled in repairing clocks and watches 很會這一套 hěn huì zhè yī tào be a past master of this sort of game 5 be likely to; be sure to 他會來的。 Tā huì lái de. He’s sure to come. 他會在家嗎？ Tā huì zài jiā ma？ Is he likely to be at home? 沒想到(事情)會這麼順利。 méi xiǎngdào huì zhème shùnlì. I didn’t expect things to go so smoothly. verb pay (or foot) a bill 飯錢我會過了。 Fàn qián wǒ huì guò le. I’ve paid for the meal. noun colloquial moment 來了一會兒了 Lái le yī huì r le have been here for a while

verb 1 speak; talk; say 說風涼話 shuōfēngliánghuà make irresponsible and carping comments 說得多做得少 Shuō de duō zuò de shǎo talk much but do little 說的比唱的好聽 shuō de bǐ chàng de hǎo tīng mouth high-sounding words 說得好不如做得好。 shuō de hǎo bùrú zuòdé hǎo. Better to do well than to say well. 他說法語。 Tā shuō Fǎyǔ. He speaks French. 你說得很對。 Nǐ shuō de hěn duì. What you say is quite true. 那未免說得太輕了。 Nà wèimiǎn shuō de tài qīng le. That’s putting it too mildly. 2 explain 說不通 shuōbùtōng cannot hold water; do not make sense 我一說他就明白了。 Wǒ yī shuō tā jiù míngbai le. I told him how and he caught on at once. 他說了又說, 我還是不懂。 Tā shuō le yòu shuō, wǒ háishi bù dǒng. He explained and explained, but I still couldn’t understand. 3 scold 他父親說了他一頓。 Tā fùqin shuō le tā yī dùn. His father gave him a scolding (or talking-to). 4 act as matchmaker 給他說個媳婦兒 Gěi tā shuō ge xífùr find a wife for him 5 refer to; indicate 你的話是說誰呢？ Nǐ de huà shì shuō shuí ne？ Who did your remarks refer to? noun theory; teachings; doctrine 著書立說 zhùshūlìshuō write books to expound a theory

verb 1 do; make; produce; manufacture 做結論 zuò jiélún pass a verdict; reach a conclusion 做衣服 zuò yīfu make clothes 做長期打算 zuò chángqī dǎsuan plan for the long term 這種糖是甜菜做的。 Zhèzhǒng táng shì tiáncài zuò de. This sugar is made from beets. 這是你自己做的嗎？ Zhè shì nǐ zìjǐ zuò de ma？ Did you make this yourself? 2 cook; prepare 做菜 zuòcài cook a dish 3 do; act; engage in 做好本職工作 zuòhǎo běnzhí gōngzuò do one’s best at one’s job 從點滴的事情做起 cóng diǎndī de shìqing zuò qǐ start with little things 大事做不來, 小事又不做 dàshì zuò bù lái, xiǎoshì yòu bù zuò incapable of big jobs yet despise small ones 照正確的意見去做 zhào zhèngquè de yìjian qù zuò act upon correct views 共做了兩萬多個勞動日 gòng zuò le liǎngwàn duō ge láodòngrì did a total of more than 20,000 workdays 4 be; become 做演員 zuò yǎnyuán become an actor or actress; go on the stage 後來她做保育員了。 Hòulái tā zuò bǎoyùyuán le. Later she became a child-care worker. 今天開會由你做主席。 Jīntiān kāihuì yóu nǐ zuò zhǔxí. You’ll be the chairman at today’s meeting. 5 write; compose See 37179904做文章zuo4wen2zhang1做文章 6 hold a family (or home) celebration See 37179648做壽zuo4shou4做壽 7 used as; used for 這篇文章可以做教材。 Zhè piān wénzhāng kěyǐ zuò jiàocái. This article may be used as teaching material. 樹皮可以做造紙的原料。 Shùpí kěyǐ zuò zàozhǐ de yuánliào. Bark may be used as raw material for paper. 8 form or contract a relationship 做對頭 zuò duìtóu set oneself against sb. 做朋友 zuò péngyou make friends with 9 pretend; feign; do sth. for form's sake See 37181184做樣子zuo4yang4zi5做樣子 10 dialect kill 把人質做了 bǎ rénzhì zuòle kill the hostage

noun 1 vegetable; greens 種菜 zhòngcài grow vegetables 2 (non-staple) food 上街買菜 shàngjiē mǎi cài go to the market to buy food 3 dish; course 川菜 Chuāncài Sichuan dishes; Sichuan cuisine 做菜 zuòcài prepare the dishes; do the cooking 一道菜 yī dào cài a course 做四道菜 zuò sì dào cài prepare a four-course meal 地方風味菜 dìfang fēngwèi cài local cuisine 4 (edible) wild herbs 吃糠咽菜 chī kāng yàn cài barely keep alive on chaff and wild herbs 5 oil seed rape; rape

verb 1 eat; take 吃茶 chīchá drink tea 吃糖 chītáng have some sweets 吃藥 chīyào take medicine 吃蘋果 chī píngguǒ eat an apple 吃得很飽 chī de hěn bǎo have eaten one’s fill; be quite full 2 have one's meals; eat somewhere 吃食堂 chī shítáng have one’s meals in the mess 3 live on (or off) 吃利息 chī lìxī live on interest 4 annihilate; wipe out 吃掉敵軍一個師 chī diào díjūn yī ge shī annihilate an enemy division 吃一個子兒 chī yī gèzir take a piece (in chess) 5 exhaust; be a strain on 吃力 chīlì strenuous; difficult 6 absorb; soak up 茄子很吃油。 Qiézi hěn chī yóu. Eggplants need a lot of oil in cooking. 這種紙不吃墨水。 Zhèzhǒng zhǐ bù chī mòshuǐ. This kind of paper does not absorb ink. 7 suffer; bear; incur 吃黃牌 chī huángpái get a yellow card 連吃敗仗 lián chī bàizhàng suffer one defeat after another 腿上吃了一槍 Tuǐ shàng chī le yī qiāng wounded by a shot in the leg 我可不吃這一套。 Wǒ kě bù chī zhè yī tào. I won’t put up with this. or I am not impressed. preposition VARIANT OF 17372672被bei4被 [used in a passive structure to introduce either the doer of the action, or the action alone] by 吃笑 chī xiào be laughed at 吃拳頭 chī quántou get a beating 吃人恥笑 chī rén chǐxiào be an object of ridicule adjective stammer; stutter 口吃 kǒuchī speak with a stammer; stutter

verb 1 write 寫封信 xiě fēng xìn write a letter 寫副對聯 Xiě fù duìlián write a couplet 寫得一手好字 xiě de yī shǒu hǎo zì have good handwriting; write a good hand 我喜歡寫鋼筆字, 不喜歡寫毛筆字。 Wǒ xǐhuan xiě gāngbǐ zì, bù xǐhuan xiě máobǐ zì. I like to write with a pen and not with a writing-brush. 這支筆不好寫。 Zhè zhī bǐ bù hǎo xiě. This pen doesn’t write well. 2 compose; write (as an author, reporter, etc.) 寫詩 xiěshī compose a poem 寫論文 xiě lùnwén write a paper (or thesis) 寫日記 xiě rìjì make an entry in one’s diary; keep a diary 寫小說 Xiě xiǎoshuō write a novel 文章寫成了嗎？ Wénzhāng xiě chéng le ma？ Have you finished writing the article? 3 describe; depict 寫人物的心理活動 xiě rénwù de xīnlǐ huódòng depict the characters’ mental activities 這個人物叫他寫活了。 Zhège rénwù jiào tā xiě huó le. His portrayal of the character is vivid and true to life. 4 paint; draw See 33305344寫生xie3sheng1寫生

noun 1 word; character 你這個字寫得不對。 Nǐ zhège zì xiě de bù duì. You wrote this character wrong. See 78122467字形zi4xing2字形;78123491字義zi4yi4 字義 2 pronunciation (of a word or character) 說話字字清楚 Shuōhuà zìzì qīngchu pronounce every word clearly; have clear articulation 3 form of a written or printed character; style of handwriting; print type 柳字 liǔ zì style of calligraphy of Liu Gongquan (柳公權, 778-865) 篆字 zhuànzì seal character 黑體字 hēitǐzì boldface type 他寫得一手好字。 Tā xiě de yī shǒu hǎo zì. He writes a good hand. or He has good handwriting. 4 scripts; writings 專藏字, 不藏畫 Zhuān cáng zì, bù cáng huà only collect calligraphy, not paintings 5 receipt; written pledge 收到款子, 寫個字兒給他。 Shōudào kuǎnzi, xiě ge zìr gěi tā. Write him a receipt when you get the money. 6 man's style name taken at the age of twenty 諸葛亮字孔明。 Zhūgě Liàng zì Kǒngmíng. Zhuge Liang styled himself Kongming. 7 dated (of a girl) be betrothed 未字 wèi zì not yet betrothed See 19547648待字閨中dai4zi4gui1zhong1待字閨中 8 common name for scale of electric meter, water meter, etc.

verb 1 read; read aloud 讀報 dúbào read the newspaper 這部小說值得一讀。 Zhè bù xiǎoshuō zhíde yī dú. This novel is worth reading. 老師讀一句, 同學們跟著讀一句。 Lǎoshī dú yī jù, tóngxué men gēnzhe dú yī jù. The students read after the teacher sentence by sentence. 2 attend school 讀完大學 Dú wán dàxué finish college 3 (of computers) read; read data; examine information computing 讀出 dúchū read out; extract data computing 讀入 dúrù read in; enter data 你的盤我的機器讀不了。 Nǐ de pán wǒ de jīqì dú bùliǎo. My computer can’t read your disk. 4 be pronounced in a certain way 這個字讀去聲。 zhège zì dú qùshēng. This character is pronounced in the falling (or fourth) tone.

noun 1 book 一本關於中國曆史的新書 yī běn guānyú Zhōngguó lìshǐ de xīnshū a new work on Chinese history 2 style of calligraphy; script 楷書 kǎishū regular script 3 literary letter 家書 jiāshū letter from home 4 document 證書 zhèngshū certificate; credential verb literary write 振筆直書 zhènbǐzhíshū take up the pen and write vigorously

noun 1 east 東城 dōng chéng eastern part of the city 東郊 dōngjiāo eastern suburbs 城東 Chéng dōng east of the city 2 master; owner 房東 fángdōng owner of the house; landlord 3 host 今天是我的東。 Jīntiān shì wǒ de dōng. I’ll be the host today. or It’s my treat today. See 37171712做東zuo4dong1做東
noun 1 south 南屋 nánwū room facing south 城南 Chéng nán southern part of the city 2 (Nán) a surname

noun 1 north 城北 chéng běi north of the city 往北走 wǎng běi zǒu go north 朝北的房間 Cháo běi de fángjiān room facing the north 2 the North (the developed countries) 南北對話 Nán-Běi Duìhuà North-South dialogue verb literary be defeated 連戰皆北 liánzhànjiēběi repeatedly defeated in battle; suffer repeated defeats

noun 1 west 西屋 Xīwū west room 西海岸 xīhǎi'àn west coast 往西去 wǎng xī qù head west 太原以西 Tàiyuán yǐxī to the west of Taiyuan 太陽西斜。 Tàiyáng xī xié. The sun is sinking in the west. 2 (Xī) Occidental; Western 中西合璧 Zhōngxīhébì good combination of Chinese and Western elements 東西文化碰撞 Dōng xī wénhuà pèngzhuàng meeting (or collision) between East and West; when East meets West 3 Buddhism Western Paradise 一命歸西 yīmìngguīxī pass away; die

pronoun colloquial why; how 你怎不早說呀？ Nǐ zěn bù zǎo shuō ya？ Why didn’t you say so earlier? 這樣的好成績, 我們怎能不高興呢？ Zhèyàng de hǎo chéngjì, wǒmenzěn néngbù gāoxìng ne? How can we help rejoicing over such a good result?

affix [suffix used in interogatives, pronouns and adverbs] affix [a syllable inserted in a line of a song for balance] 五月的花兒紅呀麼紅似火。 Wǔyuè de huā'ér hóng ya me hóng sì huǒ. Red as fire are the flowers that bloom in May.

noun 1 brain 用腦過度 Yòngnǎo guòdù overtax one’s brain 2 head 3 brains; mind; head 動手動腦 dòngshǒu dòng nǎo use one’s hands and brains 4 essence 樟腦 zhāngnǎo camphor 5 bits; residue 針頭線腦 zhēntóuxiànnǎo odds and ends

noun 1 face (of people or animals) 背過臉去 bèiguo liǎn qù turn one’s face away 2 front part of sth. 門臉兒 mènliǎnr front of a shop 3 figurative face; self-respect 露臉 lòuliǎn gain face 竟然有臉來 jìngrán yǒu liǎn lái have the impudence to come 4 facial expression; face 變臉 biànliǎn get angry 拉長了臉 lācháng le liǎn pull (or put on, wear) a long face
noun shoulder
noun neck 脖子歪 bózi wāi a cooked neck 脖子僵直 bózi jiāngzhí a stiff neck 伸長脖子 shēncháng bózi stretch (or crane) one’s neck See 26993152抹脖子mo3bo2zi5抹脖子

noun 1 belly; abdomen 肚子疼 dùzi téng have a stomachache; suffer from abdominal pain 一肚子氣 yīdùzi qì absolutely exasperated; full of pent-up anger 笑得肚子疼 xiào de dùzi téng laugh till one’s sides split 2 round and bulging thing 腿肚子 tuǐdùzi calf (of the leg)
noun arm 胳膊肘兒 gēbozhǒur elbow
noun 1 leg 他腿長。 Tā tuǐ cháng. He has long legs. 2 leglike support 桌子腿 zhuōzituǐ legs of a table 椅子腿 yǐzi tuǐ legs of a chair 3 ham 火腿 huǒtuǐ ham

noun 1 foot 腳底下 jiǎodǐxia under foot 2 base; foot 牆腳 qiángjiǎo foot of a wall 3 dialect dregs; residue 茶腳 Chá jiǎo leftover tea and tea leaves 4 [in connection with carrying and transporting manually] See 24009472腳夫jiao3fu1腳夫;24011776腳力jiao3li4 腳力

noun 1 the back of the body 背痛 bèitòng backache 捶背 chuíbèi pound sb.’s back (massage) 拍拍某人的背 pāipāi mǒurén debèi pat sb. on the back 2 the back of an object 手背 shǒubèi back of the hand 椅背兒 yǐ bèi r the back of a chair 墨透紙背。 Mò tòu zhǐ bèi. The ink has soaked through the paper. verb 1 turn away (opp. 向) 把臉背過去 bǎ liǎn bèi guòqu turn one’s face away 2 leave; go away See 17364224背井離鄉bei4jing3li2xiang1背井離鄉 3 hide sth. from; do sth. behind sb.'s back 背著人說話 bèi zhe rén shuōhuà talk behind sb.’s back 沒有什麼背人的事 méiyǒu shénme bèi rén de shì have nothing to hide 這孩子背著父母抽煙。 Zhè háizi bèizhe fùmǔ chōuyān. The child smoked behind his parents’ backs. 4 recite from memory; learn by heart (or by rote) 背臺詞 bèi táicí speak one’s lines; memorize one’s lines 書背熟了。 Shūbèi shú le. I’ve learnt the lesson by heart. or I have the lesson off pat. 5 act contrary to; violate; break 背著良心說話 bèi zhe liángxīn shuōhuà speak against one’s conscience; lie adjective 1 out-of-the-way 背街 bèi jiē backstreet; side street 那地方很背。 Nà dìfang hěn bèi. It is an out-of-the-way place. or That place is off the beaten track. 2 colloquial unlucky 手氣背 Shǒuqì bèi have bad luck (at mah-jong, gambling, etc.) 3 hard of hearing 耳朵有點兒背 ěrduo yǒudiǎnrbèi be a bit hard of hearing preposition with the back towards 背著手 bèizhe shǒu with one’s hands clasped behind one’s back 背山面海 bèishānmiànhǎi with hills behind and the sea before 背著太陽坐 bèi zhe tàiyáng zuò sit with one’s back to the sun

noun 1 colloquial buttocks (of humans); bottom; behind; arse; backside; ass 拍拍屁股就走了 Pāipāi pìgu jiù zǒu le leave without a word of explanation; leave things in a mess 2 rump (of animals); haunch; hindquarters 豬屁股 Zhū pìgu rump of a pig 3 end; butt 香煙屁股 xiāngyān pìgu cigarette butt

noun contact; touch; connection; relation 保持聯繫 bǎochí liánxì keep in contact (or touch) with 取得聯繫 qǔdé liánxì get in touch with; establish contact with 失去聯繫 shīqù liánxì lose contact 事物的內部聯繫 Shìwù de nèibù liánxì internal relations of things 事物的外部聯繫 shìwù de wàibù liánxì external relations of things 有廣泛的社會聯繫 yǒu guǎngfàn de shèhuì liánxì have wide social connections verb 1 arrange; get in touch with 聯繫住處 liánxì zhùchù arrange accommodation 看電影的事, 找俱樂部聯繫。 kàn diànyǐng de shì, zhǎo jùlèbù liánxì. As for movies, please contact the club. 隨時跟我聯繫。 Suíshí gēn wǒ liánxì. Keep in touch with me. 2 integrate; relate; link 理論聯繫實際 lǐlùn liánxì shíjì integrate theory with practice; apply theory to reality 密切聯繫群眾 mìqiè liánxì qúnzhòng maintain close ties with the masses 中國的前途同世界的前途緊密地聯繫在一起。 Zhōngguó de qiántú tóng shìjiè de qiántú jǐnmì de liánxì zài yīqǐ. The future of China is closely linked with that of the whole world.

noun telecommunications website 登陸網站 dēnglù wǎngzhàn log into (or onto) a website 訪問一家商業網站 fǎngwèn yījiā shāngyè wǎngzhàn visit a commercial website 建立個人網站 jiànlì gèrén wǎngzhàn build (or create) one’s own website

verb handle sb.'s funeral; send sb.'s coffin to the cemetery 老人沒兒沒女, 是一些朋友幫忙將他發送的。 Lǎorén méi r méi nǚ, shì yīxiē péngyou bāngmáng jiāng tā fāsong de. The old man didn’t have any offspring, it was some friends who helped handle his funeral arrangement.
noun biographical notes; curriculum vitae (CV); résumé

noun among them; of them; in it 樂在其中 lèzàiqízhōng find pleasure in it 我們車間有五百人, 其中婦女占百分之六十。 Wǒmen chējiān yǒu wǔbǎi rén, qízhōng fùnǚ zhàn bǎifēn zhī liùshí. There are 500 workers in our shop, and 60 per cent of them are women. 飯疏食, 飲水, 曲肱而枕之, 樂亦在其中矣。(《論語》) Fàn shū shí, yǐnshuǐ, qū gōng ér zhěn zhī, lè yì zài qízhōng yǐ. (《Lúnyǔ》) It is in eating coarse rice and drinking water, and using one’s elbow for a pillow, that joy is to be found.

verb include; consist of; comprise; incorporate 報價中不包括運費。 bàojià zhōng bù bāokuò yùnfèi. Carriage is not included in the quotation. 房租每月四百元, 水電費包括在內。 Fángzū měi yuè sìbǎi yuán, shuǐ-diànfèi bāokuò zàinèi. The rent is 400 yuan a month, including water and electricity. 他的報告包括三個方面。 Tā de bàogào bāokuò sān ge fāngmiàn. His report touched on three aspects. 我們的設計已經包括了你們的意見。 Wǒmen de shèjì yǐjing bāokuò le nǐmen de yìjian. Our design has incorporated your suggestions.
verb interview 參加招聘面試 Cānjiā zhāopìn miànshì attend an interview for a job

noun motive; intention 動機不純 dòngjī bù chún have impure motives; have bad motives 出於自私的動機 Chūyú zìsī de dòngjī actuated by selfish motives; act from selfish motives 他的動機是好的。 Tā de dòngjī shì hǎo de. His intentions are good. or He means well.
noun choice 沒有選擇 méi·yǒu xuǎnzé have no choice at all verb select; choose; opt 選擇職業 xuǎnzé zhíyè choose an occupation 選擇(的)餘地 xuǎnzé yúdì option; choice

noun argument; thesis; point of view 論點鮮明 lùndiǎnxiānmíng clear-cut argument 論點新穎 lùndiǎn xīnyǐng original concept (or notion) 中心論點 zhōngxīn lùndiǎn principal thesis 這一論點站不住腳。 zhè yī lùndiǎn zhànbuzhù jiǎo. The argument doesn’t hold water (or hold up).
noun 1 (grounds of) argument 論據不足 lùnjù bùzú insufficient (or inadequate) grounds 有力的論據 yǒulì de lùnjù strong argument; valid reasons 2 logic reasoning

noun 1 logic demonstration; proof 文章論點, 論據鮮明, 但缺乏論證。 wénzhāng lùndiǎn, lùnjù xiānmíng, dàn quēfá lùnzhèng. The article has a clear-cut thesis and arguments, but lacks reasoning. 2 grounds of argument; evidence 無可辯駁的論證 wúkě biànbó de lùnzhèng irrefutable proof verb expound and prove 根據因果關係進行論證 Gēnjù yīn-guǒ guānxi jìnxíng lùnzhèng argue from a cause to an effect 文章論證了改革的必要性。 Wénzhāng lùnzhèng le gǎigé de bìyàoxìng. The article proves the necessity of reform.
noun 1 ending; wind-up 結尾工程 jiéwěi gōngchéng the final stage of a project 文章的結尾很有力量。 Wénzhāng de jiéwěi hěn yǒu lìliang. The article has a forceful ending. 2 music coda

noun method; way; means 學習方法 xuéxí fāngfǎ study method 用各種方法 yòng gèzhǒng fāngfǎ in all sorts of ways; by every means 用某種方法 yòng mǒuzhǒng fāngfǎ by some means or other; one way or another 看問題的方法 kàn wèntí de fāngfǎ the way one approaches a problem (or looks at things)

noun summary; summing-up 作總結 zuò zǒngjié make a summary; sum up 哲學是關於自然知識和社會知識的概括和總結。 Zhéxué shì guānyú zìrán zhīshi hé shèhuì zhīshi de gàikuò hé zǒngjié. Philosophy is the generalization and summation of the knowledge of nature and society. verb sum up; summarize; review 總結工作 zǒngjié gōngzuò summarize one’s work; review the work 總結經驗 zǒngjié jīngyàn sum up one’s experience; review one’s experience
noun point of view; viewpoint; standpoint 闡明觀點 chǎnmíng guāndiǎn explain one’s position; lay out one’s point of view; state one’s position

noun 1 way of looking at a thing; (point of) view; opinion; perspective 看法完全一致 kànfa wánquán yīzhì see eye to eye with sb.; fall in with sb.’s views; meet sb.’s view 當局對這次爭端有什麼看法？ dāngjú duì zhècì zhēngduān yǒu shénmekànfa? What’s the authorities’ attitude towards this discord? 2 unfavourable (or critical) view of sb. 我對一個候選人有看法。 Wǒ duì yī ge hòuxuǎnrén yǒu kànfa. I’m critical of one of the candidates.

noun frame (or state) of mind; mood 心情沉重 xīnqíng chénzhòng with a heavy heart 心情激動 xīnqíng jīdòng be excited; be thrilled 心情舒暢 xīnqíngshūchàng have ease of mind 心情愉快 xīnqíng yúkuài be in a cheerful frame (or state) of mind; be in a good (or happy) mood; have a light heart 心情不一樣, 感受也不同。 Xīnqíng bù yīyàng, gǎnshòu yě bùtóng. People in different moods feel differently about things.

verb define; fix; determine 確定任務 quèdìng rènwu set the tasks 確定時限 quèdìng shíxiàn fix a time frame 確定會議宗旨 quèdìng huìyì zōngzhǐ define the aims of the conference 確定領海寬度 quèdìng lǐnghǎi kuāndù delimit the extent of territorial waters 確定作戰方案 quèdìng zuòzhàn fāng'àn decide on a battle plan 確定地層的年代 quèdìng dìcéng de niándài ascertain the ages of the strata 確定候選人名單 quèdìng hòuxuǎnrén míngdān decide on the list of candidates 確定開會的日期和地點 quèdìng kāihuì de rìqī hé dìdiǎn determine (or fix) the time and place for a meeting 他們已經確定關係了。 Tāmen yǐjing quèdìng guānxi le. They’ve agreed to marry. adjective definite 確定的答復 Quèdìng de dáfù a definite reply 確定的時間 quèdìng de shíjiān a fixed time 確定不移的結論 quèdìng bù yí de jiélùn an incontestable conclusion

noun language 語言美 yǔyánměi beauty of one’s verbal expressions 語言與文字 yǔyán yǔ wénzì spoken and written language 糟蹋語言 zāo·tà yǔyán butcher (or abuse, murder) a language 掌握一門語言 Zhǎngwò yī mén yǔyán master (or command) a language

adjective accurate; exact; precise 準確地說明 Zhǔnquè de shuōmíng explain in precise terms 準確有力的扣殺 zhǔnquè yǒulì de kòushā accurate and powerful smashes 計算準確 Jìsuàn zhǔnquè calculate accurately 他的英語發音準確。 Tā de Yīngyǔ fāyīn zhǔnquè. His English pronunciation is accurate.
noun 1 information; news; message 提供信息 tígōng xìnxī provide information 2 mathematics information

auxiliary 1 [at the end of a special, alternative, or rhetorical question] 你剛纔到哪兒去了呢？ Nǐ gāngcái dào nǎr qù le ne？ Where were you just now? 你到底認不認得她呢？ Nǐ dào dǐ rèn bù rèn de tā ne？ Do you know her or not? 你對這件事是贊成呢, 還是反對呢？ Nǐ duì zhè jiàn shì shì zànchéng ne, hái shì fǎnduì ne？ Are you for or against this? 他們都有任務了, 我呢？ Tāmen dōu yǒu rènwu le, wǒ ne? They’ve got assignments, what about me? 我錯在哪兒呢？ Wǒ cuò zài nǎr ne？ What is my mistake? 我怎麼能不記得呢？ Wǒ zěnme néng bù jìde ne？ How could I forget this? 這點子事, 何必大驚小怪呢？ Zhè diǎnzi shì, hébì dàjīngxiǎoguài ne？ Why get so excited over such a little thing? 2 [at the end of a declarative sentence to reinforce the assertion] 遠得很, 有好幾千里地呢。 Yuǎn de hěn, yǒu hǎo jǐqiān lǐ dì ne. It’s a long way off—thousands of li away. 3 [at the end of a declarative sentence to indicate the continuation of an action or a state] 他還在生氣呢。 Tā hái zài shēngqì ne. He’s still angry. 張先生, 有人找你呢。 Zhāng xiānsheng, yǒurén zhǎo nǐ ne. Mr Zhang, somebody is looking for you. 4 [used to mark a pause] 不下雨呢, 就去;下雨呢, 就不去。 Bù xià yǔ ne, jiù qù ； xiàyǔ ne, jiù bù qù. If it doesn’t rain, we’ll go; if it does, we won’t. 如今呢, 可比以往任何時候都要強。 Rújīn ne, kě bǐ yǐwǎng rènhé shíhou dōu yào qiáng. As for the present, things are far better than at any time in the past.

auxiliary 1 [indicating a suggestion, request or mild command] 咱們走吧。 Zánmen zǒu ba. Let’s go. 你好好兒想想吧！ Nǐ hǎohāor xiǎngxiang ba! Just think it over. 2 [indicating consent or approval] 明天就明天吧。 Míngtiān jiù míngtiān ba. All right, let’s make it tomorrow. 好吧, 就這麼辦吧！ Hǎo ba, jiù zhème bàn ba! O.K., that’s what we’ll do. 3 [in a leading question which asks for confirmation of a supposition] 他會來吧？ Tā huì lái ba？ He’ll come, won’t he? 你是中國人吧？ Nǐ shì Zhōngguó rén ba？ You are Chinese, I suppose (or I take it)? 4 [indicating some doubt in the speaker's mind] 他們走了吧。 Tāmen zǒu le ba. I suppose they’ve left. 他好像是這麼說的吧。 Tā hǎoxiàng shì zhème shuō de ba. That seems to be what he said. 5 [marking a pause after suppositions as alternatives] 去吧, 不好；不去吧, 也不好。 qù ba, bù hǎo; bù qù ba, yě bù hǎo. If I go, it’s no good; if I don’t, it’s no good either.

adverb very; very much; quite 很滿意 Hěn mǎnyì feel very satisfied; feel quite pleased 很有道理 hěn yǒu dàoli contain much truth; be quite correct 這幾天熱得很。 Zhè jǐ tiān rè de hěn. It’s been very hot these last few days. 他這個人好得很。 Tā zhège rén hǎo de hěn. He’s a very good man. 他覺得很不好受。 Tā juéde hěn bù hǎoshòu. He felt very bad. 我家離學校很近。 Wǒ jiā lí xuéxiào hěn jìn. I live quite near the school. 我近來身體不很好。 Wǒ jìnlái shēntǐ bù hěn hǎo. I haven’t felt very well recently. 現在他口袋裡很有幾個錢。 Xiànzài tā kǒudài lǐ hěn yǒu jǐ ge qián. He’s made himself quite a nice little pile. 這故事發生在很久很久以前。 Zhè gùshi fāshēng zài hěn jiǔ hěn jiǔ yǐqián. The story took place a long long time ago.

verb 1 see; look at; watch 看電視 kàn diànshì watch TV 看電影 kàn diànyǐng see a film; go to the movies 看球賽 kàn qiú sài watch a ball game 看演出 kàn yǎnchū attend a performance 看展覽 kàn zhǎnlǎn visit an exhibition 2 read (silently) 看報 kànbào read a newspaper 看譜 kànpǔ read music score 看書 kànshū read (a book) 3 think; consider; judge 看清形勢 kàn qīng xíngshì make a correct appraisal of the situation 全面地看問題 quánmiàn de kàn wèntí look at (or approach) an issue from all angles 你看她這個人可靠嗎？ Nǐ kàn tā zhège rén kěkào ma？ Do you think she’s reliable? 你對這件事怎麼看？ Nǐ duì zhè jiàn shì zěnme kàn？ What’s your view on this matter? 4 look upon; regard 把公眾的利益看得高於一切 bǎ gōngzhòng de lìyì kàn de gāoyú yīqiè put the interests of the public above all else 5 see (or consult) (a doctor); treat (a patient or an illness) 李大夫把她的肺炎看好了。 Lǐ dàifu bǎ tā de fèiyán kàn hǎo le. Dr. Li has cured her of pneumonia. 有病就該去看。 Yǒu bìng jiù gāi qù kàn. You ought to go and see a doctor when you are ill. 6 look after 衣帽自看。 Yī-mào zì kàn. Take care of your own hats and coats. 7 call on; visit; see 我明天去看他。 Wǒ míngtiān qù kàn tā. I’ll go and see him tomorrow. 有空我來看你。 Yǒukòng wǒ lái kàn nǐ. I’lldrop in on you when I have time. 8 depend on; rely on; fall back on 我們明天是不是出遊, 得看天氣。 wǒmen míngtiān shìbushì chūyóu, děikàn tiānqì. Whether we’ll go on a sightseeing trip tomorrow will depend on the weather. 9 mind; watch out 別跑這麼快！看摔著！ Bié pǎo zhème kuài! Kàn shuāi zhe! Don’t run so fast! Mind you don’t fall. 10 [before some verbs or adjectives] tend to; be expected See 24863488看跌kan4die1看跌 auxiliary 1 [after a reduplicated verb or a verb phrase] try and see (what happens) 試試看 shìshikàn have a try 等一等看 děng yī děng kàn wait and see 嘗嘗看。 Chángchang kàn. Just taste this. 2 [in exclamations to express surprise or rebuke, esp. in the phrase 看你 or 你看你] 看你, 水都燒乾了。 Kàn nǐ, shuǐ dōu shāo gān le. Look what you’ve done! The water has all boiled away. 你看你！怎麼滿頭大汗啊！ Nǐ kàn nǐ! Zěnme mǎntóudàhàn a! Look at yourself! How come you’re bathed in sweat!

verb 1 think; ponder; consider 想辦法 xiǎng bànfǎ think of a way; seek a solution (or a way out) 想問題 xiǎng wèntí think over a problem 讓我想一想。 Ràng wǒ xiǎng yī xiǎng. Let me think it over. or Let me see. 你想得真周到。 Nǐ xiǎng de zhēn zhōudao. You have really thought of everything. 你想清楚了沒有？ Nǐ xiǎng qīngchu le méiyǒu？ Have you thought it out (or through)? 我們也要想想困難。 Wǒmen yě yào xiǎngxiǎng kùnnan. We must also anticipate difficulties. 我在想下一步棋該怎麼走。 Wǒ zài xiǎng xià yī bù qí gāi zěnme zǒu. I’m considering my next (chess) move. 2 think back; try to remember; recall; recollect 回想往事 huí xiǎng wǎngshì recall the past 你好好想想鑰匙擱哪兒了。 Nǐ hǎohāo xiǎngxiǎng yàoshi gē nǎr le. Think back carefully where you could have put the key. 3 suppose; reckon; consider; think 我想不至於吧。 Wǒ xiǎng bùzhìyú ba. I don’t believe things could get that bad. or Surely as bad as that! 我想我該走了。 Wǒ xiǎng wǒ gāi zǒu le. I’m afraid I must be going now. 你想他能買到票嗎？ Nǐ xiǎng tā néng mǎi dào piào ma？ Do you suppose he can get the tickets? 我想他今天不會來。 Wǒ xiǎng tā jīntiān bù huì lái. I don’t think he’ll come today. 4 want to; wish to; feel like (doing sth.) 我也想試試。 Wǒ yě xiǎng shìshi. I’d like to try too. 他很想上大學。 Tā hěn xiǎng shàng dàxué. He longs to go to college. 你想看足球賽嗎？ Nǐ xiǎng kàn zúqiúsài ma？ Do you want to see (or feel like seeing) a football match? 她不想跟我們去。 Tā bù xiǎng gēn wǒmen qù. She doesn’t wish to come with us. 5 remember with longing; miss 你走了以後, 我們都很想你。 Nǐ zǒu le yǐhòu, wǒmen dōu hěn xiǎng nǐ. After you left, we all missed you. 王大娘想女兒都想病了。 Wáng dàniáng xiǎng nǚ'ér dōu xiǎng bìng le. Auntie Wang misses her daughter so much she’s fallen ill.
verb 1 drink 喝茶 hēchá drink tea 喝湯 hē tāng drink soup 2 drink liquor 喝醉了 hē zuì le get drunk 愛喝兩盅 ài hē liǎng zhōng be fond of drinking VARIANT OF 22474752嗬he1嗬 hē/hè interjection ah; oh

verb 1 ask; inquire (opp. 答) 問個問題 wèn ge wèntí ask (or pose) a question 不懂就問。 Bù dǒng jiù wèn. Ask when you don’t know. 他在食堂問了一下開飯的時間。 Tā zài shítáng wèn le yīxià kāifàn de shíjiān. He inquired about meal times at the canteen. 2 ask (or inquire) after 他信裡問起你。 Tā xìn lǐ wèn qǐ nǐ. He asks after you in his letter. 幫我問教授們好。 bāng wǒ wèn jiàoshòu men hǎo. Please give my regards to the professors. 3 interrogate; examine 審問 shěnwèn interrogate; question 4 hold responsible; intervene 出了事唯你是問。 Chū le shì wéi nǐ shì wèn. You’ll be held responsible if anything goes wrong. 5 Chinese medicine (one of the four methods of diagnosis) interrogate preposition ask (sb.) for sth. 我去問他借那本書。 Wǒ qù wèn tā jiè nà běn shū. I’ll ask him to lend me the book. noun 1 literary message; letter; news 音問 yīnwèn message; news; tidings 2 question 發問 fāwèn ask (or pose) a question

verb 1 buy; purchase 買東西 Mǎi dōngxi buy things; go shopping 太貴了, 買不起。 Tài guì le, mǎi bù qǐ. It’s too expensive. I can’t afford it. 2 buy off; bribe See 66410979買官mai3guan1買官 noun (Mǎi) a surname

noun 1 star 月明星稀。 Yuèmíngxīngxī. The moon is bright and the stars are sparse. 2 astronomy heavenly body 彗星 huìxīng comet 衛星 wèixīng satellite 3 bit; particle 火星兒 huǒxīngr sparks 4 small marks on the arm of a steelyard indicating jin and its fractions 5 archaic astronomy xing (the twenty-fifth of the twenty-eight constellations (二十八宿) into which the celestial sphere was divided in ancient Chinese astronomy (consisting of seven stars in Hydra) 6 famous performer (movie star, ball games star, etc.) 追星 zhuīxīng idolise; worship a movie star, etc.

noun 1 a period of time; phase; stage 第一期工程 dì-yī qī gōngchéng the first phase of the project 暑期班分兩期, 每期三周 shǔqī bān fēn liǎng qī, měi qī sān zhōu a summer school of two three-week sessions 2 scheduled time 到期 dàoqī become due; mature; expire 限期 xiànqī prescribe (or set) a time limit verb 1 make an appointment 不期而遇 bùqī'éryù meet unexpectedly (or by chance) 2 expect See 28083968期待qi1dai4期待 measure word [for things scheduled by periods] 最近一期的《中國畫報》 zuìjìn yī qī de 《Zhōngguó Huàbào》 the current issue of China Pictorial 短訓班辦了三期 。 Duǎnxùnbān bàn le sān qī. The short-term training class has been run three times.

noun 1 trade; commerce; business 商德 shāngdé business ethics 商海 shānghǎi business world 經商 jīngshāng engage in trade; be in business 2 merchant; trader; businessman; dealer 鹽商 yánshāng salt dealer 3 mathematics quotient verb discuss; consult 共商大計 Gòng shāng dàjì discuss matters of vital importance noun music note of the ancient Chinese five-tone scale, corresponding to 2 in numbered musical notation noun 1 Shang Dynasty (1600-1046 BC) See DYNASTIES 2 a surname
noun 1 shop; store 服裝店 fúzhuāngdiàn clothing store 文具店 wénjùdiàn stationer’s 2 inn 住店 zhùdiàn stop at an inn

verb enough; ample; sufficient 足夠用十個月的燃料 zúgòu yòng shí ge yuè de ránliào sufficient fuel to last ten months 有足夠的時間嗎？ Yǒu zúgòu de shíjiān ma？ Is there enough time? 我們對困難要有足夠的估計。 Wǒmen duì kùnnan yào yǒu zúgòu de gūjì. We must take full account of our difficulties. or We must not underestimate our difficulties.
noun barbecue verb barbecue 燒烤羊肉 shāokǎo yángròu barbecue mutton

noun business; trade 生意虧本 shēngyi kuīběn business running at loss 搶生意 qiǎngshēngyi undercut; hustle 做生意 zuòshēngyi do business 生意蕭條。 Shēngyi xiāotiáo. Business is dull (or stagnant). 生意興隆。 Shēngyi xīnglóng. Trade is brisk. or Business is booming. 他是做藥品生意的。 tā shì zuò yàopǐn shēngyi de. He’s in the drug business.

verb 1 burn; kindle 乾柴容易燃燒。 gānchái róngyì ránshāo, Dry wood burns easily. 2 figurative get excited; very enthusiastic 激情燃燒 jīqíng ránshāo be exhilarated; be filled with passion 怒火燃燒 nùhuǒ ránshāo burning with rage

noun weight 你(有)多重？ Nǐ duō zhòng? What’s your weight? or How much is your weight? 這條魚有三斤重。 Zhè tiáo yú yǒu sān jīn zhòng. This fish weighs three jin. verb lay stress on; attach importance to 重調查研究 zhòng diàochá yánjiū stress investigation and study adjective 1 heavy; weighty; important 工作很重 gōngzuò hěn zhòng have a heavy workload 眉毛很重 Méimao hěn zhòng have thick eyebrows 以友誼為重 yǐ yǒuyì wéizhòng set store by friendship 鐵比木頭重。 Tiě bǐ mùtou zhòng. Iron is heavier than wood. 話說得太重了。 Huà shuō de tài zhòng le. That’s putting it too strongly. or That’s an overstatement. 為人民利益而死, 就比泰山還重。 Wèi rénmín lìyì ér sǐ, jiù bǐ Tài Shān hái zhòng. To die for the people is weightier than Mount Tai. 2 considerable in amount or value See 36457216重金zhong4jin1重金 3 deep; heavy; serious; strong 情意重 Qíngyì zhòng deep affection 病勢很重 bìngshì hěn zhòng seriously ill 私心很重 sīxīn hěn zhòng extremely selfish 地方口音很重 dìfang kǒuyin hěn zhòng have a strong (or heavy) local accent 4 discreet; careful See 29827584慎重shen4zhong4慎重

adjective 1 thin; light 淡酒 dànjiǔ light wine 雲淡風輕。 Yúndànfēngqīng. The clouds are pale and a light breeze is blowing. 2 bland; tasteless; weak; without enough salt (opp. 濃) 淡茶 Dànchá weak tea 淡酒 dànjiǔ weak wine 這個湯太淡。 Zhège tāng tài dàn. There’s not enough salt in this soup. or This soup is too bland for me. 3 (of colour) light; pale 淡黃 dànhuáng light yellow 淡紫 dàn zǐ pale purple; lilac 4 indifferent; lukewarm 我們之間關係很淡。 Wǒmen zhījiān guānxi hěn dàn. Our relationship is just lukewarm. 5 slack; dull 生意很淡。 Shēngyi hěn dàn. Business is slack. 6 dialect meaningless; trivial 扯淡 chědàn talk nonsense

adjective 1 deep (opp. 淺) 雪深過膝 xuě shēn guò xī knee-deep snow 一口深井 yī kǒu shēnjǐng a deep well 林深苔滑。 Lín shēn tái huá. The forest is thick and the moss is slippery. 2 hard to understand; difficult; abstruse; profound (opp. 淺) 這本書對孩子們來說太深了。 zhè běn shū duì háizimen lái shuō tài shēn le. The book is too difficult for children. 3 thoroughgoing; penetrating; profound (opp. 淺) 功夫下得深 Gōngfu xià de shēn have put in a great deal of effort 問題想得很深 Wèntí xiǎng de hěn shēn think deeply about a question 4 (of relations or feelings) close; intimate (opp. 淺) 交情深 jiāo qíng shēn be very close; be on intimate terms 他們之間的感情已經很深了。 Tāmen zhījiān de gǎnqíng yǐjing hěn shēn le. They are already deeply in love with each other. 5 (of colour) dark; deep; rich (opp. 淺) 深紅 shēnhóng deep red; crimson 深藍 shēnlán dark blue 顏色太深。 Yánsè tài shēn. The colour is too dark (or deep). 6 far on in the day, night, season, etc.; late 夜深了。 Yèshēn le. It was in the dead of night (or late at night). noun depth 測量水深 Cèliáng shuǐshēn sound (or plumb) the depth of the water 這山洞有多深？ Zhè shāndòng yǒu duō shēn？ What is the depth of the cave? 這間大廳有三十米寬, 五十八米深。 zhè jiān dàtīng yǒu sānshí mǐ kuān, wǔshíbā mǐ shēn. This hall is 30m wide and 58m deep (or 30m in width and 58m in depth). adverb very; greatly; deeply 深知 shēnzhī know very well; be fully (or keenly) aware 深表同情 shēnbiǎo tóngqíng show deep (or profound) sympathy 深得人心 shēndérénxīn enjoy immense popular support 深感不安 shēngǎn bù'ān be greatly disturbed; be very much worried 深獲民心 shēn huò mínxīn fully supported by the people 深恐出事 shēnkǒng chūshì be terribly afraid that something may go wrong 深受感動 shēnshòu gǎndòng be deeply moved; be greatly touched 深有同感 shēnyǒutónggǎn fully agree to 深受消費者好評 shēn shòu xiāofèizhě hǎopíng highly praised by consumers noun abbreviation Shenzhen 深交所 abbreviation shēn jiāo suǒ Shenzhen Stock Exchange

adjective 1 shallow (opp. 深) 淺水 qiǎnshuǐ shallow (or shoal) water 淺淺的一碗飯 qiǎn qiǎn de yī wǎn fàn a partly-filled bowl of rice 這房子進深淺。 Zhè fángzi jìnshen qiǎn. The house is not deep. 2 simple; easy (opp. 深) 這篇課文很淺。 Zhè piān kèwén hěn qiǎn. This lesson is very easy. 3 superficial (opp. 深) 功夫淺 gōngfu qiǎn have superficial mastery of a skill 對問題的認識很淺 Duì wèntí de rènshi hěn qiǎn just have a superficial understanding of the problem 4 not intimate; not close (opp. 深) 交情很淺 jiāoqing hěn qiǎn not on familiar terms 5 (of a colour) light; pale (opp. 深) 淺黃 qiǎnhuáng pale yellow 淺藍 qiǎnlán light blue 這種毛線色兒太淺。 Zhèzhǒng máoxiàn sèr tài qiǎn. The colour of this woollen yarn is too pale. 6 not long in time 相處的日子還淺 Xiāngchǔ de rìzi hái qiǎn have not been together long 他在這兒工作的日子淺。 Tā zài zhèr gōngzuò de rìzi qiǎn. He’s been working here for only a short time.

noun 1 colour; colourity 你最喜歡什麼顏色？ Nǐ zuì xǐhuan shénme yánsè？ What colour do you like most? 2 countenance; facial expression 給他一點兒顏色看看 Gěi tā yīdiǎnryánsè kànkan make it hot for him; teach him a lesson 臉上現出不悅的顏色 liǎn shàng xiànchū bùyuè deyánsè look unhappy 3 countenance; appearance; looks 顏色枯槁 yánsè kūgǎo look haggard

noun 1 taste (of a person); liking 合口味 Hékǒu wèi suit one’s taste; cater to sb.’staste 各人口味不同。 Gèrén kǒuwèi bùtóng. Tastes differ. 歌劇不對我的口味。 gējù bùduì wǒ dekǒuwèi. Opera isn’t really my cup of tea. 2 flavour or taste of food 地方口味 dìfang kǒuwèi local flavour 這菜口味不錯。 Zhè cài kǒuwèi bùcuò. This dish is tasty. 這些菜都是湖南口味。 Zhèxiē cài dōu shì Húnán kǒuwèi. These are all Hunanese dishes.
noun weight
noun 1 linguistics noun; substantive 2 term; phrase 化學名詞 huàxué míngcí chemical term 3 logic name
noun linguistics verb
noun linguistics adjective
verb smile 強作微笑 qiáng zuò wēixiào manage a weak smile 她嘴角略過一絲微笑。 tā zuǐjiǎo lüèguò yī sī wēixiào. A trace of smile played across her lips.
noun summer 這裡的夏天特別熱。 Zhèlǐ de xiàtiān tèbié rè. It’s very hot here in summer. or Summers here are very hot.
noun last year 去年此時 qùnián cǐshí this time last year 去年十二月 qùnián Shí'èryuè last December
verb 1 dance (in a performance) 2 dance (socially)
verb sleep 該睡覺了。 Gāi shuìjiào le. It’s time to go to bed. or It’s time for bed. 馬上上床, 好好地睡一覺。 Mǎshàng shàng chuáng, hǎohāo de shuì yī jiào. Get straight into bed and have a good sleep.
noun electric lamp; electric light
noun (electric) cell; battery 電池組 diànchízǔ battery 乾電池 gāndiànchí dry cell 燃料電池 ránliàodiànchí fuel cell 太陽能電池 tàiyángnéng diànchí solar cell
noun film; movie; motion picture 彩色電影 cǎisè diànyǐng colour movie 黑白電影 hēi-bái diànyǐng black-and-white movie 有聲電影 yǒushēng diànyǐng sound film 無聲電影 wúshēng diànyǐng silent film
noun television; TV 看電視 kàn diànshì watch television 彩色電視 cǎisè diànshì colour television 黑白電視 hēibáidiànshì black-and-white television 立體電視 lìtǐ diànshì stereoscopic television
verb sing (a song) 她很會唱歌。 Tā hěn huì chànggē. She is a good singer.
noun Chinese (language) See 28050176普通話pu3tong1hua4普通話

noun health; physique 健康不佳 jiànkāng bùjiā ill-health 人民的健康水平有了很大提高。 Rénmín de jiànkāng shuǐpíng yǒu le hěn dà tígāo. The general level of the people’s health has markedly improved. adjective healthy; sound 健康長壽 jiànkāng chángshòu good health and a long life 健康文明的生活方式 jiànkāng wénmíng de shēnghuó fāngshì healthy and civilized life style 身體健康 shēntǐ jiànkāng be in good health 祝你健康！ Zhù nǐ jiànkāng! Wish you good health. 情況基本上是健康的。 Qíngkuàng jīběnshang shì jiànkāng de. The situation is basically sound. 為朋友們的健康幹杯！ Wèi péngyou men de jiànkāng gānbēi! Let’s drink a toast to our friends’ health! 中國經濟正在健康地發展。 Zhōngguó jīngjì zhèngzài jiànkāng de fāzhǎn. China’s economy is developing healthily.
noun map 世界地圖 shìjièdìtú world map 中國地圖 Zhōngguó dìtú map of China
noun abbreviation 1 = 19921920地下鐵道di4xia4tie3dao4地下鐵道 subway; underground; metro; tube 2 underground train

verb meet; see each other 初次見面 chū cì jiànmiàn meet for the first time 思想見面 sīxiǎng jiànmiàn each stating frankly what’s on his mind 要使產銷直接見面 yào shǐ chǎn-xiāo zhíjiē jiànmiàn establish direct links between the producer and the seller 他倆經常見面。 Tā liǎ jīngcháng jiànmiàn. They see a lot of each other. 這個話劇將通過電視與觀眾見面。 Zhège huàjù jiāng tōngguò diànshì yǔ guānzhòng jiànmiàn. This play will be shown on the TV.

noun 1 cup 茶杯 chábēi teacup 瓷杯 Cí bēi china cup 酒杯 jiǔbēi beer mug 高腳杯 gāojiǎobēi goblet; wine glass 2 (alcoholic) drink 貪杯 tānbēi too fond of drinking (or the bottle) 咱們喝一杯。 Zánmen hē yī bēi. Let’s have a drink. 3 (prize) cup; trophy 世界杯 shìjièbēi World Cup 獲得獎杯 huòdé jiǎng bēi win the cup measure word cup; glass 一杯茶 yī bēi chá a cup of tea 兩杯啤酒 liǎng bēi píjiǔ two glasses of beer; two beers

pronoun 1 this 這地方 zhè dìfang this place 這一回 zhè yī huí this time 這就對了。 Zhè jiù duì le. Now you’re on the right track. or Now that’s better. 這是新產品。 zhè shì xīnchǎnpǐn. These are new products. 這究竟是怎麼回事？ Zhè jiūjìng shì zěnme huí shì？ What’s all this about? 這才是好孩子！ Zhè cái shì hǎo háizi! That’s a good boy (girl)! or That’s a dear! 這消息我知道了。 Zhè xiāoxi wǒ zhīdao le. I’ve heard that news already. or Yes, so I’ve heard. 2 now 我這就走。 Wǒ zhè jiù zǒu. I’m leaving right now. 他這才知道鍛煉身體的好處。 Tā zhè cái zhīdao duànliàn shēntǐ de hǎochu. Only now does he see the benefit of exercise.

pronoun that 那人 nà rén that man 那時候 nà shíhou at that time 那兩棵樹 nà liǎng kē shù those two trees 那是 2008 年的事。 Nà shì 1958nián de shì. That was in 2008. 那是誰？ Nà shì shuí？ Who is that? 那是我的錯。 Nà shì wǒ de cuò. That was my fault. 我們說這道那的, 不知不覺已到凌晨。 Wǒmen shuō zhè dào nà de, bùzhībùjué yǐ dào língchén. We talked about this and that, and before we knew it, it was almost dawn. conjunction then; in that case 那我們就不再等了。 Nà wǒmen jiù bùzài děng le. In that case, we won’t wait any longer. 你要想跟我們一塊走, 那就得快點兒。 nǐ yào xiǎng gēn wǒmen yīkuài zǒu, nà jiùděi kuàidianr. If you’re coming with us, you must hurry.

adjective 1 many; much; more (opp. 少, 寡) 很多人 hěn duō rén many people 多思。 Duō sī. Think more. 人多議論多。 Rén duō yìlùn duō. More people mean more ideas. 這樣簡單多了。 Zhèyàng jiǎndān duō le. This is much simpler. 要辦的事情很多。 Yào bàn de shìqing hěn duō. There are many things to do. 他多喝了一點兒 (= 喝多了一點兒)。 tā duō hē le yīdiǎnr . He’s had a drop too much. 我在那兒多住了幾天。 Wǒ zài nàr duō zhù le jǐ tiān. I stayed there a few days longer. 時間緊迫, 我不能多考慮。 Shíjiān jǐnpò, wǒ bù néng duō kǎolǜ. Time is running out so I can’t give it much thought. 我們比原計劃多打了十口井。 Wǒmen bǐ yuán jìhuà duō dǎ le shí kǒu jǐng. We have sunk ten more wells than planned. 昨天很熱, 今天涼快多了。 Zuótiān hěn rè, jīntiān liángkuai duō le. It was quite hot yesterday but today it’s a lot cooler. 2 excessive 多疑 duōyí suspicious; distrusting adverb over a specified amount; and more 十多斤 shí duō jīn a dozen or more jin 十斤多 shí jīn duō over ten jin 六十多歲 liùshí duō suì over sixty years old 三個多月 sān ge duō yuè over three months; three months and more 一百多個人 yībǎi duō ge rén more than 100 people 全書一千多頁。 Quánshū yīqiān duō yè. It’s a book of 1,000-odd pages. verb 1 have (a specified amount) more or too much (opp. 少) 班上多了三個新同學。 Bān shàng duō le sān ge xīn tóngxué. There are three more new students in the class. 這個句子多了一個詞。 zhège jùziduō le yī ge cí. There is one word too many in this sentence. 2 have sth. in abundance 南方多水, 利於灌溉。 Nánfāng duō shuǐ, lìyú guàngài. Irrigation is easy in the South because of the abundance of water. 這裡春天多風, 夏天多雨。 Zhèlǐ chūntiān duō fēng, xiàtiān duō yǔ. Here we have a lot of wind in spring and a lot of rain in summer. adverb 1 [in questions] to what extent 他多大年紀了？ Tā duō dà niánjì le？ How old is he? 天安門有多高？ Tiān'ānmén yǒu duō gāo？ How high is Tian’anmen? 多厚的木板才能做桌面呢？ Duō hòu de mùbǎn cái néng zuò zhuōmiàn ne？ How thick must a wooden plank be to make a table top? 2 [in exclamations] to what an extent 看她多漂亮！ Kàn tā duō piàoliang! Look how pretty she is! 這天兒多悶哪！ Zhètiānr duō mēn nǎ! What stuffy weather! 3 to an unspecified extent 有多大勁兒使多大勁兒。 Yǒu duō dà jìnr shǐ duō dà jìnr. Use out all the strength you have. 走出不多遠, 他又回來了。 Zǒu chū bù duō yuǎn, tā yòu huílai le. He turned back before going far. 多複雜的算術題他都能做出來。 Duō fùzá de suànshù tí tā dōu néng zuò chūlai. He can figure out any arithmetic problem, no matter how complicated.

verb 1 be short of; lack (opp. 多) 少管閒 shǎoguǎnxiánshì keep one’s nose out of other people’s affairs (or business) 缺醫少藥 quēyīshǎoyào be short of doctors and medicine 我們還少兩把椅子。 Wǒmen hái shǎo liǎng bǎ yǐzi. We’re still two chairs short. 咱們少一個好的守門員。 Zánmen shǎo yī ge hǎo de shǒuményuán. We lack a good goalkeeper. 2 owe 還少一百塊。 hái shǎo yībǎi kuài. There are still 100 yuan owing. 他還少我半年的房租。 Tā hái shǎo wǒ bànnián de fángzū. He still owes me half year’s rent. 3 lose; be missing 看看少不少人。 Kànkan shǎo bùshǎo rén. See if anyone is missing. 少了誰地球也轉。 shǎo le shuí dìqiú yě zhuǎn. No man is indispensable. 羊群裡少了幾只羊。 Yángqún lǐ shǎo le jǐ zhī yáng. A few sheep have been lost from the flock. 這裡肯定少了一個字。 Zhèlǐ kěndìng shǎo le yī ge zì. Surely, there’s a word missing here. 4 stop; quit 少廢話！ Shǎo fèihuà! Stop talking rubbish! 少給我裝蒜！ Shǎo gěi wǒ zhuāngsuàn! Stop pretending! 少來這一套。 Shǎo lái zhè yī tào. Cut it out. or Quit that! adjective few; little; less (opp. 多) 少吃多餐 shǎochīduōcān have many meals but little food at each 少得可憐 shǎo de kělián miserably little (or few) 少勞少得 shǎoláoshǎodé less pay for less work 少生優生 shǎoshēng-yōushēng have fewer but healthier babies 少生優育 shǎo shēng yōuyù fewer births and sound child care practice 少走彎路 shǎozǒuwānlù avoid detours in one’s progress 少花錢, 多辦事 Shǎo huāqián, duō bàn shì. accomplish more with less money 少講空話, 多做實事 shǎo jiǎng kōnghuà, duō zuò shíshì forsake empty talk in favour of practical work 以少勝多 yǐshǎoshèngduō defeat the many with the few 最近我們很少見到他。 Zuìjìn wǒmen hěn shǎo jiàndào tā. We’ve seen very little of him lately. adverb a little while; a moment 請少候。 Qǐng shǎo hòu. Wait a moment, please.

noun 1 copper coin; cash 銅錢 tóngqián copper cash 2 money; wealth 有錢有勢 yǒuqiányǒushì be wealthy and powerful 這個多少錢？ Zhège duōshao qián？ How much is this? 3 fund; sum 買房的錢 mǎi fáng deqián the wherewithal to buy a flat 這筆錢是專為保健事業用的。 Zhè bǐ qián shì zhuān wèi bǎojiàn shìyè yòng de. verb 1 exist; be alive 人在人情在。 Rén zài rénqíng zài. Friendship lasts as long as the person remains. 他父親還在, 母親早就不在了。 Tā fùqin hái zài, mǔqin zǎo jiù bù zài le. His father is still alive, but his mother passed away long ago. 她人已去, 但精神永在。 tā rén yǐqù, dàn jīngshén yǒng zài. She is gone, but her spirit lives on. 問題還在, 並沒有解決。 Wèntí hái zài, bìng méiyǒu jiějué. The problem still exists and is not resolved yet. 2 be at, in, or on (a place) 你去那兒找他, 他準在。 Nǐ qù nàr zhǎo tā, tā zhǔn zài. Go and see him; he’s sure to be there. 他在家, 不在這兒。 Tā zài jiā, bù zài zhèr. He’s at home, not here. 你的鋼筆在桌子上呢。 Nǐ de gāngbǐ zài zhuōzi shàng ne. Your pen is on the table. 我父母在農村。 Wǒ fùmǔ zài nóngcūn. My parents are in the countryside. 3 depend on; rest with 去不去在你自己。 Qù bù qù zài nǐ zìjǐ. It’s up to you whether to go or not. 收不收他在學校領導。 Shōu bù shōu tā zài xuéxiào lǐngdǎo. His admittance rests with the school authorities. 學習好, 主要在自己努力。 Xuéxí hǎo, zhǔyào zài zìjǐ nǔlì. Getting good results in one’s studies depends mainly on one’s own efforts. 4 lie in; consist in 工作人員不在多, 而在有效率。 Gōngzuò rényuán bù zài duō, ér zài yǒu xiàolǜ. A staff need not be large but it must be efficient. 她美就美在那雙眼睛。 Tā měi jiù měi zài nà shuāng yǎnjing. Her charm lies in her eyes. 我們的希望在青年一代。 Wǒmen de xīwàng zài qīngnián yīdài. Our hopes lie in the younger generation. 學習貴在堅持。 Xuéxí guì zài jiānchí. Persistence is vital to study. 這首詩妙在含蓄而不明言。 Zhè shǒu shī miào zài hánxù ér bù míng yán. The appeal of this poem lies in inference rather than direct statement. 5 join or belong to an organization; be a member of an organization 在組織 Zài zǔzhī belong to a certain organization 6 be on the job or at the post See 35602688在職zai4zhi2在職 preposition 1 at, in, or on (a place or time) 在會上發言 Zài huì shàng fāyán speak at a meeting 狗在地上打滾兒。 Gǒu zài dìshang dǎgǔnr. The dog rolled on the ground. 他在工廠工作。 Tā zài gōngchǎng gōngzuò. He works in a factory. 事情發生在去年。 Shìqing fāshēng zài qùnián. It happened last year. 陽光照射在水面上。 Yángguāng zhàoshè zài shuǐmiàn shàng. The sunlight fell on the water. 運動會安排在四月份。 Yùndònghuì ānpái zài Sìyuè fèn. The sports meet will be some time in April. 2 according to; in terms of 在黨內 zài dǎngnèi within (or inside) the Party 在此期間 zài cǐ qījiān during this period 在理論上 zài lǐlùn shàng in theory; theoretically 在我看來 Zài wǒ kànlai in my opinion; as I see it 在這方面 zài zhè fāngmiàn in this respect 在國際事務中 zài guójì shìwù zhōng in international affairs 在全國範圍內 zài quánguó fànwéi nèi throughout the country 在這種情況下 zài zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng xià under these circumstances 在黨中央的領導下 zài dǎngzhōngyāng de lǐngdǎo xià under the leadership of the Party Central Committee 在和平共處五項原則的基礎上 zài hépíng gòngchǔ wǔ xiàng yuánzé de jīchǔ shàng on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence adverb 1 [indicating action in progress] 他在看電視。 Tā zài kàn diànshì. He’s watching TV. 他在幹什麼？——他還在睡覺呢。 Tā zài gàn shénme？ —— tā hái zài shuìjiào ne. What’s he doing? —He’s still sleeping. 她在游泳。 Tā zài yóuyǒng. She is swimming. 2 [used together with 所 (suǒ) and often followed by 不 (bù) to indicate emphasis] See 35597056在所不辭zai4suo3bu4ci2在所不辭;35597312在所不惜zai4suo3bu4xi1 在所不惜

The minister has gone to spend time in a grass-roots unit and left me in charge of overall business. 7 extent; range; scale; scope 知識面廣 Zhīshi miàn guǎng have a wide range of knowledge 知識面窄 Zhīshimiàn zhǎi have a narrow range of knowledge 這次討論涉及的面很廣。 Zhè cì tǎolùn shèjí de miàn hěn guǎng. The discussion covered a wide range of topics. 8 face; feelings 看在我的面上, 饒了他這一回吧。 Kàn zài wǒ de miàn shàng, ráo le tā zhè yī huí ba. noun 1 ability; capability; skill 技能 jìnéng technical skill 無能 wúnéng incompetent 2 physics energy 波能 bō néng wave energy 風能 fēngnéng wind energy verb 1 can do; be able to; be capable of 他好多了, 能下床了。 Tā hǎo duō le, néng xià chuáng le. Can he possibly come tonight? 這件事她能一點兒也不知道嗎？ Zhè jiàn shì tā néng yīdiǎnr yě bùzhīdào ma? How could she know nothing of this? or Could she be completely in the dark? 3 [between 不…不 to express obligation, certainty or great probability] 不能不 bùnéngbù must; have to; cannot but 4 may; can; have the permission to 這兒能停車嗎？——能停(不能停)。 Zhèrnéng tíngchē ma? ——néng tíng. Can we park here?—Yes, you can. (No. Parking is forbidden here.) adjective able; capable 她可能呢, 穿的衣服都是自己做的。 Tā kěnéng ne, chuān de yīfu dōu shì zìjǐ zuò de. She’s very clever with her hands and makes all her own clothes.

noun 1 worker; workman 女工 nǚgōng woman worker 2 work; labour 既省料又省工 jì shěng liào yòu shěng gōng save both material and labour 3 architecture project; construction 動工 dònggōng start a project 4 industry 工農業 gōngnóngyè industry and agriculture 5 engineer 高工 gāogōng abbreviation senior engineer 6 man-day 這項工程需要五千個工。 Zhè xiàng gōngchéng xūyào wǔqiān ge gōng. This project will take 5,000 man-days to complete. 7 skill; craftsmanship 唱工 chànggōng singing skill verb literary be versed in; be good at 工詩善畫 Gōng shī shàn huà be well versed in painting and poetry adjective exquisite; fine 其詩甚工。 qí shī shèn gōng. His poetry is fine and rhythmical. noun music archaic a note of the scale in Gongchepu (工尺譜), corresponding to 3 in numbered musical notation

noun writings; work 新作 xīnzuò a new work 成功之作 chénggōng zhī zuò a successful work verb 1 rise; grow 槍聲大作。 Qiāngshēng dàzuò. Heavy firing broke out. 2 write; compose 作畫 zuòhuà paint a picture 作詩 zuòshī compose a poem 作書一封 zuò shū yī fēng write a letter 3 pretend; affect 故作怒容 gù zuò nùróng pretend to be angry 4 regard as; take sb. or sth. for 看作 kànzuò look upon as; regard as See 37143552作廢zuo4fei4作廢 5 feel; have See 37151488作嘔zuo4ou3作嘔 6 engage in an activity See 37150976作孽zuo4nie4作孽

verb 1 sit 請坐。 Qǐngzuò. Please sit down. 請進來坐坐。 Qǐng jìnlai zuò zuò. Please come in and sit for a while. 他忽然坐起來了。 Tā hūrán zuò qǐlai le. He sat up suddenly. 我願意站著, 你坐下吧。 Wǒ yuànyi zhànzhe, nǐ zuòxia ba. I’ll love to stand, you sit. 2 travel by or on (any conveyance except those which are straddled) 坐火車去 zuò huǒchē qù go by train 坐公共汽車 zuò gōnggòng qìchē ride on a bus 坐電梯上去 zuò diàntī shàng qù go up by lift; take the elevator 3 (of a building) have its back towards 這所房子坐北朝南。 Zhè suǒ fángzi zuò běi cháo nán. This house faces south. 4 put (a pan, pot, kettle, etc.) on a fire 把壺坐上 Bǎ hú zuò shàng put the kettle on (the fire) 5 (of a building) sink; subside 這個房子向后坐了。 Zhège fángzi xiàng hòu zuò le. This house is beginning to lean backwards. 6 (of rifles, guns, etc.) recoil; kick back See 37131008坐力zuo4li4坐力 7 bear (fruit) See 37127168坐果zuo4guo3坐果 8 be punished See 20743680反坐fan3zuo4反坐 9 contract (or have) a disease; suffer from a disease 年輕時坐下了腿寒的毛病 niánqīng shí zuòxià le tuǐ hán de máobing got one’s cold legs during one’s youth noun VARIANT OF 37165824座zuo4座1 seat; place preposition literary because; for the reason that 坐此解職 zuòcǐxièzhí be dismissed for this reason adverb literary without any reason or cause; for no reason 驚砂坐飛 jīngshā zuò fēi dust flew without wind

adjective 1 healthy 健康 jiànkāng healthy 2 well-being; easy; peaceful; abundant See 24876032康寧kang1ning2康寧 noun (Kāng) a surname literary VARIANT OF 24879104糠kang1糠 noun chaff; bran; husk verb (usu. of a radish) become spongy adjective dialect of low quality; inferior

adjective 1 healthy; strong 矯健 jiǎojiàn strong and vigorous 2 strong in; good at 健鬥 jiàndòu be good at fighting verb strengthen; toughen; invigorate 健脾 jiàn pí invigorate the function of the spleen 健腎 jiànshèn strengthen the function of kidneys

noun 1 surface; outside; external 月表 yuèbiǎo the moon’s surface 2 the relationship between the children or grandchildren of a brother and a sister, or of sisters See 17654528表哥biao3ge1表哥 3 model; example 為人師表 wéirénshībiǎo worthy of the name of teacher See 17664256表率biao3shuai4表率 4 memorial to an emperor 諸葛亮《出師表》 Zhūgě Liàng 《Chūshī Biǎo》 Zhuge Liang’s “Memorial on Going to War” 5 table; form; list; chart 造表 zàobiǎo draw up a table; write out a list 登記表 dēngjì biǎo registration form 價目表 jiàmùbiǎo price list verb 1 show; express 表決心 biǎojué xīn express (or declare) one’s determination 深表同情 shēnbiǎo tóngqíng show deep sympathy 以表敬意 yǐ biǎo jìngyì as a small token of one’s respect 2 Chinese medicine administer medicine to bring out the cold noun 1 ornamental columns (in front of a palace or tomb) 2 gnomon (needle) of a sundial

noun cash; ready money 付現 fùxiàn pay cash verb show; appear; become visible 現原形 xiàn yuánxíng show one’s true colours 她臉上現出一絲笑容。 Tā liǎnshàng xiànchū yī sī xiàoróng. A faint smile appeared on (or crept over) her face. adjective 1 present; current; existing 現況 xiànkuàng the existing (or present) situation 現階段 xiànjiēduàn present stage 2 (of money, etc.) on hand See 32961024現錢xian4qian2現錢 adverb recent; improvise; extempore 現烙的燒餅 xiàn lào de shāobing sesame buns just out of the oven 現派張先生前往你處接洽。 xiàn pài zhāng xiānsheng qiánwǎng nǐ chù jiēqià. We are now sending Mr Zhang to contact you. 他在晚會上現編了一首詩。 Tā zài wǎnhuì shàng xiàn biān le yī shǒu shī. He improvised a poem at the evening party. 這點兒技術也是工作中現學的。 Zhèdiǎnr jìshù yěshì gōngzuò zhōng xiàn xué de. Whatever skills I have were picked up on the job.

verb 1 grind; pestle; mull; triturate; levigate; lap 研墨 yánmò rub an ink stick on an inkslab (to prepare ink for brush writing) 研成粉末 yán chéng fěnmò grind into fine powder; pulverize by grinding; levigate 2 study; research 研探 yán tàn explore; inquire into noun 1 abbreviation VARIANT OF 34026496研究生yan2jiu1sheng1研究生 postgraduate (student); graduate student 考研 kǎoyán take a postgraduate examination 2 abbreviation research fellow 副研 fùyán associate research fellow

verb study carefully; go into; investigate 究其根源 jiūqígēnyuán trace sth. to its source adverb literary actually; really; after all 究應如何辦理？ Jiū yīng rúhé bànlǐ？ How should this be dealt with? 究系何因, 尚待深查。 Jiū xì hé yīn, shàng dài shēn chá. The actual cause awaits further investigation.

noun 1 lining; inside (of clothing) 衣服裏 yīfu lǐ lining (of a garment) 被裏 bèilǐ inside of a quilt 這面是裏兒, 那面是面兒。 Zhè miàn shì lǐr, nà miàn shì miànr. This is the inside, that is the outside. 2 inner (opp. 外) 圈裏人 quān lǐ rén insider; member of the inner circle

noun item; project 項目立項 xiàngmù lìxiàng approve and initiate a project 項目核準與備案 xiàngmù hézhǔn yǔ bèi'àn project approval and record-keeping 出口項目 chūkǒu xiàngmù goods for export; export items 田徑項目 tiánjìng xiàngmù track and field events 訓練項目 xùnliàn xiàngmù training course 援助項目 yuánzhù xiàngmù aid project 基本建設項目 jīběn jiànshè xiàngmù capital construction project
adjective far back; ages ago; remote 年代久遠 niándài jiǔyuǎn of the remote past; age-old; time-honoured; ancient

noun contact; touch; connection; relation 保持聯繫 bǎochí liánxì keep in contact (or touch) with 取得聯繫 qǔdé liánxì get in touch with; establish contact with 失去聯繫 shīqù liánxì lose contact 事物的內部聯繫 Shìwù de nèibù liánxì internal relations of things 事物的外部聯繫 shìwù de wàibù liánxì external relations of things 有廣泛的社會聯繫 yǒu guǎngfàn de shèhuì liánxì have wide social connections verb 1 arrange; get in touch with 聯繫住處 liánxì zhùchù arrange accommodation 看電影的事, 找俱樂部聯繫。 kàn diànyǐng de shì, zhǎo jùlèbù liánxì. As for movies, please contact the club. 隨時跟我聯繫。 Suíshí gēn wǒ liánxì. Keep in touch with me. 2 integrate; relate; link 理論聯繫實際 lǐlùn liánxì shíjì integrate theory with practice; apply theory to reality 密切聯繫群眾 mìqiè liánxì qúnzhòng maintain close ties with the masses 中國的前途同世界的前途緊密地聯繫在一起。 Zhōngguó de qiántú tóng shìjiè de qiántú jǐnmì de liánxì zài yīqǐ. The future of China is closely linked with that of the whole world.

verb get in touch with; come into contact with; contact 聯絡感情 Liánluò gǎnqíng make friendly contacts; strengthen the bonds of friendship 用電話跟某人聯絡 yòng diànhuà gēn mǒurén liánluò get in touch with sb. by telephone 多多聯絡。 Duōduō liánluò. Let’s get in touch more often. noun contact (between people); liaison 失掉聯絡 shīdiào liánluò lose contact; be out of touch

noun 1 order; command 命令式的口氣 mìnglìng shì de kǒuqì commanding tone; peremptory 下命令 xià mìnglìng issue an order 服從命令 fúcóng mìnglìng obey orders 2 computing command ＤＯＳ命令 ＤＯＳmìnglìng DOS command verb order; command 連長命令一排擔任警戒。 Liánzhǎng mìnglìng yī pái dānrèn jǐngjiè. The company commander ordered the 1st platoon to guard duty.

noun 1 buy and sell; business; deal; transaction 做成一筆買賣 Zuò chéng yī bǐ mǎimai make a deal 買賣興隆。 Mǎimai xīnglóng. Business is brisk. 2 (private) shop 他原先在城裡有個買賣。 Tā yuánxiān zài chénglǐ yǒu ge mǎimai. He used to have a shop in the city.

noun need 從群眾的需要出發 Cóng qúnzhòng de xūyào chūfā make the needs of the masses our starting point 適應形勢發展的需要 shìyìng xíngshì fāzhǎn de xūyào adapt to the needs of the developing conditions verb need; want; require; demand 這本書我非常需要。 Zhè běn shū wǒ fēicháng xūyào. I need this book badly. 這所房子需要修理。 Zhè suǒ fángzi xūyào xiūlǐ. The house wants repairing. 這種情況需要立即採取措施。 Zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng xūyào lìjí cǎiqǔ cuòshī. This situation requires (or demands) immediate action. 壞習慣一旦養成, 需要很長的時間才能根除。 Huài xíguàn yīdàn yǎngchéng, xūyào hěn cháng de shíjiān cái néng gēnchú. A bad habit once contracted takes a very long time to uproot (or root up).

verb succeed; be a success 試驗成功了嗎？ Shìyàn chénggōng le ma？ Did the experiment come off all right? 這項革新一定能夠成功。 Zhè xiàng géxīn yīdìng nénggòu chénggōng. The innovation is bound to be a success. adjective successful 大會開得很成功。 Dàhuì kāi de hěn chénggōng. The congress was a great success.

verb believe in; convinced; trust; have faith in 相信群眾 Xiāngxìn qúnzhòng have faith in the masses 相信真理 xiāngxìn zhēnlǐ believe in the truth 相信自己的事業是正義的 xiāngxìn zìjǐ de shìyè shì zhèngyì de convinced of the justice of one’s cause 相信我吧。 Xiāngxìn wǒ ba. Trust me. 我相信你的話。 Wǒ xiāngxìn nǐ de huà. I believe what you say.

noun confidence; faith 滿懷信心 mǎnhuái xìnxīn full of confidence 有信心提前完成任務 yǒu xìnxīn tíqián wánchéng rènwu be confident of fulfilling a task ahead of schedule 我對這藥信心不大。 Wǒ duì zhè yào xìnxīn bù dà. I don’t have much faith in this medicine.

noun merit; strong (or good) point; advantage; virtue (opp. 缺點) 優點和缺點 yōudiǎn hé quēdiǎn merits and demerits; virtues and defects; strong and weak points 每個人都有自己的優點。 Měi ge rén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de yōudiǎn. Each person has his own strong points.

noun shortcoming; defect; weakness; drawback (opp. 優點) 克服工作中的缺點 Kèfú gōngzuò zhōng de quēdiǎn overcome shortcomings in one’s work 你的缺點是寫作業不認真。 Nǐ de quēdiǎn shì xiě zuòyè bù rènzhēn. Not doing your homework carefully is your weakness. 這本書的插圖太少是一個缺點。 Zhè běn shū de chātú tài shǎo shì yī ge quēdiǎn. One shortcoming of this book is that it has too few illustrations. 這種藥的主要缺點是敗胃。 Zhèzhǒng yào de zhǔyào quēdiǎn shì bàiwèi. The chief drawback of this medicine is that it spoils your appetite.

pronoun usually literary how; what 進展如何？ jìnzhǎn rúhé How are things getting on? 此事如何辦理？ Cǐshì rúhé bànlǐ？ How are we to handle this matter? 他不知如何是好。 Tā bùzhī rúhé shì hǎo. He didn’t know what to do. 這個電影你覺得如何？ Zhège diànyǐng nǐ juéde rúhé？ What do you think of the film? adverb VARIANT OF 22508800何如he2ru2何如1 classical how about

noun value 毫無價值 háowú jiàzhí completely worthless 這些資料對我們大有價值。 zhèxiē zīliào duì wǒmen dàyǒu jiàzhí. This data is of great value to us. 這是一個很有價值的試驗。 Zhè shì yī ge hěn yǒu jiàzhí de shìyàn. This is a worthy experiment. verb be worth; value 價值五百萬元的設備 jiàzhí wǔbǎi wàn yuán de shèbèi five million yuan worth of equipment; equipment worth (or valued at) five million yuan

noun 1 idea; plan 好主意！ Hǎo zhǔyi! That’s a good idea. 人多主意多。 Rén duō zhǔyi duō. The more the people the more the ideas. 領導者的責任主要是出主意, 用幹部兩件事。 lǐngdǎozhě de zérèn zhǔyào shì chū zhǔyi, yòng gànbù liǎng jiàn shì. A leader has two main responsibilities: proposing ideas and using the right cadres. 2 decision; definite view 打定主意 Dǎdìng zhǔyi make a decision; make up one’s mind 改變主意 gǎibiàn zhǔyi change one’s view (or mind) 拿不定主意 nábudìng zhǔyi be in two minds (about sth.); uncertain 我一時沒了主意。 Wǒ yīshí méi le zhǔyi. For a moment, I was at a loss.

noun action; operation 行動綱領 xíngdòng gānglǐng programme of action 軍事行動 jūnshì xíngdòng military operations verb 1 move (or get) about 行動不便 Xíngdòng bùbiàn have difficulty getting about 行動緩慢 xíngdòng huǎnmàn move slowly; be slow-moving 2 act; take action 行動起來 xíngdòng qǐlai go into action 按計劃行動。 Àn jìhuà xíngdòng. Proceed according to plan.

noun result; outcome 必然結果 Bìrán jiéguǒ inevitable result 會談的結果 huìtán de jiéguǒ the outcome of the talks 這樣瞎吵下去不會有什麼結果。 Zhèyàng xiā chǎo xiàqu bù huì yǒu shénme jiéguǒ. Squabbling like this won’t get anywhere. adverb as a result; finally 經過一番爭論, 結果他還是讓步了。 Jīngguò yī fān zhēnglùn, jiéguǒ tā háishi ràngbù le. After a heated argument he finally gave in. verb kill; finish off
noun pillow
verb travel together

noun theory; principle (opp. 實踐) 理論上 lǐlùnshang in theory; theoretically 理論創新 lǐlùn chuàngxīn theoretical innovation 空談理論 kōngtán lǐlùn talk about abstract principles 理論聯繫實際 lǐlùn liánxì shíjì unite (or link) theory with practice 理論脫離實際 lǐlùn tuōlí shíjì separate theory from practice 馬列主義理論 Mǎliè zhǔyì lǐlùn Marxist-Leninist theory 提高理論水平 tígāo lǐlùn shuǐpíng raise (or increase) theoretical level 提供理論根據 tígōng lǐlùn gēnjù offer (or supply) theoretical foundation 理論和實踐相結合 Lǐlùn hé shíjiàn xiāng jiéhé put theories into practice; integration of theory and practice verb argue; debate 我得跟他理論理論。 wǒ děi gēn tā lǐlùnlǐlùn. I have to argue this out with him.

noun 1 computing software 廣告軟件 guǎnggào ruǎnjiàn adware 間諜軟件 jiàndiéruǎnjiàn spyware 反垃圾軟件 fǎn lājī ruǎnjiàn antispam software 惡意攻擊軟件 èyì gōngjī ruǎnjiàn malware 2 figurative software; quality of personnel; management and service, etc. 文化軟件 wénhuà ruǎnjiàn cultural software

noun author; writer 作者贈 Zuòzhě zèng From the author 作者不詳 zuòzhě bùxiáng by an anonymous author; authorship unknown 本文作者 běnwén zuòzhě the present writer 《儒林外史》的作者是吳敬梓。 《Rúlín Wàishǐ》 de zuòzhě shì Wú jìng zǐ. Wu Jingzi was the author of The Scholars.

noun journalist; reporter; correspondent; newsman 本報記者 běnbào jìzhě staff reporter (or correspondent) 採訪記者 cǎifǎngjìzhě reporter 隨軍記者 suíjūn jìzhě war correspondent 特派記者 tèpài jìzhě special correspondent 新華社記者 Xīnhuáshè jìzhě Xinhua correspondent; reporter of the Xinhua News Agency

adverb frequently; often; many a time; more often than not 她常常工作到深夜。 Tā chángcháng gōngzuò dào shēnyè. She often works far into the night. 他倆常常通過電子郵件交換學術上的看法。 Tāliǎ chángcháng tōngguò diànzǐ yóujiàn jiāohuàn xuéshù shàng de kànfǎ. The two of them frequently discuss academic questions through email.

verb 1 taste; try the flavour of 來嘗嘗。 Lái chángcháng. Have a taste. 2 experience 嘗到甜頭 chángdào tiántou become aware of the benefits of; come to know the good of; experience the advantage of adverb literary ever; once 早年嘗習英文 Zǎonián cháng xí Yīngwén learnt English in one’s early years 他未嘗認真想過這事。 tā wèi cháng rènzhēn xiǎng guò zhè shì. He hasn’t given it serious thought.

noun 1 tongue 長舌頭 cháng shé tou gossip 嚼舌頭 jiáoshétou chatter; gossip See 31812864吐舌頭tu3she2tou5吐舌頭 2 enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information 偵察兵抓了個舌頭。 Zhēnchábīng zhuā le ge shétou. The scouts took a prisoner to get information.
noun 1 snakehead 2 slang ringleader of a gang that ferries people illegally across the border; ringleader of human trafficking across the border
toolbox; tool kit; workbox

noun 1 magazine; journal 訂一份雜誌 dìng yī fèn zázhì subscribe to a magazine 2 [often in book titles] miscellaneous notes; notes 王念孫《讀書雜誌》 wáng niàn sūn 《Dúshū Zázhì》 Wang Niansun’s Miscellaneous Reading Notes

noun 1 order; procedure; course; sequence 程序事項 chéngxù shìxiàng procedural matters 程序問題 chéngxù wèntí question of procedure; point of order 程序性動議 chéngxù xìng dòngyì procedural motion 法律程序 fǎlǜ chéngxù legal procedure 符合程序 fúhé chéngxù be in order 工作程序 gōngzuò chéngxù working procedure 2 computing programme 編程序 biān chéngxù write programmes for computers; programme
technical term; nomenclature

noun 1 stage; phase 階段考試 jiēduàn kǎoshì progress test 過渡階段 guòdù jiēduàn transitional stage 戰役的最後階段 zhànyì de zuìhòu jiēduàn final phase of the campaign 2 mining level 階段高度 jiēduàn gāodù level interval
adjective soft; softish; lithe; flexible 柔軟的墊子 róuruǎn de diànzi soft cushion 柔軟的動作 róuruǎn de dòngzuò lithe movements

verb courteous work hard; go to great trouble; go through hardships 路上辛苦了。 Lùshang xīnkǔ le. You must have had a tiring journey. or You must be very tired after the journey. 同志們辛苦了。 Tóngzhì men xīnkǔ le. You comrades have been working hard. 這事恐怕還得辛苦您一趟。 Zhè shì kǒngpà hái děi xīnkǔ nín yī tàng. I’m afraid you’ll have to take the trouble of going there to see about it. adjective hard; strenuous; toilsome; laborious 犁地這活兒很辛苦。 Lí dì zhè huór hěn xīnkǔ. Ploughing is hard work.
verb 1 part never to meet again; part forever 他這一去, 竟是永別。 tā zhè yī qù, jìngshì yǒngbié. He was gone, and for always. 2 be parted by death
verb (of family members) reunite 團圓飯 tuányuánfàn family reunion dinner 全家團圓 quán jiā tuányuán family reunion adjective round 這男孩兒團圓臉。 Zhè nán hái'ér tuányuán liǎn. The boy has a round face.

noun 1 objective; target 發現目標 fāxiàn mùbiāo find the target 攻擊目標 gōngjī mùbiāo attack a target 軍事目標 jūnshì mùbiāo military objective (or target) 2 goal; aim; objective 共同目標 gòngtóng mùbiāo common goal (or objective) 生活目標 shēnghuó mùbiāo goal in life 跟蹤目標 gēnzōng mùbiāo track a target 搜索目標 sōusuǒ mùbiāo search a target
