more; much
noun good food; delicacy; table delicacies

verb 1 study; research 研究自然規律 yánjiū zìrán guīlǜ study the laws of nature 科學研究 kēxué yánjiū scientific research 癌症病源研究 áizhèng bìngyuán yánjiū researches into the causes of cancer 2 consider; discuss; deliberate 這些問題正在研究。 Zhèxiē wèntí zhèngzài yánjiū. These matters are under review (or consideration).

verb popularize; spread; extend 推廣普通話 Tuīguǎng Pǔtōnghuà popularize standard spoken Chinese 推廣科研成果 tuīguǎng kēyán chéngguǒ turn laboratory achievements into commercial (or mass production); commercialize laboratory achievements 推廣先進經驗 tuīguǎng xiānjìn jīngyàn spread advanced experience

noun postal matter; post; mail 電子郵件 diànzǐyóujiàn email 掛號郵件 guàhào yóujiàn registered post 航空郵件 hángkōng yóujiàn air mail 小包郵件 xiǎobāo yóujiàn postal packet 早班郵件幾點到？ Zǎobān yóujiàn jǐ diǎn dào？ When does the morning post come in? 末班郵件幾點走？ Mò bān yóujiàn jǐ diǎn zǒu？ When does the last post go out? 今天的郵件量特別大。 Jīntiān de yóujiàn liàng tèbié dà. There’s an unusually heavy post (or mail) today.

adjective literary 1 not so; not the case 其實不然。 Qíshíbùrán. Actually this is not so. 2 [at the beginning of a sentence to express disagreement] no 不然, 事情並不那樣簡單。 bùrán, shìqing bìngbù nàyàng jiǎndān. No, it’s not as simple as that. conjunction or else; otherwise; if not 我得早點兒去, 不然就趕不上火車了。 Wǒ děi zǎodiǎnr qù, bùrán jiù gǎnbushàng huǒchē le. I’ve got to leave earlier, or I’ll miss the train. 要去就別遲到, 不然就甭去了。 yào qù-jiù bié chídào, bùrán jiù béng qùle. Either be on time, or don’t go at all.

noun natural resources; resources 資源豐富 zīyuán fēngfù abound (or be rich) in natural resources 開發資源 kāifā zīyuán tap (or exploit) natural resources 人力資源 rénlì zīyuán labour reserve 水產資源 shuǐchǎn zīyuán aquatic resources 野生動物資源 yěshēng dòngwù zīyuán wildlife resources

verb 1 (-//-) pass through; get past; traverse 電流通過導線。 Diànliú tōngguò dǎoxiàn. Electricity passes through the wires. 她通過了入學考試。 Tā tōngguò le rùxué kǎoshì. She passed the entrance examination. 代表們通過大廳進入會場。 Dàibiǎo men tōngguò dàtīng jìnrù huìchǎng. The delegates went through the lobby into the assembly hall. or The delegates entered the assembly hall by way of the lobby. 火車通過大橋向南奔去。 Huǒchē tōngguò dà qiáo xiàng nán bēn qù. The train crossed the bridge heading south. 路太窄, 汽車通不過。 Lù tài zhǎi, qìchē tōng bù guò. The road is too narrow for cars to get by (or pass through). 要打開局面, 就必須通過這一關。 yào dǎkāi júmiàn, jiù bìxū tōngguò zhè yī guān. We must overcome this obstacle to begin a new phase in our work. 注意交通安全, 一慢二看三通過。 Zhùyì jiāotōng ānquán, yī màn èr kàn sān tōng guò. Pay attention to traffic safety; slow down, look around, and then proceed. 2 (-//-) adopt; pass; carry 通過憲法 Tōngguò xiànfǎ adopt a constitution 以壓倒多數通過 yǐ yādǎo duōshù tōngguò pass by overwhelming majority 提案已一致通過。 Tí'àn yǐ yīzhì tōngguò. The motion was carried unanimously. 議案未必通得過。 Yì'àn wèibì tōng de guò. The bill might not get through. 3 ask for the consent or approval of 這個問題要通過群眾才能作出決定。 zhège wèntí yào tōngguò qúnzhòng cáinéng zuò chū juédìng. No decision can be made on this matter until the people have been consulted. preposition by means of; by way of; by; through 通過老張介紹, 我認識了她。 Tōngguò lǎo zhāng jièshào, wǒ rènshi le tā. I met her through Lao Zhang. 通過什麼方式我才能見到他？ Tōngguò shénme fāngshì wǒ cái néng jiàndào tā？ How can I meet him? 法國教授通過譯員同我交談。 Fǎguó jiàoshòu tōngguò yìyuán tóng wǒ jiāotán. The French professor and I had a conversation through an interpreter. 植物通過陽光照射, 能把水和二氧化碳轉換成有機物質。 Zhíwù tōngguò yángguāng zhàoshè, néng bǎ shuǐ hé èryǎnghuàtàn zhuǎnhuàn chéng yǒujī wùzhì. Plants use sunshine to turn water and carbon dioxide into organic substances.
noun 1 integration; readjustment; consolidation 2 geology conformity verb integrate; reorganize and consolidate; unify
every kind of; all kinds of; various

verb express; convey; voice 表達群眾的感情 Biǎodá qúnzhòng de gǎnqíng voice the feelings of the masses 表達人民的堅強意志 biǎodá rénmín de jiānqiáng yìzhì demonstrate the firm will of the people 充分表達思想 chōngfèn biǎodá sīxiǎng fully express one’s thoughts 我激動的心情難以用語言來表達。 Wǒ jīdòng de xīnqíng nányǐ yòng yǔyán lái biǎodá. Words can hardly express my excitement.

verb 1 carve; engrave; inscribe; cut 刻蠟版 kè làbǎn cut stencils 刻圖章 kè túzhāng engrave a seal 刻電路板 kè diànlù bǎn etch a circuit board 2 colloquial VARIANT OF 64696803刻錄ke4lu4刻錄 imprint (CD) abbreviation 3 literary set a time limit noun 1 quarter (of an hour) 五點一刻 Wǔ diǎn yī kè a quarter past five 2 moment 此刻 cǐkè this moment; now 頃刻 qǐngkè in a moment adjective 1 unkind; harsh 苛刻 kēkè harsh 2 in the highest degree 深刻 shēnkè profound measure word archaic ke (unit of time measured by the regulated flow of water through a clepsydra, hence with a day and night divided into 100 ke)
noun 1 a moment 在這一刻 Zài zhè yīkè at the moment 2 quarter of an hour

noun 1 difference; dissimilarity 時差 shíchā jet lag See 18244096差別cha1bie2差別 2 mathematics difference 兩數之差為四。 Liǎng shù zhī chā wéi sì. The difference between the two figures is 4. adverb literary only just; barely 差可 chākě barely passable

verb 1 put in order; rectify 整一下領帶 zhěng yīxià lǐngdài adjust one’s tie 2 repair; mend; renovate 整舊如新 zhěngjiùrúxīn repair sth. old and make it as good as new; renovate 3 make sb. suffer; punish; fix 挨整 áizhěng get punished; made to pay 4 dialect do; make; work 這東西我看見人整過, 並不難。 Zhè dōngxi wǒ kànjian rén zhěng guò, bìng bù nán. I once saw somebody do it and it’s not very difficult. 繩子給整斷了。 Shéngzi gěi zhěng duàn le. The rope has broken. adjective 1 whole; complete; full; entire (opp. 零) 整夜 zhěngyè whole night; all night long 整磚 zhěng zhuān whole (or unbroken) brick 一整頁 Yī zhěng yè a full page 十二點整 shí'èr diǎn zhěng twelve o’clock sharp 恰好整一年。 Qiàhǎo zhěng yī nián. It’s a year to the day. 2 in good order; neat; tidy 整然有序 zhěng rán yǒuxù in good order; well arranged 衣冠不整 yīguānbùzhěng slovenly in dress; not properly dressed 儀容不整 Yíróng bù zhěng untidy appearance

adjective general; rough; approximate 大概的估計 dàgài de gūjì a rough estimate 大概的數字 dàgài de shùzì an approximate figure 作一個大概的分析 Zuò yī ge dàgài de fēnxi make a general analysis adverb 1 generally; briefly 我大概跟他說了說。 Wǒ dàgài gēn tā shuō le shuō. I told him briefly. 2 probably; most likely; presumably 會議大概要延期。 Huìyì dàgài yào yánqī. The meeting will probably be postponed. 你大概知道他吧。 Nǐ dàgài zhīdao tā ba. Presumably you know him. 大概將有五百人出席。 Dàgài jiāng yǒu wǔbǎi rén chūxí. There will be approximately 500 people present. noun general idea; broad outline 我只知道個大概。 Wǒ zhǐ zhīdao ge dàgài. I have only a general idea.
adverb perhaps; probably; maybe 他也許病了。 Tā yěxǔ bìng le. Perhaps he’s ill. 也許我不該告訴他的。 Yěxǔ wǒ bù gāi gàosu tā de. Perhaps I shouldn’t have told him.

verb 1 affirm; confirm; approve; regard as positive (opp. 否定) 肯定成績 kěndìng chéngjì affirm one’s achievements 他的設計得到了總工程師的肯定。 Tā de shèjì dédào le zǒnggōngchéngshī de kěndìng. His design was approved by the chief engineer. 2 be sure; have no doubt 他今天來不來, 我不能肯定。 Tā jīntiān lái bù lái, wǒ bù néng kěndìng. I’m not sure whether he will come today. adjective 1 positive; affirmative (opp. 否定) 肯定的判斷 Kěndìng de pànduàn positive assessment 他的回答是肯定的。 Tā de huídá shì kěndìng de. His answer is in the affirmative. 2 definite; certain 肯定的答復 kěndìng de dáfù definite answer adverb certainly; undoubtedly; definitely 肯定按時送到 Kěndìng ànshí sòng dào guarantee punctual delivery 情況肯定對我們有利。 qíngkuàng kěndìng duì wǒmen yǒulì. The situation is undoubtedly in our favour.

noun environment; surroundings; circumstances 環境順利 huánjìng shùnlì under favourable circumstances 換換環境 huàn huàn huánjìng have a change of environment; a change of scene 如環境許可 rú huánjìng xǔkě if circumstances permit 為環境所迫 wéi huánjìng suǒ pò forced by circumstances 改善投資環境 gǎishàn tóuzī huánjìng improve the investment environment 在艱苦的環境中成長 zài jiānkǔ de huánjìng zhōng chéngzhǎng grow up under tough conditions 創造適宜的經濟和社會環境 Chuàngzào shìyí de jīngjì hé shèhuì huánjìng create a favourable economic and social environment

noun performance; exhibition 體育表演 tǐyù biǎoyǎn sports exhibition 雜技表演 Zájì biǎoyǎn acrobatic performance 航空模型表演 hángkōng móxíng biǎoyǎn model airplane exhibition 舉行時裝表演 jǔxíng shízhuāng biǎoyǎn hold a fashion show verb 1 perform; act; play 表演過火 biǎoyǎnguòhuǒ overdo; overact 表演節目 biǎoyǎn jiémù give a performance; put on a show 她表演得很好。 Tā biǎoyǎn de hěn hǎo. She performed very well. 2 demonstrate 表演新操作方法 biǎoyǎn xīn cāozuò fāngfǎ demonstrate new operating techniques

noun 1 expression; manifestation; display 這是他無知的又一表現。 Zhè shì tā wúzhī de yòu yī biǎoxiàn. This is yet another manifestation of his ignorance. 政治是經濟的集中表現。 Zhèngzhì shì jīngjì de jízhōng biǎoxiàn. Politics is the concentrated expression of economics. 2 behaviour; performance 他在工作中的表現很好。 Tā zài gōngzuò zhōng de biǎoxiàn hěn hǎo. He is doing very well in his work. verb 1 show; display; manifest 表現得好 biǎoxiàn de hǎo behave oneself well; perform well 表現出極大的勇敢和智慧 Biǎoxiàn chū jí dà de yǒnggǎn hé zhìhuì display immense courage and wisdom 一貫表現積極 yīguàn biǎoxiàn jījí consistently active; always show great initiative 他心裡很不高興, 可是沒有表現出來。 Tā xīnli hěn bù gāoxìng, kěshì méiyǒu biǎoxiàn chūlai. He was displeased, but didn’t show it. 2 show off 愛表現(自己) Ài biǎoxiàn like to show off 3 describe; express 表現戰爭的文學作品 biǎoxiàn zhànzhēng de wénxué zuòpǐn literary works depicting war

noun experience 經驗不足 jīngyàn bùzú lack experience 經驗豐富 jīngyàn fēngfù have rich experience; very experienced 憑經驗 Píng jīngyàn by experience; from experience 直接經驗 zhíjiē jīngyàn direct experience 間接經驗 jiànjiē jīngyàn direct indirect experience verb go through; experience 我從沒經驗過這樣的艱難。 wǒ cóngméi jīngyàn guò zhèyàng de jiānnán. I have never experienced such hardships.

noun 1 news 新聞圖片櫥窗 xīnwén túpiàn chúchuāng newsphoto display case 假新聞 jiǎxīnwén false news 軟新聞 ruǎnxīnwén soft news 硬新聞 yìngxīnwén hard news 電視新聞 diànshì xīnwén TV news 國際新聞 guójì xīnwén international news 國外新聞 guówài xīnwén foreign news 國內新聞 guónèi xīnwén domestic news 簡明新聞 jiǎnmíng xīnwén news in brief 金融新聞 jīnróng xīnwén financial news 體育新聞 tǐ yù xīn wén sports news 頭版新聞 tóubǎn xīnwén front-page news (or story) 頭條新聞 tóutiáoxīnwén headline 成為熱門新聞 Chéngwéi rèmén xīnwén become the hottest news 2 news; information

He takes an active interest in the healthy growth of the younger generation. 大批少數民族幹部已經成長起來。 Dà pī shǎoshù mínzú gànbù yǐjing chéngzhǎng qǐlai. verb attract; draw; fascinate 吸引注意力 Xīyǐn zhùyìlì attract attention 把顧客吸引過來 bǎ gùkè xīyǐn guòlai draw customers over; attract customers 被精彩的節目吸引住了 bèi jīngcǎi de jiémù xīyǐn zhù le fascinated by the outstanding show

verb give service to; be in the service of; serve 服務周到 Fúwù zhōudao provide good service 提高服務質量 tígāo fúwù zhìliàng improve one’s service 為人民服務。 Wèi rénmín fúwù. Serve the people. 他在郵局服務了三十年。 Tā zài yóujú fúwù le sānshí nián. He served in the post office for thirty years.
verb encourage; urge 老師鼓勵大家多說英語。 Lǎoshī gǔlì dàjiā duō shuō Yīngyǔ. Our teacher encouraged us to speak English as much as possible.

verb 1 be defeated; lose (a war, etc.) (opp. 勝利) 失敗之作 shībài zhī zuò box-office bomb 遭到了可恥的失敗 zāodào le kěchǐ de shībài meet with ignominious defeat 2 fail (opp. 成功) 試驗失敗了不止一次。 shìyàn shībài le bùzhǐ yīcì. The experiment has failed more than once.

noun cost 固定成本 gùdìng chéngběn fixed cost 可變成本 kěbiàn chéngběn variable cost 直接成本 zhíjiē chéngběn direct cost 間接成本 jiànjiē chéngběn indirect cost 降低生產成本 jiàngdī shēngchǎn chéngběn cut the production cost

noun results; gains 一次很有收穫的訪問 yī cì hěn yǒu shōuhuò de fǎngwèn a most rewarding visit 這次旅行收穫不小。 Zhècì lǚxíng shōuhuò bù xiǎo. It was a fruitful trip. 你們的艱苦勞動一定會有收穫。 Nǐmen de jiānkǔ láodòng yīdìng huì yǒu shōuhuò. Your hard work will be duly rewarded. verb gather (or bring) in the crops; harvest 春天播種, 秋天收穫 Chūntiān bōzhǒng, qiūtiān shōuhuò sow in spring and reap in autumn

verb 1 hand (or turn) over to; commit to 付表決 Fù biǎojué put to the vote; take a vote on 付諸實施 fùzhū shíshī put into effect 2 pay 付稅 fù shuì pay taxes 付房租 fù fángzū pay rent (for a house, flat or room) 票錢已經付了。 Piào qián yǐjing fù le. I’ve paid for the tickets. noun (Fù) a surname VARIANT OF 21308416副fu4副2 measure word 1 [for a set of sth.] 2 [for facial expression]

noun energy; vigour; vim 精力充沛 jīnglìchōngpèi full of vim and vigour; vigorous; energetic 把畢生精力獻給和平事業 bǎ bìshēng jīnglì xiàngěi hépíng shìyè devote a lifetime to the cause of peace; work tirelessly for peace 集中精力解決主要矛盾 jízhōng jīnglì jiějué zhǔyào máodùn concentrate on solving the main problem
noun ice cream 請來兩份冰激凌。 Qǐnglái liǎng fèn bīngjīlíng. Two ices, please.
noun ice cream 請來兩份冰激凌。 Qǐnglái liǎng fèn bīngjīlíng. Two ices, please.

noun 1 cause; undertaking; career 事業順利 shìyè shùnlì successful career 革命事業 gémìng shìyè revolutionary cause 文化教育事業 wénhuà jiàoyù shìyè cultural and educational undertakings 2 institution; facilities 公用事業 gōngyòng shìyè public utilities 集體福利事業 jítǐ fúlì shìyè collective welfare facilities (or services)

verb walk 起重機下, 禁止行走或停留。 Qǐzhòngjī xià, jìnzhǐ xíngzǒu huò tíngliú. Walking or standing under the crane is prohibited. 他在崎嶇的山路上艱難地行走著。 Tā zài qíqū de shānlù shàng jiānnán de xíngzǒu zhe. He was trudging laboriously on the rugged mountain path.
sanitation worker; street cleaner

verb 1 (play) hide-and-seek; blindman's buff 2 tricky and evasive; play hide-and-seek with 你就直說吧, 不要跟我捉迷藏了。 Nǐ jiù zhíshuō ba, bù yào gēn wǒ zhuō mí cáng le. Just get straight to the point. or Stop beating about the bush.
noun goblet
noun 1 snowman 堆雪人 Duī xuěrén make a snowman 2 Abominable Snowman (a hairy manlike creature reported to live in the snows of the Himalayas)

noun 1 heap; pile; stack 草堆 cǎoduī haystack 土堆 tǔduī mound 柴火堆 Cháihuo duī a pile (or stack) of firewood; wood pile 2 [in place names] hillock; mound 雙堆集 shuāng duī jí Shuangduiji (a town in Anhui Province) verb pile up; heap up; stack 把麥秸堆在場上 bǎ màijiē duī zài chǎng shàng stack the wheat-stalks on the threshing ground 桌上堆滿了書。 Zhuō shàng duīmǎn le shū. The desk was piled with books. 糧食堆滿倉, 果子堆成山。 Liángshi duīmǎn cāng, guǒzi duī chéng shān. Storehouses are bursting with grain, and fruit is piled high on the ground. measure word heap; pile; crowd 一堆人 yī duī rén a crowd of people 一堆垃圾 yī duī lājī a garbage (or rubbish) heap; a pile of rubbish

verb start an undertaking; do pioneering work 創業的艱辛 chuàngyè de jiānxīn hardships endured in pioneering work 創業難, 守業更難。 Chuàngyè nán, shǒuyè gèng nán. It’s hard to start an enterprise but even harder to keep it up.

verb 1 cooperate; collaborate; work together 合作經營 hézuò jīngyíng jointly operate; manage in cooperation 共同合作 gòngtóng hézuò cooperate with each other 南南合作 Nán-Nán hézuò South-South cooperation 2 co-author; compose jointly 這幅畫是他們合作的。 Zhè fú huà shì tāmen hézuò de. This painting is their joint work.
noun partner; companion 貿易伙伴 màoyì huǒbàn trade partner 我小時候的伙伴 wǒ xiǎoshíhou de huǒbàn my childhood pal

noun group; team; corps

verb 1 found; establish; set up 成立一所學校 Chénglì yī suǒ xuéxiào set up (or establish) a school 舉行成立大會 jǔxíng chénglì dàhuì hold an inaugural meeting 中華人民共和國於1949年10月1日成立。 Zhōnghuá Rénmín Gònghéguó yú 1949nián ¹⁰yuè ¹rì chénglì. The People’s Republic of China was founded on October 1st, 1949. 2 be tenable; hold water 這個論點不能成立。 Zhège lùndiǎn bùnéng chénglì. That argument is untenable (or does not hold water).
verb complete each other 優勢互補 yōushì hùbǔ benefit from each other’s advantages

adjective honest 誠實可靠 chéngshi kěkào honest and dependable 誠實勞動 chéngshi láodòng honest work
noun courage; nerve 鼓起勇氣 gǔqǐ yǒngqì pluck up (or muster up) one’s courage
adjective able; capable; competent 他是個很能幹的人。 Tā shì ge hěn néng gàn de rén. He is a man of great ability. 這些女電工真能幹。 Zhèxiē nǚ diàngōng zhēn néng gàn. These women electricians really know their job.
noun 1 mass organizations; society 2 community 言語社團 yányǔ shètuán speech community

verb become; turn into 成為工程師 chéngwéi gōngchéngshī become an engineer 把中國建設成為社會主義的現代化強國 bǎ Zhōngguó jiànshè chéngwéi shèhuìzhǔyì de xiàndàihuà qiángguó build China into a powerful modern socialist country
verb 1 make a profit; gain (opp. 賠) 這家商行做出口生意賺得可多了。 Zhè jiā shāngháng zuò chūkǒu shēngyi zhuàn de kě duō le. The firm made large profits from exports. 2 dialect earn (money) noun colloquial profit
grammatical rules

noun courtesy; politeness; manners 禮貌語言 lǐmào yǔyán polite language 禮貌周到 lǐmào zhōudao show every civility (to sb.) 講禮貌 jiǎng lǐ mào mind one’s manners 沒禮貌 méi lǐmào have no (or bad) manners; be impolite 有禮貌 yǒu lǐmào be courteous; be polite 出於禮貌 chūyú lǐmào as a courtesy; for politeness 文明禮貌教育 wénmíng lǐmào jiàoyù education in courtesy and manners 邊吃邊說是不禮貌的。 biān chī biān shuōshì bù lǐmào de. It’s bad manners to talk with one’s mouth full. adjective courteous; polite 我覺得這麼早就走不大禮貌。 Wǒ juéde zhème zǎo jiù zǒu bù dà lǐmào. I don’t think it’d be polite for us to leave so soon.
noun 1 friend 廣交朋友 Guǎngjiāo péngyou make many friends 2 boyfriend or girlfriend 談朋友 tánpéngyou have a boyfriend (or girlfriend); go steady; date

noun 1 neighbourhood; vicinity 方圓左近的人, 他都認識。 Fāngyuán zuǒ jìn de rén, tā dōu rènshi. He knows everyone in the neighbourhood. 2 area 那個湖方圓八百公里。 Nàge hú fāngyuán bābǎi gōnglǐ. The lake has an area of 800 square kilometres.

verb 1 thank 謝了又謝 xiè le yòu xiè thank again and again 多謝。 Duōxiè. Thanks a lot. 不用謝。 Bù yòng xiè. Don’t mention it. 2 literary make an apology; excuse oneself 謝病 xièbìng excuse oneself on grounds of illness 謝過 Xièguò apologize for having done sth. wrong 3 decline See 33321984謝絕xie4jue2謝絕 4 (of flowers, leaves) wither 凋謝 diāoxiè wither and fall noun (Xiè) a surname
noun now; at present; today

noun 1 drop (of liquid) 雨點兒 yǔdiǎnr raindrop 2 spot; dot; speck 墨點兒 mòdiǎnr ink spots 3 dot stroke (in Chinese characters) 4 mathematics point 兩點成一直線。 Liǎng diǎn chéng yī zhíxiàn. A straight line is formed by connecting two points. 5 decimal point; point 三點兒五 Sāndiǎnr wǔ three point five (3.5) 6 place; point 突破一點 tūpò yīdiǎn make a breakthrough at one point 7 aspect; feature 從這點上看 cóng zhè diǎn shàng kàn viewed from this aspect 對這一點沒人懷疑。 Duì zhè yīdiǎn méi rén huáiyí. Nobody has any doubt about that. 8 finance point 上證指數收漲44點。 Shàngzhèng Zhǐshù shōu zhǎng 44 diǎn. The Shanghai Composite Index ended up 44 points. verb 1 place a dot 點三個點兒表示省略 diǎn sān ge diǎnr biǎoshì shěnglüè a sequence of three dots marks an omission 2 touch on very briefly; skim 他用篙一點就把船撐開了。 Tā yòng gāo yīdiǎn jiù bǎ chuán chēng kāi le. He pushed the boat off with a shove of the pole. 她發言時點(到)了這件事。 tā fāyán shí diǎn le zhè jiàn shì. She touched on the matter in her speech. 3 drip 點眼藥 diǎn yǎnyào put drops in the eyes 4 sow in holes; dibble 點豆子 diǎn dòuzi dibble beans 5 check one by one; count 點貨 diǎnhuò check over goods; take stock 請把錢點一點。 Qǐng bǎ qián diǎn yī diǎn. Please count the money. 6 select; choose 他點了牛排。 Tā diǎn le niúpái. He ordered a steak. 7 hint; point out 一點他就明白了。 Yīdiǎn tā jiù míngbai le. He quickly took the hint. 8 light; burn; kindle 點燈 diǎn dēng light a lamp 他是火爆性子, 一點就著。 Tā shì huǒbào xìngzi, yīdiǎn jiùzhe. He’s got a fiery temper and flares up very quickly. 9 embellish; decorate 裝點 zhuāngdiǎn furnish; decorate measure word 1 a little; a bit; some 讀點兒魯迅 Dú diǎn r Lǔ Xùn read some of Lu Xun’s works 給我點兒紙。 gěi wǒ diǎn r zhǐ. Give me some paper, will you? 他今天好點兒了。 Tā jīntiān hǎo diǎn r le. He’s feeling a bit better today. 人的認識一點兒也不能離開實踐。 Rén de rènshi yī diǎn r yě bùnéng líkāi shíjiàn. Human knowledge cannot be separated from practice. 2 [for items] 我有幾點不成熟的想法。 Wǒ yǒu jǐ diǎn bù chéngshú de xiǎngfa. I have some tentative suggestions. noun 1 o'clock 上午九點(鐘) Shàngwǔ jiǔ diǎn zhōng nine o’clock in the morning 現在幾點了？ Xiànzài jǐ diǎn le？ What time is it now? 2 appointed time 到點了 Dào diǎn le it’s time (to do sth.) 3 VARIANT OF 76626147雲板yun2ban3雲板 dated iron bell or clapper (used by government offices or influential families to give time or announce an event) noun refreshments 茶點 chádiǎn tea and pastries noun printing point (a unit of measurement for type bodies)

verb 1 divide; separate; part (opp. 合) 分組討論 fēnzǔ tǎolùn hold discussions in groups 分階段實行 Fēn jiēduàn shíxíng carry out stage by stage 一年分四季。 Yī nián fēn sìjì. The year is divided into four seasons. 這藥分三次吃。 Zhè yào fēn sān cì chī. This medicine is to be taken in three separate doses. 他的頭髮往右邊分。 Tā de tóufa wǎng yòubianfēn. He parts his hair on the right side. 一條河把縣城分成兩半。 Yī tiáo hé bǎ xiànchéng fēn chéng liǎngbàn. A river divides the county town into two parts. 2 distribute; assign; allot 她分到了一套新房子。 Tā fēn dào le yī tào xīn fángzi. She has been allotted a new flat. 把這個任務分給我們吧。 Bǎ zhège rènwu fēn gěi wǒmen ba. Assign (or Give) this task to us, please. 音樂會的票都已經分完了。 Yīnyuèhuì de piào dōu yǐjing fēn wán le. The tickets for the concert have all been distributed. 大學畢業後, 他就分到外交部工作。 Dàxué bìyè hòu, tājiù fēn dào Wàijiāobù gōngzuò. After his graduation from college, he was assigned to work at the Foreign Ministry. 3 distinguish; differentiate 是非不分 shìfēibùfēn make no distinction between right and wrong 現在還分不出個勝負來。 Xiànzài hái fēn bù chū ge shèng-fù lái. It’s still quite impossible to tell who’ll win. 這對雙胞胎長得一模一樣, 簡直分不出誰是誰。 Zhè duì shuāngbāotāi zhǎng de yīmúyīyàng, jiǎnzhí fēn bù chū shuí shì shuí. The twins look so much alike that you can hardly tell them apart. adjective branch (of an organization) 新華社上海分社 Xīnhuáshè Shànghǎi fēnshè the Shanghai Branch of the Xinhua News Agency measure word 1 fraction 約分 yuēfēn reduction of a fraction 2 [in spoken forms of fractions and percentages] 三分之一 sānfēn zhīyī one-third 十分之七 shífēn zhī qī seven-tenths 百分之四 bǎifēn zhī sì four per cent 3 one tenth (of certain units of the metric system) 4 fen (of the traditional system of weights and measures) a a traditional unit of length, equal to 0.01 chi (市尺), and equivalent to 0.333 centimetre or 0.131 inch b a traditional unit of weight, equal to 0.001 jin (市斤), and equivalent to 0.5 gram or 0.175 ounce c a traditional unit of area, equal to 0.1 mu (市畝) and equivalent to 0.667 acre or 79.73 square yards d a unit of weight equal to 0.1 qian (錢) or 0.01 liang (兩) 5 fen (equal to one hundredth of a yuan (元)) 六元三角五分 liù yuán sānjiǎo wǔfēn 6.35 yuan 6 minute (equal to one sixtieth of an hour) 7 minute (equal to one sixtieth of a degree of angle or arc) 成 36 度 30分角 chéng 36 dù 30fēn jiǎo form an angle of 36 degrees 30 minutes (36°30′) 東經 129 度 15分 dōngjīng 129 dù 15 fēn 129 degrees 15 minutes (129°15′) east longitude 8 a unit of interest rate a 1% monthly interest 月利一分二釐. yuèlì yī fēn èr lí 1.2% monthly interest b 10% annual interest 年利一分二釐. niánlì yī fēn èr lí 12% annual interest 9 point; mark 六十分為及格。 Liùshí fēnwéi jígé. Sixty is the passing mark. 甲隊罰球連得二分。 Jiǎ duì fáqiú lián de èrfēn. Team A scored two successive points by free throws. 他今天考試得了一百分。 Tā jīntiān kǎoshì déle yībǎi fēn. He got full marks in today’s exam. 10 [for nonphysical things] one-tenth 七分成績, 三分錯誤 Qī fēn chéngjì, sānfēn cuòwù 70 per cent achievements, 30 per cent mistakes 他已經有三分醉了。 Tā yǐjing yǒu sānfēn zuì le. He’s a bit tipsy already. 我的牙痛好了幾分。 Wǒ de yátòng hǎo le jǐ fēn. My toothache has been partly relieved. 這消息使我多了一分希望。 Zhè xiāoxi shǐ wǒ duō le yī fēn xīwàng. The news raised my hopes a little.

noun 1 (the duration of) time 農忙的時候 nóngmáng de shíhou busy farming season 戰爭的時候 Zhànzhēng deshíhou during the war 2 (a point in) time; moment 就在這時候 jiù zài zhèshí hou just at this moment 時候不早了。 shíhou bù zǎo le. It’s getting late. 到時候我來叫你。 Dào shíhou wǒ lái jiào nǐ. I’ll call you when it’s time. 現在是什麼時候了？ Xiànzài shì shénme shíhou le？ What time is it?

noun 1 cooked rice or other cereals 小米飯 Xiǎo mǐfàn (cooked) millet 2 meal 一天三頓飽飯 yī tiān sān dùn bǎo fàn three square meals a day 飯前洗手。 Fànqián xǐshǒu. Wash your hands before meals. 3 means of living; livelihood; job 混口飯吃 hùn kǒu fàn chī make a living; earn one’s bread

noun (early) morning 從早到晚 cóngzǎodàowǎn from morning till night adjective 1 early; in advance; beforehand 早兩天我還看見他的。 Zǎo liǎng tiān wǒ hái kànjian tā de. I saw him a couple of days ago. 早知如此, 我就不回去了。 Zǎo zhī rúcǐ, wǒ jiù bù huíqu le. If I’d know this beforehand I would not have gone back. 電影離開演還早哩。 Diànyǐng líkāi yǎn hái zǎo li. The film won’t start for a while yet. 火車早到了十分鐘。 Huǒchē zǎo dào le shí fēnzhōng. The train was ten minutes early. 你早點兒來。 Nǐ zǎo diǎnr lái. Come early. 他來得比我早。 Tā lái de bǐ wǒ zǎo. He came earlier than I. 爺爺睡得早。 Yéye shuì de zǎo. Grandfather goes to bed early. 2 polite expression good morning adverb long ago; as early as; for a long time 早在二十世紀初 Zǎo zài èrshí shìjì chū at the beginning of the twentieth century; in the early twentieth century 他早走了。 Tā zǎo zǒu le. He left a long time ago. 我早就想來看你了。 Wǒ zǎojiù xiǎng lái kàn nǐ le. I’ve been wanting to see you for a long time. 我早知道了。 Wǒ zǎo zhīdao le. I knew that long ago. or That’s not news to me.

noun 1 evening; night 晚風 wǎnfēng evening breeze 2 literary later years; latter life 歲晚 suì wǎn one’s later (or remaining) years; latter life; old age adjective 1 far on in time; late 晚唐 wǎn-Táng the late Tang Dynasty 晚做總比不做好。 Wǎn zuò zǒng bǐ bù zuò hǎo. Better late than never. 2 younger; junior; succeeding 比某人晚一輩 bǐ mǒurén wǎn yī bèi one generation younger than sb. 3 geology upper; neo- 晚白堊紀 wǎn Bái'èjì Upper Cretaceous 晚古生代 wǎn Gǔshēngdài Neopaleozoic
noun 1 noon; midday 2 wu (seventh of the twelve Earthly Branches (地支)) See 21391616干支gan1zhi1干支gānzhī

verb 1 come (to); arrive 來得不巧 Láide bùqiǎo come at an unsuitable time (or moment) 來得正好 láide zhènghǎo come in good time; come just at the right time 就來！ jiù lái! I’m coming. 快來！ Kuài lái! Come along! 來客人了。 Lái kèren le. We have a guest. 客人來了。 Kèren lái le. The guests are here. 他今天來過兩次。 Tā jīntiān lái guò liǎng cì. He came twice today. 他已經來了。 Tā yǐjinglái le. He has already come. 她明天來北京。 Tā míngtiān lái Běijīng. She is coming to Beijing tomorrow. 有空來玩。 Yǒukòng lái wán. Come round when you have time. 遠處來了一條小船。 Yuǎnchù lái le yī tiáo xiǎochuán. A small boat came into view in the distance. 2 cause to come; happen; crop up; take place 問題來了。 Wèntí lái le. A problem has come up. 這事兒怎麼來的？ Zhè shìr zěnme lái de？ How did it come about? 3 obtain; get 這差事來得不容易。 Zhè chāishilái de bù róngyì. This job is hard to come by. 4 [as a substitute for some other verb] 來份糖醋魚。 lái fèn tángcùyú. A sweet-and-sour fish, please. 你來塊糖。 Nǐ lái kuài táng. Have some candy. 再來一個！ Zàilái yī ge! [call for another performance] Encore! 慢慢兒來, 別忙。 Mànmànr lái, bié máng. Take it easy. No hurry. 我累了, 你來吧。 Wǒ lèi le, nǐ lái ba. I’m tired. Why don’t you take over (or carry on). 咱們來一盤棋。 Zánmenlái yī pán qí. Let’s have a game of chess. 你歇歇, 讓我來吧。 Nǐ xiēxie, ràng wǒ lái ba. You take a rest. Let me do it. 我自己來吧, 別客氣。 Wǒ zìjǐ lái ba, bié kèqi. Please don’t bother. I’ll do it myself. 我們打籃球, 你來不來？ Wǒmen dǎ lánqiú, nǐ lái bù lái？ We’re going to play basketball. Will you join in? 5 [with 得 or 不, indicating possibility or impossibility, capability or incapability] 上海話我說不來。 Shànghǎi huà wǒ shuō bù lái. I don’t speak Shanghai dialect. 我吃不來四川菜。 Wǒ chī bù lái Sìchuān cài. I can’t get used to Sichuan cuisine. 西餐我吃得來。 Xīcān wǒ chī de lái. Western food suits me all right. 這道題我做不來。 Zhè dào tí wǒ zuò bù lái. I can’t do this problem. 這個歌我唱得來。 Zhège gē wǒ chàng de lái. I can sing this song. 6 [before a verb, indicating an intended or suggested action] 你來試試。 Nǐ lái shìshi. Have a try. 我來說兩句。 Wǒ láishuō liǎng jù. Let me say a few words. 大家來想辦法。 Dàjiā lái xiǎng bànfǎ. Let’s think of a way (to solve the problem). or Let’s put our heads together and see how to do it. 7 [after a verb or verbal expression] come in order to 他回家探親來了。 Tā huíjiā tànqīn lái le. He’s come home to see his parents. 我們道喜來了。 Wǒmen dàoxǐ lái le. We’ve come to congratulate you (or offer our congratulations). 8 [between two verbs or verbal expressions to indicate the purpose of the former] in order to 想辦法來解決問題 Xiǎng bànfǎ lái jiějué wèntí think of a way to solve the problem 你又能用什麼理由來說服他呢？ Nǐ yòu néng yòng shénme lǐyóu lái shuōfú tā ne？ And what arguments can you use to convince him? 9 (of electricity, tap water, gas, etc.) be on again 來電了。 lái diàn le. The power is on again. 來水了。 lái shuǐ le. There’s running water again. auxiliary 1 colloquial [at the end of a sentence to indicate what has happened in the past, same as 來著] 你這是何苦來？ Nǐ zhè shì hékǔlái? Why did you do that (and made yourself unhappy)? 2 [after a time expression, indicating a period of time that extends from the past up to the present] ever since 幾天來 jǐ tiān lái for the last few days 一年來 yī nián lái during the past year 3 [after a round number or after a numeral plus a measure] approximately; about; around; round 二十來個 èrshí lái ge about 20 四十來歲 sìshí lái suì round 40 (years old) 十來塊錢 shí lái kuài qián somewhere over 10 yuan 兩米來高 liǎng mǐ lái gāo about two metres high 百十來裡地 bǎishí lái lǐ dì a distance of about 100 li 4 [after the numerals 一, 二, and 三, indicating points in an explanation or argument] 我不要, 一來我不喜歡, 二來我也沒錢。 Wǒ bùyào, yī lái wǒ bù xǐhuan, èr lái wǒ yě méiqián. I don’t want it. In the first place, I don’t like it; in the second place, I don’t have the money. adjective future; coming; next 來月 láiyuè coming month noun (Lái) a surname auxiliary [as a syllable filler in folk ballads] 正月裡來是新春。 Zhēngyuè lǐ lái shì xīnchūn. The first month is the beginning of spring. 你敲鑼來我打鼓。 Nǐ qiāoluó lái wǒ dǎgǔ. You beat the gong while I play the drum.

verb circle; wind 巡回 xúnhuí tour; make a tour of verb 1 return; go back 回國 huíguó return to one’s native land 回家 huíjiā go home 回到原地 huídào yuándì return to the source; go back to where they were 回到生產第一線 huí dào shēngchǎn dì-yī xiàn go back to one’s post on the production front 2 turn round 回過身來 huí guò shēn lái turn round 3 answer; reply 回函 huíhán reply; letter in reply 4 dated report back (to one's superior) 回大人的話 huí dàren dehuà let me report, Sir 5 decline (an invitation, etc.); refuse; cancel; dismiss 我把保姆回了。 wǒ bǎ bǎomǔ huí le. I sent away my maid. measure word 1 chapter 這部小說共一百回。 Zhè bù xiǎoshuō gòng yībǎi huí. This novel has one hundred chapters. 2 time; occasion 來過一回 Lái guò yī huí have been here once 完全是兩回事 Wánquán shì liǎng huí shì two entirely different matters 有一回我在路上碰到他。 Yǒu yī huí wǒ zài lùshang pèngdào tā. Once, I ran into him in the street. noun Hui ethnic group See 23152384回族hui2zu2回族

noun 1 electricity 2 telegram; cable 3 telephone; call 4 broadcasting station 5 lightening verb 1 give or receive an electric shock 電門有毛病, 電了我一下。 Diànmén yǒu máobing, diàn le wǒ yīxià. There was something wrong with the switch and I got a shock. 2 telegraph; cable 電上級請示 Diàn shàngjí qǐngshì telegraph the higher authorities for instructions

noun 1 shadow 樹影 shù yǐng shadow of a tree 2 reflection; image 湖光塔影 húguāng tǎ yǐng lake with the reflection of a pagoda in it 3 trace; sign; vague impression 至今也沒見他的影。 Zhìjīn yě méi jiàn tā deyǐng. I haven’t seen any sign of him yet. 他長得什麼樣, 我早就忘得沒影了。 Tā zhǎng de shénmeyàng, wǒ zǎojiù wàng de méi yǐng le. I’ve clean forgotten what he looked like. 4 photograph; picture 合影 héyǐng group photo (or picture) 5 film; movie See 34865664影評ying3ping2影評 6 shadow play; galanty show verb 1 dialect hide; conceal 一隻野兔影在草叢裡。 Yī zhī yětù yǐng zài cǎocóng lǐ. There was a hare hiding in the grass. 2 copy; trace 影宋本 Yǐng Sòngběn facsimile edition of a Song book

verb 1 live; reside; stay 住城外 Zhù chéngwài live in the suburbs 住旅館 zhù lǚguǎn stay at a hotel 對面沒人住。 Duìmiàn méi rén zhù. Nobody lives opposite me. 他住在北京。 Tā zhù zài Běijīng. He lives in Beijing. 我住這間屋。 Wǒ zhù zhè jiān wū. I live in this room. or This is my room. 我們住上了新房。 Wǒmen zhù shàng le xīnfáng. We’ve moved into a new house. 2 stop; cease 雨住了。 Yǔ zhù le. The rain has stopped. 等風住了再走。 Děng fēng zhù le zài zǒu. Go when the wind drops. 3 [after a verb] firmly; to a stop 支持不住 zhīchíbuzhù cannot withstand; cannot hold out 拿住了, 別撒手。 Ná zhù le, bié sāshǒu. Hold tight and don’t let go. 她擋住了我的去路。 Tā dǎngzhù le wǒ de qù lù. She blocked my way. 這一下你可把我問住了。 Zhè yī xià nǐ kě bǎ wǒ wèn zhù le. You’ve got me there. or I don’t know what to say. 聽到這個消息我一下子愣住了。 Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi wǒ yīxiàzi lèng zhù le. I was struck dumb at the news. 悠揚的小提琴聲把我吸引住了。 Yōuyáng de xiǎotíqín shēng bǎ wǒ xīyǐn zhù le. The beautiful notes of a violin held me spellbound.
noun 1 capital of a country 進京 Jìnjīng go to the capital 2 (Jīng) abbreviation Beijing 回京 huí Jīng return to Beijing 3 (Jīng) a surname number archaic ten million

verb 1 take (or do) exercise; undergo physical training; exercise 鍛煉身體 duàn liàn shēn tǐ exercise; build a strong physique; train 每天鍛煉半小時 měitiān duànliàn bàn xiǎoshí take half an hour’s exercise every day 2 temper; steel; toughen 勞動鍛煉 láodòng duànliàn temper oneself through manual labour

noun 1 body 保持身體平衡 bǎochí shēntǐ pínghéng keep one’s balance 2 health 身體頂得住 shēntǐ dǐngdézhù have physical constitution up to the demands of the job or situation 身體非常健康 shēntǐ fēicháng jiànkāng be in excellent health 注意身體 zhùyì shēntǐ look after one’s health 她最近身體怎麼樣？ Tā zuìjìn shēntǐ zěnmeyàng？ How is she these days?

noun exercise (in a book) 交練習 jiāo liànxí hand in exercises 做練習 Zuò liànxí do exercises 算術練習 suànshù liànxí arithmetic exercises verb practise 練習射擊 liànxí shèjī practise marksmanship 練習講英語 Liànxí jiǎng Yīngyǔ practise speaking English 寫字得經常練習才能寫好。 Xiězì děi jīngcháng liànxí cái néng xiě hǎo. Chinese calligraphy requires constant practice before you can master the art.

verb 1 lift; raise; hold up 舉槍瞄準 Jǔ qiāng miáozhǔn level the gun at the target 他把孩子舉了起來。 Tā bǎ háizi jǔ le qǐlai. He lifted the child up. 他舉起棍子打了下去。 tā jǔ qǐ gùnzi dǎ le xiàqu. He raised the stick and brought it down. 2 start 舉火 jǔhuǒ light a fire 3 elect; choose 我們舉他當主席。 Wǒmen jǔ tā dāng zhǔxí. We elected him chairman. 4 cite; enumerate 你能舉出什麼理由來嗎？ Nǐ néng jǔchū shénme lǐyóu lái ma？ What reasons can you give? 我可以舉出好幾件事來說明。 Wǒ kěyǐ jǔchū hǎojǐ jiàn shì lái shuōmíng. I can cite many instances to illustrate. 5 literary give birth to (a child) 舉一男 jǔ yī nán give birth to a boy noun 1 act; deed; move 國家安危, 係於此舉。 Guójiā ān-wēi, xì yú cǐjǔ. The entire safety of our country depends upon this one move. 2 abbreviation VARIANT OF 24607488舉人ju3ren2舉人 dated (in the Ming and Qing dynasties) a successful candidate in the imperial examinations at the provincial level (鄉試) 中舉 zhòngjǔ pass the imperial examination at the provincial level (in the Ming and Qing dynasties) adjective literary whole; entire 舉族 jǔzú the whole clan
noun sports barbell 杠鈴片 gànglíngpiàn disc (of a barbell)

verb 1 ride (an animal, bicycle, etc.); sit on the back of 騎馬 qímǎ ride a horse; be on horseback 騎車回家 qíchē huíjiā go home by bicycle 騎在人民頭上作威作福 qí zài rénmín tóu shàng zuòwēizuòfú ride roughshod over the people 善騎 shàn qí excel in horsemanship; be a good rider 坡兒太陡, 車騎不上去。 Pōr tài dǒu, chēqí bù shàngqu. The slope is too steep to cycle uphill. 車太高, 我女兒騎不上去。 Chē tài gāo, wǒ nǚ'ér qí bù shàngqu. The bicycle is too high for my daughter to ride. 這摩托車你騎得怎麼樣？ Zhè mótuōchē nǐ qí de zěnmeyàng？ How are you getting on with the motorcycle? 2 straddle See 28136704騎縫qi2feng4騎縫 noun 1 horse; horse rider 坐騎 zuòqí saddle horse; mount 2 cavalryman; cavalry 鐵騎 tiěqí strong cavalry

noun 1 physical strength 使出全身力量 shǐchū quánshēn lìliang bring all one’s strength into play; put forth all one’s strength 這一腳力量很大。 Zhè yī jiǎo lìliang hěn dà. This is a powerful kick. 2 power; force; strength 經濟力量 jīngjìlìliang economic power 精神力量 jīngshen lìliang moral strength 盡一切力量 jìn yīqiè lìliang exert every effort 增強國防力量 zēngqiáng guófáng lìliang build up defence capability 依靠群眾的力量 Yīkào qúnzhòng de lìliang rely on the strength of the masses 我一定盡我的力量幫忙。 Wǒ yīdìng jìn wǒ de lìliang bāngmáng. I’ll certainly do everything in my power to help. 不要過低估計敵人的力量。 Bù yào guò dī gūjì dírén de lìliang. Don’t underestimate the strength of the enemy. 3 potency; efficacy; strength 這種農藥的力量很大。 zhèzhǒng nóngyào delìliang hěn dà. This pesticide is strong.

verb regulate; adjust 調節室溫 tiáojié shìwēn regulate the room temperature 調節水流 tiáojié shuǐliú regulate water flow 市場調節 shìchǎng tiáojié market regulation 對貨幣的流通不斷進行調節 duì huòbì de liútōng bùduàn jìnxíng tiáojié constantly adjust the amount of money in circulation

verb 1 breathe; respire 呼吸急促 hūxī jícù be short of breath 呼吸困難 hūxī kùnnan breathe with difficulty; lose one’s breath 呼吸新鮮空氣 Hūxī xīnxiān kōngqì have a breath of fresh air 停止呼吸 tíngzhǐ hūxī stop breathing; die 2 literary single breath—in a very short period of time 勝負就在那呼吸之間。 Shèng-fù jiù zài nà hūxī zhījiān. The victory and defeat depends on a single moment.
noun jump rope verb (-//-) skip rope

verb strengthen; build up 慢跑可以強壯身體。 Mànpǎo kěyǐ qiángzhuàng shēntǐ. Jogging can improve one’s health. adjective strong; sturdy; robust (opp. 細弱, 虛弱) 他身體強壯。 Tā shēntǐ qiángzhuàng. He’s strong and healthy.

verb 1 economize; save (opp. 費) 省勁 shěngjìn save effort or labour 省著點兒用 shěng zhe diǎnr yòng use sparingly 省掉 (= 省去) 不少麻煩 shěng diào bùshǎo máfan save a lot of trouble 能省就省 néng shěng jiù shěng economize wherever possible 我一個月省不下幾個錢。 Wǒ yī ge yuè shěng bù xià jǐ ge qián. I can’t save much from my monthly wages. 2 omit; leave out 省一道工序 Shěng yī dào gōngxù eliminate one step from the process 這兩個字不能省。 Zhè liǎng ge zì bù néng shěng. These two words cannot be omitted. noun literary abbreviation (of words) “佛”是“佛陀”之省。 “Fó” shì “Fótuó” zhī shěng. 佛 is an abbreviation of 佛陀. noun 1 province 省報 shěng bào provincial newspaper 省長 shěngzhǎng governor of a province 省軍區 shěng jūn qū provincial military command 省轄市 Shěng xiá shì municipality directly under a provincial jurisdiction 省政府 shěngzhèngfǔ provincial government 省人民代表大會 shěng rénmín dàibiǎo dàhuì provincial people’s congress 江蘇省 Jiāngsū shěng Jiangsu Province 2 provincial capital 抵省 dǐ shěng arrive in the provincial capital

noun 1 specific field of study; specialization; speciality; discipline 該大學有十二個系, 四十一個專業。 Gāi dàxué yǒu shí'èr ge xì, sìshíyī ge zhuānyè. The university has 12 departments with 41 specialities. 2 specialized trade (or profession); special line; professional 專業生產會議 Zhuānyè shēngchǎn huìyì a conference on specialized trades 提供專業服務 tígōng zhuānyè fúwù offer professional service

adjective 1 thin; emaciated (opp. 胖, 肥) 瘦巴巴的 shòu bābā de skinny; skin and bones 臉瘦 Liǎn shòu thin in the face 他長得很瘦。 Tā zhǎng de hěn shòu. He is very thin. 2 lean (opp. 肥) 瘦豬肉 shòu zhūròu lean pork 3 tight (opp. 肥) 這件上衣腰身瘦了點兒。 zhè jiàn shàngyī yāoshēn shòu le diǎnr. The coat is a bit tight at the waist. 4 not fertile; poor 瘦土薄田 Shòu tǔ báo tián poor soil and barren land

adverb actually; in fact; as a matter of fact 其實情況不是那樣。 Qíshí qíngkuàng bù shì nàyàng. Actually, that is not the case. 還要討論？其實沒有這個必要。 Hái yào tǎolùn？ Qíshí méiyǒu zhège bìyào. Why have another discussion? I don’t think there’s any need for it. 何必大家掏錢？其實讓我做東得了。 Hébì dàjiā tāoqián？ Qíshí ràng wǒ zuòdōng déliǎo. Why go Dutch? Let me play the host. 這臺機器看起來復雜, 其實不難掌握。 Zhè tái jīqì kàn qǐlai fùzá, qíshí bù nán zhǎngwò. This machine looks complicated, but it’s really not difficult to operate. 你們只知道她會說英語, 其實她的日語也挺好。 Nǐmen zhǐ zhīdao tā huì shuō Yīngyǔ, qíshí tā de Rìyǔ yě tǐng hǎo. You only know that she speaks English. As a matter of fact, her Japanese is pretty good too.

verb protect; safeguard 保護現場 bǎohù xiànchǎng preserve the scene of a crime or an accident 保護眼睛 Bǎohù yǎnjing protect one’s eyes 保護人民的利益 bǎohù rénmín de lìyì safeguard the people’s interests 保護動物不受虐待 bǎohù dòngwù bù shòu nüèdài protect animals from cruelty 保護環境, 防止污染 bǎohù huánjìng, fángzhǐ wūrǎn protect the environment against pollution 體操運動員都學會了互相保護和自我保護。 Tǐcāo yùndòngyuán dōu xuéhuì le hùxiāng bǎohù hé zìwǒ bǎohù. The gymnasts have all learnt to protect each other and themselves from injuries. noun protection; safeguarding 提供防盜保護 tígōng fángdào bǎohù provide protection from theft; burglary protection 在嚴密的保護下 zài yánmì debǎohù xià under heavy guard
verb trust; have confidence in 得到人民的信任 Dédào rénmín de xìnrèn enjoy the trust (or confidence) of the people
verb reduce weight; slim; lose weight 節食減肥 jiéshí jiǎnféi go on diet 醫生要他減肥。 Yīshēng yào tā jiǎnféi. The doctor told him to reduce weight.
verb increase; gain; add 增兵 zēngbīng throw in more troops; augment one’s forces; reinforce; reinforcement 增撥資金 Zēng bō zījīn allocate more funds 產量猛增。 Chǎnliàng měngzēng. Output increased sharply.

adjective 1 fat (opp. 瘦) 肥豬 féizhū big porker 這肉太肥了。 Zhè ròu tài féi le. The meat is too fat. 2 fertile; rich 這裡的地肥極了。 Zhèlǐ de dì féi jíle. The soil here is extremely fertile. 3 loose-fitting; loose; large (opp. 瘦) 這條褲子太肥了。 Zhè tiáo kùzi tài féi le. These trousers are too baggy. 4 profitable; lucrative; yielding good profits See 60118755肥差fei2chai1肥差 verb 1 fertilize 2 become rich by illegal means or income 肥飽私囊 féi bǎo sīnáng line one’s purse noun fertilizer; manure 給地上點兒肥 Gěi dìshang diǎnrféi spread some manure on the soil 這些花缺肥。 Zhèxiē huā quē féi. The flowers are in need of fertilizer.

noun muscle; musculus 肌肉發達 jīròu fādá be muscular; brawn; well-muscled 肌肉勞損 jīròu láosǔn muscular strain 肌肉酸痛 jīròu suāntòng sore muscle medicine 肌肉腫瘤 jīròu zhǒngliú muscle tumour medicine 肌肉注射 jīròuzhùshè intramuscular injection
noun fat 動物脂肪 dòngwù zhīfáng animal fat 植物脂肪 zhíwù zhīfáng vegetable fat (肪肪 fáng)
noun vegetables; greens; greenstuff 有機蔬菜 yǒujī shūcài organic vegetable 蔬菜栽培 shūcài zāipéi vegetable growing (or farming)

noun line; contour; figure 粗獷, 雄渾的線條 Cūguǎng, xiónghún dexiàntiáo bold and vigorous lines 那女孩線條很美。 nà nǚhái xiàntiáo hěn měi. The girl has a beautiful figure. 這幅畫的線條非常柔和。 Zhè fú huà de xiàntiáo fēicháng róuhé. The contours of this painting are very soft. 這尊陶俑線條非常優美。 Zhè zūn táoyǒng xiàntiáo fēicháng yōuměi. The lines of this pottery figurine are very graceful.

noun 1 the girth of a garment 這件外衣的肥瘦兒正合適。 Zhè jiàn wàiyī deféishòur zhènghéshì. This coat is a good fit. 2 proportion of fat and lean 這塊肉肥瘦兒正好。 Zhè kuài ròu féishòur zhènghǎo. This chunk of meat is not too fat and not too lean. 3 dialect partly fat and partly lean pork

noun rational faculty; reason 恢復理性 huīfù lǐxìng come to one’s senses 失去理性 Shīqù lǐxìng lose one’s reason 違反理性 wéifǎn lǐxìng be contrary to reason adjective rational (opp. 感性) 感性和理性 gǎnxìng hé lǐxìng the perceptual and the rational
noun (sense) perception (opp. 理性) 認識的感性階段 Rènshi de gǎnxìng jiēduàn the perceptual stage of cognition
noun set phrase (usu. composed of four characters); idiom
noun height (of a person) 他身高一米八。 Tā shēngāo yī mǐ bā. He is 180 centimetres in height.
noun (body) weight 體重減輕 tǐzhòng jiǎnqīng lose weight 體重增加 Tǐzhòng zēngjiā put on weight; gain weight 她體重六十公斤。 Tā tǐzhòng liùshí gōngjīn. She weighs 60 kilograms.
measure word kilogram (kg); kilo

verb 1 stop; cease; halt; pause 停下工作 tíngxià gōngzuò stop work 雨停了。 Yǔ tíng le. The rain has stopped. 他不停地寫著。 Tā bù tíng de xiě zhe. He kept on writing. 蟋蟀叫個不停。 Xīshuài jiào ge bù tíng. The crickets are chirping endlessly. 她停了一會兒, 又接著講下去。 Tā tíng le yīhuìr, yòu jiēzhe jiǎng xiàqu. She paused a moment before continuing the story. 演奏完序曲, 樂隊停下來調了調音。 Yǎnzòu wán xùqǔ, yuèduì tíng xiàlai diào le tiáoyīn. After the overture, the orchestra stopped to tune up again. 2 stop over; stay 我在杭州停了五天。 Wǒ zài Hángzhōu tíng le wǔ tiān. I stopped over at Hangzhou for five days. 火車在這些小站只停一分鐘。 Huǒchē zài zhèxiē xiǎo zhàn zhǐ tíng yī fēnzhōng. The train stops for only one minute at these small stations. 3 (of cars) parked; (of ships) lie at anchor; (of a dead body or coffin) placed 船停在江心。 Chuán tíng zài jiāngxīn. The ship anchored in the middle of the river. 靈柩停在中央大廳內。 Língjiù tíng zài zhōngyāng dàtīng nèi. The coffin was placed in the central hall. 門口停著一輛轎車。 Ménkǒu tíng zhe yī liàng jiàochē. Parked in front of the gate was a sedan. 汽車停在哪兒？ Qìchē tíng zài nǎr？ Where can we park the car? 輪船在港口已停了三天。 Lúnchuán zài gǎngkǒu yǐ tíng le sān tiān. The steamship has been in the harbour for three days. 4 ready; settled See 31556864停妥ting2tuo3停妥 measure word colloquial part (of a total); portion 十停兒有九停兒是好的。 Shí tíngr yǒu jiǔ tíngr shì hǎo de. Nine out of ten are good.

verb 1 have (or take) a rest; rest; have a break 休息一會兒 xiūxi yīhuìr rest for a while; have a rest 課間休息 kèjiān xiūxi break (between classes) 幕間休息 mùjiān xiūxi intermission 2 have a holiday (or vacation) 休息一天 xiūxi yī tiān have (or take) a day off 百貨公司元旦不休息。 Bǎihuò gōngsī Yuándàn bù xiūxi. The department store is open as usual on New Year’s Day.

adjective general; rough; approximate 大概的估計 dàgài de gūjì a rough estimate 大概的數字 dàgài de shùzì an approximate figure 作一個大概的分析 Zuò yī ge dàgài de fēnxi make a general analysis adverb 1 generally; briefly 我大概跟他說了說。 Wǒ dàgài gēn tā shuō le shuō. I told him briefly. 2 probably; most likely; presumably 會議大概要延期。 Huìyì dàgài yào yánqī. The meeting will probably be postponed. 你大概知道他吧。 Nǐ dàgài zhīdao tā ba. Presumably you know him. 大概將有五百人出席。 Dàgài jiāng yǒu wǔbǎi rén chūxí. There will be approximately 500 people present. noun general idea; broad outline 我只知道個大概。 Wǒ zhǐ zhīdao ge dàgài. I have only a general idea.
noun volleyball (the game or the ball) 沙灘排球 shātānpáiqiú beach volleyball

verb 1 advise; urge; try to persuade 勸他戒煙 quàn tā jièyān advise him to give up (or quit) smoking 勸他休息 quàn tā xiūxi urge him to take a rest 我勸了半天, 他就是不聽。 Wǒ quàn le bàntiān, tā jiù shì bù tīng. I spent a long time trying to talk him round, but he just wouldn’t listen. 我們勸他別去了。 Wǒmen quàn tā bié qù le. We tried to persuade him not to go. 2 encourage See 28863232勸學quan4xue2勸學 3 comfort 他心裡不好受, 你去勸勸吧。 Tā xīnli bù hǎoshòu, nǐ qù quàn quàn ba. He’s feeling bad; please go and say a few words to comfort him.

verb persuade; advise 他聽從了我的勸說。 Tā tīngcóng le wǒ de quànshuō. He gave in to my persuasion. 我們已經勸說過他, 叫他放棄原來的計劃。 Wǒmen yǐjing quànshuō guò tā, jiào tā fàngqì yuánlái de jìhuà. We’ve talked him out of his original plan.
verb appreciate the beautiful

verb 1 manage with an effort; do with difficulty 病人勉強喝了點兒粥。 bìngrén miǎnqiǎng hē le diǎnr zhōu. With an effort the patient ate some gruel. or The patient forced himself to take a few mouthfuls of gruel. 你最近過得怎麼樣？——勉勉強強。 Nǐ zuìjìn guò de zěnmeyàng? ——miǎnmiǎnqiǎngqiǎng. How are you recently? — Just so-so. 2 force sb. to do sth. 要是他不願意去, 就不要勉強他。 Yào shì tā bù yuànyi qù, jiù bùyào miǎnqiǎng tā. If he doesn’t want to go, don’t force him to. adjective 1 reluctant; grudging 勉強協助 miǎnqiǎng xiézhù give reluctant assistance 勉強許諾 miǎnqiǎng xǔnuò give a reluctant promise 2 inadequate; unconvincing; strained; far-fetched 勉強多數 miǎnqiǎng duōshù a bare majority 你的理由很勉強。 Nǐ de lǐyóu hěn miǎnqiǎng. Your reasons are unconvincing. adverb 1 reluctantly; grudgingly; unwillingly 勉強同意 miǎnqiǎng tóngyì reluctantly agree 勉強笑了笑 miǎnqiǎng xiào le xiào force a smile 勉強維持生活 miǎnqiǎng wéichí shēnghuó eke out a bare living; scrape along 他接受了我們的建議, 但是很勉強。 Tā jiēshòu le wǒmen de jiànyì, dànshì hěn miǎnqiǎng. He accepted our suggestion, but rather grudgingly. 2 barely 勉強及格 miǎnqiǎng jígé barely pass the examination; only just make the grade
noun bodybuilding 練健美 Liàn jiànměi practise bodybuilding adjective strong and handsome; vigorous and graceful 健美的體操表演 Jiànměi de tǐcāo biǎoyǎn a vigorous and graceful performance of callisthenics

noun get-together 他們每隔兩個月搞一次聚會。 Tāmen měi gé liǎng ge yuè gǎo yī cì jùhuì. They have a get-together every two months. verb (-//-) get together; meet 老戰友聚會在一起, 格外親熱。 Lǎo zhànyǒu jùhuì zài yīqǐ, géwài qīnrè. When old comrades-in-arms get together, everyone has a good time.
noun brown (colour)
noun deck chair; sling chair; recliner

verb guess; conjecture; surmise 妄加猜測 wàngjiā cāicè make wild guesses noun guess; guesswork; conjecture; surmise 那都是猜測。 Nà dōu shì cāicè. That’s pure conjecture. 考古新發現否定了過去對這個問題的猜測。 Kǎogǔ xīn fāxiàn fǒudìng le guòqu duì zhège wèntí de cāicè. The new archaeological finds have disproved previous conjectures on this subject.

adverb 1 to the end; to the finish 打到底 Dǎ dào dǐ fight to the finish 進行到底 jìnxíngdàodǐ carry through to the end 2 at last; in the end; finally 新方法到底試驗成功了。 Xīn fāngfǎ dàodǐ shìyàn chénggōng le. The new method has finally proved to be a success. 3 [in a question for emphasis] 你到底是什麼意思？ Nǐ dàodǐ shì shénme yìsi？ What on earth do you mean? 你那樣幹到底是為什麼？ Nǐ nàyàng gàn dàodǐ shì wèishénme？ What in the world did you do that for? 4 after all; in the final analysis 他到底是新手, 幹活還不熟練。 Tā dàodǐ shì xīnshǒu, gànhuó hái bù shúliàn. After all, he’s new to the work and isn’t very skillful at it yet.
noun muffler; scarf

noun 1 headgear; hat; cap 戴上帽子 dàishangmàozi put on a hat (or cap) 摘下帽子 zhāixià màozi take off a hat (or cap) 2 label; tag; brand 摘掉文盲的帽子 zhāi diào wénmáng de màozi rid oneself of the label of “illiterate” See 19553792戴帽子dai4mao4zi5戴帽子;25096704扣帽子kou4mao4zi5 扣帽子
noun towel
noun 1 Chinese long gown 2 unlined long gown (as worn by a doctor) 白大褂兒 bái dàguàr white gown; doctor

adjective 1 (of a wild animal or of one's temper, words, etc.) fierce; terrible 老虎比獅子還厲害。 lǎohǔ bǐ shīzi hái lìhai. Tigers are even fiercer than lions. 他這張嘴可厲害了。 Tā zhè zhāngzuǐ kě lìhai le. He has a sharp tongue. 2 (of a person) strict; stern; harsh 他的樣子很厲害。 Tā de yàngzi hěn lìhai. His appearance is very stern. 我要給他點兒厲害。 Wǒ yào gěi tā diǎnrlìhai. I’ll teach him a lesson. 我們老師很厲害。 Wǒmen lǎoshī hěn lìhai. Our teacher is very strict. 3 (of illness, heat, cold, etc.) intense; severe; terrible 疼得厲害 Téng de lìhai suffer from severe pain 他病得很厲害。 tā bìng de hěn lìhai. He is seriously ill. 這著棋非常厲害。 Zhè zhuóqí fēicháng lìhai. That’s a devastating (chess) move. 這種煙太厲害。 zhèzhǒng yān tài lìhai. This kind of tobacco is too strong. 這幾天熱得厲害。 Zhè jǐ tiān rè de lìhai. It’s been terribly hot these few days. 4 colloquial great; impressive; awesome; amazing 她是個很厲害的演員。 Tā shì ge hěn lìhai de yǎnyuán. She's a fantastic actress. 他的聲音真的很厲害。 Tā de shēngyīn zhēn de hěn lìhai. His voice is amazing. 她下象棋下得很厲害。 Tā xià xiàngqí xià de hěn lìhai. She plays chess extremely well.

noun cause; reason 原因和結果 Yuányīn hé jiéguǒ cause and effect 原因未明發熱 yuányīn wèi míng fārè fever of unknown cause 成功的原因 chénggōng de yuányīn reasons for success 由於這個原因 yóuyú zhège yuányīn on this account 別管是什麼原因 bié guǎn shì shénmeyuányīn never mind the whys and wherefores 產生這種現象有兩方面的原因。 Chǎnshēng zhèzhǒng xiànxiàng yǒu liǎng fāngmiàn de yuányīn. Two things account for the occurrence.
1 as much as possible 2 to the greatest extent

noun details; particulars 討論計劃的細節 tǎolùn jìhuà de xìjié discuss the details of a plan; go into the particulars of a plan 通過細節描寫來表現人物性格 tōngguò xìjié miáoxiě lái biǎoxiàn rénwù xìnggé portray a character through descriptive detail
noun medical record; case history
stethoscope
idiom of various (or all) colours; multicoloured; colourful 五顏六色的雲霞 wǔyánliùsè de yúnxiá many-hued clouds 一疊五顏六色的紙 yī dié wǔyánliùsè de zhǐ a heap of paper of various colours
(idiom) one man's meat is another man's poison; to each his own
verb 1 transmit by radio; go on the air 播放錄音講話 bōfàng lùyīn jiǎnghuà relay a taped speech 2 broadcast (a TV programme, etc.); show; screen 播放比賽實況 bōfàng bǐsài shíkuàng broadcast the match live

verb relax; slacken; loosen 放鬆肌肉 fàngsōng jīròu relax one’s muscles 放鬆警惕 fàngsōng jǐngtì relax one’s vigilance 放鬆鞋帶 Fàngsōng xiédài loosen shoelaces 你怎麼放鬆自己呢？ Nǐ zěnmefàngsōng zìjǐ ne? How do you relax yourself?
noun 1 shirt 2 blouse

verb 1 put up; build 搭窩 dāwō build a nest 搭帳篷 dā zhàngpeng pitch a tent 搭一個臨時舞臺 Dā yī ge línshí wǔtái put up a makeshift stage 2 hang over; put over 把洗好的衣服搭在繩上 bǎ xǐ hǎo de yīfu dā zài shéng shàng hang the washing on a line 3 come into contact; join 搭上關係 dāshang guānxi strike up a relationship with; establish contact with 前言不搭後語 qiányán bù dā hòuyǔ speak incoherently 4 throw in (more people, money, etc.); add 你忙不過來, 給你搭個人吧。 Nǐ mángbuguòlai, gěi nǐ dā gèrén ba. You’re terribly busy. We’ll send someone to help you. 5 lift sth. together 請幫我把這包大米搭上卡車。 qǐng bāng wǒ bǎ zhè bāo dàmǐ dā shàng kǎchē. Please help me lift the bag of rice onto the truck. 6 take (a ship, plane, etc.); travel (or go) by 搭輪船去上海 Dā lúnchuán qù Shànghǎi go to Shanghai by boat 搭某人的車走 dā mǒurén de chē zǒu get a lift in sb.’s car 7 combine 各種食物要搭著吃, 以保證營養均衡。 gèzhǒng shíwù yào dā zháochī, yǐ bǎozhèng yíngyǎng jūnhéng. Various kinds of food should be combined in diet to ensure balanced nutrition.
verb watch; view 觀看表演 guānkàn biǎoyǎn watch a performance 觀看排球比賽 guānkàn páiqiú bǐsài watch a volleyball match
verb test; examine; check up 質量檢測 zhìliàng jiǎncè quality control
verb build; construct; make 建造房屋 jiànzào fángwū build houses

noun 1 place to sit; seat 排座位 pái zuòwei make seating arrangements 留幾個座位 liú jǐ gè zuòwèi reserve some seats 回到你的座位上去。 huídào nǐ de zuòwèi shàngqu. Go back to your place. 這個體育館有一萬八千個座位。 Zhège tǐyùguǎn yǒu yīwàn bāqiān ge zuòwei. The stadium seats 18,000. 2 a thing to sit on; seat 給我搬個座位兒來。 gěi wǒ bān ge zuòwèir lái. Get (or Fetch, Bring) me a seat.

adverb usually literary still; yet; as before 至今仍然未見回音。 Zhìjīn réngrán wèijiàn huíyīn. As yet, we have received no answer. 等候半天, 她仍然未到。 Děnghòu bàntiān, tā réngrán wèi dào. We’ve been waiting a long time for her, but she still hasn’t arrived. 他把信看完, 仍然裝回信封。 Tā bǎ xìn kànwán, réngrán zhuāng huí xìnfēng. He put the letter back into the envelope after he’d read it.
noun speed; velocity 這條輪船的快慢怎麼樣？ Zhè tiáo lúnchuán de kuàimàn zěnmeyàng？ What’s the speed of this steamer? or How fast can this steamer sail?

noun 1 tree 樹木 shùmù trees generally 2 timber; wood 松木 sōngmù pinewood 3 made of wood; wooden 木箱 mùxiāng wooden coffer 木製家具 mù zhì jiāju wooden furniture 4 coffin 一具棺木 yī jù guān mù a coffin adjective 1 simple; plain See 27070208木訥mu4ne4木訥 2 numb; wooden 兩腳都凍木了。 Liǎng jiǎo dōu dòng mù le. Both feet were numb with cold. 舌頭木了, 什麼味兒也嘗不出來。 Shétou mù le, shénme wèir yě cháng bù chūlai. My tongue has lost all sense of taste. 3 slow-witted; stupid 這家伙可真木。 zhè jiāhuo kě zhēn mù. This chap is rather insensitive.
noun 1 forest; woods; grove 松林 sōnglín pine forest 2 group of similar persons or things; circle 藝林 yìlín art circles 3 forestry 農林 nónglín farming and forestry 4 (Lín) a surname
adjective 1 full of trees See 29392640森林sen1lin2森林 2 literary multitudinous; in multitudes See 29393664森羅萬象sen1luo2wan4xiang4森羅萬象 3 dark; gloomy 陰森 yīnsēn gruesome; ghastly
noun Guilin (a city and tourist resort in Guangxi) 桂林山水甲天下。 Guìlín shānshuǐ jiǎ tiānxià. Guilin’s scenery ranks first in the world.
continuity; continuance
noun meteorology precipitation; precipitated water 人工降水 réngōng jiàngshuǐ artificial precipitation

noun course; process 縮短製作過程 suōduǎn zhìzuò guòchéng shorten the manufacturing process 在討論過程中 Zài tǎolùn guòchéng zhōng in the course of the discussion 思想轉變要有個過程。 Sīxiǎng zhuǎnbiàn yào yǒu ge guòchéng. Changing one’s ways of thinking is a long process.

noun 1 meteorological phenomena 氣象觀測 Qìxiàng guāncè meteorological observation 2 meteorology 3 atmosphere; scene 生氣勃勃的新氣象 shēngqì bóbó de xīn qìxiàng a new and dynamic atmosphere 商店裡很熱鬧, 已經有過年的氣象了。 Shāngdiàn lǐ hěn rènao, yǐjing yǒu guò nián de qìxiàng le. The shops are very lively. They already have a New Year feel. 4 imposing manner
observation station

verb break; smash 打破常規 dǎpo chángguī break free from conventions; break the normal procedure 打破紀錄 dǎpo jìlù break a record 打破僵局 dǎpo jiāngjú break a deadlock; find a way out of a stalemate 打破界線 dǎpo jièxiàn break down barriers 打破壟斷 dǎpo lǒngduàn smash up a monopoly 打破平衡 dǎpo pínghéng upset a balance 打破醋罈子 dǎpo cùtánzi burn with jealousy 打破鐵飯碗 dǎpo tiěfànwǎn break the iron rice bowl

verb 1 build; construct; erect 建房 jiànfáng build housing 建電站 Jiàn diànzhàn build a power station 建橋工地 Jiàn qiáo gōngdì the construction site of the bridge 建空中樓閣 jiàn kōngzhōng lóugé build one’s hope on air 新樓已經建成。 xīn lóu yǐjingjiàn chéng. The new building has been completed. 2 establish; set up; found 建公司 jiàn gōngsī set up a firm 建新功 jiàn xīn gōng make new contributions 3 propose; advocate See 23843072建議jian4yi4建議 noun 1 abbreviation Fujian (Province) 建柏 jiàn bǎi Fujian cypress 2 Jian Jiang River (in Fujian Province)
noun rainfall 年降雨量 nián jiàngyǔliàng annual rainfall

noun 1 history 歷史上 lìshǐshang in history; historically; down the ages 歷史悠久 lìshǐ yōujiǔ have a long history 歷史地看問題 lìshǐ dì kàn wèntí look at the problem historically 歷史上的今天 lìshǐ shàng de jīntiān today in history 歷史遺留問題 lìshǐ yíliú wèntí problem (or issue) left over by history (or from the past); legacy from the past 創造歷史 chuàngzào lìshǐ make history 風雲變幻的歷史 fēngyúnbiànhuàn delìshǐ eventful history 創歷史最高水平 chuàng lìshǐ zuìgāo shuǐpíng hit an all-time high 全然不顧歷史事實 Quánrán bù gù lìshǐ shìshí in utter disregard of historical fact 歷史不會重演。 lìshǐ bù huì chóngyǎn. History never repeats itself. 歷史上有很多這樣的例子。 lìshǐ shàng yǒu hěn duō zhèyàng de lìzi. There are many such examples in history. 2 past events 這件事早已成為歷史。 Zhè jiàn shì zǎoyǐ chéngwéi lìshǐ. That’s already past history. 3 personal records 歷史清白 lìshǐ qīngbái have a clean record 隱瞞自己的歷史 yǐnmán zìjǐ de lìshǐ conceal one’s past 4 history (as a course of study) 他是研究歷史的。 Tā shì yánjiū lìshǐ de. His field is history. 5 historical record (or document, data) 多讀點兒歷史 Duō dú diǎnrlìshǐ read more of the history

noun 1 minutes; notes; record 會談記錄 huìtán jìlù a transcript of talks 會議記錄 huìyì jìlù the minutes of a meeting 正式記錄 zhèngshì jìlù official records 摘要記錄 zhāiyào jìlù summary record 逐字記錄 zhúzì jìlù verbatim record 2 notetaker 這次討論請你做記錄好嗎？ Zhè cì tǎolùn qǐng nǐ zuò jìlù hǎo ma？ Would you take the minutes of the discussion? 3 VARIANT OF 23542528紀錄ji4lu4紀錄 I 1 (sports) record verb take notes; keep the minutes; record 記錄在案 Jìlùzài'àn place on record; as a matter of record 把發言的主要內容記錄下來 Bǎ fāyán de zhǔyào nèiróng jìlù xiàlai note down the main points of the speeches
verb calculate in advance; estimate 預計大樓十個月可以完工。 yùjì dàlóu shí ge yuè kěyǐ wángōng. It is estimated that the building will be completed in ten months.
noun part; partial 局部必須服從全局。 Júbù bìxū fúcóng quánjú. The part must be subordinated to the whole. 不能只顧局部和眼前。 Bù néng zhǐgù júbù hé yǎnqián. One cannot focus only on the partial and the immediate.
noun torrential rain; rainstorm 暴雨傾盆。 bàoyǔ qīngpén. Rain fell in torrents. or It’s raining cats and dogs. 下了一陣暴雨。 Xià le yīzhèn bàoyǔ. There was a downpour.

verb be faced with 困難當前, 大家都儘自己最大努力吧。 Kùnnandāngqián, dàjiā dōu jǐn zìjǐ zuìdà nǔlì ba. Faced with difficulty, let’s all do our best. noun present time 當前利益 dāngqián lìyì immediate interests 當前的國際形勢 dāngqián de guójì xíngshì the current (or present) international situation 當前的中心任務 Dāngqián de zhōngxīn rènwu the central task at present 當前世界的主要傾向 dāngqián shìjiè de zhǔyào qīngxiàng the main trend in the world today
noun Li Jiang River (in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region)
hydrometric station; hydrologic station

noun water level 高水位 gāo shuǐ wèi high water level 低水位 Dī shuǐwèi low water level 地下水位 dìxià shuǐwèi water table; ground-water level 超過警戒水位1.5米 chāoguò jǐngjiè shuǐwèi1.5 mǐ be above the warning water level by 1.5 metres

verb 1 warn; admonish 2 be on the alert against; guard against; keep a close watch on 採取警戒措施 cǎiqǔ jǐngjiè cuòshī take precautionary measures 沿公路布置警戒 Yán gōnglù bùzhì jǐngjiè post guards along the highway

verb 1 literary remain 一仍其舊 Yī réng qí jiù remain the same 2 literary be frequent 頻仍 pínréng occur frequently adverb usually literary still; yet 仍未 réng wèi have not yet 仍須努力 réng xū nǔlì must continue to make efforts 仍有效力 réng yǒu xiàolì be still effective; be still in force
adjective slow (opp. 迅速) 動作緩慢 dòngzuò huǎnmàn slow in action; slowmoving 進展緩慢 jìnzhǎn huǎnmàn make slow progress
verb rise; go up; shoot up 河水上漲了。 héshuǐ shàngzhǎng le. The river has risen. 物價在上漲。 Wùjià zài shàngzhǎng. The prices are going up.

verb 1 turn; shift; change 轉敗為勝 zhuǎnbàiwéishèng turn defeat into victory; a turn around 轉弱為強 zhuǎnruòwéiqiáng go (or grow) from weak to strong 晴轉多雲 qíng zhuǎn duō yún fine then becoming cloudy; clear to cloudy 把工作重點轉到經濟建設上來 bǎ gōngzuò zhòngdiǎn zhuǎn dào jīngjì jiànshè shànglai shift the focus of work to building the economy 她轉過頭來和我說話。 Tā zhuǎn guò tóu lái hé wǒ shuōhuà. She spoke to me over her shoulder. 2 pass on; transfer 把錢從活期存款轉為定期存款 bǎ qián cóng huóqī cúnkuǎn zhuǎnwéi dìngqī cúnkuǎn transfer the money from a current to a fixed deposit account 把她的郵件轉寄到她的新地址 Bǎ tā de yóujiàn zhuǎn jì dào tā de xīn dìzhǐ forward her mail to her new address 這封信請你轉給他。 Zhè fēng xìn qǐng nǐ zhuǎngěi tā. Please pass the letter on to him.
noun wage; pay; salary
verb (of water, prices, etc.) rise; go up 潮漲了。 Cháo zhǎng le. The tide is rising. or The tide is in. 火車票又漲了。 Huǒchēpiào yòu zhǎng le. Train fares are rising again.

adjective 1 cold; chilly (opp. 熱) 冷極了 lěng jíle be extremely (or bitterly) cold 冷徹骨髓 lěngchègǔsuǐ chilled to the bone 冰冷 bīnglěng ice-cold; freezing cold 冷熱交替。 lěng rè jiāotì. Cold and heat succeed each other. 你冷不冷？ Nǐ lěng bù lěng？ Do you feel cold? 2 cold in manner; frosty; icy 冷冷地點點頭 lěnglěng dìdiǎn diǎntóu nod one’s head coldly; give sb. a cold nod 待人很冷 dàirén hěn lěng be cold towards people; treat others coldly 3 unfrequented; deserted; out-of-the-way See 25547264冷清leng3qing5冷清 4 strange; rare See 25556224冷字leng3zi4冷字 5 receiving little attention; unwelcomed See 25538816冷貨leng3huo4冷貨 6 shot from hiding 打冷拳 dǎ lěng quán hit sb. from behind 7 figurative discouraged; disappointed 學校的新政策讓老師們心冷了半截兒。 xuéxiào de xīn zhèngcè ràng lǎoshī men xīn lěng le bànjiér. The school’s new policy made teachers feel rather disappointed. verb 1 dialect (of food) cool 太燙了, 冷一下再吃。 Tài tàng le, lěng yīxià zài chī. It’s too hot. Let it cool off before you eat it. 2 dishearten; discourage; disappoint; dampen 事情冷下來了。 shìqinglěng xiàlai le. The matter has cooled off. 她對我的熱情冷了下來。 Tā duì wǒ de rèqíng lěng le xiàlai. Her passion for me has cooled off. 3 ignore 冷他一陣子 lěng tā yīzhènzi ignore him for a while noun (Lěng) a surname

noun 1 heat 摩擦產生熱。 Mócā chǎnshēng rè. Friction produces heat. 2 steam or water heat 供熱 gōngrè heating 3 fever; temperature 這孩子有點兒熱(= 在發熱)。 Zhè háizi yǒudiǎnrrè. The child is running a fever. 4 craze; fad 旅遊熱 lǚyóu rè tourism craze; intense popular interest in tourism verb heat up; warm up; warm 把湯熱一熱 Bǎ tāng rè yī rè heat up the soup adjective 1 hot (opp. 冷) 熱水 rèshuǐ hot water 三伏天很熱。 Sānfútiān hěn rè. During the dogdays it’s very hot. 2 ardent; warmhearted; enthusiastic; intimate 熱話 rè huà affectionate words 3 in great demand; popular See 69312227熱貨re4huo4熱貨 4 envious; eager 熱念 rèniàn intense desire 5 noisy See 28950784熱鬧re4nao5熱鬧 6 thermal; thermo- See 28942848熱核re4he2熱核

verb 1 come (to); arrive 來得不巧 Láide bùqiǎo come at an unsuitable time (or moment) 來得正好 láide zhènghǎo come in good time; come just at the right time 就來！ jiù lái! I’m coming. 快來！ Kuài lái! Come along! 來客人了。 Lái kèren le. We have a guest. 客人來了。 Kèren lái le. The guests are here. 他今天來過兩次。 Tā jīntiān lái guò liǎng cì. He came twice today. 他已經來了。 Tā yǐjinglái le. He has already come. 她明天來北京。 Tā míngtiān lái Běijīng. She is coming to Beijing tomorrow. 有空來玩。 Yǒukòng lái wán. Come round when you have time. 遠處來了一條小船。 Yuǎnchù lái le yī tiáo xiǎochuán. A small boat came into view in the distance. 2 cause to come; happen; crop up; take place 問題來了。 Wèntí lái le. A problem has come up. 這事兒怎麼來的？ Zhè shìr zěnme lái de？ How did it come about? 3 obtain; get 這差事來得不容易。 Zhè chāishilái de bù róngyì. This job is hard to come by. 4 [as a substitute for some other verb] 來份糖醋魚。 lái fèn tángcùyú. A sweet-and-sour fish, please. 你來塊糖。 Nǐ lái kuài táng. Have some candy. 再來一個！ Zàilái yī ge! [call for another performance] Encore! 慢慢兒來, 別忙。 Mànmànr lái, bié máng. Take it easy. No hurry. 我累了, 你來吧。 Wǒ lèi le, nǐ lái ba. I’m tired. Why don’t you take over (or carry on). 咱們來一盤棋。 Zánmenlái yī pán qí. Let’s have a game of chess. 你歇歇, 讓我來吧。 Nǐ xiēxie, ràng wǒ lái ba. You take a rest. Let me do it. 我自己來吧, 別客氣。 Wǒ zìjǐ lái ba, bié kèqi. Please don’t bother. I’ll do it myself. 我們打籃球, 你來不來？ Wǒmen dǎ lánqiú, nǐ lái bù lái？ We’re going to play basketball. Will you join in? 5 [with 得 or 不, indicating possibility or impossibility, capability or incapability] 上海話我說不來。 Shànghǎi huà wǒ shuō bù lái. I don’t speak Shanghai dialect. 我吃不來四川菜。 Wǒ chī bù lái Sìchuān cài. I can’t get used to Sichuan cuisine. 西餐我吃得來。 Xīcān wǒ chī de lái. Western food suits me all right. 這道題我做不來。 Zhè dào tí wǒ zuò bù lái. I can’t do this problem. 這個歌我唱得來。 Zhège gē wǒ chàng de lái. I can sing this song. 6 [before a verb, indicating an intended or suggested action] 你來試試。 Nǐ lái shìshi. Have a try. 我來說兩句。 Wǒ láishuō liǎng jù. Let me say a few words. 大家來想辦法。 Dàjiā lái xiǎng bànfǎ. Let’s think of a way (to solve the problem). or Let’s put our heads together and see how to do it. 7 [after a verb or verbal expression] come in order to 他回家探親來了。 Tā huíjiā tànqīn lái le. He’s come home to see his parents. 我們道喜來了。 Wǒmen dàoxǐ lái le. We’ve come to congratulate you (or offer our congratulations). 8 [between two verbs or verbal expressions to indicate the purpose of the former] in order to 想辦法來解決問題 Xiǎng bànfǎ lái jiějué wèntí think of a way to solve the problem 你又能用什麼理由來說服他呢？ Nǐ yòu néng yòng shénme lǐyóu lái shuōfú tā ne？ And what arguments can you use to convince him? 9 (of electricity, tap water, gas, etc.) be on again 來電了。 lái diàn le. The power is on again. 來水了。 lái shuǐ le. There’s running water again. auxiliary 1 colloquial [at the end of a sentence to indicate what has happened in the past, same as 來著] 你這是何苦來？ Nǐ zhè shì hékǔlái? Why did you do that (and made yourself unhappy)? 2 [after a time expression, indicating a period of time that extends from the past up to the present] ever since 幾天來 jǐ tiān lái for the last few days 一年來 yī nián lái during the past year 3 [after a round number or after a numeral plus a measure] approximately; about; around; round 二十來個 èrshí lái ge about 20 四十來歲 sìshí lái suì round 40 (years old) 十來塊錢 shí lái kuài qián somewhere over 10 yuan 兩米來高 liǎng mǐ lái gāo about two metres high 百十來裡地 bǎishí lái lǐ dì a distance of about 100 li 4 [after the numerals 一, 二, and 三, indicating points in an explanation or argument] 我不要, 一來我不喜歡, 二來我也沒錢。 Wǒ bùyào, yī lái wǒ bù xǐhuan, èr lái wǒ yě méiqián. I don’t want it. In the first place, I don’t like it; in the second place, I don’t have the money. adjective future; coming; next 來月 láiyuè coming month noun (Lái) a surname auxiliary [as a syllable filler in folk ballads] 正月裡來是新春。 Zhēngyuè lǐ lái shì xīnchūn. The first month is the beginning of spring. 你敲鑼來我打鼓。 Nǐ qiāoluó lái wǒ dǎgǔ. You beat the gong while I play the drum.

verb 1 go; go to (a place) 我去。 Wǒ qù. I’ll go. 他已經去了。 Tā yǐjing qù le. He has already gone. 我要去南京了。 Wǒ yào qù Nánjīng le. I’m going to Nanjing. 我想去南京一趟。 Wǒ xiǎng qù Nánjīng yī tàng. I think I’ll take a trip to Nanjing. 我要去車站接人。 Wǒ yào qù chēzhàn jiē rén. I’m going to the station to meet someone. 他去了三天, 還沒回來。 Tā qù le sān tiān, hái méi huílai. He’s been away for three days, and hasn’t come back yet. 昨天已經去了三個人。 Zuótiān yǐjing qù le sān ge rén. Three people went there yesterday. 我去了好幾趟, 都沒碰到他。 Wǒ qù le hǎojǐ tàng, dōu méi pèngdào tā. I went there several times, but never saw him. 2 cause to go; send there 給她去個電話。 Gěi tā qù ge diànhuà. Give her a call. 我給他去過兩封信。 Wǒ gěi tā qù guò liǎng fēng xìn. I sent him two letters. 我們只去了個代表。 Wǒmen zhǐ qù le ge dàibiǎo. We only sent a representative. 已經去了一個電報。 Yǐjing qù le yī ge diànbào. A telegram has been sent (to him). 3 remove; get rid of 去頭屑 Qù tóu xiè get rid of dandruff 去殖民化 qù zhímínhuà decolonize 去了皮再吃。 Qù le pí zài chī. Peel it before you eat it. 汽油能去油跡。 Qìyóu néng qù yóujì. Gas is good for taking out oil stains. 裙子太長了, 去兩公分吧。 qúnzi tài cháng le, qù liǎng gōngfēn ba. The skirt is too long—shorten it by two centimetres. 這句話去幾個字就簡潔了。 Zhè jù huà qù jǐ ge zì jiù jiǎnjié le. Take out one or two words and the sentence will be more concise. 4 [before and / or after a verb] go in order to; be going to (do sth. there) 咱們去看電影。(= 咱們看電影去。= 咱們去看電影去。) Zánmen qù kàn diànyǐng. (or) zánmen kàn diànyǐng qù. (or) zánmen qù kàn diànyǐng qù. Let’s go to see a movie. 這件事我去辦吧。 Zhè jiàn shì wǒ qù bàn ba Let me (go and) arrange this. 你去打水, 我來生爐子。 Nǐ qù dǎ shuǐ, wǒ lái shēng lúzi. You get some water and I’ll light the stove. 你別管, 讓他自己去想辦法。 Nǐ bié guǎn, ràng tā zìjǐ qù xiǎng bànfǎ. Don’t bother, let him figure it out for himself. 你們去研究研究, 看該怎麼辦。 Nǐmen qù yánjiū yánjiū, kàn gāi zěnme bàn. Go and make a study of it, and see what’s the best thing to do. 5 [between two verbal expressions, and / or after the second expression] in order to (do sth. there) 用科學的觀點去觀察事物 Yòng kēxué de guāndiǎn qù guānchá shìwù look at things from a scientific point of view 他回家吃飯去了。 Tā huíjiā chī fàn qù le. He went home to eat. 她上街去買東西了。(= 她上街買東西去了。= 她上街去買東西去了。) Tā shàngjiē qù mǎi dōngxi le. (or) tā shàngjiē mǎi dōngxi qù le. (or) tā shàngjiē qù mǎi dōngxi qù le. She went to the market to do some shopping. 他提了一桶水去澆花。 Tā tí le yī tǒng shuǐ qù jiāo huā. He took a bucket of water to water the flowers. 6 literary be apart from in space or time 去今五十年 Qù jīn wǔshí nián 50 years ago 兩地相去四十裡。 Liǎng de xiāng qù sìshí lǐ. The two places are 40 li apart. 7 literary depart from; leave See 28802304去國qu4guo2去國 8 euphemistic pass away; die 老太太昨夜去了。 lǎotàitai zuóyè qù le. The old lady died last night. noun abbreviation VARIANT OF 28804096去聲qu4sheng1去聲 1 falling tone (third of the four tones in classical Chinese pronunciation) 2 falling tone (fourth of the four tones in modern standard Chinese pronunciation) adjective just gone (or elapsed) 去秋 qù qiū last autumn 去冬今春 qùdōng jīnchūn last winter and this spring adverb dialect [with 了 as an intensive complement to certain adjectives with了] very; extremely 他家遠了去了。 Tā jiā yuǎn le qù le. His home is far far away. 那片林子可大了去了。 Nà piàn línzi kě dà le qù le. That’s a really huge forest. 他到過的地方多了去了。 Tā dào guò de dìfang duō le qù le. He’s been to a great many places. verb play (a part or character) 他在京劇《鬧天宮》裡去猴王。 Tā zài Jīngjù 《Nào Tiāngōng》 lǐ qù hóuwáng. He played the Monkey King in the Beijing opera Trouble in Heaven.

noun love; affection 母愛 mǔ'ài maternal love 父愛 fù'ài paternal love 夫妻之愛 fūqī zhī ài conjugal love 狂熱的愛 kuángrè de'ài wild love; madly in love 把愛傾注在孩子身上 bǎ ài qīngzhù zài háizi shēnshang heap affection on one’s child; smother one’s child with love verb 1 love 愛和平 ài hépíng love peace; peace-loving 愛祖國 Ài zǔguó love one’s country 溺愛孩子 nì'ài háizi dote on one’s children; spoil a child 2 like; fond of; keen on 愛下棋 ài xiàqí keen on chess 愛出風頭 ài chū fēngtou fond of the limelight; like attention 酷愛 kù'ài have an excessive fondness of; dead keen on 只愛聽恭維話, 不愛聽批評話 Zhǐ ài tīng gōngweihuà, bù ài tīng pīpíng huà. fond of flattery but deaf to criticism 我不愛跟他來往。 Wǒ bù ài gēn tā láiwǎng. I don’t like having anything to do with him. 3 cherish; treasure; hold dear; take good care of 愛公物 Ài gōngwù look after public property 愛廠如家 àichǎngrújiā treat the factory like one’s family 愛集體榮譽 ài jítǐ róngyù cherish the good name of the group 4 apt to; in the habit of 愛頭疼 ài tóuténg often get headaches; prone to headaches 愛暈車 ài yùnchē get carsick 愛發脾氣 ài fā píqi irritable; short-tempered 不愛誇人 bù ài kuā rén seldom praise others 鐵愛生鏽。 Tiě ài shēngxiù. Iron rusts easily.

verb 1 hate 她恨你就因為你說了那句話。 Tā hèn nǐ jiù yīnwèi nǐ shuō le nà jù huà. She hates you for saying that. 2 regret 相見恨晚 xiāngjiànhènwǎn regret not having met earlier noun hatred See 17290752抱恨bao4hen4抱恨;34511360遺恨yi2hen4遺恨

noun rain 雨夾雪 yǔjiāxuě sleet 雨打日曬 yǔdǎrìshài exposed to rain and sunshine 躲雨 duǒyǔ take shelter from the rain 被雨淋 bèi yǔ lín be wet with rain 雨小了。 yǔ xiǎo le. The rain has subsided. 雨下得很大。 Yǔ xià de hěn dà. It’s raining hard. 明天有雨。 Míngtiān yǒu yǔ. It will rain tomorrow

noun 1 snow 雪害 xuěhài snow damage 雪上舞蹈 xuě shàng wǔdǎo dance on snow 一場大雪 yī cháng dàxuě heavy fall of snow 2 sth. resembling snow; snowy See 33781760雪白xue3bai2雪白 verb wipe away (or off, out); clean 昭雪 zhāoxuě exonerate; rehabilitate

noun 1 ice 結冰 jiébīng freeze; ice up 水凍成冰。 shuǐ dòng chéng bīng. Water freezes into ice. 2 sth. resembling ice 冰糖 bīngtáng rock candy verb 1 put on ice; freeze; chill 把那瓶啤酒冰上。 Bǎ nà píng píjiǔ bīng shàng. Chill the bottle of beer. 2 feel cold 這水冰手。 Zhè shuǐ bīng shǒu. This water is freezing cold.

noun 1 frost (the white powdery substance) 2 frostlike powder 糖霜 tángshuāng icing; frosting 3 cream 眼霜 yǎnshuāng eye cream adjective white; hoar 霜白 shuāngbái frost white 霜鬢 shuāngbìn grey (or hoary) temples
noun vegetables 布衣蔬食 bùyī-shūshí coarse clothes and simple fare

noun 1 fruit 2 result; consequence (opp. 因) 結果 jiēguǒ result; outcome adjective resolute; determined 果毅 guǒyì brave and resolute literary adverb really; as expected; sure enough 果不出所料 guǒ bù chū suǒ liào just as expected conjunction if indeed; if really 果能如此 guǒ néng rúcǐ if things really turn out that way; if that is so
verb sleep 該睡覺了。 Gāi shuìjiào le. It’s time to go to bed. or It’s time for bed. 馬上上床, 好好地睡一覺。 Mǎshàng shàng chuáng, hǎohāo de shuì yī jiào. Get straight into bed and have a good sleep.

adjective 1 comfortable 舒舒服服地過日子 shūshūfufu de guò rìzi make a comfortable living; live in ease and comfort 這把椅子又軟又舒服。 Zhè bǎ yǐzi yòu ruǎn yòu shūfu. This chair is soft and comfortable. 在這兒睡得還舒服嗎？ Zài zhèr shuì de hái shūfu ma？ Were you comfortable sleeping here? 2 feel well 她今天不大舒服。 Tā jīntiān bù dà shūfu. She isn’t well today. 我渾身不舒服。 Wǒ húnshēn bù shūfu. I feel sore all over.
noun cupboard; cabinet

noun change; variation 氣溫的變化 qìwēn de biànhuà variations (or fluctuations) of temperature 經歷重大變化 Jīnglì zhòngdà biànhuà undergo substantial changes (or huge transformations) 家鄉有了很大的變化。 jiāxiāng yǒule hěn dà debiànhuà. Great changes have taken place in my home village. verb change; vary 變化無常 biànhuà-wúcháng constantly changing; changeable; capricious 他發球變化多端。 Tā fāqiú biànhuàduōduān. He has great variety in his serves. or He has tricky serves.

measure word 1 section; segment; part 邊界東段 biānjiè dōng duàn the eastern sector of the boundary 一段時間 yī duàn shíjiān a period of time 一段鐵路 Yī duàn tiělù a section of railway 一段衣料 yī duàn yīliào a length of dress material 這段歷史 zhè duàn lìshǐ this phase of history 2 paragraph; passage 另起一段 lìng qǐ yī duàn start a new paragraph 這是鋼琴五重奏《鱒魚》裡我最喜歡的一段。 Zhè shì gāngqín wǔ zhòng zòu 《Zūnyú》 lǐ wǒ zuì xǐhuan de yī duàn. That is my favourite passage from the piano quintet, The Trout. noun 1 abbreviation VARIANT OF 59525859段位duan4wei4段位 sports level; dan (in judo, weiqi, etc.) 2 section (as an administrative level in a mine or factory) 工段 gōngduàn work section; (work)shop 3 (Duàn) a surname

verb 1 shine; light; brighten 天亮了。 Tiānliàng le. It’s light already. or Day is breaking. 屋子裡亮著燈光。 Wūzi lǐ liàng zhe dēngguāng. Lights were shining in the room. 他把手電筒亮了一下。 Tā bǎ shǒudiàntǒng liàng le yīxià. He flashed the torch on for a second. 2 make one's voice loud and clear 亮起嗓子 Liàng qǐ sǎngzi lift one’s voice 3 show; reveal 亮思想 liàng sīxiǎng lay bare one’s thoughts 亮出觀點 liàng chū guāndiǎn declare one’s position; air one’s views 你真有本事就亮幾手兒。 Nǐ zhēn yǒu běnshi jiù liàng jǐ shǒur. If you are really good at this, show us. 他把工作證亮了一下就進去了。 Tā bǎ gōngzuòzhèng liàng le yīxià jiù jìnqu le. He showed his identity card and went in. noun light 別擋亮兒。 bié dǎng liàng r. Don’t block the light. adjective 1 bright; light 敞亮的房間 Chǎng liàng de fángjiān light and spacious room 雪亮的燈泡 xuě liàng de dēngpào bright electric bulb 屋裡很亮。 Wū lǐ hěn liàng. The room is very bright. 地板擦得真亮。 Dìbǎn cā de zhēn liàng. The floor has been scrubbed clean and shiny. 2 loud and clear 她的嗓子真亮。 Tā de sǎngzi zhēn liàng. She has a resonant voice. 3 enlightened; open and clear 你這一說, 我心裡頭亮了。 Nǐ zhè yī shuō, wǒ xīnli tóu liàng le. I find what you say most enlightening.

noun 1 road; path; way 走錯路 zǒu cuò lù take the wrong road 上山的路 shàngshān de lù path up the mountain 此路不通。 Cǐlùbùtōng! Dead End. 2 journey; distance 一小時走二十裡路 Yī xiǎoshí zǒu èrshí lǐ lù cover 20 li an hour 路很遠。 Lù hěn yuǎn. It’s a long way. 路漫漫其修遠兮, 吾將上下而求索。(屈原《離騷》) lù mànmàn qí xiū yuǎn xī, wú jiāng shàng-xià ér qiú suǒ. Long, long had been my road and far, far was the journey; | I would go up and down to seek my heart’s desire. 3 way; means 和平之路 Hépíng zhī lù way to peace 我實在沒路可走了。 Wǒ shízài méi lù kě zǒu le. I’m really at a dead end. 4 sequence; line; logic 思路 sīlù train of thought 5 region; district 南路貨 nán lù huò southern products 外路人 wàilùrén nonlocal people 各路英雄 gè lù yīngxióng people from different places 6 route 三路進軍 sān lù jìnjūn advance along three routes 七路公共汽車 qī lù gōnggòng qìchē No.7 bus 7 sort; grade; class 頭路貨 tóulùhuò top class goods 這一路人 zhè yī lùrén this sort of people 二三路角色 Èr-sān lù juésè a second- or third-class role 哪一路病？ Nǎ yī lù bìng？ What kind of disease is this? 紙有好幾路。 Zhǐ yǒu hǎojǐ lù. There are several kinds of paper. 8 (Lù) a surname measure word line; row 一路縱隊 yīlù zòngduì a column of files; a single column 三路縱隊 sān lù zòngduì a column of threes
noun transliteration jacket
noun fine soft feathers; eiderdown; down

adjective sudden; abrupt; unexpected 突然死亡 Tūrán sǐwáng sudden (or unexpected) death 準備對付一切突然事變 Zhǔnbèi duìfu yīqiè tūrán shìbiàn prepare for all eventualities (or contingencies) 他病得太突然。 tā bìng de tài tūrán. His illness was very sudden. 聽到這消息我感到突然。 Tīngdào zhè xiāoxi wǒ gǎndào tūrán. The news took me by surprise. 這場冰雹突然極了。 Zhè cháng bīngbáo tūrán jíle. The hail was totally unexpected. adverb suddenly; abruptly; unexpectedly 突然哭起來 Tūrán kū qǐlai burst into tears 燈突然滅了。 Dēng tūrán miè le. Suddenly the lights went out. 突然間, 火車停住了, 許多乘客從座位上摔了下來。 Tūrán jiān, huǒchē tíng zhù le, xǔduō chéngkè cóng zuòwèi shàng shuāi le xiàlai. The train came to an abrupt stop, making many passengers fall off their seats.

verb 1 exchange; barter; trade 用石油換工業品 Yòng shíyóu huàn gōngyèpǐn exchange (or barter) oil for industrial products 用鮮血換來的教訓 yòng xiānxuè huàn lái de jiàoxun lesson paid in blood 2 change 換衣服 huàn yīfu change one’s clothes 他換工作了嗎？ Tā huàn gōngzuò le ma？ Has he changed his job? 出去走一下, 換換腦筋。 Chūqu zǒu yī xià, huàn huàn nǎojīn. Let's go for a walk and give our minds a rest. 3 exchange; convert 把美元換成人民幣 Bǎ Měiyuán huàn chéng rénmínbì convert (or change) US dollars into Renminbi 4 colloquial transplant (an organ) 換腎 huànshèn transplant a kidney 5 colloquial transfuse (blood)
noun abbreviation 1 air conditioning 2 = 25036544空氣調節器kong1qi4tiao2jie2qi4空氣調節器 air conditioner 裝空調 zhuāng kōngtiáo fix an air conditioner
noun electric fan

verb use; employ; apply 使用種種手段 shǐyòng zhǒngzhǒng shǒuduàn resort to every possible means 使用起來很方便 shǐyòng qǐlai hěn fāngbiàn easy to use (or apply, operate) 使用漢語作為民族共同語 Shǐyòng Hànyǔ zuòwéi mínzú gòngtóng yǔ use Chinese as a common national language 禁止使用化學武器 jìnzhǐ shǐyòng huàxué wǔqì ban the use of chemical weapons 善於識別人和使用人 shànyú shíbié rén hé shǐyòng rén be a good judge of men and know how to use them 新機器已經開始使用。 Xīn jīqì yǐjing kāishǐ shǐyòng. The new machine is now in operation.
adverb 1 generally; principally; mainly 2 on the whole; by and large

verb replenish; supplement; complement 補充兵員 bǔchōng bīngyuán fill up (an army unit) to full strength; replace losses 補充庫存 bǔchōng kùcún replenish the stock 補充人力 bǔchōng rénlì replenish manpower 補充收入 bǔchōng shōurù supplement one’s income 補充兩點意見 bǔchōng liǎng diǎn yìjian have two points to add 補充新鮮血液 bǔchōng xīnxiān xuèyè instil new blood 互相補充 hùxiāng bǔchōng complement each other; mutually complementary adjective additional; complementary; supplementary
noun classroom; schoolroom

noun colour of skin 不論種族, 信仰或膚色 bùlùn zhǒngzú, xìnyǎng huò fūsè without regard to race, creed, or colour 不同國度, 不同膚色的運動員歡聚一堂。 Bùtóng guódù, bùtóng fūsè de yùndòngyuán huānjùyītáng. Players from different lands and of different colours enjoyed a happy gathering.

noun part; section; share 他完成了自己的那部分工作。 tā wánchéng le zìjǐ de nà bùfen gōngzuò. He has finished his share of the work. 我們部分(地)改變了原計劃。 Wǒmen bùfen de gǎibiàn le yuán jìhuà. We’ve altered the original plan to some extent. or We’ve partially changed the original plan. 我們看問題, 不但要看到部分, 而且要看到全體。 Wǒmen kàn wèntí, bùdàn yào kàndào bùfen, érqiě yào kàndào quántǐ.
