In approaching a problem we should see the whole as well as the parts.

verb free of charge; free; gratis 免費生 miǎnfèishēng tuition-exempt student 免費搬運 miǎnfèi bānyùn free haul 免費乘車 miǎnfèi chéngchē free travel 免費搭車 miǎnfèidāchē hitch-hike 免費教育 miǎnfèi jiàoyù free (or compulsory) education 免費午餐 miǎnfèi wǔcān free lunch 免費醫療 Miǎnfèi yīliáo free (or public) medical care 免費郵遞 miǎnfèi yóudì franking 免費保養服務 miǎnfèi bǎoyǎng fúwù after(-sale) service 展覽會免費參觀。 zhǎnlǎnhuì miǎnfèi cānguān. Admission to the exhibition is free.
adjective expensive; costly (opp. 低廉) 價格昂貴 jiàgé ángguì high-priced; dear
adjective literary convenient; advantageous 便宜行事 biànyíxíngshì (authorized to) act at one’s discretion; act as one sees fit

verb 1 remain; stay 你留在原地。 Nǐ liú zài yuándì. Stay where you are. 會後你留一下。 Huì hòu nǐ liú yīxià. Will you please remain after the meeting. 他留在農村工作了。 Tā liú zài nóngcūn gōngzuò le. He stayed on in the countryside to work. 2 [usu. followed by one syllable country name] study abroad 留美 liúMěi study in the US 3 ask sb. to stay; keep sb. where he is; detain 留朋友吃飯 liú péngyou chīfàn ask a friend to stay for dinner 那我就不留你了。 Nà wǒ jiù bù liú nǐ le. In that case I won’t keep you any longer. 4 pay attention to; concentrate on sth. 留個心眼兒 liú gè xīnyǎnr think twice 5 reserve; keep; save 留座位 Liú zuòwèi reserve a seat 留作紀念 liúzuò jìniàn keep sth. as a souvenir 把錢留起來, 以後用 Bǎ qián liú qǐlai, yǐhòu yòng. save the money for later use 把手稿留檔 bǎ shǒugǎo liú dàng keep the manuscript on file 留著這個有什麼用？ Liú zhe zhège yǒu shénme yòng？ What’s the use of keeping this? 他可留不住錢。 tā kě liú bùzhù qián. The money is burning a hole in his pocket. 6 (let) grow; wear 留鬍子 liú húzi grow a beard (or moustache) 留短頭髮 liú duǎn tóufa wear one’s hair short; have short (or bobbed) hair 留小辮兒 liú xiǎobiànr wear (one’s hair in) plaits (or braids) 7 accept (sth. given); take 誰的禮物我都沒留。 Shuí de lǐwù wǒ dōu méi liú. I didn’t accept (or take) any gift. 8 leave (behind) 給她留個條 Gěi tā liú ge tiáo. leave her a note 把傘留在車上 bǎ sǎn liú zài chē shàng leave the umbrella in the car 給我留個地兒 gěi wǒ liú ge dìr make room for me 請他留個電話 qǐng tā liú ge diànhuà ask him to leave his phone number 給我留下了深刻的印象 gěi wǒ liú xià le shēnkè de yìnxiàng make a deep impression on me 別把孩子單獨留在家裡。 bié bǎ háizi dāndú liú zài jiālǐ. Don’t leave the child at home alone. 他死後留下三個孩子。 Tā sǐ hòu liú xià sān ge háizi. He died and left three children. 祖先留給了我們豐富的文化遺產。 Zǔxiān liúgěi le wǒmen fēngfù de wénhuà yíchǎn. Our forefathers have left us a rich cultural heritage. noun (Liú) a surname

adjective interesting; fascinating; amusing 有趣的故事 Yǒuqù de gùshi interesting story 有趣的笑話 yǒuqù de xiàohua rich joke 有趣的遊戲 yǒuqù de yóuxì fascinating (or amusing) game 聽起來挺有趣 tīng qǐlai tǐng yǒuqù sound interesting 我想那一定很有趣。 wǒ xiǎng nà yīdìng hěn yǒuqù. I think it’ll be enormous fun.

verb (-//-) make great efforts; try hard; exert oneself 努力工作 Nǔlì gōngzuò work hard 努力發展生產 nǔlì fāzhǎn shēngchǎn actively expand production 再努一把力 zài nǔ yī bǎ lì strive again 盡最大努力 jìn zuì dà nǔlì do one’s utmost; do the best one can 為實現科技現代化而努力奮鬥 wèi shíxiàn kējì xiàndàihuà ér nǔlì fèndòu strive for the modernization of science and technology 學好一門外語要作出極大的努力。 Xué hǎo yī mén wàiyǔ yào zuò chū jí dà de nǔlì. It takes great effort to master a foreign language. adjective strenuous; arduous 學習很努力 xuéxí hěn nǔlì study hard

verb 1 surmount; overcome; conquer 克服困難 kèfú kùnnan surmount a difficulty 克服缺點 kèfú quēdiǎn overcome one’s shortcomings 克服片面性 kèfú piànmiànxìng eliminate one-sidedness 克服官僚主義 kèfú guānliáozhǔyì get rid of bureaucracy 2 colloquial put up with (hardships, inconveniences, etc.) 這兒生活條件不太好, 咱們先克服點兒吧。 zhèr shēnghuó tiáojiàn bùtài hǎo, zánmen xiān kèfú diǎnr ba. The living conditions here are not very good, but let’s put up with them for a while.

verb 1 solve; resolve; settle 解決困難 jiějué kùnnan overcome a difficulty; find a way out of a difficulty 解決問題 jiějué wèntí solve a problem; settle a question (or an issue); work out a solution 解決爭端 jiějué zhēngduān settle a dispute 迅速解決戰鬥 Xùnsù jiějué zhàndòu quick decisive battle 不同的矛盾, 只有用不同的方法才能解決。 bùtóng de máodùn, zhǐyǒu yòng bùtóng de fāngfǎ cáinéng jiějué. Different problems can only be resolved by using different methods. 2 dispose of; finish off 把剩菜解決了 bǎ shèngcài jiějué le finish off leftovers 這一仗把敵人全部解決了。 zhè yī zhàng bǎ dírén quánbù jiějué le. That battle finished off all the enemy troops.
cut up vegetables

adjective 1 positive 積極財政政策 jījí cáizhèng zhèngcè proactive fiscal policy 做出積極貢獻 zuòchū jījí gòngxiàn make positive contributions 2 active; energetic; vigorous 積極思考 jījí sīkǎo active thinking 積極向上 jījí xiàngshàng set high goals for oneself 積極進取的精神 jījí jìnqǔ de jīngshén pioneering spirit 採取積極措施 Cǎiqǔ jījí cuòshī adopt vigorous measures 他工作積極, 受到獎勵。 tā gōngzuò jījí, shòudào jiǎnglì. He was given an award for being a hard worker. 他鍛煉身體一向很積極。 Tā duànliàn shēntǐ yīxiàng hěn jījí. He has always been very keen on doing physical exercises.

adjective 1 negative 消極現象 xiāojí xiànxiàng undesirable phenomenon 消極言論 xiāojí yánlùn negative statement 消極因素 xiāojí yīnsù negative factor 消極影響 xiāojí yǐngxiǎng negative influence 2 passive; inactive 消極怠工 xiāojídàigōng be slack in work 消極抵抗 xiāojí dǐkàng passive resistance 消極防禦 xiāojífángyù passive defence 情緒消極 qíngxù xiāojí dispirited; dejected 態度消極 tàidu xiāojí take a passive attitude; remain inactive
noun politics; political affairs 政治上可靠 zhèngzhì shàng kěkào politically reliable 政治歷史清白(清楚) Zhèngzhì lìshǐ qīngbái (qīngchu) have a clean (clear) political record

noun 1 economy 經濟繁榮 Jīngjì fánróng. economic boom 經濟範疇 jīngjì fànchóu economic category 經濟復蘇 jīngjì fùsū economic resurgence; economic recovery 經濟過熱 Jīngjì guò rè overheated economy 經濟滑坡 jīngjì huápō economic downturn 經濟平衡 jīngjì pínghéng economic equilibrium 經濟起飛 jīngjì qǐfēi economic take-off 經濟滲透 jīngjì shèntòu economic infiltration 經濟失調 jīngjì shītiáo dislocation of the economy; economic dislocation 經濟衰退 jīngjì shuāituì economic recession 經濟蕭條 Jīngjì xiāotiáo economic depression (or slump) 經濟滯脹 jīngjì zhìzhàng stagflation 經濟結構調整 jīngjì jiégòu tiáozhěng economic restructuring 經濟的持續高速發展 jīngjì de chíxù gāosù fāzhǎn sustained and rapid economic development 混合經濟 hùnhé jīngjì mixed economy 發展民族經濟 fāzhǎn mínzú jīngjì develop the national economy 2 financial condition; income 經濟拮據 jīngjì jiéjū be hard up; short of money 經濟寬裕 jīngjì kuānyù well-off; well-to-do verb literary govern the country adjective 1 economical; thrifty 經濟實惠 jīngjì shíhuì economical and practical 經濟地使用 jīngjì de shǐyòng use economically 不經濟 bù jīngjì costing too much; uneconomical 2 of industrial or economic value; economic

noun 1 civilization; culture 文化下鄉 wénhuà xiàxiāng (of urban people or institutions) popularize culture and knowledge in the countryside 茶文化 cháwénhuà tea culture 中國文化 Zhōngguó wénhuà Chinese civilization (or culture) 2 education; culture; schooling; literacy 學文化 xué wénhuà acquire an elementary education; learn to read and write 3 education; schooling; literacy
noun law; statute 法律面前人人平等。 Fǎlǜ miànqián rénrén píngděng. All are equal before the law.
noun religion 信仰宗教 xìnyǎng zōngjiào believe in religion
noun 1 starting point 把成績作為繼續前進的新起點 bǎ chéngjì zuòwéi jìxù qiánjìn de xīn qǐdiǎn take achievements as starting points for further progress 2 starting point (for a race)
noun 1 terminal point; destination 旅行的終點 Lǚxíng de zhōngdiǎn destination of a journey 2 sports finish
noun pleasure trip on foot; hike; excursion; walking tour verb go for an outing

noun foundation 人民是國家的基本。 Rénmín shì guójiā de jīběn. The people are the foundation of a nation. adjective main; essential; basic; fundamental; elementary 具備生產的基本條件 Jùbèi shēngchǎn dejīběn tiáojiàn have the basic conditions necessary for production 他們之間存在著基本分歧。 Tāmen zhījiān cúnzài zhe jīběn fēnqí. Fundamental differences exist between them. adverb basically; in the main; on the whole; by and large 情況基本屬實。 Qíngkuàng jīběn shǔshí. It has been found to be basically true. 那項工程已基本完工。 Nà xiàng gōngchéng yǐ jīběn wángōng. The project has been basically completed.

noun metaphor; analogy; figure of speech 比喻義 bǐyùyì metaphorical meaning 牽強附會的比喻 Qiānqiǎngfùhuì debǐyù far-fetched comparison; awkward metaphor 這只是一個比喻的說法。 Zhè zhǐ shì yī ge bǐyù de shuōfa. This is just a figure of speech. verb draw an analogy 人們常用青松來比喻堅貞不屈的革命者。 Rénmen cháng yòng qīngsōng lái bǐyù jiānzhēnbùqū de gémìngzhě. Steadfast revolutionaries are often likened to pine trees.

noun vigour; vitality; drive 精神飽滿 jīngshenbǎomǎn full of vigour (or vitality); energetic 沒有精神 méiyǒu jīngshen listless; languid 振作精神 zhènzuò jīngshen bestir oneself; summon up one’s energy; get moving adjective lively; spirited; vigorous; smart 那孩子大大的眼睛, 怪精神的。 Nà háizi dàdà de yǎnjing, guài jīngshen de. That child’s big eyes are full of life. 他穿上西裝顯得格外精神。 tā chuānshang xīzhuāng xiǎnde géwài jīngshen. The suit made him look especially smart. 這孩子長得多精神！ Zhè háizi zhǎng de duō jīngshen! What a lovely child!

verb run into; encounter; come across 遇到挫折 yùdào cuòzhé meet with setbacks 遇到埋伏 yùdào máifú run into an ambush 遇到意外 yùdào yìwài have an accident 遇到倒霉事 yùdào dǎoméi shì fall on evil days 遇到意外的問題 yùdào yìwài de wèntí come across unforeseen problems 在路上遇到一個老同學 zài lùshang yùdào yī ge lǎo tóngxué run into an old schoolmate on the way

adjective subjective (opp. 客觀) 主觀努力 zhǔguān nǔlì subjective efforts; one’s own efforts 主觀臆斷 zhǔguān yìduàn subjective and groundless conclusion 主觀願望 zhǔguān yuànwàng subjective desire; wishful thinking 主觀地對待問題 zhǔguān de duìdài wèntí a subjective approach to problems 這些看法太主觀了。 Zhèxiē kànfǎ tài zhǔguān le. These are utterly prejudiced views.

adjective 1 objective 客觀存在 kèguān cúnzài objective reality (or fact, existence) 客觀事物 kèguān shìwù objective things (or reality); objectively existing things 客觀條件 kèguān tiáojiàn objective conditions 客觀形勢 kèguān xíngshì objective situation 2 objective; not biased 客觀地講 Kèguān de jiǎng objectively speaking; objectively
down-padded anorak
1 operating desk 2 control panel 3 console
shouder-length hair
hot spicy soup (often sold at street stalls)
noun physics
noun Renminbi (RMB, Chinese monetary unit) 對人民幣重新估值 Duì rénmínbì chóngxīn gū zhí revaluation of the Renminbi
a period of time
well-known phrase If you fail to reach the Great Wall you are not a man.—One should not give up untill one suceed.

noun 1 physics pressure (force) 大氣壓力 dàqì yālì atmospheric (or barometric) pressure 2 overwhelming force; pressure 外界壓力 wàijiè yālì outside pressure 對某人施加壓力 duì mǒurén shījiā yālì bring pressure to bear on sb. 在輿論的壓力下 zài yúlùn de yālì xià under the pressure of public opinion 3 burden; strain 運輸壓力 yùnshū yālì strain on transportation
verb regard as; treat as; take for 我把蠟像當成真人了。 Wǒ bǎ làxiàng dàngchéng zhēnrén le. I took the wax figure as a real person.

noun 1 once 一次結清 yīcì jiéqīng lump-sum settlement 一次消費 yīcì xiāofèi one-time consumption 一次付清或分期繳納 yīcì fùqīng huò fēnqī jiǎonà to be paid in a lump sum or in installments 我只跟他見過一次面。 Wǒ zhǐ gēn tā jiàn guò yī cì miàn. I’ve met him only once. 2 mathematics linear 3 primary 一次檢索 yīcì jiǎnsuǒ primary access 一次燃燒 yīcì ránshāo primary combustion
verb imitate; simulate; analog 經過電子技術處理模擬立體聲 jīngguò diànzǐ jìshù chǔlǐ mónǐ lìtǐshēng (of a record, etc.) be electronically reprocessed to simulate stereo sound
verb contest; competition; emulation; race 勞動競賽 láodòng jìngsài labour emulation drive 體育競賽 tǐyù jìngsài athletic contest; sports competition
noun 1 opponent; adversary 2 match; equal 他不是你的對手。 Tā bù shì nǐ de duìshǒu. He’s no match for you.

adverb mutually; each other 互相掣肘 hùxiāng chèzhǒu hold each other back 互相勾結 hùxiāng gōujié work in collusion 互相利用 hùxiāng lìyòng each using the other for his own ends 互相排斥 hùxiāng páichì be mutually exclusive 互相配合 hùxiāng pèihé work in coordination 互相依存 hùxiāng yīcún depend on each other for existence; be interdependent

noun help; assistance; aid 外界幫助 wàijiè bāngzhù outside help 謝謝你的幫助。 Xièxie nǐ de bāngzhù. Thank you for your help (or assistance). 這本手冊沒有多大幫助。 Zhè běn shǒucè méiyǒu duō dà bāngzhù. This handbook isn’t of much help. verb help; assist; aid 幫助消化 Bāngzhù xiāohuà aid digestion 幫助某人渡過難關 bāngzhù mǒurén dùguò nánguān help sb. through difficulties; help a lame dog over a stile 樂於幫助他人 lèyú bāngzhù tārén willing to help others 他幫助我學外語。 tā bāngzhù wǒ xué wàiyǔ. He helped me learn a foreign language. 我每個月幫助他一百塊錢。 Wǒ měi ge yuè bāngzhù tā yībǎi kuài qián. I help him out with 100 yuan each month.
noun enemy; foe
idiom divide and rule

verb change into; turn into; become; transform into 把理想變成現實 bǎ lǐxiǎng biànchéng xiànshí turn ideals into reality 蝌蚪會變成青蛙。 Kēdǒu huì biànchéng qīngwā. A tadpole transforms into a frog. 水在零攝氏度變成冰。 shuǐ zài líng Shèshì dù biànchéng bīng. Water turns to ice at 0ºC. 在一定的條件下, 壞事能夠變成好事。 Zài yīdìng de tiáojiàn xià, huàishì nénggòu biànchéng hǎoshì. Under certain conditions, bad things can turn into good.

verb gain; acquire; obtain 取得勝利 Qǔdé shènglì gain (or win) a victory 取得群眾支持 qǔdé qúnzhòng zhīchí enlist popular support 取得圓滿成功 qǔdé yuánmǎn chénggōng be crowned with success; achieve complete success 取得相當大的進展 qǔdé xiāngdāng dà de jìnzhǎn make considerable headway 取得有關方面同意 qǔdé yǒuguān fāngmiàn tóngyì obtain the consent of those concerned 取得完全一致的意見 qǔdé wánquán yīzhì de yìjian reach complete identity of views; reach a complete agreement of views 通過實踐取得經驗 tōngguò shíjiàn qǔdé jīngyàn gain experience through practice

noun match; competition 射擊比賽 shèjī bǐsài shooting contest 象棋比賽 xiàngqí bǐsài chess tournament 選美比賽 xuǎnměibǐsài beauty contest 足球比賽 zúqiú bǐsài football match 自行車比賽 zìxíngchē bǐsài bicycle race 力量懸殊的比賽 Lìliang xuánshū debǐsài uneven match; one-sided match 勢均力敵的比賽 shìjūnlìdí debǐsài tight match; close match verb contend; compete 比賽划船 bǐsài huáchuán rowing match 比賽射擊 bǐsài shèjī compete in a shooting match
verb 1 run; march at the double 跑步走！ Pǎobù zǒu! [word of command] At the double, quick march! 跑步前進！ Pǎobù qiánjìn! [word of command] Double time! 2 (a form of physical exercise) jog

conjunction [often correlatively with 但是, 可是,etc.] though; although 他雖然在北京住了十來年, 可家鄉口音一點兒沒改。 Tā suīrán zài Běijīng zhù le shí láinián, kě jiāxiāng kǒuyin yīdiǎnr méi gǎi. Though he has lived in Beijing for ten years or so, he still speaks with a heavy accent.

adjective 1 fixed; specified; definite; regular 勘探隊員成天在野外作業, 沒有一定的住處。 Kāntàn duìyuán chéngtiān zài yěwài zuòyè, méiyǒu yīdìng de zhùchù. The prospectors are always out in the field and never settle down in a fixed place. 她一忙起來, 吃飯睡覺都沒有一定的時間了。 Tā yī máng qǐlai, chīfàn shuìjiào dōu méiyǒu yīdìng de shíjiān le. When she gets really busy, she doesn’t keep regular hours for eating or sleeping. 2 given; particular; certain 在一定程度上 zài yīdìng chéngdu shàng to a certain degree 在一定條件下 zài yīdìng tiáojiàn xià under given conditions 在一定意義上 Zài yīdìng yìyì shàng in a certain sense 3 proper; fair; due 達到一定水平 dádào yīdìng shuǐpíng reach a fairly high level 給以一定的重視 gěiyǐ yīdìng de zhòngshì attach due importance to 作出了一定的貢獻 zuò chū le yīdìng de gòngxiàn have made some contributions 具有一定規模的工廠 jùyǒu yīdìng guīmó de gōngchǎng fair-sized factory 4 necessarily; surely 兩者沒有一定的聯繫。 liǎngzhě méiyǒu yīdìng de liánxì. The two are not necessarily associated with each other. adverb certainly; surely; necessarily 星期天一定來啊。 Xīngqītiān yīdìng lái a. Be sure to come on Sunday. 告訴他一定不能說出去。 Gàosu tā yīdìng bù néng shuō chūqu. Tell him that under no circumstances is he to let it out. 我們的目的一定要達到。我們的目的一定能夠達到。 Wǒmen de mùdì yīdìng yào dádào. Wǒmen de mùdì yīdìng nénggòu dádào. Our goal must be attained. Our goal can unquestionably be attained. 他一定是被什麼要緊事拖住了。 Tā yīdìng shì bèi shénme yàojǐn shì tuōzhù le. He must have been held up by some urgent business. 可以口頭彙報, 不一定要寫成書面材料。 Kěyǐ kǒutóu huìbào, bù yīdìng yào xiě chéng shūmiàn cáiliào. An oral report will do; it isn’t necessary to put it in writing.

verb 1 run 跑上前去迎接客人 Pǎo shàng qián qù yíngjiē kèren hasten forward to meet the guests 每天早晨練慢跑 měitiān zǎochen liàn màn pǎo jog every morning 火車在飛跑。 Huǒchē zài fēipǎo. The train is racing along. 2 run a race 跑百米 Pǎo bǎi mǐ run (or take part in) the 100-metre dash 跑第二 pǎo dì-èr run second 3 run away; escape; flee 別讓壞蛋跑了。 Bié ràng huàidàn pǎo le. Don’t let the scoundrel escape! 4 dialect walk; stroll 我們跑了五裡路。 Wǒmen pǎo le wǔ lǐ lù. We walked five li. 他們通常吃過晚飯出去跑跑路。 Tāmen tōngcháng chī guò wǎnfàn chū qù pǎo pǎo lù. They usually go for a stroll after supper. 5 rush about; run errands; make the rounds 跑材料 pǎo cáiliào go about collecting materials 我跑了好幾家商店, 才找到那種扳手。 Wǒ pǎo le hǎojǐ jiā shāngdiàn, cái zhǎodào nà zhǒng bānshǒu. I made the rounds of several shops to get that wrench. 6 (of a liquid or gas) leak; evaporate 管子跑水了。 Guǎnzipǎo shuǐ le. The pipe leaks! 車胎跑氣了。 Chētāi pǎo qì le. The tyre is flat. 汽油跑了半瓶。 Qìyóu pǎo le bàn píng. Half the bottle of gasoline has evaporated. 7 [as complement to a verb] away; off 一槍把鳥兒都嚇跑了。 Yī qiāng bǎ niǎor dōu xià pǎo le. The shot scared away the birds. 桌上的紙叫風給颳跑了。 Zhuō shàng de zhǐ jiào fēng gěi guā pǎo le. The paper blew off the table.
adjective complex; multiple; all-round

noun vocational work; professional work; business 鑽研業務 zuānyán yèwù diligently study one’s profession 恢復正常業務 huīfù zhèngcháng yèwù resume normal business 辦理信托投資業務 bànlǐ xìntuō tóuzī yèwù handle trust and investment business

verb 1 open 開鎖 kāisuǒ open a lock; unlock 門開了。 Mén kāi le. The door opened. 2 make an opening; open up 牆上開了個窗口。 Qiáng shàng kāi le ge chuāngkǒu. A window was made in the wall. 3 openout; come loose 4 produce flowers; bloom 花都開了。 Huā dōu kāi le. The flowers are all blooming. 扣兒開了。 Kòur kāi le. The knot has come untied. 兩塊木板沒粘好, 又開了。 Liǎng kuài mùbǎn méi zhān hǎo, yòu kāi le. The two pieces of wood were not glued together properly. They have come loose again. 5 (of a frozen river) thaw out 河開了。 hé kāi le. The river thawed (or is open). 6 lift (a ban, restriction, etc.) See 24802048開禁kai1jin4開禁 7 start; operate (a machine, car, ship, plane, etc.) 8 turn on (a light, radio, TV, etc.); switch on 開燈 kāidēng turn on a light 開飛機 kāi fēijī fly (or pilot) an airplane 開機器 Kāi jīqì operate (or run) a machine 開汽車 kāi qìchē drive a car 把汽船開到對岸去。 Bǎ qìchuán kāi dào duì'àn qù. Steer the motorboat over to the opposite bank. 9 (of a train, bus, ship, etc.) leave; start 火車幾點開？ Huǒchē jǐ diǎn kāi？ What time does the train leave? 10 (of troops) set out; move 昨天開來了兩團人, 今天又開走了。 Zuótiān kāi lái le liǎng tuán rén, jīntiān yòu kāi zǒu le. Two regiments came yesterday and set off today. 11 start or run (a factory, school, store, etc.); set up; open 開茶館 kāi cháguǎn run a teahouse 開工廠 Kāi gōngchǎng set up a factory 百貨店就開在十字路口。 Bǎihuòdiàn jiù kāi zài shízì lùkǒu. The department store is located at the intersection. 12 (of an institute, organization, etc.) open to the public See 64455907開館kai1guan3開館 / 13 (of film shooting, auction, etc.) begin; start See 24814080開拍kai1pai1開拍 / 14 hold (a meeting, exhibition, etc.) 開運動會 Kāi yùndònghuì hold a sports meet 舞會開了一夜。 Wǔhuì kāi le yī yè. The dance lasted all night. 15 make a list of; write out; prescribe 開支票 kāi zhīpiào write out a cheque 開介紹信 kāi jièshàoxìn write a letter of introduction 開信用證 kāi xìnyòngzhèng issue a credit 醫生給我開了些藥片。 Yīshēng gěi wǒ kāi le xiē yàopiàn. The doctor prescribed some pills for me. 16 pay (wages, fares, etc.) 開工資 kāi gōngzī pay wages 17 dialect fire (an employee); fire out; give sb. the sack; kick out 這個公司剛剛開了幾個人。 zhège gōngsī gānggāng kāi le jǐ gèrén. The company has just fired several of its employees. 18 boil 水開了。 Shuǐ kāi le. The water is boiling. 19 colloquial eat up 他把包子都開了。 Tā bǎ bāozi dōu kāi le. He ate up all the stuffed buns. adjective open 開循環 kāi xúnhuán open cycle measure word 1 [expressing a ratio between two things considered as parts of a whole which is 10] 二八開 Èrbā kāi 2:8 大家認為他的功過是三七開。 Dàjiā rènwéi tā de gōng-guò shì sānqī kāi. The general assessment of his work is 70% achievements and 30% mistakes. 2 printing division of standard size printing paper 對開 duìkāi folio 四開 sìkāi quarto measure word 1 transliteration carat (ct) 十四開金 14- Shísì kāi jīn carat gold 2 abbreviation VARIANT OF 64450787開爾文kai1er3wen2開爾文 physics degree Kelvin; kelvin (K)

noun 1 mountain pass; guarded passage 玉門關 Yù mén guān the Yumen Pass 2 custom(s) house 入關 rùguān go through customs 3 area just outside a city gate 城關 chéngguān suburban area 4 barrier; critical juncture 只要突破這一關, 接下來就好辦了。 Zhǐyào tūpò zhè yī guān, jiē xiàlai jiù hǎobàn le. Once we have got over this, it will be plain sailing. 5 key part; crucial part; key factor See 21970688關鍵guan1jian4關鍵 6 connection 這事與我無關。 Zhè shì yǔ wǒ wú guān. This has nothing to do with me. 7 (Guān) a surname verb 1 shut; close 把門關上。 Bǎmén guānshang. Shut the door. 2 turn off 關電燈 guān diàndēng turn off the light 關收音機 Guān shōuyīnjī turn (or switch) off the radio 3 shut in; lock up; confine 關進監獄 Guān jìn jiānyù lock up (in prison); put behind bars 別把孩子們整天關在屋裡。 Bié bǎ háizi men zhěngtiān guān zài wū lǐ. Don’t keep the children inside all day. 4 (of a business) close down 鎮上關了好幾家店鋪。 Zhèn shàng guān le hǎojǐ jiā diànpù. Quite a few shops in the town closed down. 5 concern; involve 這不關他的事。 Zhè bù guān tā de shì. That doesn’t concern him. 6 dated give out (or draw) (pay) 關餉 guānxiǎng (of soldiers, policemen, etc.) get paid

noun 1 vehicle 騎車 qíchē ride a bike 車已經開了。 Chē yǐjing kāi le. The car (or bus, etc.) has already left. 2 wheeled instrument 紡車 fǎngchē spinning wheel 3 machine 這臺車停了。 Zhè tái chē tíng le. This machine has stopped. 4 (Chē) a surname verb 1 lathe; turn 車光 chē guāng smooth sth. on a lathe 車機器零件 Chē jīqì língjiàn lathe a machine part 2 lift water by waterwheel 把河水車到稻田里 bǎ héshuǐ chē dào dàotián lǐ lift some water from the river into the paddy fields
verb dialect come to nothing; fall through

adjective 1 handsome; good-looking; pretty; beautiful 漂亮的色彩 piàoliang de sècǎi beautiful colours 漂亮的小姑娘 piàoliang de xiǎogūniang pretty little girl 漂亮的小伙子 piàoliang de xiǎohuǒzi handsome young man 打扮得漂漂亮亮的 dǎban de piàopiàoliangliang de be smartly dressed 2 remarkable; brilliant; splendid; beautiful 打一個漂亮仗 dǎ yī ge piàoliang zhàng fight a fine battle; win a brilliant victory 普通話說得很漂亮 pǔtōng huà shuō de hěn piàoliang speak beautiful standard Chinese 守門員這個球救得真漂亮。 Shǒuményuán zhège qiú jiù de zhēn piàoliang. The goalie made a beautiful save. 3 high-sounding (but will not come true) 光說得漂亮有什麼用？ Guāng shuōdepiàoliang yǒu shénme yòng? What’s the point of simply paying lip service? or High-sounding words are no use.
noun clothing; clothes 衣服裡子 yīfu lǐzi lining 外邊冷, 多穿些衣服。 Wàibian lěng, duō chuān xiē yīfu. It’s cold outside. Put on more clothes.

verb 1 sell (opp. 買) 賣不出去 mài bu chūqu do not sell; can’t sell 賣文為生 màiwénwéishēng write for a living 大伏天西瓜賣得快。 Dà fútiān xīguā mài de kuài. Watermelons sell fast during the dog days. 2 colloquial betray (one's country or friends) 這件事我只跟你說, 你可別把我給賣了。 Zhè jiàn shì wǒ zhǐ gēn nǐ shuō, nǐ kě bié bǎ wǒ gěi mài le. I’m telling this only to you. Don’t give me away. 3 exert to the utmost; not spare See 26490880賣勁兒mai4jin4r0賣勁兒 4 show off See 26492416賣弄mai4nong5賣弄 measure word one dish 一賣炒腰花 Yī mài chǎo yāohuā a dish of stir-fried pork kidneys noun (Mài) a surname

verb 1 can; may 這間屋子可以住四個人。 Zhè jiān wūzi kěyǐ zhù sì ge rén. This room can accommodate four people. 2 be worth (doing) 這個展覽我覺得可以一看。 zhège zhǎnlǎn wǒ juédekěyǐ yī kàn. I think the exhibition is worth a visit. 3 [indicating permission] can; may 你可以走了。 Nǐ kěyǐ zǒu le. You may go. 這裡不可以吸煙。 Zhèlǐ bù kěyǐ xīyān. Smoking is not allowed here. or You can’t smoke here. adjective colloquial 1 passable; not bad 這篇文章寫得還可以。 Zhè piān wénzhāng xiě de hái kěyǐ. This article is pretty good. 2 terrible; awful 你這張嘴真可以啊！ Nǐ zhè zhāngzuǐ zhēn kěyǐ a! What a sharp tongue you’ve got! 他今天忙得真可以。 Tā jīntiān máng de zhēn kěyǐ. He’s awfully busy today.
noun archaic 1 a kind of sagebrush 2 VARIANT OF 27966720萍ping2萍 botany duckweed

noun writings; work 新作 xīnzuò a new work 成功之作 chénggōng zhī zuò a successful work verb 1 rise; grow 槍聲大作。 Qiāngshēng dàzuò. Heavy firing broke out. 2 write; compose 作畫 zuòhuà paint a picture 作詩 zuòshī compose a poem 作書一封 zuò shū yī fēng write a letter 3 pretend; affect 故作怒容 gù zuò nùróng pretend to be angry 4 regard as; take sb. or sth. for 看作 kànzuò look upon as; regard as See 37143552作廢zuo4fei4作廢 5 feel; have See 37151488作嘔zuo4ou3作嘔 6 engage in an activity See 37150976作孽zuo4nie4作孽

noun 1 fruit 2 result; consequence (opp. 因) 結果 jiēguǒ result; outcome adjective resolute; determined 果毅 guǒyì brave and resolute literary adverb really; as expected; sure enough 果不出所料 guǒ bù chū suǒ liào just as expected conjunction if indeed; if really 果能如此 guǒ néng rúcǐ if things really turn out that way; if that is so
verb concentrate (one's affections, etc.) See 36424192鍾情zhong1qing2鍾情 noun (Zhōng) a surname noun VARIANT OF 36420096盅zhong1盅

adjective whole; complete; total; all 全部開支 Quánbù kāizhī total expenditure 糧食全部自給 liángshi quánbù zìjǐ be completely self-supporting in food grain 要求賠償全部損失 yāoqiú péicháng quánbù sǔnshī demand full compensation for the loss incurred 全部情況就這樣。 Quánbù qíngkuàng jiù zhèyàng. That’s all there is to it. 他們全部是學生。 Tāmen quánbù shì xuésheng. All of them are students.
verb test; examine; check up 質量檢測 zhìliàng jiǎncè quality control
verb do all one can; try one's best 我們一定盡力支援。 Wǒmen yīdìng jìnlì zhīyuán. We’ll do our best to help.

verb 1 open a business; begin doing business; debut 新購物中心開張了。 xīn gòuwù zhōngxīn kāizhāng le. The new mall has opened for business. 書店推遲了開張日期。 Shūdiàn tuīchí le kāizhāng rìqī. The book store put off its debut. 2 conduct the first transaction of a day's business 3 (of certain activities) begin; start verb literary 1 be open (to the outside world) 2 be grand and wide 氣勢開張 Qìshì kāizhāng be grand and imposing
noun police; policeman 女警察 nǚ jǐngchá policewoman

verb install; fix; mount; set up 安裝電話 Ānzhuāng diànhuà install a telephone 安裝和拆卸機器 ānzhuāng hé chāixiè jīqì assemble and disassemble machines 安裝自來水管 ānzhuāng zìláishuǐ guǎn lay water pipes 在屋頂上安裝電視天線 zài wūdǐng shàng ānzhuāng diànshì tiānxiàn erect a television antenna on the roof

verb 1 make things convenient for sb. 方便群眾 fāngbiàn qúnzhòng make things convenient for the people 2 euphemistic have money to spare or lend 手頭不方便 shǒutóu bù fāngbiàn have little money to spare 3 euphemistic go to the lavatory 你要不要方便一下？ Nǐ yào bù yào fāngbiàn yīxià？ Do you want to use the lavatory (or wash your hands)? 稍候, 我去方便方便。 Shāohòu, wǒ qù fāngbiàn fāngbiàn. Wait a few minutes. I’m just going to wash my hands. noun convenience; favour 把困難留給自己, 把方便讓給別人 Bǎ kùnnan liúgěi zìjǐ, bǎ fāngbiàn ràng gěi biéren take difficulties on oneself and make things easy for others 請您行個方便吧。 qǐng nín xíng ge fāngbiàn ba. Do me a favour, will you?
noun preparatory school (or department) (opp. 本科) 上預科 shàng yùkē go to prep school
noun Asia
noun Europe
noun American continent 南, 北美洲 Nán, běi Měizhōu North and South America
noun Oceania; Oceanica
noun 1 the North Pole; the Arctic Pole 2 the north magnetic pole
noun 1 the South Pole; the Antarctic 2 the south magnetic pole
extremely good

verb gain; acquire; obtain 取得勝利 Qǔdé shènglì gain (or win) a victory 取得群眾支持 qǔdé qúnzhòng zhīchí enlist popular support 取得圓滿成功 qǔdé yuánmǎn chénggōng be crowned with success; achieve complete success 取得相當大的進展 qǔdé xiāngdāng dà de jìnzhǎn make considerable headway 取得有關方面同意 qǔdé yǒuguān fāngmiàn tóngyì obtain the consent of those concerned 取得完全一致的意見 qǔdé wánquán yīzhì de yìjian reach complete identity of views; reach a complete agreement of views 通過實踐取得經驗 tōngguò shíjiàn qǔdé jīngyàn gain experience through practice
adjective ordinary; common; general; average 這是兩所普通的房子。 Zhè shì liǎng suǒ pǔtōng de fángzi. These are just two ordinary houses.

adjective sudden; abrupt; unexpected 突然死亡 Tūrán sǐwáng sudden (or unexpected) death 準備對付一切突然事變 Zhǔnbèi duìfu yīqiè tūrán shìbiàn prepare for all eventualities (or contingencies) 他病得太突然。 tā bìng de tài tūrán. His illness was very sudden. 聽到這消息我感到突然。 Tīngdào zhè xiāoxi wǒ gǎndào tūrán. The news took me by surprise. 這場冰雹突然極了。 Zhè cháng bīngbáo tūrán jíle. The hail was totally unexpected. adverb suddenly; abruptly; unexpectedly 突然哭起來 Tūrán kū qǐlai burst into tears 燈突然滅了。 Dēng tūrán miè le. Suddenly the lights went out. 突然間, 火車停住了, 許多乘客從座位上摔了下來。 Tūrán jiān, huǒchē tíng zhù le, xǔduō chéngkè cóng zuòwèi shàng shuāi le xiàlai. The train came to an abrupt stop, making many passengers fall off their seats.
verb imitate; simulate; analog 經過電子技術處理模擬立體聲 jīngguò diànzǐ jìshù chǔlǐ mónǐ lìtǐshēng (of a record, etc.) be electronically reprocessed to simulate stereo sound

adjective big and powerful; powerful; formidable (opp. 弱小) 強大的人民解放軍 qiángdà de rénmín jiěfàngjūn the powerful People’s Liberation Army 陣容強大的代表團 zhènróng qiángdà de dàibiǎotuán strong (or big high-ranking) delegation 這種植物具有強大的生命力。 Zhèzhǒng zhíwù jùyǒu qiángdà de shēngmìnglì. This kind of plant has great vitality.

noun 1 logic; reason; sense; order of thinking 這句話不合邏輯。 Zhè jù huà bù hé luóji. This statement is illogical. 2 logic; objective law 邏輯上的錯誤 luóji shàng de cuòwù error in logic 生活的邏輯 shēnghuó de luóji logic of life 城裡人的邏輯 chénglǐrén de luóji logic of city dwellers 3 logic logic 辯證邏輯 biànzhèng luóji dialectical logic 數理邏輯 shùlǐluóji mathematical logic 研究邏輯 yánjiū luóji study logic 形式邏輯 xíngshì luóji formal logic
verb synthesize 綜合群眾的意見 zōnghé qúnzhòng de yìjian synthesize (or sum up) the opinions of the people adjective comprehensive; multiple; composite; integrated 綜合研究 zōnghé yánjiū a comprehensive study
noun aspiration; wish; ideal verb do sth. of one's own free will; volunteer
noun living body of a human being; person 人身不可侵犯 Rénshēn bùkě qīnfàn inviolability of the person

noun 1 life 日常生活 Rìcháng shēnghuó daily life 政治生活 zhèngzhì shēnghuó political life 2 livelihood 生活出路 shēnghuó chūlù chance to earn a living 生活困難 shēnghuó kùnnan be badly off 生活用品 shēnghuó yòngpǐn articles for daily use 關心群眾的生活 guānxīn qúnzhòng de shēnghuó be concerned with the well-being of the masses 3 dialect work (of workers, peasants, or handicraftsmen) 勤勤懇懇做生活 qínqínkěnkěn zuò shēnghuó work diligently at one’s job; do conscientious work verb 1 live 跟群眾生活在一起 Gēn qúnzhòng shēnghuó zài yīqǐ live with the masses 2 survive; exist 一個人脫離了社會就無法生活。 yī gèrén tuōlí le shèhuì jiù wúfǎ shēnghuó. One cannot survive when cut off from society.
noun life 人生旅程 rénshēng lǚchéng life-long journey 他沒有什麼崇高的人生目的。 Tā méiyǒu shénme chónggāo de rénshēng mùdì. His aim in life is quite modest. or He has no great ambition in life.
implication
verb explore; make explorations; venture into the unknown; adventure into 到原始森林去探險 dào yuánshǐ sēnlín qù tànxiǎn explore a primeval forest

adjective (be) tired; weary; fatigued 累壞了 lèi huài le tired out; worn out; exhausted 不怕苦, 不怕累 Bù pà kǔ, bù pà lèi fear neither hardship nor fatigue verb 1 tire; wear out; strain 累死人的差事 lèi sǐrén de chāishi fatiguing errand (or job) 看小字累眼睛。 Kàn xiǎozì lèi yǎnjing. Reading small print strains the eyes. 這個活兒真累人。 Zhège huór zhēn lèi rén. This work really makes you tired. 這件事別人做不了, 還得累你。 Zhè jiàn shì biéren zuòbuliǎo, hái děi lèi nǐ. Since no one else can do it, I have to bother you. 2 work hard; toil 累死累活 lèisǐlèihuó tire oneself out with back-breaking work; work oneself to death 為孩子累了一輩子 wèi háizilèi le yībèizi toil all one’s life for one’s child 你累了一天, 該休息了。 Nǐ lèi le yī tiān, gāi xiūxi le. You’ve been working hard all day. You need a rest.

verb waste; squander; throw away 浪費生命 làngfèi shēngmìng loaf (or idle) away one’s time 浪費時間 làngfèi shíjiān waste time; fritter away one’s time 浪費人力物力 làngfèi rénlì wùlì waste manpower and material resources 提倡節約, 反對浪費 tíchàng jiéyuē, fǎnduì làngfèi encourage economy and combat waste adjective wasteful; extravagant (opp. 節儉) 你這樣花錢太浪費了。 nǐ zhèyàng huāqián tài làngfèi le. Spending money as you do is a waste.
noun 1 before; formerly; in the past 往前的事兒不要再提了。 wǎngqián de shìr bùyào zài tí le. Don’t bring up the past anymore. 2 ahead; in front 往前是一片樹林。 wǎngqián shì yī piàn shùlín. There’s a forest ahead.

verb feel; sense; perceive 感到驕傲 gǎndào jiāo'ào take pride in; be proud of 感到疲倦 Gǎndào píjuàn feel tired 感到新鮮 gǎndào xīnxiān find sth. new and attractive 感到幸福 gǎndào xìngfú feel happy 感到有鬼 gǎndào yǒuguǐ smell a rat 他感到自己錯了。 Tā gǎndào zìjǐ cuò le. He sensed his error.

noun pride 民族的驕傲 Mínzú de jiāo'ào pride of the nation verb be proud; take pride in 父親為兒子取得的成績感到驕傲。 fùqin wèi érzi qǔdé de chéngjì gǎndào jiāo'ào. He takes pride in his son’s achievements. adjective arrogant; conceited 驕傲矜誇 jiāo'ào jīnkuā haughty and boastful 驕傲自滿 jiāo'ào-zìmǎn conceited and self-satisfied; arrogant and complacent 驕傲使人落後, 謙虛使人進步。 proverb jiāo'ào shǐrén luòhòu, qiānxū shǐrén jìnbù. As conceit makes one lag behind, so modesty helps one make progress.
adjective have a proper sense of pride (or dignity) 為祖國(感到)自豪 wèi zǔguó zìháo be proud of one’s own country
noun vitamin 維生素 wéishēngsù E E vitamin E 丁種維生素 dīng zhǒng wéishēngsù vitamin D
play the piano
swimming pool
magician
noun museum 中國革命博物館 Zhōngguó gémìng bówùguǎn Museum of the Chinese Revolution
noun postcard

adjective 1 nervous; keyed up 神情緊張 Shénqíng jǐnzhāng look nervous; on edge 慢慢講, 別緊張。 Mànmàn jiǎng, bié jǐnzhāng. Speak slowly and don’t be nervous. 試驗到了關鍵時刻, 大家都緊張起來。 Shìyàn dào le guānjiàn shíkè, dàjiā dōu jǐnzhāng qǐlai. Everybody was keyed up as the experiment reached a crucial point. 2 tense; intense; strained 緊張局勢 jǐnzhāng júshì tense situation 緊張氣氛 jǐnzhāng qìfēn tense atmosphere 緊張的戰鬥 jǐnzhāng de zhàndòu intense fighting 緊張而有秩序的工作 jǐnzhāng ér yǒu zhìxù de gōngzuò intense but orderly work 緩和交通運輸的緊張狀況 Huǎnhé jiāotōng yùnshū de jǐnzhāng zhuàngkuàng relieve the pressure on transport 兩國關係緊張。 Liǎng guó guānxi jǐnzhāng. Relations between the two countries are strained. 這場比賽真緊張！ Zhè chǎng bǐsài zhēn jǐnzhāng! What an exciting game! 日程安排得太緊張。 Rìchéng ānpái de tài jǐnzhāng. It’s rather a tight schedule. 工程正在緊張地進行。 Gōngchéng zhèngzài jǐnzhāng de jìnxíng. Construction was in full swing. 3 in short supply; tight 這幾天汽油供應有點兒緊張。 zhè jǐ tiān qìyóu gōngyìng yǒudiǎnrjǐnzhāng. Gasoline has been in short supply for the last few days. 目前這裡住房相當緊張。 Mùqián zhèlǐ zhùfáng xiāngdāng jǐnzhāng. Accommodation here is pretty tight at present. or Housing here is in short supply now. 這裡只有一口井, 用水比較緊張。 Zhèlǐ zhǐ yǒu yī kǒu jǐng, yòng shuǐ bǐjiào jǐnzhāng. There’s only one well here and water is in great demand.
adjective 1 limp; flabby; slack 肌肉鬆弛 jīròu sōngchí flaccid muscles 2 loose; lax 紀律鬆弛 jìlǜ sōngchí lax in discipline

verb win (victory); succeed; attain the intended goal (opp. 失敗) 勝利果實 shènglì guǒshí fruits of victory 勝利沖昏了頭腦 shènglì chōnghūnle tóunǎo become dizzy with success; carried away by success 充滿勝利的信心 Chōngmǎn shènglì de xìnxīn be fully confident of victory 敢於鬥爭, 敢於勝利 gǎnyú dòuzhēng, gǎnyú shènglì dare to struggle and dare to win 勝利了！ shènglì le! we won! 祝你們取得更大的勝利！ Zhù nǐmen qǔdé gèng dà de shènglì! Wish you even greater successes! 勝利在望。 Shènglì zàiwàng. Victory is in sight. adverb triumphantly; successfully 勝利會師 Shènglì huìshī triumphantly join forces 勝利完成任務 shènglì wánchéng rènwu successfully carry out one’s task 大會勝利閉幕。 Dàhuì shènglì bìmù. The conference has concluded successfully.
adjective fast; quick; of highspeed (opp. 慢速)
verb ridicule; deride; jeer at; laugh at 反正我覺得該做的就做, 不怕別人嘲笑。 Fǎnzheng wǒ juéde gāi zuò de jiù zuò, bù pà biéren cháoxiào. I will do what I must and fear no ridicule.
adverb suddenly; all of a sudden 他正要出去, 天忽然下起了大雨。 Tā zhèngyào chūqu, tiān hūrán xiàqǐ le dàyǔ. It suddenly started pouring just as he was going out.
noun answer; reply 滿意的答復 Mǎnyì dedáfu a satisfactory answer verb answer; reply 請盡早答復。 qǐng jìnzǎo dáfu. Please reply at your earliest convenience.

verb 1 answer; reply; respond 敲了半天門沒人答應。 Qiāo le bàntiān mén méi rén dāying. I knocked again and again but there was no answer. 我答應了好幾聲他才聽見。 Wǒ dāying le hǎojǐ shēng tā cái tīngjiàn. I answered several times before he heard me. 2 agree; promise 他答應八點半到。 Tā dāying bā diǎn bàn dào. He promised to be here at 8:30. 他已經答應來參加我們的座談會。 Tā yǐjingdāying lái cānjiā wǒmen de zuòtánhuì. He has agreed to attend our discussion.

verb answer; reply; response 請回答我的問題。 Qǐng huídá wǒ de wèntí. Answer my question, please. 該書從理論上回答了這個問題。 gāi shū cóng lǐlùnshanghuídá le zhège wèntí. The book provides a theoretical answer to this question.

adjective outstanding; excellent; splendid; fine 優秀電影 yōuxiù diànyǐng highly rated films 優秀人才 yōuxiù réncái talented persons 成績優秀 Chéngjì yōuxiù get excellent results or marks 中華民族的優秀兒女 Zhōnghuá mínzú de yōuxiù ér-nǚ worthy sons and daughters of the Chinese nation

adjective fine; good (opp. 低劣) 成績優良 chéngjì yōuliáng get good marks; make a good showing 推廣水稻優良品種 tuīguǎng shuǐdào yōuliáng pǐnzhǒng popularize fine (or good) varieties of rice 艱苦樸素的優良作風 jiānkǔpǔsù de yōuliáng zuòfēng fine style of hard work and plain living

noun 1 one's parents, spouse, children, etc.; one's family members 他除母親外, 沒有別的親人。 Tā chú mǔqin wài, méiyǒu bié de qīnrén. His mother is the only other member of his family. 2 dear ones; those dear to one 感謝親人子弟兵 Gǎnxiè qīnrén zǐdìbīng thank our beloved soldiers
noun relative 一門親戚 Yī mén qīnqi a set of relatives 我們兩家是親戚。 Wǒmen liǎng jiā shì qīnqi. Our two families are relatives.

adverb 1 in addition; besides 另外有事 lìngwài yǒushì be otherwise occupied 另外買一份禮物 lìngwài mǎi yī fèn lǐwù buy another gift 2 in place of 我今天有事, 咱們另外再找時間談吧。 Wǒ jīntiān yǒu shì, zánmen lìngwài zài zhǎo shíjiān tán ba. I’ve got some things to attend to today. Shall we find another time to talk? pronoun [with nouns] different; other 另外兩個人我不認識。 Lìngwài liǎng ge rén wǒ bù rènshi. I don’t know the other two people. 我還要跟你談另外一件事情。 Wǒ hái yào gēn nǐ tán lìngwài yī jiàn shìqing. There’s another thing I want to talk over with you. conjunction in addition; besides 這篇文章我改動了幾處, 另外又補充了一小段。 Zhè piān wénzhāng wǒ gǎidòng le jǐ chù, lìngwài yòu bǔchōng le yī xiǎo duàn. I made a few changes in this article. I also supplemented it with one short paragraph.

verb continue; go on 繼續工作 Jìxù gōngzuò continue working 繼續有效 jìxù yǒuxiào remain valid; remain in force 繼續執政 jìxù zhízhèng continue in office; remain in power 會議繼續到深夜。 Huìyì jìxù dào shēnyè. The meeting went on till late at night. 有些問題仍需繼續研究。 Yǒuxiē wèntí réng xū jìxù yánjiū. Some problems require further study. 他們第二天又繼續會談。 Tāmen dì-èr tiān yòu jìxù huìtán. They resumed the talks the next day. 大雨繼續了三晝夜。 Dàyǔ jìxù le sān zhòu-yè. It rained heavily for three days and nights. noun continuation 現行政策是以往政策的繼續。 xiànxíng zhèngcè shì yǐwǎng zhèngcè dejìxù. The present policy is a continuation of the earlier one.

verb continue; sustain 保證經濟的可持續發展 bǎozhèng jīngjì de kě chíxù fāzhǎn ensure a sustainable economic development 使國民經濟持續穩定增長 shǐ guómín jīngjì chíxù wěndìng zēngzhǎng bring about a sustained, stable growth in the national economy 兩國的文化交流已經持續了一千多年。 Liǎng guó de wénhuà jiāoliú yǐjing chíxù le yīqiān duō nián. Cultural exchange between the two countries has gone on for over a thousand years.

adverb continuously; successively; in a row 連續爆破 liánxù bàopò continuous demolition 連續傳球 liánxù chuánqiú consecutive passes 連續多年豐收 liánxù duō nián fēngshōu reap bumper harvests for many years in succession 連續工作八小時 liánxù gōngzuò bā xiǎoshí work eight hours at a stretch 連續六年未出事故。 Liánxù liù nián wèi chū shìgù. There have been no accidents for six years running.
verb sun; air; sun-cure 晾曬稻米 liàngshài dàomǐ field the rice 把被褥徹底晾曬一下 bǎ bèirù chèdǐ liàngshài yīxià give the bedding a thorough airing
noun islands and islets; islands

verb criticize; comment 批評某人的缺點和錯誤 pīpíng mǒurén de quēdiǎn hé cuòwù criticize sb.’s shortcomings and mistakes noun criticism 批評與自我批評 pīpíng yǔ zìwǒ pīpíng criticism and self-criticism 黨內批評 dǎngnèi pīpíng inner-Party criticism; criticism within the Party 藝術批評 yìshù pīpíng artistic criticism

verb praise; commend 表揚好人好事 biǎoyáng hǎorénhǎoshì praise good people and good deeds 值得表揚 zhíde biǎoyáng deserve praise (or commendation) 大會表揚了十個先進集體。 Dàhuì biǎoyáng le shí ge xiānjìn jítǐ. The conference commended ten advanced units.

noun 1 level; degree 文化程度 wénhuà chéngdù level of education; degree of literacy 生產社會化程度還很低。 Shēngchǎn shèhuìhuà chéngdù hái hěn dī. Socialization of production is still at a very low level. 2 extent; degree 在不同程度上 zài bùtóng chéngdù shàng in varying degrees 在很大(一定)程度上 Zài hěn dà (yīdìng) chéngdù shàng to a great (certain) extent 在不少環節上還不同程度存在官僚主義和腐敗現象。 Zài bùshǎo huánjié shàng hái bùtóng chéngdù cúnzài guānliáozhǔyì hé fǔbài xiànxiàng. Bureaucracy and corruption still exist to varying degrees in many sectors.

noun standard; level 水平很高 shuǐpíng hěn gāo be well above average; be outstanding 認識水平 rènshi shuǐpíng level of one’s understanding 生活水平 shēnghuó shuǐpíng living standard 文化水平 wénhuà shuǐpíng standard of education; cultural level 提高領導水平 tígāo lǐngdǎo shuǐpíng improve one’s art of leadership 趕超世界先進水平 gǎnchāo shìjiè xiānjìn shuǐpíng attain and surpass advanced world levels 他的講話沒什麼水平。 tā de jiǎnghuà méi shénmeshuǐpíng. His talk is very shallow. adjective horizontal; level
noun social intercourse; social contact; social life 擅長社交 shàncháng shèjiāo be a good mixer 喜歡社交 xǐhuan shèjiāo be sociable 他社交活動很多。 tā shèjiāo huódòng hěn duō. He has a very active social life.

verb 1 exchange; interflow; interchange 交流經驗 jiāoliú jīngyàn exchange (or swap) experience; draw on each other’s experience 人才交流 réncái jiāoliú exchange of talents 思想交流 sīxiǎngjiāoliú exchange of views (or ideas) 信息交流 xìnxī jiāoliú exchange of information 城鄉物資交流 chéng-xiāng wùzī jiāoliú flow of goods and materials between city and country 國際文化交流 guójì wénhuà jiāoliú international cultural exchange 經濟和技術交流 jīngjì hé jìshù jiāoliú economic and technical interchange 2 literary flow simultaneously 交流學者 jiāoliú xuézhě exchange scholar; visiting scholar (on an exchange programme) 涕淚交流 tìlèijiāoliú shed tears and have a runny nose adjective electricity alternating
verb seek; look for 尋找失物 xúnzhǎo shīwù look for lost articles 尋找真理 xúnzhǎo zhēnlǐ seek truth

adjective strange; unfamiliar (opp. 熟悉) 陌生的面孔 mòshēng de miànkǒng unfamiliar face 儘管我們初次見面, 但並不感到陌生。 Jǐnguǎn wǒmen chū cì jiànmiàn, dàn bìng bù gǎndào mòshēng. This was only our first meeting yet, we didn’t feel like strangers.

verb know sth. or sb. well; be familiar with; have an intimate knowledge of 熟悉內情 shúxi nèiqíng know the ins and outs of the matter; know the inside story of; be in the know 用群眾熟悉的語言來寫作 Yòng qúnzhòng shúxi de yǔyán lái xiězuò write in language familiar to the masses 你到了那裡, 要先熟悉當地的情況。 Nǐ dào le nàli, yào xiān shúxi dāngdì de qíngkuàng. When you get there, first of all familiarize yourself with the situation. adjective familiar with (opp. 陌生) 他們彼此很熟悉。 Tāmen bǐcǐ hěn shúxi. They know each other very well. 他對這工作不熟悉。 Tā duì zhè gōngzuò bù shúxi. He is new to the task. 他對各項生產數字很熟悉。 Tā duì gèxiàng shēngchǎn shùzì hěn shúxi. He has the various production figures at his fingertips.

verb hope; wish; expect 希望你明天能來。 Xīwàng nǐ míngtiān néng lái. I hope you’ll come tomorrow. 他希望長大了當醫生。 Tā xīwàng zhǎngdà le dāng yīshēng. He wants to be a doctor when he grows up. noun 1 hope; wish; expectation 把希望變成現實 Bǎ xīwàng biànchéng xiànshí turn hopes into reality 大有成功的希望 dà yǒu chénggōng de xīwàng promise high hopes of success; stand a very good chance of success 他康復的希望不大。 Tā kāngfù de xīwàng bù dà. There is little hope of his recovery. or He is unlikely to recover. 2 that on which hope is placed 青少年是我們的未來, 是我們的希望。 Qīng-shàonián shì wǒmen de wèilái, shì wǒmen de xīwàng. The youth is our future and our hope.
noun literary appearance; countenance 形容枯槁 xíngróngkūgǎo look haggard 形容憔悴 xíngróng qiáocuì wan-looking; thin and pallid verb describe 難以形容 nányǐxíngróng difficult to describe; beyond description

verb 1 be able to; be capable of 能夠獨立工作 Nénggòu dúlì gōngzuò be able to work on one’s own 他能夠說三種外語。 Tā nénggòu shuō sān zhǒng wàiyǔ. He can speak three foreign languages. 這條河的下游能夠行駛輪船。 Zhè tiáo hé de xiàyóu nénggòu xíngshǐ lúnchuán. The lower reaches of the river are navigable for steamers. 2 be allowed to 明天的晚會, 家屬也能夠參加。 Míngtiān de wǎnhuì, jiāshǔ yě nénggòu cānjiā. Family members are also welcome at tomorrow’s party.

noun 1 door bolt; door bar 2 key; hinge; crux 問題的關鍵 Wèntí de guānjiàn key to the problem; crux of the matter 關鍵在於要有決心和行動。 Guānjiàn zàiyú yào yǒu juéxīn hé xíngdòng. What counts is determination and action. adjective critical; decisive 關鍵部門 guānjiàn bùmén key sector 關鍵人物 guānjiàn rénwù key figure 關鍵時刻 guānjiàn shíkè critical (or crucial) moment 這著棋很關鍵, 關系到全局的勝負。 zhè zhuóqí hěn guānjiàn, guānxidào quánjú de shèng-fù. This is a decisive move which will determine the outcome of the game.
adjective high (or top) quality; high grade 優質高產 yōuzhìgāochǎn high quality and high yield 優質混凝土 yōuzhì hùnníngtǔ quality concrete 提供優質服務 tígōng yōuzhì fúwù provide good service
adjective of poor (or low) quality; inferior 劣質煤 lièzhì méi dross; inferior (or faulty) coal 劣質產品 lièzhì chǎnpǐn substandard (or inferior) product

verb 1 solve; resolve; settle 解決困難 jiějué kùnnan overcome a difficulty; find a way out of a difficulty 解決問題 jiějué wèntí solve a problem; settle a question (or an issue); work out a solution 解決爭端 jiějué zhēngduān settle a dispute 迅速解決戰鬥 Xùnsù jiějué zhàndòu quick decisive battle 不同的矛盾, 只有用不同的方法才能解決。 bùtóng de máodùn, zhǐyǒu yòng bùtóng de fāngfǎ cáinéng jiějué. Different problems can only be resolved by using different methods. 2 dispose of; finish off 把剩菜解決了 bǎ shèngcài jiějué le finish off leftovers 這一仗把敵人全部解決了。 zhè yī zhàng bǎ dírén quánbù jiějué le. That battle finished off all the enemy troops.
noun particular period 和平建設時期 Hépíng jiànshè shíqī period of peaceful construction 抗日戰爭時期 Kàng-Rì Zhànzhēng shíqī during the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression (1937-1945)
noun vacation; holiday; period of leave
noun trade; profession; industry 服務行業 fúwù hángyè service trades (or industry) 建築行業 jiànzhù hángyè building industry

noun occupation; profession; vocation 從事各種職業的人 Cóngshì gèzhǒng zhíyè de rén people of all occupations 這裡填上你的姓名, 職業等等。 zhèlǐ tiánshàng nǐ de xìngmíng, zhíyè děngdeng. Put down your name, occupation, etc. here. 他的職業是醫生。 Tā de zhíyè shì yīshēng. He is a doctor by profession. 我們的職業有保障。 Wǒmen de zhíyè yǒu bǎozhàng. Our jobs are secure. adjective professional 職業軍人 zhíyè jūnrén professional (or career) soldier 職業拳擊手 zhí yè quán jí shǒu prizefighter
noun town; city
noun rural area; countryside; village
return or round-trip ticket

noun 1 crowd; group 人群 rénqún crowd; throng; multitude 2 (Qún) a surname measure word [for people or animals] group; herd; flock 一群狼 yī qún láng a pack of wolves 一群牛 yī qún niú a herd of cattle 一群人 yī qún rén a crowd of people 一群羊 yī qún yáng a flock of sheep 一群蜜蜂 yī qún mìfēng a swarm of bees 一群小孩 yī qún xiǎohái a group of children

verb (of students or trainees) practise (what has been learnt in class); skills exercise; fieldwork 去煤礦實習 qù méikuàng shíxí go on a field trip to a coal mine 在中學實習 zài zhōngxué shíxí in-class training at a middle school 進行護理實習 jìnxíng hùlǐ shíxí nursing practice

noun 1 group 讀報組 Dúbàozǔ a newspaper-reading group 2 series; suite; cycle See 37040128組畫zu3hua4組畫;78239203組詩zu3shi1組詩 verb organize; form 改組 gǎizǔ reorganize; reshuffle measure word set; series; battery 一組郵票 yī zǔ yóupiào a set of stamps 兩組發電機 liǎng zǔ fādiànjī two generators
idiom just right (for the purpose or occasion)
verb dialect take things easy 悠著點兒勁兒, 別太猛了。 yōuzhe diǎnr jìnr, bié tài měng le. Take it easy (or Easy)! Don’t go at it so hard.

noun 1 drop (of liquid) 雨點兒 yǔdiǎnr raindrop 2 spot; dot; speck 墨點兒 mòdiǎnr ink spots 3 dot stroke (in Chinese characters) 5 decimal point; point 三點兒五 Sāndiǎnr wǔ three point five (3.5) measure word 1 a little; a bit; some 讀點兒魯迅 Dú diǎn r Lǔ Xùn read some of Lu Xun’s works 給我點兒紙。 gěi wǒ diǎn r zhǐ. Give me some paper, will you? 他今天好點兒了。 Tā jīntiān hǎo diǎn r le. He’s feeling a bit better today. 人的認識一點兒也不能離開實踐。 Rén de rènshi yī diǎn r yě bùnéng líkāi shíjiàn. Human knowledge cannot be separated from practice.
noun human body; flesh 肉體上的痛苦 ròutǐ shàng de tòngkǔ physical suffering (or anguish)
nevertheless

noun 1 on the road 路上停著一輛車。 Lùshang tíng zhe yī liàng chē. There is a car parked on the road. 2 on the way; en route 路上要用的東西 lùshang yào yòng de dōngxi things needed for the journey 回來的路上 huílai delùshang on one’s way back (一)路上小心。 lùshang xiǎoxīn. Take care on the way. 路上不要耽擱。 Lù shang bù yào dānge. Don’t waste any time on the way. 我正在路上。 Wǒ zhèngzài lùshang. I’m on my way.

noun limits; scope; range 範圍狹小 Fànwéi xiáxiǎo be limited in scope 勢力範圍 shìli fànwéi sphere of influence 國家管轄範圍 guójiā guǎnxiá fànwéi the limits of national jurisdiction 實際控制範圍 shíjì kòngzhì fànwéi the extent of actual control 在法律許可範圍內 Zài fǎlǜ xǔkě fànwéi nèi within the limits permitted by law 在協定規定的範圍內 zài xiédìng guīdìng de fànwéi nèi within the framework of the agreement 談話的範圍很廣。 tánhuà defànwéi hěn guǎng. The talk covered a wide range of subjects. 這不屬於我們研究的範圍。 Zhè bù shǔyú wǒmen yánjiū de fànwéi. This is outside the scope of our study. verb literary set limits to; limit the scope of 難以範圍 nányǐ fànwéi hard to confine
noun 1 territory 2 field; sphere; domain; realm 學術領域 xuéshù lǐngyù academic field 社會科學領域 shèhuì kēxué lǐngyù domain of the social sciences 意識形態領域 yìshi xíngtài lǐngyù ideological sphere
noun suburban district; suburbs; outskirts (opp. 城區) 郊區居民 jiāoqū jūmín suburban inhabitants; suburbanites
noun city proper; urban district; downtown area
noun provinces other than where one is; other provinces

adjective correct; right; proper (opp. 錯誤) 正確的答案 Zhèngquè de dá'àn a correct answer 正確的立場 zhèngquè de lìchǎng the right stand 正確的批評 zhèngquè de pīpíng valid criticism 正確對待自己 zhèngquè duìdài zìjǐ assess oneself properly 正確估計客觀形勢 zhèngquè gūjì kèguān xíngshì accurately appraise the actual situation 正確處理國家, 集體, 個人三者之間的關係 zhèngquè chǔlǐ guójiā, jítǐ, gèrén sān zhě zhījiān de guānxi balance the interests of the state, the collective, and the individual 你這樣做是正確的。 Nǐ zhèyàng zuò shì zhèngquè de. What you are doing is right.

noun mistake; error; blunder 錯誤百出 cuòwù bǎi chū riddled with errors; full of mistakes 犯錯誤 fàn cuòwù make a mistake; commit an error 改正錯誤 gǎizhèng cuòwù correct a mistake 印刷錯誤 yìnshuā cuòwù misprint adjective wrong; mistaken; erroneous (opp. 正確) 錯誤結論 cuòwù jiélùn wrong conclusion 錯誤路線 cuòwù lùxiàn erroneous line 錯誤思想 cuòwù sīxiǎng wrong thinking; mistaken idea
verb go there and back; journey to and fro; shuttle
1 group 2 cohort 3 cluster

conjunction so; therefore; for this reason; consequently 雪融化時吸收熱量, 氣溫因此下降。 Xuě rónghuà shí xīshōu rèliàng, qìwēn yīncǐ xiàjiàng. Melting snow absorbs heat, and so makes the temperature drop. 她的話引得大家都笑了, 室內的空氣因此輕鬆了很多。 Tā de huà yǐndé dàjiā dōu xiào le, shìnèi de kōngqì yīncǐ qīngsōng le hěn duō. What she said set everyone laughing, and consequently the party livened up a lot.
verb abandon; give up; renounce 放棄原則 fàngqì yuánzé forsake one’s principles 放棄表決權 fàngqì biǎojuéquán abstain from voting 放棄原有計劃 fàngqì yuányǒu jìhuà abandon the original plan

verb persist in; persevere in; uphold; insist on; stick to; adhere to 堅持錯誤 jiānchí cuòwù persist in one’s errors 堅持己見 jiānchí jǐjiàn hold on to one’s own views 堅持原則 jiānchí yuánzé adhere to principle 堅持對話, 不搞對抗 jiānchí duìhuà, bù gǎo duìkàng persist in dialogue, refrain from confrontation 堅持社會主義方向 jiānchí shèhuìzhǔyì fāngxiàng persevere in the socialist orientation 堅持一個中國的立場 jiānchí yī ge Zhōngguó de lìchǎng stick to the principle of one China 他堅持要走。 Tā jiānchí yào zǒu. He insisted on leaving. 堅持就能勝利。 jiānchí jiù néng shènglì. Perseverance leads to success. 你應該堅持做早操。 Nǐ yīnggāi jiānchí zuò zǎocāo. You should persevere in doing morning exercises. 再走十裡, 堅持得了嗎？ Zài zǒu shí lǐ, jiānchí déliǎo ma? Can you hold on for another ten li? 救援隊希望船裡的人能堅持到他們趕來。 Jiùyuán duì xīwàng chuán lǐ de rén néng jiānchí dào tāmen gǎnlái. The rescue team hoped that the men in the boat could hold out till they arrived.

adjective absolute (opp. 相對) 絕對多數 juéduì duōshù absolute majority; overwhelming majority 絕對優勢 juéduì yōushì absolute predominance; overwhelming superiority 防止思想上的絕對化 fángzhǐ sīxiǎng shàng de juéduì huà avoid thinking in terms of absolutes adverb absolutely; perfectly; definitely 絕對可靠 juéduì kěkào absolutely reliable 那事絕對真實。 Nà shì juéduì zhēnshí. That account is definitely true. 你絕對不能去。 Nǐ juéduì bù néng qù. You must absolutely not go. 我絕對有把握。 Wǒ juéduì yǒu bǎwò. I’m absolutely sure. 這件事要絕對保密。 Zhè jiàn shì yào juéduì bǎomì. This must be kept absolutely secret. or This is strictly confidential.

noun 1 additional space; spare room 屋子太小, 沒有活動的餘地。 Wūzi tài xiǎo, méiyǒu huódòng deyúdì. The room is too small to turn round. 2 leeway; margin; room; latitude 回旋的餘地 Huíxuán deyúdì space for manoeuvre 沒有選擇餘地 méiyǒu xuǎnzé yúdì with no alternative 還有改進的餘地。 Háiyǒu gǎijìn de yúdì. There is still room for improvement. 訂計劃要留有餘地。 Dìng jìhuà yào liúyǒuyúdì. When drawing up a plan, one should leave some margin.

adverb must; have to 必須指出 Bìxū zhǐchū it must be pointed out that 必須厲行節約。 Bìxū lìxíngjiéyuē. It is imperative to practise economy. 學習必須刻苦。 Xuéxí bìxū kèkǔ. Learning requires diligence. 共產黨員必須勇於批評和自我批評。 Gòngchǎndǎngyuán bìxū yǒngyú pīpíng hé zìwǒ pīpíng. A Communist must have the courage to criticize others as well as themselves.

verb essential; indispensable 發展工業所必需的原料 Fāzhǎn gōngyè suǒ bìxū de yuánliào raw materials essential for industrial development 應該把國家建設資金用在必需的地方。 yīnggāi bǎ guójiā jiànshè zījīn yòng zài bìxū de dìfang. Our national construction funds should be spent where they are most needed.

verb 1 turn one's face to; turn in the direction of; face 面嚮黨旗莊嚴宣誓 Miànxiàng dǎngqí zhuāngyán xuānshì swear solemnly facing the Party flag 2 geared to the needs of; cater to 面嚮出口 miànxiàng chūkǒu be export-oriented 面嚮基層 miànxiàng jīcéng cater to (or meet) the needs of grass-roots units
noun dialect facial features; looks; appearance
noun good luck; good fortune; happy lot 老太太有福氣, 兒女都很孝順。 lǎotàitai yǒu fúqi, ér-nǚ dōu hěn xiàoshùn. The old lady is fortunate in having such dutiful children.
idiom obviously; evidently; clearly 何以如此, 原因顯而易見。 Héyǐ rúcǐ, yuányīn xiǎn'éryìjiàn. The reason why so is quite obvious.

verb 1 discover; find; detect; identify 發現一些線索 fāxiàn yīxiē xiànsuǒ find some clues 發現一個新方法 Fāxiàn yī ge xīn fāngfǎ discover a new method 2 find; realize; perceive; notice; be aware of 我發現他好像有什麼心事。 Wǒ fāxiàn tā hǎoxiàng yǒu shénme xīnshi. I noticed that he seemed to have something on his mind. 我們發現他有精神病。 Wǒmenfāxiàn tā yǒu jīngshénbìng. We found him to have a mental disorder. noun discovery; find 考古發現 kǎogǔ fāxiàn archaeological finds 物理學上一個劃時代的發現 Wùlǐxué shàng yī ge huàshídài defāxiàn an epoch-making discovery in physics

adjective efficacious; effective; valid 有效合同 yǒuxiào hétong valid contract 有效證件 yǒuxiào zhèngjiàn valid documents 採取有效步驟 cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào bùzhòu take effective steps 採取有效措施 cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī take effective measures 這項指示仍然有效。 zhè xiàng zhǐshì réngrán yǒuxiào. The directive still holds good. 這藥治哮喘病很有效。 Zhè yào zhì xiàochuǎnbìng hěn yǒuxiào. This is an efficacious (or effective) drug for asthma. 這張車票三日內有效。 Zhè zhāng chēpiào sān rì nèi yǒuxiào. This train ticket is good (or valid) for three days.
noun traditional Chinese calendar; lunar calendar (opp. 公曆)

1 Qixi Festival or Double Seven Festival on the 7th day of the 7th lunar month 2 girls' festival 3 Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女niúlǎngzhīnǚ [牛郎織女] are allowed their annual meeting

noun legend; folk tale 民間傳說 mínjiān chuánshuō folklore; popular legend 魯班的傳說 Lǔ Bān de chuánshuō the legend of Lu Ban verb pass from mouth to mouth; it is said; they say 傳說如此。 Chuánshuō rúcǐ. So the story goes. 村里傳說他叔叔要從國外回來了。 Cūnlichuánshuō tā shūshu yào cóng guówài huílai le. The villagers are all saying that his uncle will soon come home from abroad.
noun female celestial; fairy maiden; nymph

noun 1 weaving-girl; weaving-maid; female weaver 2 mythology (Zhīnǚ) the Weaving-girl See 27415808牛郎織女niu2lang2zhi1nv3牛郎織女 3 VARIANT OF 36163840織女星zhi1nv3xing1織女星 astronomy the Weaving-girl star—Vega

adjective diligent; industrious; hardworking (opp. 懶惰) 勤勞致富 qínláozhìfù become rich through hard work (or industry) 勤勞的雙手 qínláo de shuāngshǒu an untiring pair of hands 勤勞勇敢的中國人民 Qínláo yǒnggǎn de Zhōngguó rénmín the valiant and industrious Chinese people
noun child cowherd
noun 1 dated herd-boy; cowherd; oxherd 2 (Niúláng) the Herd-boy See 27415808牛郎織女niu2lang2zhi1nv3牛郎織女

verb marry; get married; be married 她結婚了嗎？ Tā jiéhūn le ma？ Is she married? 她跟誰結婚了？ Tā gēn shuí jiéhūn le？ Who did she marry? 她結過兩次婚了。 Tā jié guò liǎng cì hūn le. She’s been married twice. 她是什麼時候結的婚？ Tā shì shénme shíhou jié de hūn？ When did she get married?
noun mother 母親河 mǔqinhé mother river

noun the Queen Mother of the West (beautiful mythical immortal, who dwells at Jasper Lake (瑤池) in the Kunlun Mountains, and in whose garden grow magic peach trees which bear the fruit of immortality (蟠桃) once every three thousand years)
noun mythology Heavenly Palace 大鬧天宮 Dànào Tiāngōng wreaking havoc in the Heavenly Palace

noun permission 得到家長的允許 dédào jiāzhǎng deyǔnxǔ gain permission from one’s parents verb permit; allow 不允許破壞紀律 bù yǔnxǔ pòhuài jìlǜ permit no breach of discipline 請允許我代表全廠職工向你們致謝。 Qǐng yǔnxǔ wǒ dàibiǎo quán chǎng zhígōng xiàng nǐmen zhìxiè. Allow me to thank you on behalf of our factory. 這是我國內政, 不允許任何外來幹涉。 Zhè shì wǒguó nèizhèng, bù yǔnxǔ rènhé wàilái gānshè. This is our internal affair which brooks no outside interference.
verb see each other; meet 相見無日 xiāng jiàn wú rì not able to meet again; prospects of seeing each other again are dim
idiom have a tearful face; wear a woebegone look

verb cry; weep; wail 哭了起來 Kū le qǐlai burst into tears 哭得死去活來 kū de sǐqùhuólái weep one’s heart (or eyes) out; weep oneselfout 《哭任弼時同志》 《Kū Rèn Bì Shí Tóngzhì》 “Lament for Comrade Ren Bishi” 大哭一場 dà kū yī cháng have a good blub 又哭又鬧 Yòu kū yòu nào make a tearful scene

verb 1 love dearly 這樣慣孩子不是心疼他。 Zhèyàng guàn háizi bù shì xīnténg tā. Pampering a child like this is not loving him. 2 (-//-) feel sorry; be distressed 這麼浪費, 叫人看了心疼。 Zhème làngfèi, jiào rén kàn le xīnténg. It makes one’s heart ache to see such waste.
1 to set foot on 2 to step on or into
verb join; link 把兩條鐵路連接起來 Bǎ liǎng tiáo tiělù liánjiē qǐlai link up the two railway lines

noun human (or man's) world; world 人間滄桑 rénjiān-cāngsāng the shifts and charges of human life 人間春色 rénjiānchūnsè the fairest (spring scenery) in the human world 此曲只應天上有, 人間能得幾回聞？(杜甫《贈花卿》) Cǐ qǔ zhǐ yīng tiānshàng yǒu, rénjiān néng dé jǐ huí wén? But this song should only belong to heaven, | Among mortals how seldom can it be heard!

noun Magpie Bridge (the bridge formed by magpies which the Weaving-girl is supposed to cross for her annual meeting with the Herd-boy on the seventh evening of the seventh month) 鵲橋相會 Quèqiáo xiānghuì magpie bridge meeting—the reunion of husband and wife or lovers after a long separation

verb separated by (a distance of ...); be ... apart; be ... away from 兩地相距不到兩公里。 Liǎng dì xiāngjù bùdào liǎng gōnglǐ. The two places are less than two kilometres apart. 兩個橋墩相距二十米。 liǎng ge qiáodūn xiāngjù èrshí mǐ. The two piers of the bridge are 20 metres apart.
verb meet; gather; assemble 相聚一堂, 共商國是 xiāngjù yītáng, gòng shāng guóshì come together to discuss affairs of state; confer on national affairs
noun 1 origin; source 分歧的由來 Fēnqí de yóulái the origin of differences 2 duration up to now; so far 由來已久 yóulái yǐ jiǔ long-standing; time-honoured
noun tradition 發揚優良傳統 fāyáng yōuliáng chuántǒng carry on a fine tradition adjective traditional; conservative 傳統友誼 chuántǒng yǒuyì traditional (ties of) friendship

noun modern times; contemporary age adjective modern; contemporary 現代史 xiàndàishǐ contemporary history 現代舞 xiàndàiwǔ modern dance 現代戲 xiàndàixì drama with a contemporary theme 現代漢語 xiàndài Hànyǔ modern Chinese 現代思潮 xiàndài sīcháo modern schools of thought 現代題材 xiàndài tícái contemporary themes 現代文學 xiàndài wénxué contemporary literature 現代藝術 xiàndài yìshù modern art 現代意識 xiàndài yìshi modern thinking 現代主義 xiàndàizhǔyì modernism 現代作家 xiàndài zuòjiā modern (or contemporary) writer 現代交通工具 xiàndài jiāotōng gōngjù modern means of transport 現代企業制度 xiàndài qǐyè zhìdù modern enterprise (or corporate) system

verb 1 continue to have; retain 他還保留著年輕時的朝氣。 tā hái bǎoliú zhe niánqīng shí de zhāoqì. He still retains the fervour of his youth. 這個地方還保留著原來的面貌。 Zhège dìfang hái bǎoliú zhe yuánlái de miànmào. The place still looks the same as before. 2 hold (or keep) back; reserve 保留以後再答復的權利 bǎoliú yǐhòu zài dáfù de quánlì reserve the right to reply at a later date 持保留意見 chí bǎoliú yìjian have reservations 無保留地同意 Wú bǎoliú de tóngyì agree unreservedly (or without reservation) 票給你保留到明天中午。 Piào gěi nǐ bǎoliú dào míngtiān zhōngwǔ. We’ll reserve (or hold) the ticket for you till tomorrow noon. 有意見都談出來, 不要保留。 Yǒu yìjian dōu tán chūlai, bù yào bǎoliú. Say everything you want, don’t hold back.

preposition [used in a passive structure to introduce either the doer of the action, or the action alone] 被擒 bèiqín be caught 他被對手擊倒。 Tā bèi duìshǒu jīdǎo. He was knocked down by his opponent. 她被選為主席。 Tā bèi xuǎn wéi zhǔxí. She was elected chairwoman. 那棵樹被大風颳倒了。 Nà kē shù bèi dà fēng guā dǎo le. The tree was uprooted by the gale. noun quilt 做一床被 Zuò yī chuáng bèi make a new quilt verb literary 1 cover (with) See 17376768被覆bei4fu4被覆 2 suffer 被災 bèi zāi suffer from a disaster
adjective day-to-day; everyday; daily 這些都是日常必須用的東西。 Zhèxiē dōu shì rìcháng bìxū yòng de dōngxi. These are all the things needed for daily use.
noun kite 放風箏 fàng fēngzheng fly a kite
noun shuttlecock 踢毽子 tī jiànzi kick the shuttlecock (as a game)

verb 1 tremble; shiver; quiver 渾身直抖 húnshēn zhí dǒu tremble all over 2 shake; jerk 抖空竹 dǒu kōngzhú play with a diabolo (Chinese yo-yo) 抖開棉被 dǒu kāi miánbèi spread the quilt with a shake 抖一抖韁繩 dǒu yī dǒu jiāngsheng jerk the reins 把衣服上的雪抖掉 bǎ yīfu shàng de xuě dǒu diào shake the snow off one’s clothes 3 rouse; stir up 抖起精神 dǒu qǐ jīngshén pluck up one’s spirits; raise one’s spirits 4 colloquial usually sarcastic [usu. with 起來] get on in the world; gain fame (or fortune) 這家伙抖起來了。 Zhè jiāhuodǒu qǐlai le. The chap became quite a somebody. 5 [usu. with 出來] disclose the inside story; expose 把整件事抖出來 bǎ zhěng jiàn shì dǒu chūlai disclose the whole story
play with a diabolo (Chinese yo-yo)
kick the shuttlecock (as a game)
verb 1 practice taiji shadowboxing; do taiji exercises 2 figurative dodge and shirk
fly a kite
1 to send 2 to give as a present
adjective sensible; intelligent 懂事的孩子 dǒngshì de háizi a sensible child; a reasonable child 你怎麼這樣不懂事？ Nǐ zěnme zhèyàng bù dǒngshì？ How can you be so thoughtless?
adjective good and honest; kind-hearted 善良願望 shànliáng yuànwàng the best of intentions 善良的人們 Shànliáng de rénmen good and honest people; people of goodwill 心地善良 xīndì shànliáng kind-hearted

noun 1 supernatural being; celestial being; immortal 2 person who has the power of clairvoyance or who is free from worldly cares 神仙下凡 shénxianxiàfán immortals descend to the earth 快活似神仙 kuàihuo sì shénxian as happy as a lark

conjunction and; besides; moreover; furthermore 任務艱巨, 並且時間緊迫。 Rènwu jiānjù, bìngqiě shíjiān jǐnpò. The task is difficult and, what’s more, time is short. 這本書內容很有趣, 並且寫得也很生動。 zhè běn shū nèiróng hěn yǒuqù, bìngqiě xiě de yě hěn shēngdòng. This book has interesting content and a lively style too.

verb be born 出生於富貴之家 chūshēng yú fùguì zhī jiā be born with a silver spoon in one’s month 他出生在美國。 Tā chūshēng zài Měiguó. He was born in the United States. 我是一九三〇年出生的。 wǒ shì yī jiǔ sān líng nián chūshēng de. I was born in 1930.
verb step on; tread on (grass, etc.) 請勿踩踏！ qǐngwù cǎità Step off!
noun ornithology magpie 喜鵲登枝 xǐque dēng zhī magpie settles on the bough—good omen; harbinger of good news; good sign

adjective 1 steady; firm 坐穩 zuòwěn sit tight 把桌子放穩 bǎ zhuōzi fàng wěn steady the table 2 steady; sedate; composed 她做事很穩。 Tā zuò shì hěn wěn. She is steady and reliable. 3 sure; certain 這場比賽他穩贏。 Zhè chǎng bǐsài tā wěn yíng. He is certain to win the game. verb stabilize; calm 你最好先穩住他。 nǐ zuìhǎo xiān wěn zhù tā. You’d better calm him down first.
noun colloquial lame person; cripple

noun get-together 他們每隔兩個月搞一次聚會。 Tāmen měi gé liǎng ge yuè gǎo yī cì jùhuì. They have a get-together every two months. verb (-//-) get together; meet 老戰友聚會在一起, 格外親熱。 Lǎo zhànyǒu jùhuì zài yīqǐ, géwài qīnrè. When old comrades-in-arms get together, everyone has a good time.
verb 1 reunite 夫妻團聚 fūqī tuánjù couple reunion 全家團聚 Quánjiā tuánjù family reunion 2 unite and gather
noun tradition 發揚優良傳統 fāyáng yōuliáng chuántǒng carry on a fine tradition adjective traditional; conservative 傳統友誼 chuántǒng yǒuyì traditional (ties of) friendship
verb shake; tremble; vibrate

verb VARIANT OF 30980096隨心sui2xin1隨心 follow one’s inclinations adjective at will; as one pleases; at random 隨意抽查 suíyì chōuchá random check 隨意選擇 suíyì xuǎnzé casual choice 隨意漲價 suíyì zhǎngjià wilful inflation of prices 請各位隨意！ Qǐng gèwèi suíyì! Make yourselves at home, everybody!

verb think over; consider; take into account 考慮不周 kǎo lǜ bù zhōu thoughtless; ill-considered; inconsiderate 考慮到…… kǎolǜ dào…… in view (or consideration) of; with an eye to; considering that… 不考慮個人得失 Bù kǎolǜ gèrén dé-shī disregard personal gains and losses 從實際情況考慮 cóng shíjì qíngkuàng kǎolǜ by practical consideration
noun tool; instrument; implement; means 運輸工具 yùnshū gōngjù means of transport 語言是交流思想的工具。 Yǔyán shì jiāoliú sīxiǎng degōngjù. Language is a means for exchanging thoughts.

verb make clear (or definite); clarify 明確學習的目的 Míngquè xuéxí de mùdì be clear about the purpose of one’s study 明確當前的中心任務 míngquè dāngqián de zhōngxīn rènwu define the key task for the present period 需要明確幾個基本觀念。 Xūyào míngquè jǐ ge jīběn guānniàn. Several basic concepts need to be clarified. adjective clear and definite; clear-cut; explicit; unequivocal 明確的答復 míngquè de dáfù definite answer 明確的立場 míngquè de lìchǎng clear-cut stand 目的明確 mùdì míngquè have a clear aim 用明確無誤的語言 yòng míngquè wúwù de yǔyán use unequivocal terms; clear language

noun background; backdrop 家庭背景 jiātíng bèijǐng family background 歷史背景 Lìshǐ bèijǐng historical background (or setting) 以藍天為背景 yǐ lántiān wéi bèijǐng set against the blue sky 此案背景複雜。 cǐ àn bèijǐng fùzá. This case has a complicated background. 他有背景。 Tā yǒu bèijǐng. He has powerful connections. or He is well-connected. 這幅畫的背景是一片森林。 Zhè fú huà de bèijǐng shì yī piàn sēnlín. The painting shows the woods in the background. 這事肯定有背景。 Zhè shì kěndìng yǒu bèijǐng. Someone must be behind this. or There’s more in this than meets the eye.
verb digress from the subject; stray from the point; go off at a tangent

verb 1 damage; impair; spoil 損壞公物要賠。 Sǔnhuài gōngwù yào péi. Pay for public property you damage. 不要損壞樹木。 Bùyào sǔnhuài shùmù. Do not damage the trees and bushes. 事故中兩輛汽車都受到嚴重損壞。 shìgù zhōng liǎng liàng qìchē dōu shòudào yánzhòng sǔnhuài. The accident did great damage to both cars. 2 computing corrupt (file)
1 to err 2 to make a mistake 3 to do the wrong thing
verb commit a crime (or an offence) 共同犯罪 gòngtóng fànzuì joint offence

noun 1 bottom; base 井底 jǐngdǐ bottom of a well 2 heart of a matter; ins and outs 交底 jiāodǐ put all one’s cards on the table; reveal one’s intentions 3 rough draft 4 copy kept as a record 留個底兒 liú ge dǐr keep a copy on file; duplicate and file (a letter, etc.) 5 end of a year or month 年底 niándǐ end of the year 6 ground; background; foundation 白底紅花 bái dǐ hóng huā red flowers on a white background 7 abbreviation VARIANT OF 19863040底數di3shu4底數 a truth or root of a matter; how a matter actually stands b mathematics base number 8 (Dǐ) a surname verb literary end up with; come to 終底於成 zhōng dǐ yú chéng succeed in the end pronoun dated 1 here; this 2 so; such 3 what 底處 dǐ chù what place; where 幹卿底事？ Gàn qīng dǐ shì？ What has that to do with you?

noun 1 the beginning of; the early part of 八月初 Bāyuè chū early in August; in early August 本世紀初 běn shìjì chū the beginning of this century 2 original 和好如初 héhǎorúchū become good friends again; reconciled 3 (Chū) a surname adjective 1 first (in order) 初雪 chūxuě first snow 初戰 chūzhàn first battle 初一 chūyī the first day of the lunar month 初五 chūwǔ the fifth day of the lunar month 初十 chūshí the tenth day of the lunar month 2 elementary; rudimentary See 18906112初級chu1ji2初級 adverb for the first time; just beginning 初上陣的戰士 chū shàngzhèn de zhànshì soldiers going into action for the first time 感冒初起 gǎnmào chū qǐ with the first symptoms of a cold
noun first ten-day period of a month (opp. 下旬)

pronoun 1 certain; some 某日 mǒurì at a certain date 張某 zhāng mǒu a certain person called Zhang 某些農產品 mǒuxiē nóngchǎnpǐn certain agricultural products 在某種程度上 zài mǒuzhǒng chéngdu shàng to some (or a certain) extent 在某種意義上 zài mǒuzhǒng yìyì shàng in a sense 在四川某地 zài Sìchuān mǒu de somewhere in Sichuan Province 他老說某某某是他的朋友。 Tā lǎo shuō mǒumǒu mǒu shì tā de péngyou. He’s always claiming that so-and-so is his friend. 2 [referring to oneself] 我李某不是幹這種事的人。 Wǒ lǐ mǒu bù shì gàn zhèzhǒng shì de rén. Yours truly is not the sort of person to do that. or Yours truly would never do that.
idiom unique; unparalleled; unmatched
adjective only; sole 唯一出路 wéiyī chūlù the only way out 唯一繼承人 wéiyī jìchéngrén the sole heir 唯一可行的辦法 wéiyī kěxíng de bànfǎ the only feasible way
verb substitute for; replace; supersede 用石油替代煤 yòng shíyóu tìdài méi replace coal with petroleum; substitute petroleum for coal
verb replace; substitute for; take the place of 你要是自己不能去, 可以找個人來代替。 Nǐ yào shì zìjǐ bù néng qù, kěyǐ zhǎo ge rén lái dàitì. If you cannot go yourself, try to find someone to substitute for you.

verb injure; harm; hurt 傷害自尊心 Shānghài zìzūnxīn injure (or hurt) one’s pride; hurt one’s self-respect 傷害民族感情 shānghài mínzú gǎnqíng hurt national dignity (or pride) 不要傷害鳥類。 Bùyào shānghài niǎolèi. Don’t harm birds. 飲酒過多會傷害身體。 Yǐnjiǔ guò duō huì shānghài shēntǐ. Excessive drinking is harmful to the health.

adjective clear; obvious; evident; distinct 明顯的改進 míngxiǎn de gǎijìn distinct improvement 明顯的成效 míngxiǎn de chéngxiào tangible result 明顯的優勢 Míngxiǎn de yōushì clear superiority 這很明顯是一個藉口。 Zhè hěn míngxiǎn shì yī ge jièkǒu. This is clearly a pretext.

adjective suitable; appropriate; becoming; right 你這樣說不合適。 Nǐ zhèyàng shuō bù héshì. It’s not right (or suitable) for you to say so. 星期五對我最合適。 Xīngqīwǔ duì wǒ zuì héshì. Friday suits me best. 這個詞用在這裡不合適。 Zhège cí yòng zài zhèlǐ bù héshì. This isn’t the right word to use here. 這雙鞋我穿著正合適。 Zhè shuāng xié wǒ chuānzhe zhèng héshì. These shoes fit me beautifully.

verb leave; depart from; deviate from 離開北京去上海 líkāi Běijīng qù Shànghǎi leave Beijing for Shanghai 離開崗位 líkāi gǎngwèi leave one’s post 離開正道 líkāi zhèngdào stray from (or off) the right path 離開主題 líkāi zhǔtí depart (or digress) from the subject 突然離開 tūrán líkāi take one’s departure suddenly 小孩子離不開媽媽。 xiǎoháizilí bù kāi māma. Children cannot do without their mothers.

noun single day; very short time adverb once; in case; now that 理論一旦為群眾所掌握, 就會產生巨大的物質力量。 Lǐlùn yīdàn wéi qúnzhòng suǒ zhǎngwò, jiù huì chǎnshēng jùdà de wùzhì lìliang. Once grasped by the masses, theory will generate a tremendous material force.
verb correct; amend; put right; rectify 改正錯誤 gǎizhèng cuòwù correct mistakes 改正缺點 gǎizhèng quēdiǎn overcome one’s shortcomings

adverb 1 straight 一直走 Yīzhí zǒu go straight ahead; keep straight on 2 continuously; all along; always; all the way 我一直在等你。 Wǒ yīzhí zài děng nǐ. I’ve been waiting for you all the time. 我們一直配合得很好。 Wǒmen yīzhí pèihé de hěn hǎo. We have cooperated very well all along. 她一直把我送到車站。 Tā yīzhí bǎ wǒ sòng dào chēzhàn. She went with me all the way to the station. 3 [emphasizing no exception] 全村從老人一直到小孩都非常熱情。 Quáncūn cóng lǎorén yīzhí dào xiǎohái dōu fēicháng rèqíng. All the villagers from the elderly people to the little kids were very friendly.

noun regret; sorrow; remorse 終身的遺憾 zhōngshēn deyíhàn lifelong regret 對此表示遺憾 duì cǐ biǎoshì yíhàn express regret over the matter adjective regretful; sorry 十分遺憾地指出 shífēn yíhàn de zhǐchū point out with great (or deep) regret 一點兒不感到遺憾 yīdiǎnr bù gǎndào yíhàn have no regrets 非常遺憾, 我不能接受你的邀請。 Fēicháng yíhàn, wǒ bùnéng jiēshòu nǐ de yāoqǐng. I am very sorry I will not be able to accept your invitation. 今晚的音樂會你不能來, 實在遺憾。 Jīnwǎn de yīnyuèhuì nǐ bù néng lái, shízài yíhàn. It’s really a pity that you can’t come to the concert this evening. 我遺憾地告訴你, 你考試沒及格。 wǒ yíhàn de gàosu nǐ, nǐ kǎoshì méi jígé. I regret to inform you that you failed the exam.

verb do harm to; damage; impair 損害保險 sǔnhài bǎoxiǎn nonlife insurance; insurance of damage 損害健康 sǔnhài jiànkāng impair one’s health 損害莊稼 Sǔnhài zhuāngjia damage crops; be harmful to crops 損害兩國關係 sǔnhài liǎng guó guānxi impair bilateral relations 損害他人的名譽 sǔnhài tārén de míngyù impair (or damage) another’s reputation; defame another’s character 損害第三者的利益 sǔnhài dì-sānzhě de lìyì jeopardize the interests of the third party; do sth. at the expense of the third party 決不能損害群眾的利益。 Juébù néng sǔnhài qúnzhòng de lìyì. On no account should the interests of the masses be infringed upon. 在光線不好的地方看書, 容易損害視力。 Zài guāngxiàn bù hǎo de dìfang kàn shū, róngyì sǔnhài shìlì. Reading in poor light is bad for one’s eyes. noun harm; injury; damage 重大損害 zhòngdà sǔnhài substantial damage 造成嚴重損害 Zàochéng yánzhòng sǔnhài do great harm to; inflict serious damage on
noun prestige; credit; reputation 樹立良好的信譽 shùlì liánghǎo dexìnyù build up a fine reputation 享有很高的國際信譽 xiǎngyǒu hěn gāo de guójì xìnyù enjoy high international prestige
verb excuse; forgive; pardon 得到原諒 dédào yuánliàng obtain a pardon 不能原諒的錯誤 Bù néng yuánliàng de cuòwù unpardonable mistake 我來晚了, 請原諒。 Wǒ lái wǎn le, qǐng yuánliàng. Please excuse me for being late.

adjective special; particular; out of the ordinary 特別的愛好 tèbié de àihào an unusual hobby 他的口音很特別。 Tā de kǒuyin hěn tèbié. He has a peculiar accent. 這棟樓的設計沒有什麼特別的地方。 Zhè dòng lóu de shèjì méiyǒu shénmetèbié de dìfang. The design of this building is nothing out of the ordinary. 這種花每當夜晚就散發出一種特別的香味兒。 Zhèzhǒng huā měidāng yèwǎn jiù sànfā chū yī zhǒng tèbié de xiāngwèir. As evening approaches, this flower gives off a distinctive fragrance. adverb 1 especially; particularly 質量特別好 zhìliàng tèbié hǎo of extra fine quality 工作特別努力 Gōngzuò tèbié nǔlì especially hard-working 建設一支特別能戰鬥的隊伍 jiànshè yī zhī tèbié néng zhàndòu de duìwu train a contingent of exceptional fighters 今天特別熱。 Jīntiān tèbié rè. It’s extremely hot today. 這個報告特別有教育意義。 zhège bàogào tèbié yǒu jiàoyù yìyì. The talk was particularly instructive. 2 for a special purpose; specially; deliberately 他臨走時特別去向女主人道謝。 Tā línzǒu shí tèbié qùxiàng nǚzhǔrén dàoxiè. He made a point of thanking his hostess before he left the party. 這些花是我特別為你摘的。 Zhèxiē huā shì wǒ tèbié wèi nǐ zhāi de. I picked these flowers specially for you. 3 all the more; in particular 他喜愛體育, 特別是籃球。 Tā xǐ'ài tǐyù, tèbié shì lánqiú. He loves sports, particularly basketball. 這裡最需要醫務人員, 特別是外科醫生。 Zhèlǐ zuì xūyào yīwù rényuán, tèbié shì wàikē yīshēng. There’s a huge need for medical workers here, especially surgeons.

verb 1 manage; run; administer; govern; be in charge of 管理不善 guǎnlǐ bùshàn mismanagement; poor management 管理財務 Guǎnlǐ cáiwù in charge of financial affairs 管理買賣 guǎnlǐ mǎimai manage the business 管理圖書 guǎnlǐ túshū run the library 2 look after; take care of; attend to 管理孩子的日常生活 guǎnlǐ háizi de rìcháng shēnghuó attend to the children’s daily life 3 control (people or animals); tend 管理牲口 guǎnlǐ shēngkou tend to and control draught animals 管理罪犯 Guǎnlǐ zuìfàn keep criminals under control; prisoner control

adverb 1 approximately; about 大約一小時的路程。 Dàyuē yī xiǎoshí de lùchéng. It’s about an hour’s journey. 大約將有五百人出席。 Dàyuē jiāng yǒu wǔbǎi rén chūxí. There will be approximately 500 people present. 2 probably 他大約是到書店去了。 tā dàyuē shì dào shūdiàn qùle. He has probably gone to the bookstore.

adjective general; rough; approximate 大概的估計 dàgài de gūjì a rough estimate 大概的數字 dàgài de shùzì an approximate figure 作一個大概的分析 Zuò yī ge dàgài de fēnxi make a general analysis adverb 1 generally; briefly 我大概跟他說了說。 Wǒ dàgài gēn tā shuō le shuō. Presumably you know him. 大概將有五百人出席。 Dàgài jiāng yǒu wǔbǎi rén chūxí. There will be approximately 500 people present. noun general idea; broad outline 我只知道個大概。 Wǒ zhǐ zhīdao ge dàgài. noun folk tradition any one of the names of 12 symbolic animals associated with a 12-year cycle, often used to denote the year of a person's birth (the 12 animals are: rat, ox, tiger, hare, dragon, snake, horse, sheep, monkey, rooster, dog, and hog) 他生肖屬鼠。 Tā shēngxiào shǔ shǔ. People stood in a long queue to buy tickets. 8 long and round pipe 水龍 shuǐlóng (fire) hose 過山龍 guòshānlóng siphon 9 (Lóng) a surname

This board is just the right size. 2 colloquial proper limits of speech (or action); sense of propriety 他辦事很有尺寸。 Tā bàn shì hěn yǒu chǐcun. He does everything very properly.

noun plan; project; programme 河流開發計劃 héliú kāifā jìhuà river development programme 切實可行的計劃 qièshíkěxíng de jìhuà feasible (or workable) plan 有計劃地進行 yǒu jìhuà de jìnxíng proceed in a planned way verb map out; plan 計劃好了再動手幹。 Jìhuà hǎo le zài dòngshǒu gàn. Map it out before you start.

noun interest; benefit; profit 個人利益 Gèrén lìyì individual (or personal) interest 國家利益 guó jiā lì yì national interests 商業利益 shāngyè lìyì commercial interests 物質利益 wùzhì lìyì material benefits (or gains) 侵害他人利益 qīnhài tārén lìyì encroach upon the interests of others 照顧全局利益 zhàogu quánjú lìyì take the interests of the whole into account 為大多數人謀利益 Wèi dàduōshù rén móu lìyì work for the interests of the vast majority of people 使人民群眾得到利益 shǐ rénmín qúnzhòng dédào lìyì benefit the masses of the people

What does this word mean? 5 understand; comprehend 令人不解 lìng rén bùjiě puzzling; incomprehensible 6 relieve oneself 大解 dàjiě empty one’s bowels; defecate 小解 xiǎojiě urinate noun mathematics solution 求解 qiújiě find a solution to a mathematical problem; answer

noun at the same time; simultaneously; meanwhile; in the meantime 同時存在 tóngshí cúnzài exist simultaneously; exist side by side; coexist 同時發生 tóngshí fāshēng happen at the same time; coincide; concur 在加快工程進度的同時, 必須注意質量。 Zài jiākuài gōngchéng jìndù detóngshí, bìxū zhùyì zhìliàng. While speeding up work on the project, we must pay attention to ensuring its quality. conjunction moreover; besides; furthermore 任務艱巨, 同時時間又很緊迫。 Rènwu jiānjù, tóngshí shíjiān yòu hěn jǐnpò. The task is arduous and besides, there’s little time. 造林可以保持水土, 同時也可以制止流沙。 Zàolín kěyǐ bǎochí shuǐtǔ, tóngshí yě kěyǐ zhìzhǐ liúshā. Afforestation conserves soil and water and also checks drift sand.

preposition [used in a passive structure to introduce either the doer of the action, or the action alone] 被擒 bèiqín be caught 他被對手擊倒。 Tā bèi duìshǒu jīdǎo. He was knocked down by his opponent. 她被選為主席。 Tā bèi xuǎn wéi zhǔxí. She was elected chairwoman. 那棵樹被大風颳倒了。 Nà kē shù bèi dà fēng guā dǎo le. The tree was uprooted by the gale. noun quilt 做一床被 Zuò yī chuáng bèi make a new quilt verb literary 1 cover (with) See 17376768被覆bei4fu4被覆 2 suffer 被災 bèi zāi suffer from a disaster
