verb infect; be contagious 水傳染 shuǐ chuánrǎn waterborne infection 接觸傳染 jiēchù chuánrǎn contagion 空氣傳染 kōngqì chuánrǎn infection through air 這病不傳染。 Zhè bìng bù chuánrǎn. This disease is not contagious (or infectious). 感冒很容易傳染。 Gǎnmào hěn róngyì chuánrǎn. Colds are highly infectious. 她低沉的情緒很快傳染給了班上其他同學。 Tā dīchén de qíngxù hěn kuài chuánrǎn gěi le bān shàng qítā tóngxué. Her gloomy mood soon infected other students in the class.

noun common cold 患感冒 Huàn gǎnmào catch cold; have a cold 流行性感冒 liúxíngxìnggǎnmào flu; influenza verb 1 catch cold 小心點兒, 別感冒了。 Xiǎoxīn diǎnr, bié gǎnmào le. Take care not to catch cold. 2 dialect be interested in; like (usu. used in the negative) 他對那人不感冒。 Tā duì nà rén bù gǎnmào. He doesn’t like that person.

adjective serious; grave; critical 嚴重故障 yánzhòng gùzhàng catastrophe failure 嚴重關頭 yánzhòng guāntóu critical juncture 嚴重後果 yánzhòng hòuguǒ serious (or grave) consequences 嚴重虧損 yánzhòng kuīsǔn heavy loss 嚴重違約 yánzhòng wéiyuē grave breach of a contract 病情嚴重 bìngqíng yánzhòng be seriously ill 充分認識到問題的嚴重性 chōngfèn rènshi dào wèntí de yánzhòngxìng be fully aware of the gravity of the question

verb lie; recline 躺倒不幹 tǎngdǎo bù gàn stay in bed—refuse to shoulder responsibilities any longer 躺下歇歇 Tǎng xià xiēxie lie down and rest a while 他正躺床上呢。 Tā zhèng tǎng chuáng shàng ne. He’s in bed. 不要躺在過去的成績上睡大覺。 Bùyào tǎng zài guòqu de chéngjì shàng shuì dà jiào. Don’t rest content with past achievements. or Don’t rest on your laurels.

noun 1 activity; manoeuvre 活動餘地 huódong yúdì room for manoeuvre; latitude 政治活動 zhèngzhì huódong political activities 從事科學活動 cóngshì kēxué huódong go in for scientific pursuits 2 psychology behaviour verb 1 act; move about; exercise 活動一下筋骨 huódong yīxià jīngǔ limber up the joints; loosen up; warm up 站起來活動 Zhàn qǐlai huódong. stand up and move about 2 be shaky; unsteady 口氣有點兒活動 Kǒuqì yǒudiǎnrhuódong sound less adamant; relent a little 椅子直活動。 yǐzi zhí huódong. The chair is rickety. 這顆牙活動了。 Zhè kē yá huódong le. This tooth is loose. 3 use personal influence or irregular means 替某人活動 Tì mǒurén huódong put in a word for sb.; use one’s influence on sb.’s behalf adjective movable; mobile; flexible 這樣說話比較活動些。 zhèyàng shuōhuà bǐjiào huódong xiē. This is a more flexible way to put it.

adverb even (to the extent that) 他忙得甚至好幾夜沒睡覺。 Tā máng de shènzhì hǎo jǐ yè méi shuìjiào. He was so busy that he didn’t even go to bed for several nights. conjunction (go) so far as to; so much so that 他對大家的批評置若罔聞, 甚至反唇相譏。 tā duì dàjiā de pīpíng zhìruòwǎngwén, shènzhì fǎnchúnxiāngjī. He not only ignored the criticism of the others but went so far as to be sarcastic.

verb delay; hold up 耽誤工夫 dānwu gōngfu waste time 耽誤了整個工程 dānwu le zhěnggè gōngchéng hold up (or delay) the whole project 把耽誤的時間追回來 bǎ dānwu de shíjiān zhuī huílai make up for lost time 她從不因私事耽誤工作。 tā cóngbù yīn sīshì dānwu gōngzuò. She never allows her private affairs to interfere with her work.
verb catch cold; catch a chill

adjective clear; neat 清楚 qīngchǔ clear; distinct noun literary pang; suffering 苦楚 kǔchǔ suffering; misery noun 1 one of the Warring States into which China was divided during the Eastern Zhou period (770-256 BC), occupying what is now Hubei and northern Hunan 2 name for what is now Hunan and esp. Hubei 3 a surname

verb afford first aid; give emergency treatment 有十幾個人食物中毒, 立刻送醫院急救。 Yǒu shíjǐ ge rén shíwù zhòngdú, lìkè sòng yīyuàn jíjiù. A dozen or so victims of food poisoning were sent to the hospital for emergency treatment.
noun ward (of a hospital); sickroom 查病房 chá bìngfáng (of a doctor) make one’s rounds; doctor’s rounds 隔離病房 gélí bìngfáng isolation ward 內科病房 nèikē bìngfáng medical ward

verb rescue; save; salvage 搶救病人 qiǎngjiù bìngrén give emergency treatment to a patient; rescue a patient 搶救國家財產 Qiǎngjiù guójiā cáichǎn save state property (from a fire, flood, etc.) 搶救水淹了的莊稼 qiǎngjiù shuǐ yān le de zhuāngjia salvage flooded crops 搶救無效。 Qiǎngjiù wúxiào. All rescue measures proved ineffectual.
verb relieve; alleviate; ease 緩解疼痛 Huǎnjiě téngtòng relieve (or ease) the pain 緩解住房緊張 huǎnjiě zhùfáng jǐnzhāng alleviate (or ease) the housing shortage

noun state of an illness; patient's condition 加重病情 jiāzhòng bìngqíng aggravate a disease 孩子的病情有好轉。 Háizi de bìngqíng yǒu hǎozhuǎn. The child’s condition took a favourable turn. or The child’s condition was improving.
verb resist; stand up to 不抵抗 bùdǐkàng make no resistance 奮起抵抗 fènqǐ dǐkàng rise in resistance; rise up against 增強對疾病的抵抗力 zēngqiáng duì jíbìng de dǐkànglì build up resistance to disease
noun 1 medicine virus 受病毒感染 shòu bìngdú gǎnrǎn infected by a virus; viral infection 2 computing virus 清除病毒 qīngchú bìngdú eliminate a virus 計算機病毒 jìsuànjī bìngdú (computer) virus

adverb without doubt; certainly; of course 這樣做當然最好。 Zhèyàng zuò dāngrán zuì hǎo. Of course this is the best way to do it. 借你的筆用一下可以嗎？——當然可以。 Jiè nǐ de bǐ yòng yī xià kěyǐ ma？ —— dāngrán kěyǐ. May I borrow your pen? —Certainly! or Sure! adjective 1 natural 當然同盟軍 Dāngrán tóngméngjūn natural ally 你取得成功是當然的。 Nǐ qǔdé chénggōng shì dāngrán de. It is quite natural that you should succeed. 2 ex officio 當然成員 Dāngrán chéngyuán an ex officio member (of a committee, etc.) 當然繼承人 dāngrán jìchéngrén heir apparent

noun 1 at ordinary times; in normal times 他平時住在廠裡, 星期六才回家。 Tā píngshí zhù zài chǎng lǐ, Xīngqīliù cái huíjiā. Ordinarily he stays at the factory and goes home only on Saturdays. 2 in peacetime 平時多流汗, 戰時少流血。 Píngshí duō liúhàn, zhànshí shǎo liúxuè. More sweat in peacetime (training) means less blood shed in war.
verb 1 put on; wear 戴眼鏡 dài yǎnjìng wear glasses 戴上手套 Dài shàng shǒutào put on one’s gloves 2 respect; honour 愛戴 àidài love and respect noun (Dài) a surname
noun gauze mask (worn over nose and mouth); surgical mask

verb 1 infect; taint 細菌感染 Xìjūn gǎnrǎn infected by bacteria 體弱者容易感染流行性感冒。 tǐruò zhě róngyì gǎnrǎn liúxíngxìng gǎnmào. If one is not strong, it’s easy to catch the flu. 2 influence; infect; affect; arouse 詩人的激情感染了每一個讀者。 Shīrén de jīqíng gǎnrǎn le měi yī ge dúzhě. The poet’s passion moved all his readers.

idiom incomparable; too different to compare; cannot be mentioned in the same breath; there's no comparison between them 他倆的文學成就不可同日而語。 Tāliǎ de wénxué chéngjiù bùkětóngrì'éryǔ. They are poles apart in their literary achievement.
verb discuss; talk about 談論國事 tánlùn guóshì discuss state affairs 同學們紛紛談論著今天發生的事。 Tóngxué men fēnfēn tánlùn zhe jīntiān fāshēng de shì. The students are all talking about what happened today.
to be used for

noun difference; disparity 年齡差別 niánlíng chābié disparity in age 數量與質量上的差別 shùliàng yǔ zhìliàng shàng de chābié quantitative and qualitative differences 縮小兩代人之間的差別 Suōxiǎo liǎng dài rén zhījiān dechābié narrow the generation gap 二者之間差別很大。 Èrzhě zhījiān chābié hěn dà. There is a world of difference between the two. 兩者之間沒有什麼差別。 Liǎngzhě zhījiān méiyǒu shénme chābié. There isn’t much to choose between the two.

noun abbreviation science and technology 科技扶貧 kējì fúpín help a poverty-stricken area with science and technology 科技成果轉讓 kējì chéngguǒ zhuǎnràng transfer of scientific and technological achievements 科技創新能力 kējì chuàngxīn nénglì hi-tech innovation capacity 科技成果產業化 Kējì chéngguǒ chǎnyèhuà apply scientific and technological advances to production 科技是第一生產力。(鄧小平) kējì shì dì-yī shēngchǎnlì. Science and technology is the first productive force.

verb 1 [after a verb to indicate motion away from the speaker] 把車開過去。 Bǎ chē kāi guoqu. Drive the car over (there). 一隻燕子飛過去了。 Yī zhī yànzi fēi guoqu le. A swallow flew past. 2 [after a verb to indicate turning away from the speaker] 先別把這一頁翻過去。 Xiān bié bǎ zhè yī yè fān guoqu. Don’t turn over the page yet. 3 [after a verb to indicate a departure from the normal state] 病人暈過去了。 Bìngrén yūn guoqu le. The patient has fainted. 4 [after a verb to indicate success of action] 企圖蒙混過去 Qǐtú ménghùn guoqu try to get by under false pretences 老太太腦子很清楚, 你休想騙過去。 Lǎotàitai nǎozi hěn qīngchu, nǐ xiūxiǎng piàn guoqu. The old lady is very sharp. You won’t fool her. 5 [after an adjective plus 得 or 不 to indicate superiority or inferiority] 雞蛋還能硬得過石頭去！ Jīdàn hái néng yìng de guò shítou qù! How can an egg be harder than a stone?

noun physical (or bodily) strength; physical power 消耗體力 xiāohào tǐlì be a drain on one’s (physical) strength; consume (or sap) one’s strength 增強體力 zēngqiáng tǐlì build up one’s strength 他體力好, 打滿五局擊敗對手。 Tā tǐlì hǎo, dǎ mǎn wǔ jú jībài duìshǒu. He had good stamina and beat his opponent at the end of the fifth game. 下半時隊員們顯得體力不支。 Xiàbàn shí duìyuán men xiǎnde tǐlì bù zhī. The players showed signs of tiredness during the second half.
adjective universal; general; widespread; common 普遍的愛國主義教育 pǔbiàn de àiguózhǔyì jiàoyù general education in patriotism 有普遍意義 yǒu pǔbiàn yìyì of universal significance; generally applicable

noun standard; criterion 不夠標準 bùgòu biāozhǔn substandard; below (or under) the standard (or mark) 合乎標準 Héhū biāozhǔn up to standard (or mark) 公認的標準 Gōngrèn debiāozhǔn accepted standard 按我們的標準來看 àn wǒmen de biāozhǔn lái kàn by our standards 用高標準要求自己 yòng gāo biāozhǔn yāoqiú zìjǐ set high demands on oneself; set high standards for oneself 真理的標準只能是社會實踐。 zhēnlǐ debiāozhǔn zhǐnéng shì shèhuì shíjiàn. Social practice alone can be the criterion for truth. adjective serving as or conforming to a standard
to fall down

adverb even (to the extent that) 他忙得甚至好幾夜沒睡覺。 Tā máng de shènzhì hǎo jǐ yè méi shuìjiào. He was so busy that he didn’t even go to bed for several nights. conjunction (go) so far as to; so much so that 他對大家的批評置若罔聞, 甚至反唇相譏。 tā duì dàjiā de pīpíng zhìruòwǎngwén, shènzhì fǎnchúnxiāngjī. He not only ignored the criticism of the others but went so far as to be sarcastic.

adjective direct; immediate (opp. 間接) 直接會晤 zhíjiē huìwù meet in person 直接交涉 zhíjiē jiāoshè negotiate directly with; talk things over face to face with 直接原因 zhíjiē yuányīn immediate (or direct) cause 由公司直接經營 yóu gōngsī zhíjiē jīngyíng run directly by the company
adjective indirect; secondhand (opp. 直接) 這消息我是間接聽來的。 Zhè xiāoxi wǒ shì jiànjiē tīng lái de. I heard the news indirectly.
verb 1 quote; cite 他在文章中引用了魯迅的話。 Tā zài wénzhāng zhōng yǐnyòng le Lǔ Xùn de huà. In his article he quoted Lu Xun. 2 recommend; appoint 引用賢能 yǐnyòng xiánnéng appoint virtuous and talented people

verb dialect speak; talk; answer 你走的時候言語一聲兒。 Nǐ zǒu de shíhou yányu yī shēngr. Let me know when you leave. 他這個人不愛言語。 Tā zhège rén bù ài yányu. He is a man of few words. 人家問你這事兒, 你怎麼不言語？ Rénjia wèn nǐ zhè shìr, nǐ zěnme bù yányu？ Why didn’t you say something when people asked you about it?
noun weapon; arms 重武器 zhòngwǔqì big arms; heavy weapon 放下武器 fàngxià wǔqì lay down one’s arms 野戰武器 yězhàn wǔqì field weapons 制導武器 zhìdǎo wǔqì guided weapon
1 very few 2 rarely

verb discuss; talk over 關於這個問題我們進行了長時間的討論。 Guānyú zhège wèntí wǒmen jìnxíng le cháng shíjiān de tǎolùn. We held a long discussion about this problem. 經過充分討論, 問題得到了解決。 Jīngguò chōngfèn tǎolùn, wèntí dédào le jiějué. After much discussion, the matter was finally settled. 他們討論了今後的計劃。 Tāmen tǎolùn le jīnhòu de jìhuà. They discussed their plans for the future. 這件事我們得討論討論。 Zhè jiàn shì wǒmen děi tǎolùn tǎolùn. We must talk it over.

verb for instance; for example (e.g.); such as 田徑運動的項目很多, 例如跳高, 跳遠, 百米賽跑等。 Tiánjìng yùndòng de xiàngmù hěn duō, lìrú tiàogāo, tiàoyuǎn, bǎimǐ sàipǎo děng. There are many track-and-field events, such as the high jump, the long jump, the 100-metre dash, etc.

noun misgivings; doubts 疑慮重重 yílǜchóngchóng be laden with misgivings 消除心中的疑慮 xiāochú xīnzhōng de yílǜ clear one’s mind of doubt; free sb. from doubts and misgivings 這件事在我們心中引起許多疑慮。 Zhè jiàn shì zài wǒmen xīnzhōng yǐnqǐ xǔduō yílǜ. It raised many doubts in our minds. verb be doubtful; hesitate 疑慮不安 yílǜ bù'ān be hesitant and worried

verb doubt; suspect 受到懷疑 shòudào huáiyí come under suspicion 消除懷疑 xiāochú huáiyí dispel doubts; clear up suspicion 引起懷疑 yǐnqǐ huáiyí raise doubts; arouse suspicion 持懷疑態度 chí huáiyí tàidu take a sceptical attitude 你懷疑誰作的案？ Nǐ huáiyí shuí zuò de àn？ Whom do you suspect of the crime? 我懷疑他今天來不了。 Wǒ huáiyí tā jīntiān láibuliǎo. I doubt if he’ll come today. 他這話很叫人懷疑。 Tā zhè huà hěn jiào rén huáiyí. What he said is extremely doubtful.

noun ability; capacity; capability 能力強 nénglì qiáng have great ability; be very capable 培養學生的推理能力 péiyǎng xuésheng de tuīlǐ nénglì develop students’ reasoning capacity 分析問題和解決問題的能力 fēnxi wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì ability to analyse and solve problems 他經驗豐富, 有能力擔當這項工作。 Tā jīngyàn fēngfù, yǒu nénglì dāndāng zhè xiàng gōngzuò. He is very experienced and can very well take on this responsibility.

adjective general; usual; normal 通常的方法 Tōngcháng de fāngfǎ the usual way; usually 通常情況下 tōngcháng qíngkuàng xià under normal conditions; normally adverb generally; usually; ordinarily; as a rule 通常消息可靠人士 Tōngcháng xiāoxi kěkào rénshì usually reliable sources 晚間我通常不外出。 Wǎnjiān wǒ tōngcháng bù wàichū. As a rule I don’t go out in the evening. 我通常六點鐘起床。 Wǒ tōngcháng liù diǎn zhōng qǐchuáng. I generally get up at six o’clock.

noun reality; practice 客觀實際 kèguān shíjì objective reality 從實際出發 cóng shíjì chūfā proceed from actual conditions; realistic 理論和實際 lǐlùn hé shíjì theory and practice 切合當地實際 qièhé dāngdì shíjì suit local conditions 思想經常會落後於實際。 sīxiǎng jīngcháng huì luòhòu yú shíjì. Thinking often lags behind reality. adjective 1 practical; realistic 實際經驗 shíjì jīngyàn practical experience 你這種想法不實際。 Nǐ zhèzhǒng xiǎngfa bù shíjì. You are being unrealistic. 2 real; actual; concrete 實際的例子 shíjì de lìzi concrete instance 實際生活水平 shíjì shēnghuó shuǐpíng real standard of living 實際使用投資 shíjì shǐyòng tóuzī actual utilized investment 石油產量實際增長百分之四。 shíyóu chǎnliàng shíjì zēngzhǎng bǎi fēnzhī sì. Oil production increased by 4% in real terms.
noun answer; solution; key 練習的答案 liànxí de dá'àn key to an exercise 找不到問題的答案 zhǎo bùdào wèntí de dá'àn find no solution to the problem

verb 1 wish; like; want 他們願意你留在這裡。 Tāmen yuànyi nǐ liú zài zhèlǐ. They hope that you will stay here. 2 be willing; be ready 願意幫忙 yuànyi bāngmáng be ready to help 表示願意 biǎoshì yuànyi express (or demonstrate, signify) a willingness (to do sth.)

adjective necessary; essential; indispensable 必要時 bì yào shí when needed; if the need arises; in case of necessity 提供必要的資金 Tígōng bìyào de zījīn provide the requisite capital 沒有必要再討論了。 Méiyǒu bìyào zài tǎolùn le. No more discussion is needed.

noun archaic an animal offered as a sacrifice; sacrifice verb 1 sacrifice oneself; die a martyr's death; lay down one's life 英勇犧牲 yīngyǒngxīshēng die a heroic death 他為了救人犧牲了自己的生命。 tā wèile jiùrén xīshēng le zìjǐ de shēngmìng. He sacrificed (or gave) his life to rescue another. 2 sacrifice; give up; do sth. at the expense of 犧牲個人利益 Xīshēng gèrén lìyì sacrifice one’s personal interests 犧牲質量而去追求數量是錯誤的。 Xīshēng zhìliàng ér qù zhuīqiú shùliàng shì cuòwù de. It is wrong to sacrifice quality for quantity.

noun 1 mathematics angle 撐條和橫梁之間角度太大。 Chēng tiáo hé héngliáng zhījiān jiǎodù tài dà. The brace is at too big an angle with the beam. 2 point of view; angle 從各個角度來研究問題 Cóng gègè jiǎodù lái yánjiū wèntí examine the matter from various angles

verb understand; comprehend 不可理解 bùkě lǐjiě incomprehensible; be above (or past, beyond) one’s comprehension 加深理解 Jiāshēn lǐjiě deepen one’s comprehension; acquire a better understanding 相互理解 xiānghù lǐjiě mutual understanding 你的意思我完全理解。 Nǐ de yìsi wǒ wánquán lǐjiě. I understand you completely. or I see perfectly well what you mean.

verb think deeply; meditate; ponder over; reflect on 思考決策 sīkǎo juécè decision thinking 思考問題 sīkǎo wèntí ponder a problem 獨立思考 dúlì sīkǎo think things out for oneself; think independently 思考的一代 sīkǎo de yīdài thinking generation
noun bridegroom
1 chang pao (traditional Chinese men's robe) 2 gown 3 robe M: 件jiàn [件]
noun mandarin jacket (worn over a gown)
noun a close-fitting woman's dress with high neck and slit skirt; cheongsam; mandarin gown
noun bride
noun dress and personal adornment; dress
noun lady's wedding garment; wedding dress
verb mix together; fuse; merge 銅與錫的融合 tóng yǔ xī de rónghé the fusion of copper and tin

adjective deep; profound; deepgoing 深刻地闡明 Shēnkè de chǎnmíng expound profoundly 深刻的教訓 shēnkè de jiàoxun bitter lesson 作深刻的檢討 zuò shēnkè de jiǎntǎo make a penetrating self-criticism 一次深刻的革命 yī cì shēnkè de gémìng a deepgoing revolution 受到一次深刻的教育 shòudào yī cì shēnkè de jiàoyù learn a profound lesson

noun 1 work; labour 農業勞動 nóngyè láodòng rural labour 血汗勞動 xuèhàn láodòng hard labour; sweat of one’s brow 2 physical or manual labour 勞動鍛煉 láodòng duànliàn temper oneself through manual labour verb do physical labour 他勞動去了。 Tā láodòng qù le. He’s gone out to do physical labour.
noun industry
noun finance; banking
verb 1 (of a socioeconomic structure, cultural practices, etc.) transform; evolve 2 change product line; diversion

verb enter; get into (opp. 退出) 進入角色 jìnrù juésè get inside the character that one is playing; enter into the spirit of a character; live one’s part 進入市場 jìnrù shìchǎng enter a market 進入陣地 jìnrù zhèndì get into position 進入決賽階段 jìnrù juésài jiēduàn enter the finals 進入隆冬時節 jìnrù lóngdōng shíjié (of temperature) drop into the depths of winter 運動已進入高潮。 Yùndòng yǐ jìnrù gāocháo. The campaign has reached a climax. 中國經濟建設進入了新的時期。 Zhōngguó jīngjì jiànshè jìnrù le xīn de shíqī. China has entered a new stage of economic development.
noun 1 threshold 跨過門檻 kuàguò ménkǎn step over the threshold 2 dialect way to do sth.; knack 懂門檻 dǒng ménkǎn know the tricks

noun balance; equilibrium 保持平衡 bǎochí pínghéng maintain one’s equilibrium; keep one’s balance 失去平衡 shīqù pínghéng lose one’s balance; in a state of imbalance 收支平衡 shōu-zhī pínghéng balance between income and expenditure; balance of payments verb bring into or keep in equilibrium; balance 逐漸在全國平衡工業布局 zhújiàn zài quánguó pínghéng gōngyè bùjú gradually distribute industry evenly all over the country 咱們組的計劃還要跟別的組平衡一下。 Zánmen zǔ de jìhuà hái yào gēn bié de zǔ pínghéng yīxià. We’ll have to balance our plan with those of the other groups.
birthrate

verb 1 cultivate (plants) 培養花卉 péiyǎng huāhuì cultivate flowers and plants; grow flowers 2 culture (micro-organisms) 細菌培養 xìjūn péiyǎng bacteria culture 3 foster (or train, develop) (a certain spirit, ability, etc.) in sb. 培養好習慣 péiyǎng hǎo xíguàn develop good habits 培養積極分子 péiyǎng jījí fènzǐ foster activists 培養對閱讀的興趣 péiyǎng duì yuèdú de xìngqù develop an interest in reading 培養學生自學能力 péiyǎng xuésheng zìxué nénglì train students to study on their own
noun sense; idea; concept 傳統觀念 chuántǒng guānniàn traditional ways of thinking; old-fashioned ideas 紀律觀念 jìlǜ guānniàn sense of discipline

noun habit; custom; usual practice 從小培養勞動習慣 Cóngxiǎo péiyǎng láodòng xíguàn cultivate from childhood the habit of working with one’s own hands 破除舊習慣, 樹立新風尚 Pòchú jiù xíguàn, shùlì xīn fēngshàng discard outmoded customs and establish new ones 別養成抽煙的習慣。 Bié yǎngchéng chōuyān de xíguàn. Don’t get into the habit of smoking. verb accustomed to; used to; inured to 他習慣早起。 Tā xíguàn zǎoqǐ. He is used to getting up early. 我已經習慣了北方的氣候。 Wǒ yǐjing xíguàn le běifāng de qìhòu. I’ve become accustomed to the northern climate. 這樣潮濕的天氣我實在不習慣。 Zhèyàng cháoshī de tiānqì wǒ shízài bù xíguàn. I just can’t get used to this damp weather.
adjective 1 long-range; long-distance (opp. 近程) 遠程航行 yuǎnchéng hángxíng long voyage 2 computing telecommunications remote; tele- 遠程用戶 yuǎnchéng yònghù remote user

noun 1 scene (of an incident) 保護現場 bǎohù xiànchǎng keep the scene (of a crime or accident) intact; preserve the scene 作案現場 zuò'àn xiànchǎng the scene of a crime; crime scene 2 site; spot 工作現場 gōngzuò xiànchǎng worksite 試驗現場 shìyàn xiànchǎng testing ground

conjunction 1 and; as well as 偉大而艱巨的任務 wěidà ér jiānjù de rènwu great and arduous task 2 and yet; but; while on the other hand 有其名而無其實 Yǒu qí míng ér wú qíshí in name but not in reality 你喜愛體育運動, 而我呢, 情願看書。 Nǐ xǐ'ài tǐyù yùndòng, ér wǒ ne, qíngyuàn kàn shū. You like sports, while I’d rather read. 這裡的氣候有利於種小麥, 而不利於種水稻。 Zhèlǐ de qìhòu yǒulì yú zhòng xiǎomài, ér bù lìyú zhòng shuǐdào. The climate here is favourable to the growth of wheat but unfavourable to the growth of rice. 3 so that; in order to 不要因失敗而灰心, 也不要因成功而驕傲。 Bùyào yīn shībài ér huīxīn, yě bùyào yīn chénggōng ér jiāo'ào. Don’t be discouraged by failure or get dizzy with success. 4 [with 由, 從, 自, etc.] to 由南而北 Yóu nán ér běi from south to north 自遠而近 zìyuǎn'érjìn approach from a distance 由童年而少年, 而壯年 yóu tóngnián ér shàonián, ér zhuàngnián from childhood to teenage, then to middle age 5 [connecting an adverbial element to a verb] 匆匆而去 cōngcōng'érqù leave in haste 盤旋而上 pánxuán ér shàng spiral up 順流而下 shùnliú'érxià go down the stream 6 [between a subject and a predicate expressing a condition, to be followed by a clause indicating result] if 作家而不深入群眾, 就寫不出好作品。 Zuòjiā ér bù shēnrù qúnzhòng, jiù xiěbuchū hǎo zuòpǐn. If a writer does not go deep among the masses, he cannot expect to turn out good writings.

noun enterprise; business 企業對個人 qǐyè duì gèrén business to customer (B2C) 工礦企業 gōngkuàng qǐyè factories, mines and other enterprises 全資企業 quán zī qǐyè exclusively-invested enterprise 鄉鎮企業 xiāngzhèn qǐyè township enterprise

verb reduce; decrease; lessen; cut down (opp. 增多) 減少財政赤字 jiǎnshǎo cáizhèng chìzì plug the budget deficit 減少流通環節 jiǎnshǎo liútōng huánjié cut down on circulation intermediaries 減少非生產性開支 Jiǎnshǎo fēishēngchǎnxìng kāizhī reduce nonproductive expenditure 給他減少一些工作 gěi tā jiǎnshǎo yīxiē gōngzuò relieve him of some of his work 精簡機構, 減少層次 jīngjiǎn jīgòu, jiǎnshǎo céngcì simplify the administrative structure and eliminate duplication

noun pollution 核污染 héwūrǎn nuclear pollution 大氣污染 dàqìwūrǎn air (or atmospheric) pollution 工業污染 gōngyè wūrǎn industrial pollution 環境污染 huánjìngwūrǎn environmental pollution 精神污染 jīngshén wūrǎn spiritual corruption verb pollute; contaminate 河流已被該廠排放的有毒廢水污染。 héliú yǐ bèi gāi chǎng páifàng de yǒudú fèishuǐ wūrǎn. The river has been polluted by (or with) waste water from that factory.

verb apply for; file an application 申請破產 shēn qǐng pò chǎn file for bankrupcy; petition for bankruptcy 申請入黨 shēnqǐng rùdǎng apply for Party membership 申請調動工作 shēnqǐng diàodòng gōngzuò apply for a transfer; ask for a transfer; ask to be transferred to another job 申請法律援助 shēnqǐng fǎlǜ yuánzhù apply for legal aid 申請入境簽證 shēnqǐng rùjìng qiānzhèng apply for an entry visa 申請出境簽證 shēnqǐng chūjìng qiānzhèng apply for an exit visa 申請註冊域名 shēnqǐng zhùcè yùmíng domain name application and registration 向……申請 xiàng … shēnqǐng make an application to; lodge (or file) an application with; present a petition to
home loan

verb produce; give rise to; bring about; evolve; emerge; come into being 產生好的結果 chǎnshēng hǎo de jiéguǒ produce good results 產生很大的影響 chǎnshēng hěn dà de yǐngxiǎng exert a great influence 舊的問題解決了, 新的問題又產生了。 Jiù de wèntí jiějué le, xīn de wèntí yòu chǎnshēng le. New problems crop up after old ones are resolved. 每個小組產生兩個代表。 Měi ge xiǎozǔ chǎnshēng liǎng ge dàibiǎo. Each group nominates two representatives. 實踐使我們的認識產生了新的飛躍。 Shíjiàn shǐ wǒmen de rènshi chǎnshēng le xīn de fēiyuè. Practice (or Practical experience) has pushed our knowledge further. 在中國幾千年的歷史中, 產生了豐富燦爛的文化。 Zài Zhōngguó jǐqiān nián de lìshǐ zhōng, chǎnshēng le fēngfù cànlàn de wénhuà. The riches and splendour of our Chinese culture has evolved over a long history of thousands of years. 最近我對圍棋產生了很大的興趣。 Zuìjìn wǒ duì wéiqí chǎnshēng le hěn dà de xìngqù. I’ve become very interested in Weiqi recently.
adjective profound and lasting; far-reaching 影響深遠 yǐngxiǎng shēnyuǎn have a far-reaching influence 具有深遠的歷史意義 jùyǒu shēnyuǎn de lìshǐ yìyì have profound historic significance

verb 1 produce; manufacture 達到生產定額 dádào shēngchǎn dìng'é meet the required production quotas 堅守生產崗位 Jiānshǒu shēngchǎn gǎngwèi stick to one’s post on the production front 挖掘生產潛力 wājué shēngchǎn qiánlì tap the productive potentialities 此地生產水稻和生絲。 Cǐdì shēngchǎn shuǐdào hé shēngsī. This place produces rice and raw silk. 新車間已投入生產。 Xīn chējiān yǐ tóurù shēngchǎn. The new workshop has gone into operation. 2 give birth to a child 她快生產了。 Tā kuài shēngchǎn le. She’ll be having her baby soon. or She’s expecting her baby soon.
always

noun foundation; base; basis 理論基礎 lǐlùn jīchǔ theoretical basis 物質基礎 wùzhì jīchǔ material base 國民經濟基礎 guómín jīngjì jīchǔ foundation of the national economy 新校舍的基礎 xīn xiàoshè dejīchǔ foundations of a new school 在上述條件的基礎上 zài shàngshù tiáojiàn dejīchǔ shàng on the basis of the above-said conditions 在原有的基礎上提高一步 Zài yuányǒu de jīchǔ shàng tígāo yī bù make improvements on what has already been achieved 他正在努力學習, 為日後的研究工作打下牢固的基礎。 Tā zhèngzài nǔlì xuéxí, wèi rìhòu de yánjiū gōngzuò dǎxià láogù de jīchǔ. He is studying hard in order to lay a good foundation for his future research work.

adjective 1 nimble; agile; quick 腦筋靈活 nǎojīn línghuó be quick-witted; have a supple mind 手腳靈活 Shǒu-jiǎo línghuó dexterous and quick in action 2 flexible; elastic 靈活多樣的經營方式 línghuó duōyàng de jīngyíng fāngshì flexible and diversified forms of operation 靈活機動的戰略戰術 línghuó jīdòng de zhànlüè zhànshù flexible strategy and tactics
verb 1 defeat; beat; worst 以懸殊比分打敗對手 yǐ xuánshū bǐfēn dǎbài duìshǒu beat the opponent team by a large score 2 suffer a defeat; be defeated 打了敗仗 dǎ le bài zhàng lose a battle

verb strive for; fight for; win over 爭取群眾 zhēngqǔ qúnzhòng win over the masses 爭取時間 zhēngqǔ shíjiān race (or work) against time 爭取選票 zhēngqǔ xuǎnpiào canvass for votes 爭取主動 zhēngqǔ zhǔdòng try to gain the initiative; contend for the initiative 要爭取一切可以爭取的人, 團結一切可以團結的人。 Yào zhēngqǔ yīqiè kěyǐ zhēngqǔ de rén, tuánjié yīqiè kěyǐ tuánjié de rén. We must win over all those who can be won over, and unite all those who can be united. 你能給我們雜誌寫點兒什麼嗎？——我爭取吧。 Nǐ néng gěi wǒmen zázhì xiě diǎnr shénme ma? ——Wǒ zhēngqǔ ba. Can you write something for the magazine? —Well, I’ll try.

noun expression; indication 友好的表示 Yǒuhǎo de biǎoshì expression of friendship; friendly gesture 接吻是愛的表示。 jiēwěn shì ài debiǎoshì. Kissing is a sign of affection. verb show; express; indicate 表示憤慨 Biǎoshì fènkǎi voice (or express) one’s indignation 表示關切 biǎoshì guānqiè show concern 表示歉意 biǎoshì qiànyì offer one’s regrets; offer an apology 表示熱烈歡迎 biǎoshì rèliè huānyíng extend a warm welcome 發高燒表示有病。 Fā gāoshāo biǎoshì yǒu bìng. A high fever indicates sickness. 我們謹向你們表示衷心的祝賀。 Wǒmen jǐn xiàng nǐmen biǎoshì zhōngxīn de zhùhè. We wish to convey to you our hearty congratulations.
verb 1 satirize 2 ridicule; taunt; mock 別諷刺他了。 Bié fěngcì tā le. Don’t ridicule him.
noun 1 end 信的末尾 xìn de mòwěi at the end of the letter (排隊)排在末尾 páiduì pái zài mòwěi stand at the end of a queue 2 music finale; end

noun originally; at first; at the outset 起初他一個字也不認識, 現在已經能夠寫信了。 qǐchū tā yī ge zì yě bù rènshi, xiànzài yǐjing nénggòu xiěxìn le. At first he couldn’t read and write, but now he can even carry on a correspondence. 起初, 這裡只是一個小漁村。 qǐchū, zhèlǐ zhǐshì yī ge xiǎo yúcūn. At the beginning, this was a mere fishing village. 這個工廠起初很小。 Zhège gōngchǎng qǐchū hěn xiǎo. The factory was originally very small.

noun assignment; mission; task; job 承擔任務 chéngdān rènwu assume a mission 接受任務 Jiēshòu rènwu accept an assignment 完成任務 wánchéng rènwu fulfill the task; complete the mission 主要任務 zhǔyào rènwu main task 擔負艱巨的任務 Dānfù jiānjù de rènwu shoulder a difficult task 壓倒一切的任務 yādǎo yīqiè de rènwu overwhelming task
noun cause; origin 事故的起因 Shìgù de qǐyīn the cause of the accident verb originate in; be caused by 事件起因於一樁小事。 Shìjiàn qǐyīn yú yī zhuāng xiǎoshì. The incident originated in a trifle.
noun wedding (ceremony) 星期天舉行婚禮。 Xīngqītiān jǔxíng hūnlǐ. The wedding will take place on Sunday.

verb hold (a meeting, ceremony, etc.) 舉行罷工 jǔxíng bàgōng stage a strike 舉行會談 jǔxíng huìtán hold talks 舉行宴會 jǔxíng yànhuì give (or host) a banquet 大會在人民大會堂舉行。 Dàhuì zài Rénmín Dàhuìtáng jǔxíng. The congress took place (or was held) in the Great Hall of the People. 你們幾時舉行婚禮？ Nǐmen jǐ shí jǔxíng hūnlǐ？ When is your wedding?
noun guests; visitors 賓客盈門 bīnkèyíngmén a house always full of visitors 請賓客入席 Qǐng bīnkè rùxí show the guests to their seats 賓客如雲。 bīnkè rúyún Visitors come in flocks.

noun 1 number; figure; amount 數以萬計 shùyǐwànjì number tens of thousands 數數 shǔshù count; reckon 代表人數 dàibiǎo rénshù number of delegates 2 mathematics number; digit 小數 xiǎoshù decimal 3 linguistics number 單數 dānshù singular number 複數 fùshù plural number 4 fate; destiny 劫數 jiéshù inexorable doom; predestined fate number 1 several; a few 數百人 shù bǎi rén several hundred people 數小時後 shù xiǎoshí hòu a few hours later 2 [after a numeral or a classifier to indicate an approximate number] 千數斤小麥 qiān shù jīn xiǎomài around a thousand jin of wheat
adjective surprised; amazed; astonished; astounded 他的無知令人驚訝。 Tā de wúzhī lìng rén jīngyà. His ignorance is astonishing.
