verb hope; wish; expect 希望你明天能來。 Xīwàng nǐ míngtiān néng lái. I hope you’ll come tomorrow. 他希望長大了當醫生。 Tā xīwàng zhǎngdà le dāng yīshēng. He wants to be a doctor when he grows up. noun 1 hope; wish; expectation 把希望變成現實 Bǎ xīwàng biànchéng xiànshí turn hopes into reality 大有成功的希望 dà yǒu chénggōng de xīwàng promise high hopes of success; stand a very good chance of success 他康復的希望不大。 Tā kāngfù de xīwàng bù dà. There is little hope of his recovery. or He is unlikely to recover. 2 that on which hope is placed 青少年是我們的未來, 是我們的希望。 Qīng-shàonián shì wǒmen de wèilái, shì wǒmen de xīwàng. The youth is our future and our hope.
noun food; eatables; edibles

verb 1 explain; explicate; expound; illustrate 說明理由 shuōmíng lǐyóu give reasons 說明真相 shuōmíng zhēnxiàng give the facts 說明機器的用法 Shuōmíng jīqì de yòng fǎ explain how a machine works 舉例說明 jǔlìshuōmíng illustrate by examples 代表團認為有必要說明自己的立場。 Dàibiǎotuán rènwéi yǒu bìyào shuōmíng zìjǐ de lìchǎng. The delegation deems it necessary to state its position. 2 show; prove 他的話很能說明問題。 tā dehuà hěn néng shuōmíng wèntí. His words are very telling. 事實充分說明這種做法是正確的。 Shìshí chōngfèn shuōmíng zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ shì zhèngquè de. The facts show clearly that this procedure is correct. noun explanation; directions; caption 圖片下邊附有說明。 Túpiàn xiàbian fùyǒu shuōmíng. There is a caption under the picture.
noun wedding feast
noun song 校園歌曲 xiàoyuán gēqǔ campus song
adjective grand; magnificent 盛大的歡迎 shèngdà de huānyíng rousing welcome 盛大的遊行 shèngdà de yóuxíng mammoth parade 盛大的招待會 shèngdà de zhāodàihuì grand reception

verb strengthen; enhance; augment; reinforce (opp. 削弱) 加強安全 jiāqiáng ānquán tighten security 加強戰備 Jiāqiáng zhànbèi enhance combat preparedness; intensify preparations against war 加強紀律性 Jiāqiáng jìlǜ xìng strengthen discipline 加強法制觀念 jiāqiáng fǎzhì guānniàn enhance one’s awareness of law 加強行業管理 jiāqiáng hángyè guǎnlǐ strengthen the trade management 加強軍事力量 jiāqiáng jūnshì lìliang augment military strength 加強輿論監督 jiāqiáng yúlùn jiāndū strengthen the supervisory function of public opinion 加強黨風政風建設 jiāqiáng dǎngfēng zhèngfēng jiànshè improve the conduct of the Party and the government 看到工作成績, 大家信心加強了。 Kàndào gōngzuò chéngjì, dàjiā xìnxīn jiāqiáng le. Seeing the results of their work, everyone felt their confidence increase. adjective reinforced 加強排 jiāqiáng pái military reinforced platoon

adjective at ease; natural; free from affectation 態度非常自然 Tàidu fēicháng zìran be quite at ease 他不自然地笑了一笑。 Tā bù zìran de xiào le yī xiào. He forced a smile. 拍照時表情要自然些。 Pāizhào shí biǎoqíng yào zìran xiē. Try to look natural for your photograph. 她雖是初次演出, 但是演得很自然。 Tā suī shì chūcì yǎnchū, dànshì yǎn de hěn zìran. Her acting was very natural although this was her first appearance on stage. 像他這樣年齡的孩子對女孩兒產生興趣是很自然的。 Xiàng tā zhèyàng niánlíng de háizi duì nǚ hái'ér chǎnshēng xìngqù shì hěn zìran de. It’s natural for a boy his age to be interested in girls.
well-known phrase Once you form a habit, it comes natural to you. or Habit becomes second nature.
adverb slowly; leisurely 慢慢(地)說 Mànmàn shuō speak slowly

verb pay attention to; take note (or notice) of 注意工作方法 zhùyì gōngzuò fāngfǎ pay attention to work methods 注意別摔倒。 Zhùyì bié shuāidǎo. Mind you don’t fall. or Mind your step. 注意, 馬上就要點炮啦！ Zhùyì, mǎshàng jiùyào diǎn pào la! Look out! We’re ready to blast. 我沒注意他什麼時候走的。 Wǒ méi zhùyì tā shénme shíhou zǒu de. I didn’t notice when he left. 必須注意團結一切可以團結的人。 Bìxū zhùyì tuánjié yīqiè kěyǐ tuánjié de rén. We must be careful to unite all those we can.

verb VARIANT OF 30980096隨心sui2xin1隨心 follow one’s inclinations adjective at will; as one pleases; at random 隨意抽查 suíyì chōuchá random check 隨意選擇 suíyì xuǎnzé casual choice 隨意漲價 suíyì zhǎngjià wilful inflation of prices 請各位隨意！ Qǐng gèwèi suíyì! Make yourselves at home, everybody!
conjunction literary whereas; on the other hand; conversely 反之亦然 fǎnzhīyìrán vice versa 反之則不然 fǎnzhī zé bùrán but not vice versa

adjective 1 good; well 良好的氣氛 liánghǎo de qìfēn a favourable atmosphere 良好的賽風 liánghǎo de sàifēng fine sportsmanship 良好的願望 liánghǎo de yuànwàng good intentions 打下良好的基礎 dǎxià liánghǎo de jīchǔ lay a sound foundation 自我感覺良好 Zìwǒ gǎnjué liánghǎo feel fine 水稻長勢良好。 Shuǐdào zhǎngshì liánghǎo. The rice is coming on splendidly. 手術經過良好。 Shǒushù jīngguò liánghǎo. The operation came off well. 財政貿易情況良好。 Cáizhèng màoyì qíngkuàng liánghǎo. Finance and trade are in a good state. 2 B (in grading, somewhere between excellent and passing) 考試成績良好 kǎoshì chéngjì liánghǎo get a B in the exam

idiom 1 with facility; with high proficiency 他畫起馬來真可謂得心應手。 Tā huà qǐmǎ lái zhēn kěwèi déxīnyìngshǒu. He is in his element when painting horses. 2 serviceable; handy 這支筆寫起來得心應手。 Zhè zhī bǐ xiě qǐlai déxīnyìngshǒu. This pen writes very well.
noun appearance; exterior; looks 不要以外貌取人。 Bùyào yǐ wàimào qǔ rén. Don’t judge people by their appearance.

verb describe; depict; portray 描寫一位畫家的成長過程 miáoxiě yī wèi huàjiā de chéngzhǎng guòchéng describe his development into painter 這段描寫非常生動。 Zhè duàn miáoxiě fēicháng shēngdòng. This description is very vivid. adjective linguistics descriptive

noun expression; manner; bearing; mien 神態安詳 shéntài ānxiáng appear calm and composed 神態各異 shéntài gèyì with different expressions 神態悠閒 shéntài yōuxián look perfectly relaxed 看她的神態像舞蹈演員。 Kàn tā de shéntài xiàng wǔdǎo yǎnyuán. From the way she carries herself she must be a dancer.

noun movement; motion; action 動作敏捷 Dòngzuò mǐnjié quick in one’s movements 動作緩慢 dòngzuò huǎnmàn slow in one’s movements 優美的舞蹈動作 yōuměi de wǔdǎo dòngzuò graceful dance movements verb act; start moving 看看他下一步怎樣動作。 Kànkan tā xiàyībù zěnyàng dòngzuò. Let’s see what he does next.

noun in the heart; at heart; in mind 心裡發悶 xīnli fāmèn feel constriction in the area of the heart 心裡有事 xīnli yǒu shì have sth. on one’s mind 心裡不痛快 xīnli bù tòngkuai feel bad about sth. 心裡裝著億萬人民 xīnli zhuāng zhe yìwàn rénmín have at heart the well-being of hundreds of millions 記在心裡 jì zài xīnli keep (or bear) in mind 他將永遠活在我們心裡。 Tā jiāng yǒngyuǎn huó zài wǒmen xīnli. He will live forever in our hearts.
noun scenery 站在山上眺望山下的景物 Zhàn zài shān shàng tiàowàng shān xià de jǐngwù stand on the hill top looking down on the scenery below

verb excite; stir; agitate; move 激動人心的消息 jīdòng rénxīn de xiāoxi sensational piece of news 他獲得了冠軍, 激動得流下眼淚。 tā huòdé le guànjūn, jīdòng de liúxià yǎnlèi. When he won the championship, he was moved to tears. adjective excited; annoyed 激動萬分 jīdòngwànfēn be beside oneself with excitement 他受了這般屈辱, 情緒很激動。 Tā shòu le zhèbān qūrǔ, qíngxù hěn jīdòng. Being slandered that way made his blood boil.

noun 1 archaic washbasin 2 shallow flat receptacle, as a tray, plate, dish, etc. 茶盤 chápán tea tray 3 dialect face; appearance 盤亮 pán liàng good-looking; pretty 4 market quotation; current price 大盤 dàpán overall situation in the securities market verb 1 coil (up); wind; twist 把繩子盤起來 bǎ shéngzi pán qǐlai coil up the rope 把頭髮盤成一個髻 bǎ tóufa pán chéng yī ge jì comb one’s hair into a coil or bun 2 build (by laying bricks, stones, etc.) 盤灶 pán zào build a brick cooking range 3 check; examine; interrogate 盤究 pánjiū cross-question; investigate 4 transfer the ownership of; make over to sb. else 把整個廠連同設備盤給人家 bǎ zhěnggè chǎng liántóng shèbèi pán gěi rénjia transfer the ownership of the factory with all its equipment to another person 5 carry; transport 從倉庫往外頭盤東西 cóng cāngkù wǎng wài tóu pán dōngxi carry things out of the warehouse measure word 1 [for dishes, millstones, etc.] 四盤菜 sì pán cài four dishes 一盤磨 yī pán mó a pair of millstones 一盤電線 yī pán diànxiàn a coil of electric cable 2 sports game; set 下一盤棋 xià yī pán qí play a game of chess 以六比零勝了這一盤 yǐ liù bǐ líng shèng le zhè yī pán win the set in six straight games
adjective bright-coloured; gaily-coloured 顏色鮮艷 yánsè xiānyàn gay colours; brightly coloured 穿著鮮艷的民族服裝 chuānzhe xiānyàn de mínzú fúzhuāng wearing colourful national costume
noun body; stature 身軀高大 shēnqū gāodà tall of stature 健壯的身軀 Jiànzhuàng de shēnqū sound body

noun 1 god; deity; divinity; immortal 神鬼 shén-guǐ gods and ghosts 諸神 Zhū shén gods 命運之神 mìngyùn zhī shén the god of fortune 2 spirit; mind 耗神 hào shén take up one’s energy 雙目有神 shuāngmù yǒushén have a pair of piercing eyes 3 expression; look 眼神 yǎnshén expression in one’s eyes adjective 1 supernatural; magical; miraculous 神投手 shén tóushǒu sharpshooter (in basketball); superb shooter (or scorer) 2 dialect smart; clever 這孩子真神！ Zhè háizi zhēn shén! What a smart child! 這家伙神了！ Zhè jiāhuo shén le! This fellow is incredible!

verb stretch; extend 伸腰 shēnyāo straighten oneself up 伸胳臂 Shēn gēbei stretch one’s arms 伸舌頭 shēn shétou stick out one’s tongue 伸大姆指 shēn dà mǔ zhǐ hold up one’s thumb 兩臂平伸 liǎng bì píng shēn extend (or stretch, spread) one’s arms horizontally 不要把頭伸出窗外。 Bùyào bǎ tóu shēnchū chuāngwài. Don’t put (or stick) your head out of the window. 他的手伸得太長了。 Tā de shǒu shēn de tài cháng le. He has overextended himself.

noun sth. serving as a support botany 花托 huātuō receptacle verb 1 hold in the palm; support with the hand or palm 托著盤子 Tuō zhe pánzi hold a tray on one’s palm 兩手托腮 liǎng shǒu tuō sāi cup one’s chin in one’s hands 2 serve as a foil (or contrast); set off 襯托 chèntuō set off; serve as a foil to verb 1 ask; entrust 托人買書 tuō rén mǎi shū ask sb. to buy books for one 托人照看孩子 tuō rén zhàokàn háizi leave a child in sb.’s care 這事就托給她吧。 Zhè shì jiù tuō gěi tā ba. Let’s leave the matter to her. 我想托你給他捎點兒東西。 Wǒ xiǎng tuō nǐ gěi tā shāo diǎnr dōngxi. I’d like you to take something to him. 2 plead; give as a pretext See 31889152托病tuo1bing4托病 3 rely upon; owe to See 31888896托庇tuo1bi4托庇 measure word physics torr (a unit of pressure)

verb 1 fear; dread; afraid of 怕蛇 pà shé afraid of snakes 我很怕在人前講話。 Wǒ hěn pà zài rén qián jiǎnghuà. I get nervous speaking in public. 2 cannot withstand; affected by 這種錶不怕水。 Zhèzhǒng biǎo bù pà shuǐ. This kind of watch is waterproof. 3 afraid something might happen; anxious about; concerned for (or about) 怕要下雨了, 你最好帶著傘。 Pà yào xià yǔ le, nǐ zuì hǎo dàizhe sǎn. It looks like rain, so better take an umbrella. 他怕遲到, 六點就動身了。 Tā pà chídào, liù diǎn jiù dòngshēn le. He started out at six for fear of being late. adverb [expressing supposition, judgement, estimation, etc.] I am afraid (that); I suppose; perhaps 事情怕不那麼簡單。 Shìqing pà bù nàme jiǎndān. I am afraid things are not that simple. 這個瓜怕有十幾斤吧。 Zhège guā pà yǒu shíjǐ jīn ba. This melon weighs over ten jin, I think.

verb 1 fall; drop; shed; come off 掉眼淚 diào yǎnlèi shed tears 掉水裡了 diào shuǐli le fall into the water 鎬頭掉了。 Gǎotou diào le. The pick-head has fallen off. 車前燈掉了。 chēqiándēng diào le. A car headlight has come off. 2 fall behind 他腳上打了泡, 掉在後面了。 Tā jiǎo shàng dǎ le pào, diào zài hòumian le. He got blisters on his feet, and fell behind. 3 lose; missing 我把鑰匙掉了。 Wǒ bǎ yàoshi diào le. I’ve lost my key. 這本書掉了兩頁。 Zhè běn shū diào le liǎng yè. Two pages are missing from the book. 4 reduce; drop; lessen 他害了一場大病, 體重掉了十多斤。 Tā hài le yī cháng dà bìng, tǐzhòng diào le shí duō jīn. During his serious illness he lost over ten jin. verb 1 wag; swing 掉尾巴 Diào wěiba wag the tail 掉臂而去 diàobì'érqù leave in a flurry 2 turn; U-turn 把車頭掉過來 bǎ chētóu diào guò lái turn the car round 3 change; exchange 掉座位 diào zuòwèi change (or exchange) seats; swap places verb [after certain verbs to indicate removal] 擦掉 cādiào wipe off 扔掉 rēngdiào throw away 洗掉 xǐdiào wash out 改掉壞習氣 gǎidiào huài xíqì correct bad habits

noun 1 mouth 嘴上說說而已 zuǐ shàng shuōshuo éryǐ pay lip service 閉上嘴 bì shàng zuǐ keep one’s mouth shut 你這張嘴啊！ Nǐ zhè zhāng zuǐ a! What a tongue you’ve got! 2 anything shaped or functioning like a mouth 瓶嘴兒 píngzuǐr the mouth of a bottle 茶壺嘴兒 Cháhú zuǐr the spout of a teapot
adverb slightly; faintly 微微一笑 wēiwēi yī xiào smile faintly noun micromicro-; pico-

verb stick up; hold up; bend upwards; turn upwards 翹起拇指 qiào qǐ mǔzhǐ hold up one’s thumb 你的頭髮翹起來了, 要梳一梳。 Nǐ de tóufa qiào qǐ lái le, yào shū yī shū. A lock of your hair is sticking up. Go and comb it.
noun 1 lune; luniform; crescent (moon); new moon 2 crescent; shaped like crescent moon 月牙兜兒 yuèyá dōur crescent pocket

verb 1 verbally abuse; curse; swear; call names 他罵我是笨蛋。 Tā mà wǒ shì bèndàn. He called me an idiot. 2 condemn; rebuke; reprove; scold 把孩子罵了一頓 Bǎ háizi mà le yī dùn give one’s child a scolding (or dressing down) 他爹罵他不長進。 Tā diē mà tā bù zhǎng jìn. His father blamed him for not making progress. 這樣鋪張浪費, 沒有一個人不罵。 Zhèyàng pūzhāng làngfèi, méiyǒu yī ge rén bù mà. Such extravagance is condemned by all.

verb 1 pause 他頓了一下, 又接著往下說。 Tā dùn le yīxià, yòu jiēzhe wǎng xià shuō. He paused a moment and then went on speaking. 2 calligraphy pause with the brush in order to reinforce the beginning or ending of a stroke 3 arrange; settle 安頓 āndùn help settle down 4 dated touch the ground (with one's head) 頓首 dùnshǒu kowtow 5 stamp (one's foot) 頓足 dùnzú stamp adverb literary suddenly; immediately 頓感傷悲 dùn gǎn shāngbēi gripped by a feeling of sadness measure word [indicating frequency] 說了他一頓 shuō le tā yī dùn give him a dressing down 一天三頓飯 yī tiān sān dùn fàn three meals a day adjective fatigued; tired 勞頓 láodùn weary

verb 1 button up; buckle; clasp 扣扳機 kòu bānjī pull (or press) the trigger 扣扣子 kòu kòuzi do up the buttons 把門扣上 bǎ mén kòu shàng latch (or bolt) the door 把皮帶扣上 bǎ pídài kòu shàng buckle a belt 把衣服扣上 bǎ yīfu kòu shàng button (up) one’s coat 環環相扣 huánhuánxiāngkòu each (ring) linked with another 扣子扣不上。 kòuzikòu bù shàng. The button won’t clasp. 2 place (a cup, bowl, etc.) upside down; cover with an inverted cup, bowl, etc. 把缸扣過來。 Bǎ gāng kòu guòlai. Turn the vat upside down. 用碗把菜扣上, 免得涼了。 Yòng wǎn bǎ cài kòu shàng, miǎnde liáng le. Cover the food with a bowl to keep it from getting cold. 3 detain; take into custody; arrest 把可疑分子扣起來 Bǎ kěyí fènzǐ kòu qǐlai detain a suspect 他違反交通規則, 交警扣了他的自行車。 Tā wéifǎn jiāotōng guīzé, jiāojǐng kòu le tā de zìxíngchē. The policeman held his bike because he had violated traffic regulations. or He had his bike taken away by a policeman for violating traffic regulations. 4 deduct; dock; discount 扣分 kòufēn deduct school marks 扣工資 Kòu gōngzī deduct a part of sb.’s pay 打九扣 dǎ jiǔ kòu give a 10 per cent discount 5 smash; spike 扣球 kòuqiú smash a ball 6 impose; brand groundlessly; accuse unjustly 被人扣黑鍋 bèi rén kòu hēiguō be made a scapegoat noun 1 knot 繩扣兒 shéng kòur a knot (in a rope) 繫個扣兒 xì ge kòur tie ( or make) a knot 2 circle of thread (on a screw) 擰了三扣 níng le sān kòu drive in a screw in three twists noun button; buckle 扣式電池 kòushìdiànchí button cell 雙排扣 shuāngpáikòu double-breasted

noun colloquial 1 pocket money 媽媽給了他五塊錢做零花。 Māma gěi le tā wǔ kuài qián zuò línghuā. Mother gave him five yuan as pocket money. 2 extra income 做點兒小買賣掙點兒零花 Zuò diǎnr xiǎomǎimai zhèng diǎnrlínghuā do some odd business to make a little extra money verb spend money on minor purchases 這點兒錢留著在路上零花吧！ zhèdiǎnr qián liú zhe zài lùshanglínghuā ba! Keep this money for incidental expenses on the way.

verb endure hardships, adversity, rough conditions, etc.; have a hard time 大熱天穿這麼厚的衣服, 真受罪！ Dà rètiān chuān zhème hòu de yīfu, zhēn shòuzuì! It’s awful wearing these heavy clothes on such a hot day. See 23253504活受罪huo2shou4zui4活受罪

noun sunlight; sunshine 陽光充足 Yángguāng chōngzú full of sunlight; with plenty of sunshine (or sun); sunny 陽光普照大地。 Yángguāng pǔzhào dàdì. Sunlight floods the earth. or The sun illuminates every corner of the land. adjective 1 cheerful; optimistic 陽光男孩 yángguāng nánháir cheerful boy 2 open; transparent 陽光採購 yángguāng cǎigòu transparent purchase 陽光操作 yángguāng cāozuò transparent operation
1 to pass through 2 to penetrate 3 by means of 4 via
noun leaves (of a tree); foliage 樹葉掉了怕打破頭 shùyè diào le pà dǎpò tóu fear the falling leaves will break one’s head

verb sprinkle; spray; spill; shed 灑農藥 sǎ nóngyào spray pesticide 甘灑熱血為人民 Gān sǎ rèxuè wèi rénmín willingly shed one’s blood for the people 別把湯灑了。 Bié bǎ tāng sǎ le. Don’t spill the soup. adjective natural and unrestrained See 29266688灑脫sa3tuo1灑脫

noun 1 grass 羊兒在山上吃草。 yáng r zài shān shàng chī cǎo. The sheep are grazing on the hillside. 2 straw 草可以做飼料, 也可以造紙。 Cǎo kěyǐ zuò sìliào, yě kěyǐ zàozhǐ. Straw can be used both for fodder and for papermaking. 3 dated countryside; wilderness 落草為寇 luòcǎowéikòu take to the greenwood and become an outlaw adjective 1 careless; rough 這幾個字寫得太草。 Zhè jǐ ge zì xiě de tài cǎo. These characters are written in a sloppy hand. 2 draft; initial See 18185984草案cao3an4草案 verb draft 起草 qǐcǎo make a draft noun 1 calligraphy cursive script 狂草 kuángcǎo highly cursive script 2 running (or cursive) hand of a phonetic alphabet adjective colloquial of female livestock or poultry See 18193920草雞cao3ji1草雞;18196736草驢cao3lv2草驢

verb 1 drape over one's shoulders; wrap around 披上衣服 pī shàng yīfu throw on some clothes 披著羊皮的狼 pī zhe yángpí de láng wolf in sheep’s clothing 披上節日的盛裝 pī shàng jiérì de shèngzhuāng be colourfully decorated for the festival 披著合法的外衣, 幹著非法的勾當 pī zhe héfǎ de wàiyī, gàn zhe fēifǎ de gòudàng carry on illegal activities under the cloak of legality 2 open; unroll; spread out 披卷 pījuàn browse 3 split open; crack 竹竿披了。 zhúgān pī le. The bamboo pole has split. 4 (of hair, etc.) hang down 披著頭髮 pī zhe tóufa let one’s hair down; with one’s hair down

measure word 1 storey; floor 十五層大樓 Shíwǔ céng dàlóu a fifteen-storey building 我住一層。 Wǒ zhù yī céng. I live on the ground floor (UK) / first floor (US). 2 a component part in a sequence 他這話還有一層意思。 Tā zhè huà hái yǒu yī céng yìsi. What he said has further implications. 我聽了那話, 又多了一層顧慮。 Wǒ tīng le nà huà, yòu duō le yī céng gùlǜ. When I heard this, my misgivings increased. 這段文字有兩層意思。 Zhè duàn wénzì yǒu liǎng céng yìsi. This passage has two levels of discourse. 3 layer; stratum 塗上一層油漆 tú shàng yī céng yóuqī give sth. a coat of paint 桌上積了厚厚的一層灰塵。 Zhuō shàng jī le hòu hòu de yī céng huīchén. The desk is covered with a thick layer of dust. noun layer; tier 表層 biǎocéng surface layer See 18238208層巒疊嶂ceng2luan2die2zhang4層巒疊嶂

noun 1 astronomy ring of light (round a planet) 土星周圍沿赤道面有三個光環。 Tǔxīng zhōuwéi yán chìdào miàn yǒu sān ge guānghuán. Saturn is encircled by a system of three rings lying in the plane of its equator. 2 halo (round the head of a god or saint) 3 luminous ring 4 figurative glory; distinction; splendour 明星的光環 míngxīng deguānghuán splendour of a star

noun hometown; native place; birthplace 第二故鄉 Dì-èr gùxiāng second home 舉頭望明月, 低頭思故鄉。(李白《靜夜思》) jǔtóu wàng míngyuè, dītóu sī gùxiāng. Raising my head, I look at the bright moon; | Bending my head, I think of home.

adjective quiet; peaceful; silent; calm 安靜的環境 Ānjìng de huánjìng tranquil surroundings 絕對安靜 juéduì ānjìng absolutely quiet 使啼哭的嬰兒安靜下來 shǐ tíkū de yīng'ér ānjìng xiàlai pacify a crying baby 將手指貼近嘴唇以示安靜 jiāng shǒuzhǐ tiējìn zuǐchún yǐ shì ānjìng place a finger to one’s lips to signal silence 保持安靜！ Bǎochí ānjìng! Silence! 病人需要安靜。 Bìngrén xūyào ānjìng. The patient needs peace and quiet. 周圍安安靜靜的。 Everything around was still and quiet. or All is quiet. 大幕一拉開, 觀眾頓時安靜下來。 Dà mù yī lākai, guānzhòng dùnshí ānjìng xiàlai. As soon as the curtain rose, the audience quieted down. verb quiet down 大幕一拉開, 觀眾頓時安靜下來。 Dà mù yī lākai, guānzhòng dùnshí ānjìng xiàlai. As soon as the curtain rose, the audience quieted down.

adjective 1 be in harmony; be in accord 和諧 héxié harmonious 2 literary come to an agreement; settle 事諧之後, 即可動身。 Shì xié zhīhòu, jíkě dòngshēn. We shall set out immediately once the matter is settled. adjective humorous 詼諧 huīxié humorous; jocular
noun 1 neighbourhood 2 people of the neighbourhood; neighbours 處理好鄰里關係 Chǔlǐ hǎo línlǐ guānxi get along with one’s neighbours
1 (after a noun) between; among; amid 2 (used after certain bisyllabic words to form expressions indicating a short period of time, e.g. 彈指之間tánzhǐzhījiān [彈指之間])
to extend

noun depths; recesses 在密林深處 Zài mìlín shēnchù in the depths (or recesses) of the forest 在靈魂深處 zài línghún shēnchù in one’s innermost soul 在內心深處 zài nèixīn shēnchù in the depth (or innermost recesses) of one’s heart 在思想深處 zài sīxiǎng shēnchù in one’s heart of hearts
verb make money (or a profit) 賺大錢的生意 zhuàn dà qián de shēngyi highly profitable business

verb medicine be allergic 皮膚過敏 pífū guòmǐn skin allergy 他對花粉過敏。 Tā duì huāfěn guòmǐn. He is allergic to pollen . 他對青霉素過敏。 Tā duì qīngméisù guòmǐn. He is allergic to penicillin. See 29779968神經過敏shen2jing1guo4min3神經過敏 adjective over-sensitive; touchy 你別太過敏了。 Nǐ bié tài guòmǐn le. Don’t be over-sensitive.

noun 1 quality 質量好 zhìliàng hǎo of high quality 質量不高 zhìliàng bù gāo of low quality; inferior 質量檢查制度 zhìliàng jiǎnchá zhìdù rules for quality tests 提高質量 tígāo zhìliàng improve the quality 2 physics mass 相對質量 xiāngduì zhìliàng relative mass

noun physique; constitution 增強體質 zēngqiáng tǐzhì build up health; strengthen the body; build up strength 各人的體質不同, 對疾病的抵抗力也不同。 Gèrén de tǐzhì bùtóng, duì jíbìng de dǐkànglì yě bùtóng. People’s constitutions differ and so does their resistance to disease. 他們的體質都很好。 Tāmen de tǐzhì dōu hěn hǎo. They are all strong and healthy.

verb rigorously enforce 嚴格規章制度 yángé guīzhāng zhìdù rigorously enforce rules and regulations adjective strict; rigorous; rigid; stringent 嚴格的規定 yángé de guīdìng rigid (or stringent) rule 嚴格說來 yángé shuōlái strictly speaking 嚴格履行協定條款 Yángé lǚxíng xiédìng tiáokuǎn strictly implement the terms of the agreement
noun peanut; groundnut
noun right 勞動的權利 Láodòng de quánlì the right to work 受教育的權利 shòu jiàoyù de quánlì the right to education

noun 1 power; authority 權力下放 quánlì xiàfàng transfer (or delegate) power to lower levels 國家權力機關 Guójiā quánlì jīguān organs of state power 一切權力屬於人民。 Yīqiè quánlì shǔyú rénmín. All power belongs to the people. 2 scope of power; extent of authority; jurisdiction 行使會議主席的權力 xíngshǐ huìyì zhǔxí de quánlì exercise the functions of chairman of a conference; invoke the authority of chairman of a conference 這是他權力範圍以內的事。 Zhè shì tā quánlì fànwéi yǐnèi de shì. This matter comes within his jurisdiction.

verb 1 design; plan 設計版面 shèjì bǎnmiàn lay out a printed page 設計一座廠房 Shèjì yī zuò chǎngfáng make designs for a factory building 設計一座水壩 shèjì yī zuò shuǐbà project a dam 設計一種新機器 shèjì yī zhǒng xīn jīqì design a new machine 2 work out a plan (or scheme) 設計陷害 shèjì xiànhài plot a frame-up; frame
noun 1 scene in a play, film, or TV drama 2 scene; sight 活躍的場景 Huóyuè dechǎngjǐng lively scene

noun both sides; the two parties 雙方犯規 shuāngfāngfànguī double foul 雙方同意 shuāngfāng tóngyì by mutual consent 雙方對等原則 shuāngfāng duìděng yuánzé principle of being equitable to both parties 締約國雙方 dìyuēguó shuāngfāng both signatory states; the contracting parties 雙方各執一詞。 Shuāngfāng gèzhíyīcí. Each side persisted in its own views.

noun 1 speech; talk 鼓舞人心的講話 Gǔwǔ rénxīn de jiǎnghuà inspiring speech 他講話不大靈。 Tā jiǎnghuà bùdà líng. What he says doesn’t carry much weight. 2 talks [in titles of books that set out basic information] 《語法修辭講話》 《Yǔfǎ Xiūcí Jiǎnghuà》 Talks on Grammar and Rhetoric verb 1 (-//-) speak; talk; address 對著話筒講話 Duì zhe huàtǒng jiǎnghuà speak into a microphone 他在會上講了話。 Tā zài huì shàng jiǎng le huà. He spoke at the meeting. or He addressed the meeting. 2 criticize 你這樣搞特殊, 難怪人家要講話。 Nǐ zhèyàng gǎo tèshū, nánguài rénjia yào jiǎnghuà. You seek personal privileges and naturally others will talk.

verb outstrip; surpass; exceed 超過限度 Chāoguò xiàndù go beyond the limit 超過規定的速度 chāoguò guīdìng de sùdù exceed the speed limit 超過歷史最高水平 chāoguò lìshǐ zuìgāo shuǐpíng top all previous records 超過世界先進水平 chāoguò shìjiè xiānjìn shuǐpíng surpass advanced world standards 有利條件超過困難條件。 Yǒulì tiáojiàn chāoguò kùnnan tiáojiàn. Favourable conditions outweigh difficulties. 到會的代表已超過百分之九十。 Dàohuì de dàibiǎo yǐ chāoguò bǎifēn zhī jiǔshí. More than 90 per cent of the delegates to the conference have arrived.
verb less than 少於一百 shǎoyú yībǎi less than a hundred 少於預計 shǎoyú yùjì less than expected
go nowhere; meet one’s doom
idiom one divides into two—everything has its good and bad sides; there are two sides to everything

verb 1 race to control; seize; grab 搶占制高點 Qiǎngzhàn zhìgāodiǎn race to control a commanding point 2 unlawfully occupy 這家工廠搶占了附近學校的一塊地。 Zhè jiā gōngchǎng qiǎngzhàn le fùjìn xuéxiào de yī kuài dì. The factory was unlawfully built on a piece of land which belongs to a nearby school.
idiom He who stays near vermilion gets stained red, and he who stays near ink gets stained black.—one tends to take on the colour of one's company; influenced by surroundings
cultivate; raise
verb read; peruse 閱讀雜誌 yuèdú zázhì read magazines 廣泛閱讀 guǎngfàn yuèdú read extensively 快速閱讀 kuàisù yuèdú speed reading

noun colloquial all one's life; throughout one's life; as long as one lives; lifetime 一輩子也忘不了。 Yī bèizi yě wàngbuliǎo. I won’t forget as long as I live. 這工作我準備幹它一輩子。 Zhè gōngzuò wǒ zhǔnbèi gàn tā yī bèizi. I’m taking this as a lifelong job.
verb 1 destroy oneself 自毀健康 zìhuǐ jiànkāng ruin one’s (own) health 2 military self-destroying 導彈自毀 dǎodàn zì huǐ missile self-destruction

noun 1 future; prospect 你的孩子又聰明又用功, 一定前程遠大。 Nǐ de háizi yòu cōngming yòu yònggōng, yīdìng qiánchéng yuǎndà. Your son is smart and diligent; he definitely has a bright future before him. 2 dated desired career or high rank (sought after by an intellectual or official)

noun 1 the Lord on High (in ancient Chinese thought, a deity who watches over human society and regulates the working of the universe) 2 Christianity God 願上帝保佑你！ yuàn Shàngdì bǎoyòu nǐ! God bless you! 顧客是上帝。 Gùkè shì Shàngdì. Customers come first.
1 to close (a door) 2 to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)
noun 1 Taoist school; Taoism 2 dated superstitious cults See 70184362會道門兒hui4dao4men2r5會道門兒

verb 1 open; unfold 打開門 dǎkāi mén open the door 打開蓋子 dǎkāi gàizi take off the lid 打開缺口 dǎkāi quēkǒu make a breach 2 turn on; switch on 打開收音機 dǎkāi shōuyīnjī turn on the radio 打開電燈 dǎkāi diàndēng turn on the light 3 open up; widen 打開局面 Dǎkāi júmiàn open up a new prospect; make a breakthrough 打開銷路 dǎkāi xiāolù develop new markets for a product 打開眼界 dǎkāi yǎnjiè widen one’s horizon

noun 1 fan 扇狀星雲 shàn zhuàng xīngyún fan-shaped nebula 2 a sliding, hinged, or detachable flat part; leaf 八扇屏風 Bā shàn píngfēng an eight-leaf screen measure word [for doors, windows, etc.] 一扇門 yī shàn mén a door 兩扇窗子 liǎng shàn chuāngzi two windows
noun window 開窗 kāi chuāng open the window 看窗外 kàn chuāngwài look out of the window 靠窗的座位 kào chuāng de zuòwèi window seat
(old) wife
noun 1 hotel 北京飯店 Běijīng fàndiàn Beijing Hotel 2 restaurant
to switch off; to shut off

noun gate of a pass; gate of a stronghold; city gate verb (-//-) 1 (of a shop, etc.) close 展覽館下午六點半關門。 Zhǎnlǎnguǎn xiàwǔ liù diǎn bàn guānmén. The exhibition centre closes at 6:30 p.m. 2 colloquial (of a business) close down 公司管理不善, 最後只好關門。 gōngsī guǎnlǐ bùshàn, zuìhòu zhǐhǎo guānmén. In the end, due to mismanagement the company had no choice but to close down. 3 refuse discussion or consideration; slam the door on sth. 採取關門(主義的)態度 Cǎiqǔ guānmén tàidu adopt a closed-door attitude; outright refusal 4 behind closed doors; without outside contact; exclusion 我們不能關門辦報。 Wǒmen bùnéng guānmén bànbào. We must not run a newspaper from behind closed doors. adjective final; last 關門之作 guānmén zhī zuò final piece of work; swan song
cask

noun principle; theory; law; tenet 根本原理 gēnběn yuánlǐ cardinal principle 運用原理 yùnyòng yuánlǐ apply the principle (of) 數學的基本原理 shùxué de jīběn yuánlǐ fundamentals of mathematics 馬克思列寧主義的基本原理 Mǎkèsī-Lièníngzhǔyì de jīběn yuánlǐ fundamental tenets of Marxism-Leninism

noun decision; resolution 通過一項決定 tōngguò yī xiàng juédìng pass a resolution verb 1 decide; resolve; make up one's mind 一時決定不了 yīshí juédìng bùliǎo undecided for the time being; be unable to decide at this moment 理事會決定下屆比賽將在北京舉行。 Lǐshìhuì juédìng xiàjiè bǐsài jiāng zài Běijīng jǔxíng. The Council decided that the next match would be held in Beijing. 2 determine; decide 存在決定意識。 Cúnzài juédìng yìshi. Man’s social being determines consciousness. adjective decisive 決定因素 juédìng yīnsù decisive factor; determinant
noun 1 tub; pail; bucket; keg; barrel 桶裝啤酒 tǒngzhuāng píjiǔ barrelled beer; draught beer 汽油桶 qìyóutǒng petrol drum 一桶牛奶 yī tǒng niúnǎi a pail of milk 2 barrel (of petroleum)

noun 1 outfit; clothing 滑雪裝 huáxuězhuāng ski suit 2 stage makeup and costume 卸裝 xièzhuāng remove stage makeup and costume verb 1 dress up; attire; deck; play the part (or role) of; act 她裝老大娘真像。 Tā zhuāng lǎodàniáng zhēn xiàng. She acted an old woman and really looked the part. 2 pretend; feign; make believe 裝出一副可憐相 Zhuāng chū yī fù kěliánxiàng assume a pitiful look 不要不懂裝懂。 Bùyào bùdǒngzhuāngdǒng. Don’t pretend to know when you don’t. 她不是真哭, 是裝的。 Tā bù shì zhēn kū, shì zhuāng de. She wasn’t really crying, just pretending. verb 1 load; pack; hold 裝桶 zhuāng tǒng fill the cask (or barrel) 裝箱 zhuāngxiāng pack a box; put in a crate; crate 裝煙袋 zhuāng yāndài fill one’s pipe 這書包裝不下這麼多東西。 Zhè shūbāo zhuāng bù xià zhème duō dōngxi. This satchel can’t hold so much. 2 install; fit; assemble 裝個無線電 zhuāng ge wúxiàndiàn assemble a radio set 給門裝上鎖 Gěi mén zhuāng shàng suǒ fit a lock on the door 我們村家家戶戶都裝上了電燈。 Wǒmen cūn jiājiāhùhù dōu zhuāng shàng le diàndēng. Electric lights have been installed in every house in our village. or Every house in our village now has electric lights.
noun 1 amount (or volume) of water 水量不足 shuǐliàng bùzú water shortage 2 dialect swimming skill

noun 1 physics pressure (force) 大氣壓力 dàqì yālì atmospheric (or barometric) pressure 2 overwhelming force; pressure 外界壓力 wàijiè yālì outside pressure 對某人施加壓力 duì mǒurén shījiā yālì bring pressure to bear on sb. 在輿論的壓力下 zài yúlùn de yālì xià under the pressure of public opinion 3 burden; strain 運輸壓力 yùnshū yālì strain on transportation
1 to roll up 2 roll 3 classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

verb 1 way out; outlet 給某人以生活出路 gěi mǒurén yǐ shēnghuó chūlù provide sb. with the opportunity to earn a living 河道淤塞, 水無出路。 Hédào yūsè, shuǐ wú chūlù. The riverbed is silted up, so there’s no outlet for the floodwater. 他們在森林裡迷失了方向, 找不到出路。 Tāmen zài sēnlín lǐ míshī le fāngxiàng, zhǎo bùdào chūlù. They lost their bearings in the forest and couldn’t find their way out. 堅持這種觀點是沒有出路的。 jiānchí zhèzhǒng guāndiǎn shì méiyǒu chūlù de. You won’t get anywhere if you cling to this idea. 2 outlet for goods 給滯銷商品找個出路 Gěi zhìxiāo shāngpǐn zhǎo ge chūlù find an outlet for unsalable goods

noun internal; domestic; home 國內貿易 guónèi màoyì domestic trade 國內市場 guónèi shìchǎng domestic (or home) market 國內新聞 guónèi xīnwén home news 國內形勢 guónèi xíngshì domestic situation; internal conditions 國內治安 guónèi zhì'ān internal security 國內外形勢 guónèiwài xíngshì the situation at home and abroad

noun external; overseas; abroad 國外來信 guówài láixìn letter from abroad 國外投資 guówài tóuzī investment in foreign countries 國外市場 guówài shìchǎng overseas (or foreign) market 國外事務 guówài shìwù external affairs
seek a way out
well-known phrase The gift is trifling but the feeling is profound. or (It's nothing much, but) it's the thought that counts.
noun gift; present 生日禮物 shēng ri lǐ wù birthday present 聖誕禮物 Shèngdàn lǐwù Christmas gift
noun tender regards; affection; goodwill 深厚的情意 shēnhòu de qíngyì deep affection

adjective 1 deep; profound 深厚的感情 shēnhòu de gǎnqíng deep (or profound) feelings 結成深厚的友誼 jiéchéng shēnhòu de yǒuyì establish a profound friendship 2 solid; deep-seated 深厚的基礎 shēnhòu de jīchǔ solid foundation
verb give sb. a present; present a gift to sb. 請客送禮 qǐngkèsònglǐ give dinners and send gifts (in order to curry favour)
not at all; by no means

pronoun itself; in itself 條約本身 Tiáoyuē běnshēn the treaty per se 院子裡雜草叢生, 但房子本身完好無損。 Yuànzi lǐ zácǎocóngshēng, dàn fángzi běnshēn wánhǎowúsǔn. The yard is full of weeds, but the house itself is in good condition.

verb contain; embody; include 沒有什麼事物是不包含矛盾的。 Méiyǒu shénme shìwù shì bù bāohán máodùn de. There is nothing that does not contain contradictions. 這句話包含好幾層意思。 Zhè jù huà bāohán hǎojǐ céng yìsi. This statement has quite a few implications.

noun wish; greetings 致以良好的祝願 zhìyǐ liánghǎo de zhùyuàn with best wishes verb wish; hope for 祝願貴國日益繁榮昌盛。 Zhùyuàn guìguó rìyì fánróngchāngshèng. We wish your country ever growing prosperity. or May your country enjoy increasing prosperity.
noun friendly feelings (or sentiments) 兄弟情誼 xiōng-dì qíngyì brotherly affection 戰鬥情誼 zhàndòu qíngyì militant bonds of friendship
adjective sincere; cordial 真摯的友誼 Zhēnzhì de yǒuyì sincere friendship
valuable

adjective 1 rough; fierce; savage; unreasoning 野蠻 yěmán savage; cruel 2 reckless; rash See 26502144蠻幹man2gan4蠻幹 noun archaic the tribes in Southern China adverb dialect quite; pretty 蠻有意思 mán yǒu yìsi quite interesting 這電影蠻好。 Zhè diànyǐng mán hǎo. This is quite a good film. or This is a pretty good film.
verb disturb; trouble 對不起, 打攪您了！ Duìbuqǐ, dǎjiǎo nín le! Sorry to have bothered you. 人家正在工作, 別去打攪他了。 Rénjia zhèng zài gōngzuò, bié qù dǎjiǎo tā le. He’s working. Don’t disturb him.
verb 1 make up a missed lesson 教師給學生補課。 Jiàoshī gěi xuésheng bǔkè. The teacher helped his pupils make up the lesson they had missed. 2 do over again sth. not well done; redo

verb imitate; copy; model oneself on 模仿動物的叫聲 mófǎng dòngwù de jiàoshēng imitate the cries of animals 兒童的模仿能力很強。 értóng demófǎng nénglì hěn qiáng. Children are very imitative. 這部機器是模仿上海的一種新產品製造的。 Zhè bù jīqì shì mófǎng Shànghǎi de yī zhǒng xīn chǎnpǐn zhìzào de. This machine is modelled on one recently made in Shanghai.

verb yearn for; look forward to 嚮往著北京 xiàngwǎng zhe Běijīng yearn for Beijing 嚮往幸福的新生活 xiàngwǎng xìngfú de xīn shēnghuó look forward to a happy new life 我終於登上了嚮往已久的長城。 Wǒ zhōngyú dēng shàng le xiàngwǎng yǐ jiǔ de Chángchéng. At long last, I climbed to the top of the Great Wall, which I had wanted to do for a long time.

verb usually literary go to; leave for; proceed to 代表團已動身前往日內瓦。 Dàibiǎotuán yǐ dòngshēn qiánwǎng Rìnèiwǎ. The delegation has left for Geneva. 他們將由西安前往延安。 Tāmen jiāng yóu Xī'ān qiánwǎng Yán'ān. From Xi’an they will proceed to Yan’an.
1 (embryology) to involute; involution 2 (neologism c. 2017) (of a society) to become more and more of a rat race; to become increasingly competitive (due to limited resources)
(neologism c. 2014) (slang) to stop striving (esp. when one knows one cannot succeed); to let it all go to hell; (sports) to tank
noun egg roll (made of eggs mixed with flour and sugar)
adjective anxious; troubled; have worries and misgivings 焦慮不安 jiāolǜbù'ān on tenterhooks; anxious 我為她的病情感到焦慮。 wǒ wèi tā de bìngqíng gǎndào jiāolǜ. I am anxious about her illness.

verb 1 lose one's way; get lost 天太黑, 我迷了路。 Tiān tài hēi, wǒ mí le lù. I lost my way because it was too dark. 2 figurative go astray 在生活的旅途中迷了路 zài shēnghuó de lǚ túzhōng mí le lù go astray on one’s life’s journey noun anatomy labyrinth (a part of inner ear) 骨迷路 gǔ mílù bony labyrinth 膜迷路 mò mí lù membranous labyrinth
noun spider 蜘蛛絲 zhīzhūsī the thread of a spider web; cobweb 蜘蛛網 zhīzhūwǎng spider (or spider’s) web; cobweb
noun medicine pneumonia

noun festival; red-letter day; holiday 節日氣氛 jiérì qìfēn festive air 慶祝節日 qìngzhù jiérì celebrate (or observe) a festival 致以節日的問候 zhìyǐ jiérì de wènhòu extend holiday greetings 穿上節日的盛裝 chuān shàng jiérì de shèngzhuāng in one’s holiday best; in gala dress

noun surrounding feeling; atmosphere 他是在宗教氣氛中長大的。 Tā shì zài zōngjiào qìfēn zhōng zhǎngdà de. He was brought up in a religious atmosphere. 討論會的氣氛始終很熱烈。 Tǎolùnhuì de qìfēn shǐzhōng hěn rèliè. The atmosphere was lively throughout the discussion. 會談在親切友好的氣氛中進行。 Huìtán zài qīnqièyǒuhǎo deqìfēn zhōng jìnxíng. The talks were held in a cordial and friendly atmosphere.

noun strike; industrial action 號召罷工 Hàozhào bàgōng call a strike 鎮壓罷工 zhènyā bàgōng suppress (or put down) a strike 舉行為期一周的罷工 jǔxíng wéiqī yī zhōu debàgōng stage a one-week walkout verb (-//-) strike; go on strike 為增加工資而罷工 wèi zēngjiā gōngzī ér bàgōng strike for better pay 為抗議惡劣工作條件而罷工 wèi kàngyì èliè gōngzuò tiáojiàn ér bàgōng strike against bad working conditions 工人已經罷了三天工。 gōngrén yǐjing bàle sān tiāngōng. The workers have been on strike for three days now.

verb worry; feel anxious 我真擔心她的健康。 Wǒ zhēn dānxīn tā de jiànkāng. I do worry about her health. 快給老大娘寫信, 免得她擔心。 Kuài gěi lǎodàniáng xiěxìn, miǎnde tā dānxīn. Write to the old lady at once so as to set her mind at rest.
noun 1 skill 2 kung fu 3 VARIANT OF 21658112工夫gong1fu5工夫 a time b spare (or free) time c dialect period of time d effort; work

noun 1 time 明天有工夫再來吧。 Míngtiān yǒu gōngfu zài lái ba. Come again tomorrow if you have time. 他三天工夫就學會了滑冰。 Tā sān tiān gōngfu jiù xuéhuì le huábīng. It took him only three days to learn to skate. 她去了沒多大工夫就回來了。 Tā qù le méi duō dà gōngfu jiù huílai le. She didn’t take long to get there and come back. 2 spare (or free) time 你有工夫旅遊嗎？ nǐ yǒu gōngfu lǚyóu ma? Do you have time for travelling? 3 dialect period of time 我們說話那工夫他還在這兒。 Wǒmen shuōhuà nà gōngfu tā hái zài zhèr. He was still here when we were talking. 4 effort; work 費工夫 fèi gōngfu consume time 花了好大工夫 Huā le hǎo dà gōngfu put in a lot of work

verb 1 go to the street; go shopping 上街看看 Shàngjiē kànkan go window-shopping 我陪媽媽上了一趟街。 Wǒ péi māma shàng le yī tàng jiē. I went shopping with my mother. 2 take to the streets; go on to the streets 上街遊行(示威) shàngjiē yóuxíng(shìwēi) take to the streets
noun evening of entertainment; soiree; social evening; evening party 除夕晚會 Chúxī wǎnhuì New Year’s Eve entertainment (or party)

adjective cold and cheerless; desolate; lonely; deserted 冷清清的小巷 Lěngqīngqīng de xiǎoxiàng deserted lane 冷清清的月色 lěngqīngqīng de yuèsè cold and cheerless moonlight 通跨院兒的月亮門冷清清地開著。 Tōng kuà yuànr de yuèliang mén lěngqīngqīng de kāizhe. A moon gate, forlorn and uninviting, opened into a side yard.

adjective cold and cheerless; desolate; lonely; deserted 冷清的商店 lěngqing de shāngdiàn deserted shop 冷清的舊房子 lěngqing de jiù fángzi desolate (or lonely) old house 冷清的遊樂場 lěngqing de yóulèchǎng unfrequented pleasure resort 生意冷清。 shēngyi lěngqing Business is dull. 他一個人住著很冷清。 Tā yī ge rén zhù zhe hěn lěngqing. He’s very lonely living all by himself.

adjective lively; bustling (with noise and excitement) 熱鬧的菜市場 Rènao de càishìchǎng food market bustling with activity; busy food market 晚會很熱鬧。 Wǎnhuì hěn rènao. It was a very lively evening party. 大家熱熱鬧鬧玩了個痛快。 Dàjiā rèrènaonao wán le ge tòngkuai. Everyone had a terrific time. verb liven up; have a jolly time 你說個笑話讓大伙兒熱鬧熱鬧吧。 Nǐ shuō ge xiàohua ràng dàhuǒr rènao rènao ba. Tell us a joke to liven things up. noun scene of bustle and excitement; thrilling sight 節日裡街上有熱鬧看。 Jiérì lǐ jiēshang yǒu rènao kàn. There will be lots of fun to watch in the streets during the holidays. See 24867840看熱鬧kan4re4nao5看熱鬧
verb celebrate 慶祝國慶 qìngzhù Guóqìng celebrate National Day
noun armed forces; army; troops
noun rank-and-file soldier; private
noun good fortune; good luck adjective fortunate; lucky 幸運垂青於勇者。 xìngyùn chuíqīng yú yǒng zhě. Fortune favours the brave.
noun misfortune; adversity 遭到不幸 zāodào bùxìng meet with misfortune adjective unfortunate; sad 不幸的消息 bùxìng de xiāoxi sad news 他不幸以身殉職。 Tā bùxìng yǐshēnxùnzhí. To our great sorrow he died at his post.

verb push and squeeze 不要擁擠！ Bùyào yōngjǐ! Don’t push! adjective crowded; packed 上下班時間, 公共汽車特別擁擠。 Shàng xiàbān shíjiān, gōnggòng qìchē tèbié yōngjǐ. The buses are especially crowded during the rush hours.
noun Spring Festival; Chinese New Year
Lantern Festival (15th of the 1st lunar month)
noun All Saints' Day
noun 1 Christmas Day (Dec. 25) 2 Christmastime; Christmastide (Dec. 24-Jan. 6)
noun National Day (in China observed on October 1) 歡度國慶節 Huāndù Guóqìngjié celebrate National Day
dragon dance
lion dance (traditional Chinese dance form)
noun Avenue des Champs-Élysées (France)

entry.headword: 千里送鹅毛，礼轻情意重
千里送鵝毛，禮輕情意重
entry.defn: goose feather sent from afar, a trifling present with a weighty thought behind it (idiom); It's not the gift that counts, but the thought behind it.
perfectionist

verb win; gain 贏得獨立 Yíngdé dúlì win (or attain) independence 贏得群眾的贊揚 yíngdé qúnzhòng de zànyáng win praise from the masses 贏得長時間的掌聲 yíngdé cháng shíjiān de zhǎngshēng draw prolonged applause 贏得大多數的支持 yíngdé dàduōshù de zhīchí obtain (or win, gain) the support of the great majority

noun 1 youth; youthfulness 把青春獻給祖國 bǎ qīngchūn xiàngěi zǔguó dedicate one’s youth to serving one’s country 充滿著青春的活力 chōngmǎn zhe qīngchūn de huólì be bursting with youthful vigour 老廠恢復了青春。 Lǎo chǎng huīfù le qīngchūn. The old factory has regained its old vigour. 2 dated age of a young person 青春幾何？ qīngchūn jǐhé How old is the youth?

adjective 1 vast and hazy 大雪紛飛, 原野一片迷茫。 Dàxuěfēnfēi, yuányě yī piàn mímáng. The vast plain was obscured by the falling snow. 2 confused; perplexed; dazed 他臉上顯出迷茫的神情。 Tā liǎnshàng xiǎnchū mímáng de shénqíng. There was a confused look on his face. or He looked perplexed.

adverb immediately; at once; right away; in the turn of a hand 立刻去 lìkè qù go right away 立刻回答 lìkè huídá answer (a question) immediately; make an instant reply 鈴聲一響, 教室裡立刻安靜下來。 Língshēng yī xiǎng, jiàoshì lǐ lìkè ānjìng xiàlai. As soon as the bell rang, the classroom quietened down at once.

noun point of time; hour; moment 歡樂的時刻 Huānlè de shíkè time of rejoicing 幸福的時刻 xìngfú de shíkè happy moment 在此關鍵時刻 zài cǐ guānjiàn shíkè at this crucial hour; at this critical moment 處於重要的歷史時刻 chǔyú zhòngyào de lìshǐ shíkè at a critical historical juncture adverb constantly; always 時刻準備保衛祖國 shíkè zhǔnbèi bǎowèi zǔguó ready to defend the country at all times 時時刻刻為人民利益著想 shíshíkèkè wèi rénmín lìyì zhuóxiǎng never forget the people’s interests

noun abbreviation literature jueju; quatrain 五絕 wǔjué pentasyllabic quatrain 七絕 qījué heptasyllabic quatrain verb 1 cut off; sever 絕其後路 Jué qíhòu lù cut off his retreat 掌聲不絕 zhǎngshēng bù jué prolonged applause 2 cease breathing; die adjective 1 exhausted; used up; finished 法子都想絕了。 Fǎzi dōu xiǎng jué le. All possible ways have been tried. or All possibilities have been exhausted. 2 desperate; hopeless 3 unique; superb; matchless 她發的那球真絕。 Tā fā de nà qiú zhēn jué. Her serve was a beauty. 4 leave no leeway; make no allowance; uncompromising 儘管他不同意, 但是沒把話說絕。 jǐnguǎn tā bùtóng yì, dànshì méi bǎ huàshuō jué. He disagreed, but said nothing definitive. adverb 1 extremely; most 絕大多數 juédàduōshù most; the overwhelming majority 絕大的錯誤 Jué dà de cuòwù an egregious error; a grievous fault 絕好的機會 jué hǎo de jīhuì an excellent opportunity 2 [before a negative] absolutely; in the least; by any means; on any account 絕非偶然 juéfēi ǒurán by no means fortuitous 絕無此意 jué wú cǐ yì have absolutely no such intentions 絕不可粗心大意 jué bùkě cūxīndàyì must on no account be negligent

verb satisfied; feel pleased; content 大家對他的工作很滿意。 Dàjiā duì tā de gōngzuò hěn mǎnyì. Everyone was pleased with his work. 雙方對會談的結果表示滿意。 Shuāngfāng duì huìtán de jiéguǒ biǎoshì mǎnyì. Both sides are satisfied (or expressed satisfaction) with the results of the talks. adjective satisfactory; gratified 她滿意地笑了。 Tā mǎnyì de xiào le. She smiled with content. 他給了我一個滿意的答復。 Tā gěi le wǒ yī ge mǎnyì de dáfù. He gave me a satisfactory reply.

verb 1 step back 退卻 tuìquè retreat; withdraw 2 drive back; repulse See 28876544卻敵que4di2卻敵 3 decline; refuse 推卻 tuīquè refuse; decline auxiliary [after a verb to indicate completion of an action] 冷卻 lěngquè become (or make) cool adverb but; yet; however 文章雖短卻很有力。 Wénzhāng suī duǎn què hěn yǒu lì. The essay is short but forceful. 這樣推理很周全, 卻說服不了我。 Zhèyàng tuīlǐ hěn zhōuquán, què shuōfú bùliǎo wǒ. The logic is sound, and yet it does not convince me. 她有許多話要說, 一時卻什麼也說不出來。 Tā yǒu xǔduō huà yào shuō, yīshí què shénme yě shuō bù chūlai. She had a lot to say, but at the time she was unable to utter a word.
adverb sometimes; at times; now and then 那裡的天氣有時冷, 有時熱。 Nàli de tiānqì yǒushí lěng, yǒushí rè. The weather there is now cold, now hot.
verb writing 寫作技巧 xiězuò jìqiǎo writing technique 從事寫作 Cóngshì xiězuò take up writing as one’s career

noun 1 colloquial brain 2 brains; mind; head 腦子活 nǎozi huó quick-witted 沒腦子 méi nǎozi have no brains; unthinking; stupid 問題是複雜的, 我們的腦子也要複雜一點兒。 wèntí shì fùzá de, wǒmen denǎozi yě yào fùzá yīdiǎnr. The problems are complicated, so we must think more carefully, too.

conjunction 1 in a word; in short; in brief 我是既沒工夫又沒興趣, 總之, 我不幹。 Wǒ shì jì méi gōngfu yòu méi xìngqù, zǒngzhī, wǒ bù gàn. I have neither the time nor the inclination; in short, I refuse to do it. 2 anyway; anyhow 確切地址我記不清了, 總之是在頤和園附近。 Quèqiè dìzhǐ wǒ jìbuqīng le, zǒngzhī shì zài Yíhéyuán fùjìn. I can’t remember the exact address, but it’s somewhere near the Summer Palace.

conjunction even; even if; even though; even granted that; notwithstanding 即使下雨我也去。 Jíshǐ xiàyǔ wǒ yě qù. I’ll go anyway even if it rains. 即使跟我沒有關係, 我也要管。 Jíshǐ gēn wǒ méiyǒu guānxi, wǒ yě yào guǎn. I shall make it my business even if it had nothing to do with me. 即使條件再好, 也還要靠自己努力。 Jíshǐ tiáojiàn zài hǎo, yě hái yào kào zìjǐ nǔlì. No matter how favourable the conditions are, we’ll still rely on our own efforts.
noun examination paper; test paper 批改試卷 pīgǎi shìjuàn mark the exam papers; grade exams 出英語試卷 chū Yīngyǔ shìjuàn set an English paper
verb solve a (mathematical, etc.) problem; give the answer to

verb 1 ought to be; should be 按歲數排, 該老潘排第一。 Àn suìshu pái, gāi lǎo Pān pái dì-yī. By seniority, Old Pan should go first. 2 be sb.'s turn (or duty) to do sth.; fall to sb. 該我了。 gāi wǒ le. It’s my turn now. 你要是聽了他的話, 就該你倒霉。 Nǐ yào shì tīng le tā de huà, jiù gāi nǐ dǎoméi. You’re in for trouble if you’ve followed his advice. 3 deserve; merit; serve sb. right 該打 gāidǎ deserve a good beating 4 must; should; ought to 該罰 gāi fá should be punished 我該走了。 Wǒ gāi zǒu le. I must be off now. 我不該來。 Wǒ bù gāi lái. I shouldn’t have come. 5 [no negative form; not to be used alone in answering a question] will probably; most likely; can be reasonably or naturally expected to; ought to; should 該畢業了 gāi bìyè le due to graduate 他該到了。 tā gāi dàoliǎo. He ought to be here by now. 6 [in exclamatory sentences for emphasis] 這些樹長大成林時, 風景該(有)多美！ Zhèxiē shù zhǎngdà chénglín shí, fēngjǐng gāi duō měi! When these trees grow into a forest, how beautiful the scenery will be! verb owe (money or debt) 該他一份人情 gāi tā yī fèn rénqíng owe him a favour 我該他五元錢。 Wǒ gāi tā wǔ yuán qián. I owe him five yuan. pronoun literary this; that; the said; the above-mentioned 該廠 Gāi chǎng this (or the said) factory VARIANT OF 21347328賅gai1賅 adjective literary complete; full; comprehensive; all-inclusive
1 to change over to 2 to switch to 3 to use (sth different)

noun consciousness; awareness 法律意識 fǎlǜ yìshi law awareness 思想意識 sīxiǎngyìshi ideology 宗教意識 zōngjiào yìshi religious consciousness 增強全民族的環保意識 zēngqiáng quán mínzú de huán-bǎo yìshi enhance the whole nation’s awareness of environmental protection 他傷得很重, 但意識還算清醒。 tā shāng de hěn zhòng, dàn yìshi hái suàn qīngxǐng. He is badly hurt, but still conscious. verb [usu. with 到] be conscious (or aware) of; awake to; realize 他意識到了自己的責任。 Tā yìshi dàoliǎo zìjǐ de zérèn. He has become conscious of his responsibilities. 這一點我當時還沒意識到。 Zhè yīdiǎn wǒ dāngshí hái méi yìshi dào. I didn’t realize this at the time. 她充分意識到將會遇到的困難。 Tā chōngfèn yìshi dào jiāng huì yùdào de kùnnan. She is fully aware of the difficulties awaiting her.

adjective firm; strong; unyielding; indomitable (opp. 柔) 以柔剋剛 yǐróukègāng overcome hardness with softness 他的性情太剛。 Tā de xìngqíng tài gāng. He has a very strong character. adverb 1 just; exactly; precisely 這雙鞋大小剛合適。 Zhè shuāng xié dàxiǎo gāng héshì. This pair of shoes is just the right size (or fits perfectly). 2 barely; only; just; no more than 剛到八點。 gāng dào bā diǎn. It’s just eight o’clock. 他剛十八歲, 有了選舉權。 Tā gāng shíbā suì, yǒu le xuǎnjǔquán. He just turned 18 and has the right to vote. 3 only a short while ago; just 她剛走。 Tā gāng zǒu. She just left. 她剛來過。 Tā gāng lái guò. She was here just now.

verb realize; fulfill; carry out; bring about 實現理想 shíxiàn lǐxiǎng realize one’s ideal 實現諾言 shíxiàn nuòyán fulfill one’s promises 實現零的突破 shíxiàn líng de tūpò fulfill the zero (gold medal, etc.) breakthrough; win one’s first... 實現民族復興 shíxiàn mínzú fùxīng bring about the rejuvenation of the nation 實現祖國統一 shíxiàn zǔguó tǒngyī reunify the motherland 實現科學技術現代化 shíxiàn kēxué jìshù xiàndàihuà modernize science and technology 他的夙願實現了。 Tā de sùyuàn shíxiàn le. His long-cherished wish has come true. 她實現了當演員的願望。 Tā shíxiàn le dāng yǎnyuán de yuànwàng. She realized her ambition to become an actress.
adjective colloquial (of work) well done; done carefully 實實在在的做法 shíshízaizai de zuòfǎ down-to-earth practice 工作做得很實在。 Gōngzuò zuò de hěn shízai! The work is well done.

verb 1 draw near; approach 靠近些。 Kào jìn xiē. Come closer. 輪船慢慢地靠近碼頭。 Lúnchuán mànmàn de kàojìn mǎtou. The ship is gradually nearing the dock. 2 close to; near 靠近我們小區有一家超市。 kàojìn wǒmen xiǎoqū yǒu yījiā chāoshì. There’s a supermarket near our neighbourhood. 兩人坐得十分靠近。 Liǎng rén zuò de shífēn kàojìn. The two of them sat quite close together.

noun 1 thought; thinking; ideology 思想波動 sīxiǎng bōdòng in a restless state of mind 思想過硬 sīxiǎng guòyìng mentally tough; with strong conviction and able to stand severe emotional strain 思想簡單 sīxiǎng jiǎndān be simple-minded 思想僵化 sīxiǎng jiānghuà rigid mind; mental stagnation 思想交鋒 sīxiǎng jiāofēng confrontation of ideas 思想自由 sīxiǎng zìyóu freedom of thought 思想內容好 sīxiǎng nèiróng hǎo have good ideological content; be politically correct 思想跟不上形勢 sīxiǎng gēnbushàng xíngshì lag behind the trend of the times in one’s understanding 搞通思想 gǎotōng sīxiǎng straighten out one’s thinking 解放思想 jiěfàng sīxiǎng emancipate one’s mind 軍事思想 jūnshì sīxiǎng military thinking 有思想準備 yǒu sīxiǎng zhǔnbèi be mentally prepared 解除思想顧慮 jiěchú sīxiǎng gùlǜ free one’s mind of misgivings 解開思想疙瘩 jiěkāi sīxiǎng gēda dispel a mental block 2 idea; intention 打消了出國留學的思想 dǎxiāo le chūguó liúxué desīxiǎng give up the idea of studying abroad verb (-//-) consider; think of 思前想後 sīqiánxiǎnghòu think over again and again; turn over in one’s mind
run all over the place; dash about

verb 1 evade; dodge; avoid (meeting sb.) 迴避困難 huíbì kùnnan avoid difficulties 迴避行為 huíbì xíngwéi elusive behaviour 迴避要害問題 huíbì yàohài wèntí evade (or sidestep) the crucial question 他迴避我的問題, 不作答復。 Tā huíbì wǒ de wèntí, bù zuò dáfù. He avoided answering my questions. 2 law withdraw 如果審判員是案件的當事人, 應當自行迴避。 Rúguǒ shěnpànyuán shì ànjiàn de dāngshìrén, yīngdāng zìxíng huíbì. If the judge is a party to the case, he/she should offer to withdraw or excuse himself/herself.
brief commentary
noun antagonism; confrontation; hostility 兩國之間的對抗 liǎng guó zhījiān de duìkàng confrontation between two states verb resist; oppose
idiom go off into flights of fancy; give way to foolish fancies; let one's imagination run away with one 無根據地胡思亂想 Wú gēnjùdì hú sī luàn xiǎng disregard reality and indulge in flights of fancy
1 to set (the tone, a target etc) 2 to lay down (the beat)

verb struggle; fight; strive 奮鬥到底 fèndòudàodǐ struggle to the end 奮鬥目標 fèndòumùbiāo objective of a struggle 為民族復興事業奮鬥終身 wèi mínzú fùxīng shìyè fèndòu zhōngshēn fight all one’s life for rejuvenation of the nation; dedicate one’s life to rejuvenation of the nation

adjective 1 limited; finite 人生有限, 知識無限。 Rénshēng yǒuxiàn, zhīshi wúxiàn. There is a limit to one’s life, but no limit to knowledge. 2 not many (or much); not high in degree 為數有限 wéi shù yǒuxiàn limited in number 對情況了解有限 duì qíngkuàng liǎojiě yǒuxiàn have a limited knowledge of the situation 名額有限。 míng'é yǒuxiàn There is a fixed number of quotas.

adverb at an early date; as soon as possible; before it is too late 有病要及早治。 Yǒu bìng yào jízǎo zhì. When you are ill, see the doctor as soon as possible. 一有消息, 請及早通知我。 Yī yǒu xiāoxi, qǐng jízǎo tōngzhī wǒ. Please let me know as soon as you get any news. 既然知道錯了, 就要及早回頭。 Jìrán zhīdao cuò le, jiù yào jízǎo huítóu. Now that you know you are wrong, you should mend your ways without delay.

verb 1 prepare; get ready 為會議準備文件 wèi huìyì zhǔnbèi wénjiàn prepare documents for a meeting 作最壞的準備 zuò zuì huài de zhǔnbèi prepare for the worst 你準備好了嗎？ Nǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo le ma？ Are you ready? 可能還會有更大的洪水到來, 我們必須有所準備。 Kěnéng hái huì yǒu gèng dà de hóngshuǐ dàolái, wǒmen bìxū yǒusuǒ zhǔnbèi. Worse floods are likely, so we must be prepared. 2 intend; plan 今年暑假我準備回老家看看。 Jīnnián shǔjià wǒ zhǔnbèi huí lǎojiā kànkan. I intend to visit my home town this summer vacation. 我們準備下星期一開始試驗。 Wǒmen zhǔnbèi xiàxīngqī yī kāishǐ shìyàn. We plan to start the experiment next Monday.

verb 1 get (hoarded goods, etc.) off one's hands; dispose of; sell (opp. 入手) 貨物已經出手了。 Huòwù yǐjing chūshǒu le. The goods have been disposed of. 2 give out 他相當大方, 一出手就給了一百元。 Tā xiāngdāng dàfang, yī chūshǒu jiù gěi le yībǎi yuán. He was quite generous and gave out 100 yuan. noun 1 length of a sleeve 你出手大約有七十釐米吧？ Nǐ chūshǒu dàyuē yǒu qīshí límǐ ba? Your sleeves would be about 70cm long. 2 skill displayed in making opening moves (in wushu, chess, etc.) 出手很快 chūshǒu hěn kuài quick to start, strike, smash, etc. See 19334144打出手da3chu1shou3打出手
verb destroy; damage 毀壞名譽 Huǐhuài míngyù ruin sb.’s reputation 洪水毀壞了鐵路。 Hóngshuǐ huǐhuài le tiělù. The flood damaged the railway.

noun sections and chapters; text; writing 篇章結構 Piānzhāng jiégòu structure of an article; composition 在民族解放鬥爭的史冊上寫下燦爛的篇章 zài mínzú jiěfàng dòuzhēng de shǐcè shàng xiě xià cànlàn de piānzhāng add an illustrious chapter to the annals of national liberation struggles
verb 1 military retreat; withdraw 戰略退卻 zhànlüè tuìquè strategic retreat 2 hang back; shrink back; flinch
conjunction colloquial even if; granted that 就算幹得不錯, 你也不應該驕傲吧。 jiùsuàn gàn de bùcuò, nǐ yě bù yīnggāi jiāo'ào ba. Granted you have done well, there is no reason to be conceited.
verb [as aux.] should; ought to 你應該知道。 Nǐ yīnggāi zhīdao. You ought to know. 你應該冷靜些。 Nǐ yīnggāi lěngjìng xiē. You should cool down. 事情就應該這樣。 Shìqing jiù yīnggāi zhèyàng. This is as it should be.

verb not stop; continue 接連不斷 jiēliánbùduàn one after another; in a row adverb unceasing; uninterruptedly; continuously; constantly 不斷進步 bùduàn jìnbù make continuous progress 不斷努力 bùduàn nǔlì make sustained efforts 不斷完善 bùduàn wánshàn steady improvement 不斷增長的人口 bùduàn zēngzhǎng de rénkǒu constantly swelling population 促進生產力的不斷發展 cùjìn shēngchǎnlì de bùduàn fāzhǎn promote uninterrupted (or continuous) growth of productive forces 先進單位不斷涌現。 Xiānjìn dānwèi bùduàn yǒngxiàn. Advanced units never stop emerging.

noun price 價格倒掛 jiàgé dàoguà reverse of price 價格反彈 jiàgé fǎntán price rebound 價格公道 jiàgé gōngdao with reasonable price 價格欺詐 jiàgé qīzhà pricing fraud 標明價格 Biāomíng jiàgé mark (goods) with a price tag; have goods clearly priced 放開價格 fàngkāi jiàgé relax price control; decontrol price

noun price 價錢公道 jiàqian gōngdào fair (or decent, reasonable) price 講價錢 jiǎng jiàqian haggle over the price; bargain 價錢在漲。 Jiàqian zài zhǎng. The prices are rising. 西紅柿什麼價錢？ Xīhóngshì shénme jiàqian？ How much are the tomatoes? 這張書桌你是什麼價錢買的？ Zhè zhāng shūzhuō nǐ shì shénme jiàqian mǎi de？ What price did you pay for this desk?
noun one's secrets; privacy 尊重個人隱私 Zūnzhòng gèrén yǐnsī respect individual’s privacy
1 can only 2 obliged to do sth 3 to have no other choice
noun intellectual power (or ability)

noun influence; effect 產生巨大影響 chǎnshēng jùdà yǐngxiǎng exert a tremendous influence; produce a great impact 月亮對潮汐的影響 yuèliang duì cháoxī de yǐngxiǎng influence of the moon on the tides 這篇文章很有影響。 Zhè piān wénzhāng hěn yǒu yǐngxiǎng. This article is making a strong impact. verb affect; influence 影響工作 yǐngxiǎng gōngzuò interfere with one’s work 影響威信 yǐngxiǎng wēixìn lower (or undermine) one’s prestige 影響質量 yǐngxiǎng zhìliàng impair the quality 影響工程進度 yǐngxiǎng gōngchéng jìndù hold up the project 影響群眾的積極性 yǐngxiǎng qúnzhòng de jījíxìng chill (or dampen) the enthusiasm of the masses 用自己的榜樣去影響孩子 Yòng zìjǐ de bǎngyàng qù yǐngxiǎng háizi try to influence children by personal example 別影響他複習功課。 Bié yǐngxiǎng tā fùxí gōngkè. Don’t disturb him while he is reviewing his lessons. 燈光不好會影響演出效果。 Dēngguāng bù hǎo huì yǐngxiǎng yǎnchū xiàoguǒ. Poor lighting will spoil the stage effect. adjective dated groundless; hearsay; gossip 影響之談 Yǐngxiǎng zhī tán speaking from hearsay
overwhelming majority

adjective 1 reasonable; justified; in the right 有理無情 yǒulǐ-wúqíng stick to the principle and disregard personal feelings 有理, 有利, 有節 yǒulǐ, yǒulì, yǒu jié on just ground, to one’s advantage, and with restraint 有理走遍天下, 無理寸步難行。 yǒulǐ zǒubiàn tiānxià, wúlǐ cùn bù nán xíng With justice on your side, you can go anywhere; without it, you cannot take a step. 2 mathematics rational
verb be of grounds; have evidence 出言有據 Chūyán yǒujù speak with convincing proof
to procrastinate
